Whether you are staying on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key for business or pleasure, we realize that in today’s modern era, access to the internet helps us all stay connected to those who matter the most. It is one of our standards to have a fee in place, however we have modified this in a small way and all internet in the lobby or The Mainstay Tavern is provided free of charge. This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms but for now it remains as a fee based service.   It was disappointing that you did not enjoy the food options as we have some very talented a creative Chef’s and have won the Florida Trend Magazines Golden Spoon award seven years in a row. One of our main focuses this year is on Food and Beverage options with an accent on local and regional cuisine and there will be many new menu items added to each of our Food and Beverage outlets throughout the hotel.  When next in the Clearwater Beach area be sure to stop in and check out those changes.

title: A Great Place to Kick Back
review: This place has pros and cons:  Cons:  We got there at 6:30 pm and the lady at check in said that the beachside restaurant closes at sunset. We headed straight there to find out it had closed at 5 pm (sunset is after 8 Pm). We were bummed but went inside to the tavern for dinner (after traveling to a beach vacation, we much rather would have eaten outside with a view than in a windowless indoor restaurant). We tried to go to the beachside/poolside restaurant again for breakfast the next morning but it didn’t open until 11 am. So we went inside to their breakfast buffet which was $23 but free for our small kids)..    The poolside bar had the same hours (11-5) which was a bummer for us. Had to go to the tavern inside to get drinks which we could take out to the pool or by the fire…

title: Fourth time - still lovin it
review: After staying here now four years in a row it’s actually my home away from home .   Check in was fine . John was friendly and gave me a room on the sixth floor as per my request .  Most everything stays the same year after year , which is a positive thing . Employees are the only thing that changes year to year .   This trip I had the pleasure of meeting two outstanding employees from our floor housekeeping .  Mario and Corrine . Thank you to them for enhancing my stay !!traveling with two teenage girls , we were always in need of extra towels and toiletries . Mario and Corrine were so helpful , and accommodating. They should be recognized for such detail paid to guests. My only complaint is the pool . Although it’s beautiful and tropic like , it is the most crowded pool I have…

title: Lovely Stay
review: We stayed at the Sheraton Sands with our two children for 4 nights at the end of our Orlando Holiday.  The hotel was nice, very clean and all of the staff were very helpful and friendly.  The room was very comfortable and clean however slightly dated.  Hotel pool area is lovely and food & drinks were to a high standard.  This is a very family friendly hotel and is in a fabulous location , slightly out of the centre of Clearwater but easily reached by the regular ‘jolly trolly’ which is a free service - alternately $6 in an Uber.  There are lovely restaurants nearby.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Island Grill - Great Food, Reasonable Prices
review: I am delighted that you enjoyed our Island Oasis and thank you for your recommendation. It is a lovely place with its beautiful views, breathtaking sunsets and palm trees slightly bending in the breeze. Relaxation therapy is what the Island of Sand Key is all about especially after a very busy time in Orlando. There is also much fun to be had; with our heated pool, our beautiful, large private beach along with all the beach games available and Sand Key Park being adjoining and so much more. The Sheraton Sand Key is a casual, welcoming beach resort which has been on this serene Island for many years and as you stated we are in close proximity to all the activity of Clearwater Beach area although not in the middle. Your very accurate transportation information to get you to the many dining venues and all this area offers is very much appreciated. We look forward to a return visit!

title: Perfect Couples Getaway
review: We returned to visit Clearwater this year and made sure we dined at the Island Grill.  They still had a great soup/salad bar.  They have reasonable prices and great service. The Clam Chowder was very delicious! The creamy base reminded us of the fantastic Lobster Bisque we had here 16 years ago. If we lived in the area, we would eat here all the time.

title: GREAT STAY/HOTEL - A++ Family Friendly!
review: We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate the review you have provided. It is always nice when your walk down memory lane does not disappoint you. Actually the same Chef has been making those soups for at least 20 + years and was delighted to hear your return was due to the soup and our efficient, caring and genuinely friendly associates. The Lobster Bisque is a favorite and can usually be found during Holiday’s such as New Year’s Eve and Valentine’s Day. I am pleased you enjoyed the Chowder, the Creamy Tomato Basil and the Cream of Mushroom are also delicious. Come back and visit us again and if you call ahead we will ensure we have a creamy soup for you.

title: Nice stay
review: They have updated the rooms which I appreciated. We always love the beach drink shack. Always clean and comfortable. The reason I gave it 4 stars is that the pool is deep and not super kid friendly. With the space they have a huge pool area would be better!

title: Good, not great
review: I chose this property because it is part of the Marriott family and it is on the beach.  There are some definite pros and cons to this resort.  Bottom line is it’s an outdated hotel with some improvement needed to be “Marriott” quality.    Pros - Beautiful and peaceful beach, nice pool, snack bar by the pool is convenient, Todd the concierge was GREAT, some front desk staff was great, location is a bit quieter than being right in Clearwater Beach which we liked, great spot to go walking each morning, pretty place to watch sunset,   Cons - both restaurants are windowless which is weird when you are on the beach, service and food in the casual dining restaurant was awful, breakfast buffet in fine dining restaurant NOT worth the money, if you want to sit by the ocean chairs are not…

title: Wonderful first-time stay at Sheraton Sand Key
review: Thank you for taking your valued time to write a very informative review. If you are seeking a healthy dose of happiness, you can find it on the 13 acres of private beach in the front of the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and Vitamin D might just be the magic pill. The best part; sunshine is free along with the beauty that surrounds us! This tropical paradises can immerse you in relaxation therapy and you are able to balance that with many of beach side amenities offered such as tennis, beach tennis, pickle-ball, volley ball and so much more. Sand Key Park being adjunct to our beach adds even more to do, you can find a mixture of nature, wildlife, walking trails and a large playground even a fishing place just a few minutes away.  Being on this Island Oasis surrounded by all the beauty that Mother Nature has shared with us with and a great work environment does inspire positive attitudes among associates such as Todd. He truly takes joy from being warm, welcoming and knowledgeable which enables him to ensure your stay is the experience you anticipated, he thanks you for recognizing him The hotel does provide complimentary loungers and hammocks in the sand, around the pool and many of the grassy areas around the resort along with a complementary shuttle to get you to the shore and we can not forget free trolley rides that will take you anywhere on these Barrier Islands. Concerning the cabanas, many area resorts include those charges for the cabanas along the shore in a nightly resort fee, which means rain or shine you have paid for those cabanas. We have opted not to include a resort fee or parking fee and there is no charge for many of our amenities such as the use of beach games mentioned. Those cabanas are a private concession, they charge $35 per day for the usage should the guest so choose to use. We agree a view would enhance the dining experience, the Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and was designed in the style of the era in which it was built. We are constantly renovating throughout the resort including all the Food and Beverage outlets we realize there is always more to be done. We are unable to change the location of our extremely large kitchen which is why the restaurants are located in the middle of the hotel. You are correct the choice is whether you want to be in the middle of all the activity of Clearwater Beach or away from the crowds and traffic here on the tranquil Island of Sand Key. Wherever you decide to stay we hope your travels will bring you back to the Clearwater Beach area as there is much more to see and explore.

title: Already planning for next year
review: After many years wanting to stay here we finally made it for 6 nights in mid- February 2019.  We used SPG 40,000 points for 4 nights with night 5 being free and night 6 as a free night award.  So glad we could arrange for this final goodbye to the SPG program as we will likely not be able to afford this under the new BonVoy program with higher points needed and higher hotel prices.  We were upgraded as Platinum members to a beautiful room on a high floor with a magnificent pool and ocean view.  The room was perfect with a very comfortable bed (as always).  The room attendants kept it spotlessly clean.  Loved the golf cart delivery to the Gulf when feeling lazy.  Loved our complimentary breakfast at Rusty's each morning.  Most mornings we were served by the lovely Diane.  Diane…

title: Overpriced but great location
review: Your review was truly a delight especially that you were treated with the recognition and respect you deserve and I am pleased you received that upgrade. That your stay was everything you anticipated and more is exactly what we strive for.  This is truly a tropical paradise: the beauty and tranquility of the Island of Sand Key, with the close proximity to all the activity of the Clearwater Beach area offers. Hoping you were able to enjoy several of the many surrounding beach towns, as each offers a distinct charm which allows you to find a stunning collection of recreational and cultural surprises sprinkled throughout this area… and includes many dining venues.  I thank you for recognizing Diane and your positive interaction with the many other associates. I will research who the person was who took you out to see the moon, I hope you also caught one of our breathtaking sunsets. Both Diane and the associate from the Club Lounge will be added to our associate recognition program, and thank you for recognizing them.  As with many things in today’s world there are changes; the global footprint of the legacy SPG program was quite limited, with roughly 1,500 properties. With the addition of the brands under the legacy Marriott umbrella, members now have over 6,500 properties from which to choose. In the newly combined program, this redemption option is sticking around.  May the many memories made and the positive interaction with our associates bring you back for another visit.

title: Nice, quick getaway to the beach!
review: I stayed just one night with my teenage daughter. We live  in Tampa and wanted to spend some time at the beach during her spring break.  We are Marriott Ambassador Elite members and were treated very well. We were greeted by Cydney who did a great job explaining everything about our stay. Our room was upgraded to a gulf view room, they let us check in early and check out late. We had access to the club room for happy hour and breakfast. Cydney also mentioned that we could enjoy the resort after we checked out as well and could use the fitness center to shower!  I agree with the other reviews that the bathroom is very small and the pool was way too crowded. We’ve stayed here outside of spring break and it’s more relaxing  All in all a nice stay.

title: Could've Been a Great Resort
review: My wife and I wanted a late winter get-a-way, so picked this Sheridan a bit removed from the more crowded Clearwater Beach Pier area. This resort has a great location: next to the Sand Key Park and within walking distance of several breakfast, lunch and dinner restaurants (and within short driving distance from many others.) The Good: The rooms are clean and the matresses are comfortable. The housekeeping staff and the outdoor staff are friendly. There is much free parking. The room has a fridge, safe and more hangers than the average hotel. It has a very large beachfront location with many free sand sports available. This resort also has many outdoor loungers, so each guest is always able to get one. (Loungers and cabanas are available on the beach from a third party at a hefty…

title: Great location but...........!
review: Dear Mr. Trippin: We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our services and focus on these issues. We cater to families and groups and unfortunately we do not have control on how many kids will be in the hotel, especially during spring break vacation. Kind regards

title: Great location
review: A five day break for 6 of us. Weather was great so plenty of use of the pool and the kids games facilities. The good things: 1) Plenty of sand games, football, volley ball, tennis etc to keep the kids entertained. 2) Staff very upbeat even when the hotel is very full. 3) Food good, a little limited, not a bad meal during our stay. 4) Beach fantastic....can't be bettered (except maybe Brancaster UK) 5) Good complimentary trolley service to Clearwater and beyond and a great app to track its progress. 6) Couple of good restaurants for breakfast and dinner 5 min walk (Maggie Mae's breakfast, Breakers for dinner)  Now the not so good. 1) pool small and can get VERY crowded (the swimming pool equivalent of standing room only!) 2) pools frequently out of action for "Incident requiring…

title: Great location
review: We visited here from UK after a hectic stay at Universal Orlando. The hotel is very well located on Sand Key with a beautiful beach a few minutes walk away. Although the hotel is dated, it still offers a great holiday full of the best activities and things you want to do on vacation. Great beach (Clearwater beach the best in USA) Tennis courts  Good Pool (busy but ok) Good restaurants Friendly staff  Great gym And Location location location  There are so many things to do in the area that we were so happy with the amount of choices. Beach, jet skiing attractions etc. Some really great local restaurants too like Island Grill and Columbia. It’s a fab tourist area.  Downside is poor WiFi and tiny bathroom  Overall a big plus from us.  Management please update the bathroom and WiFi…

title: Beautiful Resort...Grand Location..Great Staff
review: My first-time stay at Clearwater and although I haven't booked with Marriott-Starwood in a while, I chose the Sheraton Sand Key for the location and was not disappointed.  The beach here is beautiful, although quite a distance from the hotel. They will shuttle you back and forth! I had reserved a balcony room pool-view and instead was placed on the side by the tennis court.  Since we were only staying one night I decided to keep the room and take it up at check-out. Superb dining at Rusty's Bistro! Our server, Duane was top-notch and the food excellent. We took advantage of the free trolley to Clearwater Pier and free parking at this hotel is also a plus. The pool area was crowded and too small for this size resort, but we were here for the beach so it didn't matter. Upon…

title: The good and the nearly great
review: I had an almost opposite experience to other reviewers. I had stayed at this property 20 years ago (almost to the day) and expected it to be a bit tired, given the other reviews. In fact the property has held up great and is more substantial and feels better quality than some newer hotels.  By contrast having read about the amazing staff I was completely underwhelmed by the service. I was there with two children and we checked in after midnight and sent to a 1 king bed room. I should have checked, but it should have been obvious we were three people. I asked for a rollaway ($10) which took 30 minutes to arrive and three calls.  This set the tone for the service. Yes the staff say hello to you but they are not particularly helpful or approachable.  There is also some disconnect…

title: Nice resort away from the busy town
review: We came here for our 5th anniversary, booked via travel agent. Lobby looked grand and updated. They had a bottle champagne and card for us upon arrival at our room. We got a room facing the marina. The a/c units were right there so kinda loud but we tuned them out and still spent a lot of evenings on our balcony visiting. The room was basic but headboard, lamps, dressers looked updated. Bathroom and shower definitely hadn’t been updated, but worked fine. The bed was comfortable, felt lovely to sink into. I loved their pillows. Housekeeping was friendly and helpful. Just ask if you need anything, they are very quick to try and meet your needs. $5 voucher if you skip housecleaning each day, which we did for most of the 6 night stay. Used the voucher in gift shop. There’s a fire…

title: Quick getaway!
review: We had a wonderful quick stay during the Crabfest at the Sheraton Sand Key!  The hospitality is always wonderful. The employees, from custodial on up to administration are always smiling and helpful, making sure our stay was idealic.  Down the street at the pier was the annual sand sculpting and they were all amazing!  Weather beautiful, beaches sugar white.  Could not ask for a more idealic, relaxing setting for a quick getaway from home.

title: Forgettable
review: Firstly the positives:  - Excellent location on the beach - Good communal areas - Staff overall were helpful (especially Micheal the Australian guy)  However, the rooms in the hotel are dingy and outdated. I have stayed in Sheraton Hotels all over the world and this is by far the worst standard of room I have seen.   The cleanliness is poor. On arrival the fridge had not been emptied from the previous occupants. Leaving behind milk and hummus (nice smell).  Initially we were given a room on the third floor. The view was of a wall and also overlooked the rooftop where the extractors and aircon units were located. It was too noisy for my done to sleep. We requested to move and we were moved to 6th floor.  On the 6th floor the noise was slightly reduced but the view was not much…

title: hotel
review: The staff was very helpful.  We had a lovely time.  A bit of a walk to beach if you have a lot, but hotel provides cart ride to water's edge.  I ate dinner there one night and the food was very good.  The noise level can be high, depending on location.

title: Another fantastic holiday
review: The Island of Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; beautiful sunsets, walks on along the shore, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or relax. True the beach is a bit of a walk and I can empathize with you completely; it is 1300 feet or 0.25 miles or around a 4-5 minute walk, Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptionally large beaches. We do understand the distance can be an inconvenience which is the reason we have added a 6 person beach complementary shuttle to get you back and forth to the beach whenever needed. We have also added beach wagons which will conveniently help you get your children or what is needed down to the shore to enjoy your day at the beach. This time of the year we also have the Beach Buggy which delivers food and beverage right to the water’s edge and we now have a server taking and delivering orders right to your lounge chair or table around the pool. There have been hammocks, chairs and loungers placed in the sand for relaxing in the sun and conveniently near the bathrooms, turtle bar or what might be needed. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. It is our associate’s number one goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and to provide “Go Beyond” customer service. Which is why a review such as yours is truly an incentive for everyone from management down to continue to provide the customer service and amenities that made your stay the experience you anticipated. Thank you and Hurry Back!

title: Great hotel on a great beach
review: Well what can I say an amazing holiday. This is due to the hotels lovely staff, lucky to have Janet to greet and check us in. Never in our 23 stays at this hotel have I ever had a complaint stay Twice a year 2 weeks in the spring and 3 weeks in August. Plenty of choice if you wish to eat at the hotel excellent food, rooms clean plus all facilities pool grounds lots to do. Even a cart to take you down to the sea. Clearwater was busy because of Spring Break,  cross the bridge onto Sand Key a lot quieter and plenty of room on the beach. Cannot wait to return in August. A big thank you for making our holiday special.

title: 5 star holiday.
review: I worked in Clearwater in the tourism industry from 1999 and 2006.  The Sheraton Sand Key Resort was the go-to property when we wanted to impress clients.  It has one of the largest beach areas in Pinellas County.

title: Great stay - wish it could have been longer!
review: Thank you for the great complement and sharing your experiences on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort does offer the same beautiful views; 13 acres of large private beach which can be so serene that it brings a calmness and true relaxation therapy along with those same breathtaking sunsets. It also is in close proximity to all the entertainment and activity that the Clearwater Beach area offers. Yes this area is truly a tropical paradise and hurry back!

title: Beautiful beach
review: We always go to Clearwater but this was our first time staying here. We loved it, it literally on the beach. There are a bunch of free games on sand. The bell man, Paul gave us a great over view of resort. Can wait to go back.

title: Nice for families
review: Overall this was a fun hotel. I loved the family game area and beach. The main restaurant had good food.  It was nice having the trolley service right out front. The pool activities for kids was fun. The pool is on the small side, but was fine.  The room itself was ok, but the bathroom set up is awful. Our family of four had a hard time with it.  The bathroom itself was small and the wash area was outside. But, the hand towel hanger is inside the bathroom. It was just awkward.  The only other negative I had was the poolside cafe.  I had a chicken sandwich and could barely eat it.  Other than that, it’s a pleasant place with friendly staff.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Like this hotel. Free parking, nice room with a balcony. The pool area was great. A bit long walk to take a swim in the ocean even though this hotel is on the beach. Free shuttle to “downtown “ and pier 60. The negatives is that it is something wrong with the acoustics in the lounge, the noice level was very high. Also the WiFi was slow

title: Amazing flushing
review: I would have given this resort 4 stars because the pool is really small, however everything else is just fantastic.  This is not a modern hotel, but it is spotless, the food affordable, the beach is endless, the games and activities from volleyball to checkers to tennis and pickeball also are great, the water unbelievably clear, the personnel kind and helpful, finally the toilet flushing in the room was powerful, as in an airplane, never seen anywhere else such strength!

title: What a nice resort!
review: My husband and I decided to run away from the cold temps in Michigan, and hang out in Clearwater for a week.  We stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key, which as hotels go, was a really nice surprise.  It is located south of Clearwater, and their beach was not half as packed as the beach at the Clearwater Pier .  Their Bistro restaurant, was top-notch....the red snapper dinner was  incredible.  The rooms were very clean, our view of the pool/ocean was nice, and I loved having a 24 hour store for snacks at night, and coffee/donuts in the morning.  The staff throughout the hotel were so accommodating, and the Jolley Trolley picks up right outside their door.  Clearwater is a spot we would travel to again, and the Sheraton Sand Key Resort is at the top of our list of hotels.  Thank you…

title: Business Leader
review: I spend +100 nights in hotels a year and I am Titanium Elite for life with Marriott.  This is my review while staying at this property and after communicating with them prior our arrival.   First of all, the location is nice, right in the beach and with a beautiful sunset.  It could be really nice... but it isn’t.   1) We were not well greeted upon checking in.  The man who checked us in lacked any kind of hospitality and was rather rude.  2) The Hotel is worn down and tired.  Low ceilings, dark but at least it doesn’t smell from mold.   3) The restaurants are all shielded from the sunlight.  Not one window despite the excellent location right on the beach.   If you don’t like burgers and wings, there is really only one restaurant called Rusty’s.  It is big, empty and dark.   4)…

title: Great Resort with Terrific Staff and Lots to Do!
review: Your recognition to the ladies who assisted you in our Club Lounge on Sunday is not only a great motivator it is also a great thank you. It has been shared with those associates and they have been added to our associate recognition program which highlights our associate’s commitment to providing exceptional service to you our guest. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting many of your expectations. That the Front Desk associate did not recognize your loyalty along with the other issue noted such as your Club Lounge experience has been reviewed and addressed by the appropriate management. You are correct as a Marriott Bonvoy Titanium Elite as you should have been treated with the recognition and respect you deserve, as should all of our guests. There are times especially during this our high season when we do an extreme high volume of Marriott Bonvoy Elites including Platinum Plus/Titanium/Ambassador Elite’s (averaging over 90 daily) and during this high season on the #1 beach in Florida it has become a challenge for us. Finding solutions to the issues noted is high on our priority list as we do value you our loyal guest, we again truly apologize. Please let me invite you back during one of our many more tranquil months and there are many when we may better serve your needs.

title: Nice spot on the beach to spend a couple of days.
review: Our first visit and will happily come back. Super friendly and helpful staff throughout the property.  Lots of activities onsite including tennis, billiards, hammocks, and other beach games.  Great access to a terrific private beach.  Nice heated pool. Clearly not a “new” property but well maintained and a fun place to stay.  Highly recommended!!

title: Friendly, Clean & Relaxing
review: Thank you the beautiful Island of Sand Key definitely promotes relaxation and fun in the sun. It is always very encouraging to read such positive comments particularly when it comes from those who matter the most – you!

title: Top notch service!
review: We stayed here for a couple of days in between Spring Training days. We were upgraded to ocean view but otherwise room was very basic with a tiny bathroom. There were no issues with housekeeping. Executive lounge is excellent but extremely busy. It seemed like if you did not get there at the dot of when it opened you do not get a table. There was water and pop available throughout the day. The lounge staff were very attentive and kept everything well stocked. They were all great especially Erica who could not do enough. This hotel is right on a large beach and food at the restaurants was very reasonable. The parking lot was jammed but at least is free. Note though that the area roads are extremely congested and you should allow plenty of time to get where you are going.

title: Wonderful Staff. Great stay
review: From the very warm welcome from Holly, to the staff person who walked me to the ice machine I couldn’t find, to morning coffee from Louis at Rusty’s. Staff are exceptional.  Nice pool with lots of chairs. Short walk to the beach. (<5 min) Beach Volleyball courts, tennis courts are great.  Room was clean and comfortable. Safe in closet. Nice to have sink/mirrors outside of toilet/shower room.  We enjoyed main floor walk out room at pool.

title: Great location, great staff, small bathroom
review: That your stay was wonderful to read and that you enjoyed all the amenities provided is truly gratifying. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. In your case Holly and Louis are continue to be high on the list for often being recognized for their continued efficient, knowledgeable and genuine caring attitude. We hope your interaction with all of our associates and the beauty that surrounds the tranquil Island of Sand Key will bring you back for another visit soon.

title: Always wanted to stay on the gulf....not disappointed
review: Overall, I really enjoyed my stay. The room was updated and had a large king bed. It was firmer than I prefer, but fine for the three nights I was there. The staff were all incredibly helpful, and the waiters at the bar and Rusty’s were very good. My only complaint was the size of the tiny bathroom (but at least the sink was located outside it and had counter space) and yeh lack of water pressure in the shower. I’m 5’7”, and it was a trick getting the top of my head soaked. The showers would be a struggle for someone 6’ tall, I would imagine.   The hotel is right on the beach and has a lovely pool area as well.

title: Great hotel in a convenient location and not far from beaches. Great price too.
review: I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay on our little tropical Island of Sand Key, we are a casual beach hotel a place for flip flops and suntan lotion with long relaxing days on the beach or around the pool. Where you will find breathtaking sunsets and beautiful views along with many amenities inside and ending the evening gathering our fire pit with the beverage of choice. Our associates are caring, efficient and friendly and that you for recognizing them.  The Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and that was the architectural design of the era in which the hotel was built, at that time there was a different concept of what minimum bathroom space was. Although we are constantly renovating, replacing the worn with new, making changes and improvements we realize there is always more to be done. We are excited that we have made the first steps towards that total renovation of our guest room bathrooms and look forward to sharing our plans once details and scheduling are finalized. We look forward to a return visit when no tricks will be needed to get your head wet.

title: Weekend at the Beach
review: My husband and I go to Florida most every spring and stay in St.Petersburg.  This year we went in February and decided to stay on the gulf in Clearwater.  We were not disappointed.  The Sheraton Sand Key is a beautiful resort with so many wonderful experiences. We were staying for 6 nights.  Check in was great; the only thing when I was asked if we were members of the Sheraton and I said no, I wish he would have offered to sign us up.  I've signed up since I've been home but I'm not sure I will get credit for our stay in February.  The housekeeping was great...Harriet is awesome.  We could tell when she didn't clean our room (2 different days) but we always had fresh towels and water.  The beds were very comfy and there were plenty of pillows.  The restaurants were great too. …

title: Mixed review
review: We stayed at Sheraton Sand Key for just under a week.  We've stayed there before a number of times but it was many years ago.  The positives:  - check in was very friendly and efficient.   - staff (housekeeping, shop, pool area) were also friendly and efficient - Rusty's restaurant and staff were very good - we had the buffet dinner - as mentioned in many reviews, the location and beach are excellent - housekeeping the first 2 days of our stay was perfect  The not-so positives: - rooms are getting tired, especially the bathrooms - housekeeping the remainder of our stay was poor - lots of amenities not refilled/replaced (cups, glasses, coffee, complimentary water bottle, towels) - bed making was essentially not done - the sheet was just thrown on the bed with comforter over top,…

title: Casual restaurant in hotel
review: Thank you for your informative review and we sincerely appreciate your recent visit and hope that it brought back some treasured memories of the past. This is truly a slice of paradise and I am pleased you enjoyed our proximity to the beach, which offers sunshine, warm breezes, the smell of salt water and the gentle roar of the waves all combined to create a sense of peace and calm during your beach get-away and later maybe a dip in the pool. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and that was the architectural design of the era in which the hotel was built, at that time there was a different concept of what minimum bathroom space was. Although we are constantly renovating, replacing the worn with new, making changes and improvements we realize there is always more to be done. We are excited that we have made the first steps towards that total renovation of our guest room bathrooms and look forward to sharing our plans once details and scheduling are finalized. I apologize for your Housekeeper and your comment has been reviewed by the Director of Guest serves and addressed as a teachable moment. As for the rates they do fluctuate, we are in our peak season and please let me assure you those rates are less during our many more tranquil months keep checking your resources on rates and please return!

title: Nice visit but could have been better!
review: Food taste, portions and price was excellent. Server David made the experience even better than great. Water refills, quick table clearing, attentive and friendly truly made the evening enjoyed. Enjoyed hotel location.

title: Honestly the BEST
review: Welcome to our beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key and we thank you for your positive comments and delighted that you enjoyed the service and the culinary options during your dining experience. One of our main focuses this year is on Food and Beverage options with an accent on local and regional cuisine. There will be many new menu items added to each of our Food and Beverage outlets throughout the hotel. David has been added to our associate recognition program due to your comment and sends a personal thank you. I do hope the beauty of the location and your interaction with our associates will bring you back for another visit soon.

title: Best customer service in FLA
review: Beautiful resort, excellent food, relatively close to the beach, and many conveniences at your disposal. Having made our reservations over 2 weeks in advance, we thought they could have handled our request for a feather-free room and extra pillows. Two of our 4 pillows were feather as was the down comforter. The housekeeper quickly addressed the problem but brought a thin blanket in place of the comforter. The foam pillows had no firmness and collapsed in the middle (see picture). Otherwise, the bed was very comfortable.   The restaurants had marvelous food and service.  We were very pleased with the all-you-can eat crab legs and the attentive service that Walter provided. The breakfast buffet had a nice assortment of hot and cold foods.  The pool was nice, small but not…

title: Pool and beach are great!
review: This hotel is older and the suites are large and roomy.  Easy access to the beach and the pool is larger with a jacuzzi.  The is bar right there to order drinks with food.  The fitness center has people to help you work out with Lifetime fitness equipment.  Nice place to vacation.

title: Dated but great location and they really take care of elite members
review: The Sheraton Sand Key Resort was designed to the era in which it was built, still it is a welcoming, casual and comfortable beach resort on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key. Not too much is needed for fun in the sun and lots of relaxation therapy, some sun tan lotion, flip flops and your favorite beach attire.  We love hearing that you enjoyed the Fitness Center, the equipment and your positive interaction with our associates … add in its panoramic view from the ninth floor, a great place to work out . Breathtaking sunsets, nights around the fire pit with your favorite beverage, some great conversation along with all the fun beach side amenities offered. Hopefully you are planning your next vacation stay to be in the very near future.

title: Very nice property, great location, and an amazing staff
review: The rooms and hotel are dated (though clean), but the beach is amazing and the staff really take care of elite members. Pool is ok, no fuss with the beach towels. Free parking and no resort fee is a bonus!  Thanks!!

title: Nice visit
review: What a great compliment and we thank you! As our Marriott Bonoy Elite guest you are truly paramount to the continued success of both the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and the Sheraton brand. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guest, we realize they are largely accountable for our success and we appreciate you recognizing them.  The Sheraton Sand Key Resort is a casual beach resort and it is truly a warm, welcoming and comfortable place on the beach to enjoy the all beauty Mother Nature has shared with us. It definitely has been promoting relaxation therapy and fun in the sun for many of our guests over the years. Please hurry back!

title: Staff are the Best Here
review: Sheraton Sand Key Resort is in a great location just off Clearwater Beach, and a bit removed from the hustle and bustle during peak times there. The property is quite nice, but what really sets it apart is the staff. Every single person with whom I interacted was helpful and friendly, something that even many higher end properties do not have. Having spent much time commuting throughout my business career and staying at hotels and conference centers at all levels, I was very impressed with this property. You aren't hit with resort fees, the parking is free, and the sunset views are stunning. Opt for a room with an ocean view if you can,

title: Excellent, Clean Beach Hotel, Clean Carpet! Ample Parking
review: An amazing hotel with a hot giant hot tub with 10+ capacity. Clean carpet and clean room on the beach with no roads blocking beach access. There is a golf cart on the side to make the commute to the ocean if you do not want to walk there. Chairs and umbrella cost extra at the beach but are free by the volleyball courts by the pool. The parking is plentiful with no need for a parking garage if you want to evade those of  Clearwater Beach.

title: Great break from the cold. Offered everything.
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of you our guest and provide excellent customer service. It is a  delight to read that you enjoyed the hot tub, our beautiful private beach and many of the other amenities provided as that is just what a visit to the Sheraton Sand Key Resort is all about. May there have been many treasured memories made that will bring you back for another visit to our beautiful and tranquil island soon.

title: Amazing place to enjoy Clearwater, St. Petersburg and Tampa.
review: Terrific stay. Easy to get to, easy to enter from parking lot. Free parking outside door. Several dining areas and bars. Meeting rooms off lobby and conferences take place.   Room with balcony overlooking pool an beach. Food, hot tub, pool, sand games and hammocks next to pool. All were clean and well kept. Towels and sand toys available for adults and kids. Kiddy pool also next to regular pool. Hot tub set at perfect 104.  Food drink staff all done well. Free Jolly Trolly runs to Clearwater, Pier 60, tour boats, Clearwater Beach. Great for those who don’t want to be burdened with driving or at least driving after drinking.

title: Insulted rather than impressed.
review: We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate the informative review you have provided. That you had a terrific stay is truly the experience we strive to provide and we thank you for sharing. This beautiful and tranquil island does promote relaxation therapy at its best. I am delighted that you enjoyed the amenities provided along with being in close proximity to all the entertainment and activities that Clearwater Beach and surrounding areas offer, Complementary trolley rides for our guests ensures you are able to have a bit of fun without the burden of driving or the expensive of parking and keeps you safe. Hurry Back!

title: A wonderful host hotel for our wedding weekend!
review: I stayed at this hotel to escape the cold winter up north. The place is really nice.  Although the building is a little dated, it is maintained to the dots. Customer service is A+ And the food is excellent too.  The best beach and leisure area I could find in the area. Don’t miss a spectacular sunset! Pool is super clean and heated. Also don’t miss sitting out by the fire pit.  I will definitely go back!

title: Good hotel with great service
review: The rooms are nice, similar to other Sheraton rooms- no surprises, but nothing incredible. The pool is smaller than we expected, but really nice if the weather is good (unfortunately for us the weather did not cooperate). The private beach outside the hotel is huge! They have hammocks, beach games and loungers on the beach. It's a bit of a walk to the ocean, which we were fine with because it was too cold to get in the water anyway. It also gets a bit more shelly near the ocean, so I'd recommend bringing water shoes if you plan to spend time in the water.  The really outstanding thing we found about this hotel is the service. Every time we called to get something extra delivered (extra pillows, robes, even a mattress topper), they were so quick and accommodating.

title: Nice place
review: Thank you for the “outstanding” comment we feel very fortunate to have associates who take pride in ensuring our guest’s entire stay is truly the experience that they anticipated.  You are correct we are not a Luxury Hotel, we are a comfortable, clean and casual beach resort on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key. Which is in close proximity to the entertainment and activity that the Clearwater Beach area offers. Our private beach is huge, although it was actually right up to the break wall when the hotel was built many years ago. It was cooler than normal and I am truly disappointed that you really were unable to enjoy all the amenities you listed and more. If you are not feeling that walk, due to the size of our beach we also have a six person complementary beach shuttle that runs continually throughout the day to take our guests to the shore and back along with our beach buggy that delivers food and beverages right on the beach. Water shoes are a great idea as the beach profile along the shore changes daily. It is a totally different environment when the sun is shining and there are warm breezes keeping you comfortable enough to take a dip in the usually warm Gulf of Mexico. We also have just upgraded and resurfaced our tennis/ pickle ball courts and truly another pool is on the top of our wish list … May to November is always beautiful beach weather and please return there are many memories waiting to be made.

title: Not Perfect in Little Ways, But I'll Be Back
review: Clean and comfortable.  Good restaurant and shops.  The staff is very friendly and professional.  Pool has sufficient seating in both shade and sun and there is a hot tub for cooler days.  Lots to do via a short drive.  I've never seen anything like the "beach" though.  Yes, there is sand right outside the hotel....but it is a LONG way across a great distance of flat packed sand to get to the water.   The sliding doors in the rooms and the walls between rooms are not sound proofed well.  You hear everything going on at the pool, in the hallways or in the rooms next door.  But management is  responsive and takes action to quiet things down if you complain.

title: I love the beach
review: We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate your informative review. It is always very encouraging to read both positive and constructive comments.  I am delighted that you enjoyed our associates as they are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guest, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. Along with the amenities offered and the close proximity to all the activity of the Clearwater Beach area and the surrounding beach towns offer it is a place for relaxation therapy and some fun in the sun. True the beach is a bit of a walk and I can empathize with you completely, when the hotel was built the beach was much closer to the hotel actually right up to the break wall, you could easily see the water from you room. Then between Mother Nature and the Sand Key jetty being built in 1975, the sand has been washed in a southerly direction over the years which has caused a very wide beach. We do understand the distance can be an inconvenience which is the reason we have added a 6 person complementary beach shuttle to get you back and forth to the beach whenever needed. We have also added beach wagons which will conveniently help you get your children or what is needed down to the shore to enjoy your day at the beach, just ask a pool attendant.  We look forward to when next your travels bring you back to the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key.

title: Fabulous beach front location !
review: Like all things in life, the Sheraton Sand Key Hotel is a mixture of good and…less than good. The hotel is not new, and some of the design elements reflect this fact.  The guest rooms are small, but you’re in Clearwater, Florida. You’re not supposed to be spending time in your room, but there are a few little idiosyncrasies that are somewhat annoying. First, when the room is equipped with two beds, there is no space between the open closet doors and the bed. In fact, in order to open the closet doors, we had to shift the bed over slightly. That was a minor inconvenience.  More annoying is the bathroom, which consists of a small space between the room entrance and the bathroom that contains a small basin opposite a small counter. There is very little counter space, which we could…

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Yes , yes  a comfortable bed indeed! I slept better than ever . Quiet didn’t hear a lot of noise. A nice outdoor circular fireplace with about 12 chairs around it. Great location. All staff were courteous and helpful . I’d stay there again.

title: That's It: Location and Comfortable Beds
review: It is always a delight to read such a positive review, thank you. The Island of Sand Key is truly a bit of paradise; a serene environment with beautiful views, private beaches, and picturesque sunsets. A place to relax whether it be around our heated pool catching some Florida sun, napping in a hammock or evenings gathering around our fire pit with friends or family and maybe your favorite beverage. That you ended your days getting the best sleep ever on our “Sweet Sleeper” bed is truly gratifying. Add in our associates who sincerely take pride in ensuring you our guest’s entire stay is truly the experience that you anticipated … Now Just Hurry Back!

title: Fabulous Stay
review: This place does not merit the title of Resort.  The pool is tiny and outdated, as is most of the hotel.  There is no outdoor dining with a view of the beach or the sea, even though this place is on the beach.  And lastly, this hotel does not have a coffee bar in the lobby, only drip coffee from the 90s.  Seriously.  And for this price?!  The beds are comfortable and the location is sweet, but that is really all this hotel has to offer.  it is really not a resort, so adjust your expectations.  There are no activities for the kids, either.  Terrible value for money.  While this hotel was updated, it seems to have been limited to the rooms, only, which are nice.

title: Great getaway
review: Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts regarding your recent stay with us and we hope that there were some positive experiences that will bring you back to the Clearwater Beach area.

title: A bit disappointed ☹️
review: Our family stayed here  for 5 nights over the New Years holiday.  The resort is as beautiful as the photos; we booked a room overlooking the pool and ocean and it was perfect.  The room and resort were modern and clean.   The best thing about our experience was the service.  The staff here seemed to really care about our happiness.  We actually felt like we were staying at a Four Seasons or Ritz.  Janet at the front desk is a gem - she greeted us warmly and checked back to be sure our needs were met.  We loved her cheerfulness.   And Gallo, who brought us drinks and food by the pool, is amazing.  He displayed a maniacal enthusiasm for keeping us, and everyone around us, happy.   We definitely purchased more drinks than we otherwise would have because of his eagerness.   Our…

title: Excellent Vacation - will stay again
review: Away from the Clearwater crowd, Sand Key is very private and relax. Quite beach with shells. Beach sports offered by hotel are a lot of fun. Several great restaurants (Maggie May, Columbia, E&E Stake..) are nearby (be honest Hotel breakfast and dinner are not as good).  Hotel staffs are super friendly and accommodating(our booking was one bed but asked to switch to 2 beds with no problem). Will definitely stay again. A day trip to Honeymoon island is a waste of time. The private beach at hotel is 10 times nicer than that on Honeymoon Island. Thank you Sheraton Sand Key for such a nice year end family vacation.

title: Just go
review: It is truly our pleasure to be part of your families’ memories and we thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the Clearwater Beach area. Ensuring you receive all the relaxation therapy needed is definitely our priority when visiting this Island Oasis. Whether it be; walking the miles of shore line, shelling, Dolphin sightings or activities such as beach tennis or one of the many other beach sports available. Maybe just lounging around the pool or enjoying watching the waves hitting the shore of our large private beach and ending the evening around our fire pit all that is only part of what is to be found on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key. Our associates truly take pride in doing whatever they can to make your stay warm and welcoming. Thank you for taking the time to write this review as we are then able to continue to improve our service and focus on issues such as those with our Food and Beverage Department. It is truly a critical way of understanding how we can continue to deliver great experiences. We look forward to you and your family creating more memories here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort whenever your travels bring you back to this area.

title: Can’t say enough wonderful things!
review: The hotel is ok. The food and drinks are good. The staff and service is extraordinary.  The hotel itself is nice, nothing over the top. It is flawlessly clean. (Picture spotless and you’ve got it). The food is quite tasty, it can’t be faulted that’s for sure.  While we were there for five days, there wasn’t a single staff member that didn’t say hello, ask us how our day was and went over the top to fulfill whatever it is that we needed. Because the staff was so wonderful and positive, guests were all relaxed and kind. It was incredible to see. There are much newer hotels on the strip but, this place is worth every single dime. They need to keep doing what they are doing because, it’s working.  Thank you- we appreciated our much deserved and needed break away from our reality.…

title: Terrific location and friendly staff
review: It is always encouraging to read such a great review, particularly when it comes from you. I am sure you did deserve that much deserved break from the everyday reality of life and we are pleased you chose to do that here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort with all of us. Your positive comments concerning your recent experience here on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key are truly incentive to all of our extraordinary, efficient and genuinely friendly associates. It was great being recognized and that your entire experience was just what staying at a casual beach resort for a quick get-away should be all about… sun, sand and surf outside with a welcoming, warm, clean and comfortable environment inside. Along with wonderful people all around, it is a fact that people’s vibes and mindsets can truly become our own. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of any details that will impact your stay. I have shared your amazing comment and it was truly appreciated by many. Save those dimes and hurry back, we love guests like you.

title: Great Vacation
review: Our family is visiting my husband who is temporarily stationed in Tampa - we loved Clearwater Beach so we wanted to take a mini- vacation while here.  The resort is so beautiful, easy, relaxing and accommodating.  The staff is incredible - everyone we spoke with was kind and helpful.  From the front desk attendant, to the Tavern staff to the housecleaning staff  - they all perfectly represented the resort.  We did not pay to have a room with a view but we still had a great balcony and view of the ocean - I believe all rooms have a balcony.  I think what we appreciated the most - the beach was not in the hub bub of Clearwater yet we were a quick (free) trolly ride away from the action of Clearwater or a nice walk - (about 20 min walk over a beautiful bridge)

title: Fantastic Staff
review: First off, I just have to say how great the staff is at this resort. Every one from the front desk, top floor lounge, main restaurant and pool area were friendly and accommodating even working on Christmas Day.   The hotel itself is very nice in an outdated Florida kind of way.  Parking is easy, right out the front door and free. Check in was smooth but I did have to suggest an upgrade due to my platinum status which landed me a very large one room suite. No issues with chairs at the lovely pool area. It was awesome to be able to walk right onto the beach and take a long walk or just grab a chair.   I find this location superior to being in Clearwater Beach proper.  You get a very private resort feel as the Sheraton is really the only hotel on the beach in Sand Key. You are only…

title: Beautiful view, helpful staff
review: Thank you for sharing with our other guests as it is very helpful to them when planning their stay. We are so pleased that you enjoyed the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and it is truly an Oasis from all the activity and traffic of the Clearwater Beach area, although still in close proximity. You are correct we are not one of the new luxcury resorts that the Clearwater Beach offers. We are a casual, comfortable, relaxing and welcoming beach resort which has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and is still the design of the era in which the hotel was built. It is the kind of place you just need your flip flops, some casual wear, and suntan lotion and our main activity is relaxation therapy. The location, it is a tropical paradise with beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key.  Being on the Island of Sand Key surrounded by all the beauty that Mother Nature has shared with us with and a great work environment and does inspire positive attitudes among our associates. The secret to our success is truly our associates as their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. There are also several very nice dining options in walking distance.  Truly many of our guest never drive as the Sheraton Sand Key Resort hotel guests can ride all Pinellas Suncoast Transit Authority (PSTA) transportation free of charge (up to 4 people with one room key). These buses and trolleys will pick you up front of the Sheraton Sand Key and will take you to the mall or to any beach attractions anywhere in the area. You can get on and off whenever the mood strikes as the bus stops every 1-10th of a mile. Ask one of the Bellman and they will show you how to track pick up times on your phone and there are schedules at each stop. There is also the Jolly Trolley in which will take you where you would like to go in the Clearwater beach area and do not forget Uber or a taxi. Taking one of the transportation options offered saves the stress of driving and finding your way around (the drivers are very helpful) it save the cost of parking although we offer free parking for our guests, to park anywhere in the Clearwater Beach or surrounding areas can be costly. You can also get to see the sights as driving around this area with all the tourist and traffic certainly calls for complete focus. We look forward to a return visit soon.

title: Heavenly.
review: I had a lovely stay during the first week of December at this property with my girlfriend was booked under an associate rate, I called ahead and Cydney at the Front Desk took my call and arranged a beautiful amenity for us in the room for our anniversary and even wrote a personal card, what a great touch! When we checked in, Jeff the concierge/bellman helped us up to the room and gave us all sorts of great recommendations. And he continued to help us with breakfast/dinner reservations and recommandations throughout the week, even called and made lunch cruise reservations for us. The pool and hottub was nice, I forgot the name of the pool attendant but she was helpful throughout our stay and drove us to the beach! I paid for the Gulf/Pool view with a balcony and it was well worth…

title: Great conference venue
review: This is truly a tropical paradise the beauty and tranquility of the Island of Sand Key along withal the many amenities offered and the close proximity to all the activity and entertainment that the Clearwater Beach area offers makes it the perfect place to celebrate an anniversary. Stunning views, breathtaking sunsets, and romantic walks along the shore. Caring associates such as Cydney who is very intuitive concerning our guests needs, Jeff with his knowledge of the area offerings and the best places to dine and Molly who enjoys the interaction with you our guest. All took pleasure ensuring your entire anniversary experience be just as you anticipated. They have been added to our associate recognition program and personally thank you. I am delighted that you enjoyed your room view of the Gulf of Mexico. There truly is an immeasurable sense of peace that many of us feel around water, it can put life into perspective and we hope those memories will bring you back for another stay. There is much more to do and explore when next your travels bring you back to the Clearwater beach area. You will also find a stunning collection of recreational and cultural surprises sprinkled throughout this area. Now hurry back!

title: Comfortable Hotel
review: What a great location.  Had a gulf view room on the sixth floor. Great views of the beach. Great choices for food throughout the three onsite venues, although there are places a gentle stroll away. Staff were really great and went out of their way to help. Right on a gorgeous beach too, with the sea a stroll away or a golf buggy ride away if you're not up to that. No resort fee either, which was great. Complementary travel of the jolly trolley was a nice touch too. Made exploring the area fun. Roll on next year when we're returning. Having tried several other hotels in the area, this is the one for my wife and I.

title: Awesome hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel as we were doing a split holiday with here and magic kingdom ,we stayed here for a week and was so impressed with everything we were a family of 3 adults 2 teenagers and all loved it here the staff were very friendly and we had the gold trolley treatment on arrival the evening meal was quiet expensive  but we thoroughly enjoyed it . The bedrooms were very good really clean and maids every day. The pool and amenities were really good would recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Second visit & Still Very Good
review: It is encouraging to read such a positive review particularly when it comes from those who matter the most – you!  Family vacations can be one of those rare times when you can just enjoy each other’s company without any outside intrusion, if you hide the cell phones. Using the complementary Trolley will undoubtedly ensure you are able to enjoy all the Clearwater Beach and the surrounding areas have to offer. Not having to finding where to park, directions or the expensive of parking and enjoying the sites is exactly what taking the trolley is about (no stress). This is the perfect place for teenagers as it is safely secluded from the outside world although close enough to the Clearwater Beach area to enjoy all the activity it offers. I am sure you enjoyed all the relaxation therapy that the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key offers before or after the adventures of Disney. Hopefully your interaction with our associates and the beautiful and tropical location will bring you back for a future visit soon.

title: STAY AWAY if you want relaxation.
review: Our second visit hear and we were equally impressed, great service and pool area was great. Staff were excellent - rooms were just ok (perhaps we have been spoilt by US standards) but very clean.  We had a few teething problems at reception with billing on WIFI but all was sorted out - I would have no hesitation recommending.

title: Best Family Hotel with Awesome Staff!
review: Your loyalty is paramount to the continued success of the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and we sincerely appreciate your loyalty and hope there will be many more future visits planned. I am delighted that you enjoyed your interaction with our associates as they are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly, thank you for recognizing them. You are probably used to more modern hotels when traveling; we are a casual, warm and welcoming beach resort which has been on this beautiful and tranquil island of Sand Key for many, many years and was designed in the style of the era in which it was built. Although we are constantly renovating and replacing the worn with new, we realize there is always a need for more changes and improvements throughout the hotel.  I am delighted that your issues with billing were resolved quickly and we thank you for the recommendation. Now that you are part of our family we truly look forward to that next visit to paradise.

title: long long walk to the beach
review: We were in the top floor balcony and unfortunately most rooms in the hotel are adjoined, which means you can hear every word from the neighbor next door. Once it hit 11 oclock and our neighbors with 8 people in the room weren't quieting down, we called the front desk. While they did offer us another room and we took it, you can still hear every single thing happening in the next room once we moved. TERRIBLE place to stay unless you are the noisy people. And if you are noisy, you are golden-- because the hotel won't do anything about it.

title: Wonderful
review: My husband and I came to the resort to get away from the cold weather in CT, celebrate Thanksgiving and our 10 year wedding anniversary. The resort is beautiful. We spent nearly all waking hours poolside. Great drinks. Nice walk to the beach for sunset. A nice park to explore right next door. Great sunrises right across the street. Free rides on the trolley are a bonus. Food at the snack bar are restaurant are all very good. Super friendly staff-everyone!  We will be back, for sure!

title: Another incredible stay at the Sheraton Sand Key
review: We love when we are part of the memories that were made on this beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key. Thank you for celebrating your 10th year anniversary and Thanksgiving with us. Fun in the sun and relaxation therapy is our specialty here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. It is truly our pleasure to share all Mother Nature has surrounded us with and all the surrounding area offers. And those complementary trolley rides are a definite plus.  It is also gratifying to read that your experience our associates was very positive, with ambition, empowerment and heart their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care.   Hurry Back!

title: Great place to stay in Clearwater
review: I enjoyed another incredible stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort in mid-November thanks to the wonderful staff, including Mauricio Rodriguez, Assistant Front Desk Manager, The hotel is beautiful, with lush, very comfortable rooms, that include a small refrigerator, The bed is so comfortable, and I have a lovely view of the Gulf and the Intracoastal. The amenities are amazing:  huge outdoor pool, Tiki Bar, a firepit, outdoor activities, beachfront (the beach is long so you can have a nice walk to the water's edge) and a free trolley to downwater Clearwater.  Everyone is so helpful and friendly, all eager to make the guests' experiences memorable and enjoyable.  I love Rusty's Bistro for dinner or brunch, and the Mainstay Tavern is fun and festive.  I was there during the annual…

title: Very nice stay
review: Thank you! Ensuring that your stays are always are incredible is truly our goal and it is gratifying to read that your experiences with our associates was again very positive. With ambition, empowerment and heart their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care.  Of course the Suncoast Dixieland Festival is added fun, a gathering of people who love music and truly embrace the theme and enjoying all the fun atmosphere this event generates. The Festival which provides opportunities for both professional musicians from all over the US and Canada as well as aspiring young musicians from our community to perform and share their music with enthusiastic and very appreciative audiences such as yourself. And our associates look forward to this time of year also. Catching a romantic sunset, relaxing times around the pool, walks along the shore, nights around the fire pit, a beverage from the Tiki Bar and a comfortable place to lay your head at the end of the day is what a visit to “Our Island” is about. We are pleased many memories were made and you enjoyed your experience and look forward to your January return.

title: A little bit of heaven
review: The Sheraton Sand Key Resort was a very nice surprise for our vacation. We had originally booked at another hotel but due to Red Tide issues we came north to Clearwater. The hotel was great and the staff were fabulous. All the staff were welcoming and helpful but one staff member in particular stood out. Brandon at front reception had superior customer service skills and went above and beyond to make our stay wonderful.  From the moment we checked in with him we felt welcomed and special. Every time we went by the front desk he remembered us by name and said hello. My husband and I have done a lot of travel for both business and pleasure and appreciate the efforts of superior service and Brandon stands out for this and should be recognized by the management. When we checked in,…

title: From top to bottom a great place to stay
review: We had a great time here.  The room was very nice and the pool and the many things to do around it made for a great time for our family who visited us there.  The restaurant was amazing, not cheap, but everything was scrumptious. Don't miss the Calamari appetizer that even my wife loved and she would never ever order calamari. The beach was clean and great to walk on and if you wanted you could rent a small shaded seating.  Everyone on the staff was helpful.  Will come back

title: Looks like Hawaii
review: We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate your great review. We absolutely enjoyed reading your positive comments as it is truly our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service, we are always pleased to hear that goal was reached. Yes! I must say our Pan Seared Humboldt Calamari Steak is uniquely prepared and definitely scrumptious and I am so pleased that it was enjoyed.  We do take pride in our beautiful, private and very large island beach and walking the beach certainly can bring a special serenity and is great exercise. I am pleased that your time spent with your family was filled with many memorable moments for all of you. Our associates are always pleased to have been able to contribute to those memories. Please come back soon!

title: Fabulous
review: Loves this hotel. Husband and I thought it looked like a place we were when we went to Hawaii. It has plenty to do on the property. Pool, whirlpool, hammocks, yard games like chess and others. Plenty of chairs on the property facing the beach. You could walk right to the beach. it is next door to Sand Key Park. They also have free parking and a free shuttle service to take you around Clearwater.  All the rooms have a balcony (I believe) with either a view of the sunrise or the sunset. Room was nice and bed comfortable.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Wow! That is a complement (Hawaii) … I thank you for the lovely description and yes, the Island Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness. Starting the day with beautiful sunrises on the east and breathtaking sunsets on the west, walks along the shore, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or relax. It is gratifying that you enjoyed many of the amenities offered, the trolley does open the option of many places to explore. And yes Sand Key Park being adjoining is an added amenity with nature trails, all varieties of wild life and a great picnic area and a playground. May your recent memories bring you back for another visit to paradise soon.

title: MY STAY IN SHERATON SAND KEY RESORT
review: The hotel is right on the gulf beach they even have a buggy that will take you to waters edge .All areas of hotel were well kept clean and nice decor . The bedroom was not enormous but was more than adequate with nice gulf view . The hotel staff were outstanding very friendly and efficient and couldn’t do enough to make sure you enjoyed stay .

title: Relaxation second to none
review: What a super hotel, we were on the 5th floor with views of the sea, beach and pool. We had a king size bed, very comfortable,a very nice balcony, a Mr Coffee machine which we enjoyed first thing in the morning. Rooms were a good size but bathrooms a tad small although they had bath/shower etc....  each floor had an ice machine. All in all a great stay.

title: The pool and direct beach access
review: I am delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.Tropical views, beautiful sunsets, maybe Dolphins at play or just uninterrupted time with your own thoughts. It sounds as if this was the experience you anticipated.  Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. We do realize that the bathroom areas are definitely in need of a total renovation. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and that was the design of the era in which the hotel was built. We are very excited as this is scheduled in the very near future.We're always working on new ways to better care for you, return soon.

title: Fabulous!
review: This is a nice hotel and we loved the pool area as well as the beach access. We ate at the hotel at the sports bar restaurant (we forget the name) and it was ok. We’re not ones to complain about our food but let’s just say it was hotel quality.   There is a nice convenience store in the hotel which was perfect for our needs. The Jolly Trolley (free transportation for Sheraton guests) has a stop at the far end of the hotel so you can wait in the shade. Definitely download the Ride Systems app to track the Jolly Trolley.  Unfortunately, I will say that the whole hotel from lobby to room is in need of a remodel. You can tell that the furniture has been updated all around but the rooms are done in the old style of the sink being outside the bathroom. Please know that we still…

title: Did not meet my expectations
review: Recommendations are the highest form of flattery and we sincerely thank you for yours. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort is truly is a great place to come for a relaxing beach stay. It is gratifying that you enjoyed our beautiful and private beach, heated pool, hot tub and maybe a night with your favorite beverage gathering around the fire pit enjoying the quiet of the evening, to name just a few of our amenities.  The Sheraton Sand Key partnering with PSTA is truly is an awesome amenity. When producing a room key for up to four guests per room you will have access to all buses and trolleys which can take you anywhere in the area including in-land to Malls and entertainment. Downloading the app is a valuable piece of information (thank you) as it is in real time and will help our guest’s plan exactly what time you need to be at the trolley stop both ways without wasting time from your day.   I do apologize that you did not enjoy the food and your comment has been reviewed by our Executive Chef and the Food and Beverage team to find different options, we apologize. We realize that listening to the voice of our guest adds to our success and enables us to make changes so that we are then able to add to our customers’ experience.  Our associate’s personal concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they care and yes they are genuinely friendly, we thank you for recognizing them. We are looking forward to your return visit at a time when we may better serve you.

title: Lovely hotel and great staff
review: We would not hesitate to recommend this hotel. We paid by using our points and were kindly upgraded to a room on the 7th floor with a stunning view of the beach and ocean. Special thanks to Mauricio Rodriguez for arranging this, it made our trip so much more special and we have already booked another trip for April / May of next year. Our room was beautiful; 2 very comfortable queen beds, good bathroom, balcony, coffee maker and a fridge. The young lady who looked after our room did an amazing job too. Staff in the hotel were welcoming and friendly, including poolside staff. There are sun beds on the beach but these weren’t owned by the hotel so you had to pay for them. The price was $27 a day for 2 beds and a shade.  To give an overview, the hotel sits in a beautiful spot right…

title: Excellent Holiday
review: Fabulous holiday! We are returning guest,  september/october time for our wedding anniversary, two weeks. The weather was just perfect.  We were greeted, as always, by happy polite registration staff. Room 706 which was perfect for us overlooking beach and tennis courts. Lovely big room with two of the most comfortable beds ever! Lots of towels, shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and body lotion. Theres a hair dryer too. Tammi was or cleaning lady. I have to say what a very happy lady she is, she cleaned our room every day and nothing was too much trouble for her.   The Mainstay Tavern Bar we love. Good place to meet people, have a game of pool and eat dinner, all great! The bar staff are great!  We ate breakfast a few times at Rusty's which was very good.  It was quiet round the…

title: Stunning Resort
review: Fabulous holidays are our specialty here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort  and your lovely and informative review is definitely appreciated. September and October are truly some of the best months to visit weather wise and being on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; breathtaking sunsets, steel drums in the background, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or read your favorite book. Long walks on our private beach where you can spend uninterrupted time with your own thoughts and birdsong mingling with the ocean breeze, this is true therapy at its best. We truly thank you for your comments on Tammi, she is truly happy and always pleased to provide you with an effortless experience and make you feel truly at home by being genuinely friendly, caring and efficient. All of our associates truly enjoy being here to provide you with any information needed and to ensure your stay is the experience you anticipated.  Hopefully the beauty that surrounds us and the interaction with our associates and our "Sweet Sleeper" bed will bring you back for another visit soon.

title: Great staff and service
review: I was fortunate enough to stay at this resort for a business conference.  The rooms are well kept and very clean.  I had room 543 which had a gorgeous view of the private beach.  The pool area is perfect.  The staff is so incredibly friendly!  Truly, the best customer service I've experienced at a hotel and I've been to many of them.  The beach is a private beach for hotel guests so you only see others that are staying in the immediate area hotels.  This is a huge contrast to Clearwater Beach which is very crowded; still nice but crowded.
