Like any resort the food is expensive and you are on an island so, go to the mainland and stock up on snacks and drinks.  Get yourself an insulated cup and you're all set. Great choice.  As I said, I was there for business but this is a…

title: Great stay
review: That you took time out of your busy day to write this lovely review is truly appreciated. Actually we were the fortunate ones to have you as a guest. We truly love sharing all the beauty that surrounds us especially when it is appreciated. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. We sincerely thank you for recognizing their “Go Beyond” attitude. And … Knowing that you have experienced all we have to offer during your recent conference stay we hope you will return for a leisure visit to the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key soon.

title: Great stay again
review: I was really surprised with the quality of the staff and service at this resort.  The hard product is a tad dated, but no more so than the other hotels in this area.  The soft product exceeded all my expectations.  From check in, to the restaurants, to the pool, and to the room cleaning, everything was great and the staff was professional and courteous.    I have stayed in some nice properties - St. Regis, Four Seasons, Ritz, etc., - and the level of professionalism and effort by the staff at this Sheraton was on par with those.  I wish every Westin/Sheraton was run this well.

title: Great hotel with great service
review: We spent two weeks here with the whole family. The rooms were very spacious, everything was clean. The hotel has a beautiful large beach and a very pleasant pool area. What we liked best was the great service provided by the staff. Especially Louis, one of the servers at the breakfast was very attentive, friendly, child-friendly and always on the spot. The entire staff was friendly, helpful and always to have fun. I definitely will recommend the hotel to my friends and business associates. We will come back again!

title: Staycation
review: We appreciate your feedback and your personal recommendation as that is truly the highest form of flattery. We were delighted to hear that your stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort was the experience you anticipated.  With a spirit to serve, all of our associates take great pride in not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations. Louis thanks you for the personal recondition, he has also been added to our associate recognition program.  There is truly nothing more special than time spent with families, making new memories and sharing past memories. Fun lounging around the pool, walks on the shore and maybe a Dolphin sighting. Evenings watch a breathtaking sunsets and sitting around the fire pit with family. Being in close proximity to the Clearwater beach area and all the activity this area offers helps ensure there is something for everyone in the family to enjoy. Hurry Back!

title: Wanted to stay longer
review: Wow big place lots of free parking which is a bonus these days. Right on beach but it like three hundred yard from the property line . They do have a golf cart to carry you and all your stuff. Nice touch. You have water on both sides . The restaurant Rusty breakfast buffet @ 10:00ish. Looked good . But all cold. Bacon all stuck together. Server was unaware of what cause when we got up to get more cold food never took the dirty plates off table. I stacked them and he heard the plates so he finally got the pic . We won’t go back

title: Nicely appointed!!
review: Thank you for this informative review which is very much appreciated as it is loyal guests such as yourself that share the details that need our focus.  The Sheraton Sand Key Resort is situated on 13 acres of beautiful, private beach and due to the break-wall to the North of Sand Key Park it continues to grow, which makes it the perfect Island get away. No crowds, no stress a place that offers complete relaxation therapy. We do realize that makes it a bit of a walk, around 4 minutes which is why we provide a complementary six person beach shuttle to get you our guest back and forth to the shore line. Free parking and complementary Trolley options to take you where you need to go makes it win, win situation. Our continued commitment is in providing you with outstanding service and an excellent customer experience and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations during your recent breakfast experience at Rusty’s. Your comments have been shared with the appropriate management and addressed. I do hope that there were some memories made that will bring you back to “Our Island.”

title: Another Amazing Holiday
review: This was a wonderful stay.  We usually find a hotel that we can just spend the night and be off.  This hotel is easily a destination.  The view of the gulf was fantastic.  We saw sunset, sunrise, a storm move in, the full moon and walked the beach before sunrise.  That does not even include the pools and volleyball.  We plan to go back.  And Jane, at check in, was outstanding.  Very helpful and informative.

title: Not like our first time there. 2.5 stars
review: Staff is hit and miss. Many were great but some were not. The front desk lady was obviously overwhelmed by the full house, she showed her frustration with me when I asked extra valid questions. Forgot her name. We woke up early to go to the beach, around 730am. On the way through the pool area, a guy was pressure washing the stairs. The water from the pressure washer was hitting us and we were forced to walk through it. The pressure washer might even had some solution in it because it burned our eyes. He saw our discomfort but didn't care and continued on. It was a full house and parking was full so you might have to park near the entrance, it's a good walk if you can't walk much. Would we come back again? Probably not. I gave this place a 5 stars last time, it's more like 2.5…

title: 1st Class costumer service...
review: Your loyalty to the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and the Sheraton brand is essential to our success and we thank you for your return visit. First and foremost, the safety and security of you our guest is our first priority along with providing the highest level of hospitality and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations. We thank you for bringing this to our attention, we take matters such as this very seriously and the issues noted have been addressed with the associates mentioned by the appropriate management. I do hope there were several positive memories made on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key that will bring you back for another visit to the Clearwater Beach area.

title: Location, location, location
review: This resort is so beautifull... the rooms and the service was  outstanding... Jhon was  incredible .. the room he gave us was priceless!!  with one of the best views in the property....My wife wanted to be impressed.... and Jhon did it!! Thank you soo much! You did our weekend!!

title: Wonderful Stay
review: We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate the lovely review you have provided. A week-end get away on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key can be a welcome respite from the busy everyday life we lead. Our large private beach, beautiful views and the recreational amenities and opportunities offered can certainly promote relaxation therapy at its best. Add in associates such as John and the excellent customer service and personal touches he truly enjoys giving our guests it is a winning combination. John has been added to our associate recognition program and sends his thank you. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Amazing Resort!!
review: We visited the Sheraton for a week to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary. We honeymooned here in 1993 and felt it was the ‘right’ place for us to celebrate together. The location of the hotel is amazing with its own massive beach on the Gulf. We were here in the off-season and so the pool area was quiet, especially during the week. The hotel rooms are fine although a little tired looking in places. Staff were friendly and very welcoming. However, the hotel was everything that we wanted and I can’t recommend it enough. Ask for a gulf view room.

title: Great vacation spot
review: We spent our anniversary here because we love the St Pete area. It’s a great location and has a trolley to take you into the downtown area so you don’t have to worry about parking. There are a few nearby restaurants also if you do not want to go into town. Their beach area is nice and open, and the pool is good too (lots of kids so be prepared). Drinks aren’t overly priced  so that’s a plus. The man at the entrance is superb; so inviting and had a sense of humor-ask him anything!! A great vacay overall.

title: Great three day staycation
review: A belated Happy Anniversary and thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key Resort to celebrate such a truly special occasion. It is always a delight when we hear that you chose to stay here on our beautiful and tranquil island and that it was the experience you anticipated. Relaxing days on our beautiful, large and private beach, a dip in the pool, walks along the shore, catching a romantic sunset, and maybe ending your night around the fire pit with your beverage of choice.  Easy access to explore and experience all this area has to offer with complementary trolley rides which is definitely a win, win especially if you install the app which truly gives you minute to minute updates on pick-up time.   A strong team is our truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. In your case Mike, who mans the parking area is always a great first impression of the hospitality you will find throughout the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and he continues to be high on the list for often being recognized, I have shared your comments with him and he sent you a very warm smile. Thank you and we look forward to your next visit to the St Pete/Clearwater Beach area.

title: Nice location, Great service but hotel needs renovation
review: We had a great two night staycation. If you are going for the beach  the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. It is very clean, friendly staff and nice size rooms. The hotel is near the end of the island part of clearwater pass. The beach was very quiet compared to the clearwater beach pier 60 area on the other side of the bridge. The hotel does offer a 6 person golf cart to shuttle back and forth from the beach to the hotel. You can hitch a ride by the towel stand. There are two chairs and umbrella for $27 a day at the beach.  We are from Florida so I will be bringing our own chairs and canopy tent next time. There are some four food restaurants and food court type cafes.  The only place we will eat at the resort next time would be the sports bar. There are also some nice breakfast, lunch…

title: Great value, service
review: Thank you! for all your great insight and the many helpful hints as it is always great to share. It was rewarding to hear that your experience was exactly what you anticipated.  Every area of the country has its local attractions, some in which people come from all over to enjoy, others, well, just fun. Pretend you’re a tourist just seeing what this area offers or enjoy which is lots or just enjoy some total relaxation therapy without the stress of lawns to mows, houses to clean and the always much more to do list. Yes, staycations are truly away to escape from everyday life … especially if you turn off your cell phone.   There are many beach amenities available, Jet Skis, Kayak’s, games and much more. Catch up on sleep in one of our hammocks in the sand or a lounger around the pool, after taking a dip in the pool and no matter where or how you relax on this island enjoy a Crystal Light Margaritas or your choice of beverage as that does sound great. There are many local or just stay in-house dining options. Leave your car parked and use the complementary Trolley rides, save on the driving, parking and the cost. Take a long walk along the shore and enjoy the beauty that surrounds this island or use the hiking and biking trails in adjoining Sand Key Park. For sure watch a breathtaking sunset and maybe if you lucky catch a green flash. Delighted you also enjoyed our associates as they genuinely care about you our guest and truly enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay.This is truly what the serene Island of Sand Key is all about … Hurry Back!

title: On the disappointing side of average
review: Pros - Great staff who always go out of their way for guests - Free Trolley ride to popular spots (Pier 60, Clearwater Aquarium)  Cons - Rooms are outdated and small - The Pool is small and gets crowded and it's a hike to go to the beach area. Pier 60 beach about a mile from this place is a lot better.

title: A Solid but not outstanding Hotel given the ratings
review: A fantastic spot with the direct access to the beach, friendly and helpful staff. However the rooms were just ok (perhaps I have been spoiled by other American Hotels) and of the 4 days we stayed there we had to ask for the room to be cleaned twice (returned to room at 1pm after leaving at 8am) - to be fair it was cleaned immediately but you shouldn't have to ask.

title: 3:45pm still waiting for a room
review: The Sheraton Sand Key Resort was designed to the era in which built still it is a welcoming, casual and comfortable beach resort on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key, a place for fun in the sun and lots of relaxation therapy in which hopefully you enjoyed both.  It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service, it is humbling to realize that we failed to fulfill those expatiations. Our Housekeeping team services the occupied rooms starting at 8am until 5pm. Our guests may request an earlier service or a precise time to attend to the room by dialing "0" and speaking with the operator or communicating the time preference at check-in. It is disconcerting you were not made aware of that option. I am pleased that your room was cleaned in a timely manner.  I do hope that when your travels bring you back to this area of the USA you will consider returning to the Sheraton Sand Key Resort at a time when we may better serve you.

title: Very disappointing
review: Unacceptable - been here for over 90 mins waiting and no ETA kids everywhere crying as no ones room is ready.  Not a good impression  Pool nothing like picture it is an over sized bathtub!  Much nicer places to stay than here  Bell men are amazing but front desk is terrible

title: Crowded and Outdated
review: There are many choices for lodging in the Clearwater Beach area and we thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We truly understand the importance of first impressions although check-in is at 3:00 when occupancy allows we are pleased to check you in upon arrival. I sincerely apologize for your wait and can empathize with your frustration. Labor Day week-end is definitely one of our peak times and although we deploy all efforts to ensure your room is ready, clean and comfortable and that you are settled in it in a timely manner there still are times we are unable to do so. We will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance. And yes another pool is on the top of our priority list. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guests. They also are caring, efficient and most of all, genuinely friendly, thank you for recognizing them. Hopefully after you settled-in your stay was the experience anticipated.

title: A good break
review: I don't want to sound harsh but our visit was very disappointing.  I am a beach goer and the number one feature that attracted me about this hotel was ocean front rooms with easy access to the beach, well there was no easy access to the beach; we had to cross a huge inundated sand dune to get to the beach, there was no way around it, we decided to go through the vegetation in order to avoid the cold and nasty water but we were attacked by southern sandbur (quite painful).  We ended up going to Caladesi island in order to enjoy the beach.  I will probably never visit this hotel again.

title: Disappointing
review: Older hotels that need a refurbishment, The room was disappointing. It was very old and reminded me more of a motel than a Sheraton. The pool was also very small compared to the size of the hotel - very crowded. Far to the sea, but the hotel offers transport. Sheraton also pays by its guests to use sun loungers by the sea, disappointing.  Price is not at all relative to the renowned Sheraton quality

title: Beautiful Resort, Amazing Staff and a Great Beach
review: We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on these issues. I sincerely apologize for your disappointment that our current appearance was not what you had anticipated. Our hotel has been on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key for over 40 years and certainly does have a nostalgic feel. It is a casual, warm and welcoming beach resort and you defiantly get the beach vibe here. This is truly the right place to be if you desire to get away from it all, especially when longing for gentle, temperate seas lined by sandy shores, our beach was especially made for you. Sunshine and breezes during the day then sliding into the evening with spectacular sunsets and night around the fire pit.          We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. Throughout the years we have continued to renovate and upgrade daily, at this time there are many renovations going and a total renovation of our bathrooms is scheduled to begin soon.  Most area resorts include all amenities charges in a nightly resort fee we have opted not to include a resort fee or charge for parking. Due to that reason we do charge individually for some amenities, if you choose to use them. There is a private concession for the cabanas they charge $25 per day. There are also loungers and hammocks in the sand and loungers around the pool area which are free of charge. I do hope there were some memorable moments made here and in the Clearwater Beach area.

title: Not at all what we were expecting !
review: This is my second visit to the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. I can't say enough nice things about the resort and their staff. They are all so polite, considerate and all have the "can do" attitude you expect to only find at Disney. The staff is constantly cleaning or helping guests. This place is one of my favorite places to visit.

title: Close to Paradise
review: The Island of Sand Key is the home to some of the most beautiful beaches in the area. As you come over the Sand Key Bridge you can see some breathtaking views of the entire area; awesome sunsets, maybe a pirate ship on the horizon and you might even catch view of the Dolphins at play. We are a very tranquil island although just a few minutes from the activity of Clearwater Beach. Yes!! Our associates do have that “can do attitude” and truly take pride in their part of making the Sheraton Sand Key the perfect place for a beach get-away. They positively enjoy the interaction with you our guest and their goal is truly to make you feel welcomed. Their satisfaction in a job well done comes from reviews such as this, thank you and we look forward to that third visit.

title: Love the white sandy beach
review: Although this is advertised as a 4star hotel it is anything but. Unfortunately this hotel has not been updated since it was built 44 years ago and is severely lacking in even the basics.  The rooms are small and dated  The bathrooms are extremely small with just a toilet and an old fashioned bath and shower - there is barely enough room to turn around - totally unacceptable for a family of four !  The dining areas have no windows or outside - pretty strange considering you are next to one of the best beaches in the US   This is much more of a conference centre hotel than a holiday destination 😱

title: OUTSTANDING service and staff!
review: We just returned from a week stay at the Sheraton Sand Key! I will start with the staff; truly outstanding! Every single staff member was so accommodating! From the front desk, pool staff, the lovely ladies in the concierge lounge, housekeeping and the many restaurant wait staff- truly top notch! The rooms are worn, but I do believe they do a good job keeping up with them; our A/C smelled mildewy, when I let the front desk know they had maintenance change the filter very quickly and our bathroom had some mildew on the ceiling. We ate in all the restaurants and the food was very good; they even have gluten free options. The hotel is in a great location; beach is beautiful! We rented two chairs and an umbrella for 27.50 the first day, but was fortunate to have met a lovely couple…

title: Lovely beach views
review: Stayed at this hotel in mid-August.  This hotel has the potential to be excellent, however needs updating, especially in the rooms.  Sink was oddly placed outside of the bathroom/shower room and on carpet. Wifi worked well and sea view was excellent.  Booking details were all accurate etc. which made check-in easy.  The welcome at reception is very much dependent on who was on duty.  Some pleasant, some a little grumpy.    We ate once in the hotel bar and food was tasty, although expensive compared to other local eateries. We didn't need to book to gain a seat.  Good access directly to the beach and if you don't want to walk the short distance you can jump on one of the carts.  Good range of activities and sun loungers provided by the pool area, however lack of umbrellas for…

title: Best Oceanfront Location In Clearwater
review: The beautiful, serene and tropical Island of Sand Key is defiantly a place to come to for fun and relaxation therapy. All that is usually needed is flip flops and suntan lotion and casual wear. We can usually … with Mother Nature’s assistance provide sunshine, breezes, beautiful views, breathtaking sunsets, a lovely and large private beach and the many beach amenities provided to help enjoy a great beach get-away. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. Our associates are caring, efficient and usually genuinely friendly and I apologize that you found some a little grumpy, which has been addressed by the Director of Guest Services. Although there was no need to book to dine during your stay in mid-August there are many times reservations are definitely suggested. Our prices are truly in line with other area resort, you are correct you are able to explore the area and find some less expensive local eateries. We have been on the beautiful and tranquil island of Sand Key for many years still we strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. We constantly are renovating and do have some soft renovations going on at this time, we realize that the bathroom areas are in need of total renovation and that is scheduled. Another pool is also on the top of our wish list. We hope when your travels next bring you back to the Clearwater Beach area you will check out all the planned improvements and thank you for your recent stay.

title: Best place
review: We had a wonderful 3-night stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort last week in two connecting rooms facing the Gulf. This is an older building with smaller-sized rooms and bathrooms. But, the beds were comfortable, everything was very clean, and the service/hospitality from all staff members was excellent. FYI, we thought that the sheets were a bit rough.  We enjoyed continental breakfast and afternoon hors d'oeuvre's several times in the club lounge. The space is limited, but the servings were pretty good. Big thank you to all the ladies working there. The quality of the room service food was also quite good.  The beach area in front of the hotel felt almost like a private beach compared to the main area near the pier in Clearwater, and there was no red tide warning while we were…

title: Mixed reviews and inevitable comparisons
review: I enjoyed reading your inviting descriptions and I am delighted that your room view was everything you anticipated; hopefully you were able to enjoy several beautiful sunsets. There are some that can actually be breathtaking especially after the sun hits the water which is when the sands and sky are layered in bright watercolors. Thank you for that awesome comment “Best Oceanfront Location in Clearwater” Our beach is private, large and beautiful and definitely a more tranquil environment. Clearwater Beach is in close proximity if you are looking to experience all the activity that area offers and then come back home to the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We do provide complementary trolley rides which helps relieve the stress of driving and parking.  We strive to maintain the highest standards in service and maintaining a fresh atmosphere within our guest rooms and common areas. I have shared your comment on the sheets, we always appreciate the feedback from you our loyal guest. Another pool or maybe a children’s splash area is high on our priority list and we will be doing a complete renovation of the guest room bathrooms which is scheduled to begin soon. Thank you again for your comment concerning our associate as their main priority is to be focused on you our guest’s well-being. We look forward to that return visit …

title: Loved our visit!!
review: Beach, my little boy, seashells, pool, food, what’s not to love?!!! We had an amazing time! They even have sand toys so you don’t have to pack them. Rooms are average for this price range. We stayed in the room without a view. That’s ok, the view outside is amazing. If you want a view from high up, make a point to go up the red-lit stairwell that faces the ocean to get a good view of the beach. Breakfast buffet was average. The second day we decided to order instead. The waffle and strawberries were delicious!! Easy to check in and find our room. Plenty of towels for a family of 3. Comfortable beds. Great dinner food choices for our family. Had bow-tie pasta and chicken for the kid. Now a couple negatives. The cheapest merlot I do not recommend. Splurge and get something…

title: Fun stay. Not worth the money we paid
review: Thank you for your lovely descriptive review! There is nothing more precious than spending quality time with family and making forever memories. The service and personal touches that our associates give our guests demonstrate our commitment to turning everyday moments into memorable experiences and I am sure when reading your review that many beautiful and fun memories were made for all three of you. We are always pleased to share the beauty that Mother Nature has surround us with, especially with someone with as positive attitude as you have. Now that you have decided on what Merlot to have. We truly cannot wait to have you back and we will work on making that next stay perfect.

title: Excellent Resort!!!!
review: We wanted something close to the beach. Check in was quick. The resort is pretty big. We stayed in room 210. The room was large and the bathroom was nice for the room. Hot water and good water pressure in the shower. There is a fridge in the room and free Starbucks coffee. There is no view or balcony in this room. The beds and pillows are comfy.  Anything possibly free seems to be tied to being a SPG member. If you are not a member then there is no free WiFi, no free breakfast, no free anything.  They have a couple of expensive restaurants onsite.   We loved the beach and pool area. The hot tub always had kids in it so no romantic relaxation possible in the hot tub. The beach is a little bit of walk from the resort. We always need the exercise so it was OK. They have a guy…

title: Nice beach resort!
review: Thank you for your informative review It is always encouraging to see the positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most – you! I would like to clarify some misconceptions in anticipation that you will return for a future visit.  It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of all our guests and provide excellent customer service whether they are loyalty members or not. There is no cost when becoming a Loyalty Member–Marriott Rewards and you are correct they do receive many perks and you are able to sign up on line.  I do apologize for the inconvenience of the Fitness Center hours and the appropriate manager has addressed the lack of communication at check-in oversight. Being on the ninth floor and over some of our guest rooms it would be disturbing to those guests staying on the 8th floor if we were open the Fitness Center for 24 hours, relocation is on our wish list. Still it is a great place to work-out especially with all the new equipment, that panoramic view of the beaches and the area that surrounds us, along with a great staff.  There is adequate and always free parking here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort, we are on a very narrow island and unfortunately there is no way to add on to the parking lot, if needed we will always find a convenient solution.  There is no cost for the bellman to take your luggage up to your room on a cart, it is an amenity that we offer and gratuity is a personal choice not a mandatory charge.    When planning a relaxing beach vacation the beautiful Island of Sand Key is often described as a peaceful paradise, a great place to bask in the sunshine, swim in the pool and to enjoy all the fun and activity this area has to offer. There are many, many months when we truly are that peaceful paradise.  Being right on the beach and being a casual beach resort also makes us a great place for families with children although they normally only vacation here when school is out, we enjoy seeing that joy and memories being made. Please check out the web site often as there are many special rate plans offered throughout the year.  We do hope your travels will bring you back here to the Clearwater Beach area as there is more relaxation therapy and fun waiting.

title: Beach news
review: My husband and I stayed here during our 10th anniversary and I was very impressed. The rooms were very nice and clean and we had a great view of the gulf.  This resort offers a variety of restaurants for dining as well as small snack areas.  I would love to return and would certainly stay at this location!!!!

title: Lovely get-away
review: My two adult daughters and I spent a few days at the Sheraton Sand Key. We arrived too early to check in, but they gave us a key that gave us access to their pool and beach area and pointed out a place to change into our bathing suits.  There is a nice pool complex with chairs, food and drinks, towels, and toys,  We sat on the beach near the pool - best of both worlds one day and took the brief cart ride to the warm gulf waters the next day.  When we checked out they allowed us to stay and use the facilities as long as we liked that day.  We had a relaxing visit.

title: Not very impressed!
review: There is nothing more special or more memorable then Mother and Daughter time and it truly is pleasing to know that we will be a forever part of those memories. It sounds that you enjoyed every minute of the relaxation therapy you had while here on this beautiful and tranquil Island. Breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. A private beach with soothing sounds such as the breezes blowing, seagulls squawking, and waves crashing on shore. Sunshine, beach games, great conversations and fun in the sun. The choice of many places to dine, cool beverages and great food Just Hurry Back soon!

title: Spring Break, belated review!
review: My family of 6 stayed for one night in 2 separate rooms while on a 2 week vacation. All the villas and hotels we stayed in prior were excellent. The Sand Key Resort was a lot less. Gold status is barely acknowledged here and all they offer is a few points or one welcome drink, yes one drink for two rooms even! The rooms are so small and the bathrooms even smaller. The deluxe bay view balcany that we had was a view of the dumpsters with the bay in the background. The room is so small that you literally have to move the coffee pot to plug it in. During our stay the pool closed due to lighting in the area. Lightning is understandable for this time of year in Florida. What I didn't expect was for the pool grille and pool bar to close at 3:00 in the afternoon and not reopen. My…

title: Vacation
review: Dear Ms. Georgea T: I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. Our Goal is to provide our guests with a memorable and enjoyable experience from start to finish and we are sorry that we did not carry out this promise. The hotel was built in 1974 and all of our rooms are the same size, back then the bathroom size standards were different compared to newer hotels. When the hotel was built in the 70's, the beach was much closer to the hotel. The Sand Key Jetty was built in 1975, since then, the sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused a wide beach . If you would consider returning, please reach out to me as I would be very pleased to assist you with your booking.

title: Relaxing spot
review: My family of four wanted a beach vacation for spring break this year, and our stay at the Sheraton Sand Key did not disappoint. Our kids are 12 and 13 and they were never bored! The pool wasn’t too small for them to enjoy, although it was a little full (of kids, but it was spring break, so that was expected) for me to enjoy a swim. They also enjoyed all of the “beach” activities near the pool area: volleyball, paddle ball, the big chess board, and relaxing in the hammocks. We enjoyed walking down to the beach, not deterred at all by the 1/4 mile walk to the waves. The water was a little cold, but we enjoyed collecting 1,000 shells and walking along the water. The hotel was a short drive to Clearwater and the many restaurants and fun things there. The hotel itself was well kept…

title: Zhamane !!!
review: This resort was located in Sandy Key clearwater beach. I walked in and immediately was greeted by staff. My kids casually mentioned my up coming birthday while I was checking in. The staff was accomadating and friendly and wishwd me a Happy Birthday . My room was ready on arrival you couldnt ask for more. We got right to the beach and pool. Love the available ride to and from the beach added plus. To my surprise as we returned to the room that evening a birthday cake and a card from the staff waiting in the room. Such a grand jester for a one night stay. Thanks for the special attention, Zhamane Front desk for going above and beyond ...

title: Avoid Low rates
review: Being on the Island of Sand Key surrounded by all the beauty that Mather Nature has shared with us with and a great work environment does inspire positive attitudes. Our associates truly take joy from being warm and welcoming and doing something to let our guests know how appreciated they are is their pleasure. Putting people first, pursuing excellence, embracing change and acting with integrity are part of our core values and Zhamane is a great example of that, she has been added again to our associate recognition program and sincerely thanks you. We look forward to a longer stay when next your travels bring you back to our tropical paradise and please return soon.

title: Very good Beach hotel
review: If you book the lowest rate given by your booking agency online or off line you may end up in rooms 208 - 223 on the second floor which face a huge wall, the worst rooms ever and should  not be in a resort ,  really the feeling you are in prison and not a resort now even facing the parking lot.  not even a plastic flower pot, a roof and blocked by a wall.  The worst time I ever had in a Sherston.  The two stars are for the staff who were very nice and helpful.  For the Sheraton brand I give them zero on these rooms.

title: Golf cart service to the beach!
review: Customer satisfaction is something that we take very seriously and we appreciate your comment that all your interaction with our associates was positive. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and that was the design of the era in which the hotel was built. Still I again apologize for your room view.  As for the location, being optimistic I truly hope that there were positive memories made during part of your stay. The island of Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; beautiful sunsets, walks on along the shore, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or relax and much more and being in close proximity to Clearwater Beach which offers much activity is a plus. We do hope that you enjoyed your time in the Clearwater Beach area and you will return to the area as there is much more fun to be had and places to explore.

title: Girls weekend
review: I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key this past weekend. Upon arrival, the front desk gave me 4 meal vouchers that can be used at Rusty's restaurant. We were there for a weekend of fishing so we didnt really take advantage of this perk until sunday morning. There was a bit of confusion as I realized that they vouchers only cover the buffet, not ordering from the menu. I spoke to management and this was handled quickly.   The hotel has its own private white sand beach, very clean. Throughout the hotel, I was courteously greeted by the staff. The lobby is huge and there is a nice bar there for guess. My only issue is that the bathroom were relatively small for a hotel of this size, sinks were outside the shower.

title: New Favorite Beach Hotel
review: We just spent the weekend here and have found our new favorite beach hotel!! We have already started looking at a weekend to come back soon!  We arrived early on Friday afternoon (around 1-2pm) and were greeted by Mike in the parking lot. He was delightful and gave us a quick rundown of the area and the hotel; a great first impression!  Janet (or Janice) assisted us at the elite desk and she was amazing and extremely friendly. Our room wasn’t quiet ready but she must have pulled some strings as we only waited about 30 minutes before the hotel called to let us know our room was ready. We were all settled in and down by the pool by 2:30pm!  The hotel is on the local Trolley system which is amazing and you can ride for free as a hotel guest which is even better.   The hotel was…

title: Weekend
review: Thank you and as your new favorite beach hotel we look forward to many visits. Comments such as this are truly rewarding as part of our core values are putting people first and pursuing excellence. First impressions are so very important and we feel very fortunate to have associates who sincerely take pride in ensuring our guests entire stay is truly the experience that they anticipated right from the time they enter our parking lot. I have shared your comment with both Mike and Janet who both are mentioned often and have again been added to our associate recognition program for their excellent and truly genuine attitude. Of course Mother Nature does help by surrounding the Island of Sand Key with a beauty and serenity that promotes lots of relaxation therapy. There is also much to do and explore as the Clearwater Beach area and the surrounding beach towns each offer a distinct charm. You can find a stunning collection of recreational and cultural surprises sprinkled throughout the area. And as you stated the trolley is free to our guest here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort to get you wherever you would like to go … Hurry Back!

title: Beautiful and Offering a lot
review: Nice place. Wonderful beach. Clean. Good breakfast.  A friend with kids was thinking about nickelodeon, but after my bad previous experience we decided to try to expend our hard earned $ in the USA.  This beach was actually nicer... while a little pricey, it was very nice. Astonishing sunset in the beach.  And Columbia restaurant is within walking distance!

title: Ok, but could be a lot better
review: It is always gratifying when our guest take time to write that they enjoyed a positive stay on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key. There is truly much to enjoy without that added spending, there are many memories to be made while enjoying walks along the shore, shelling or just exploring the waters along the way. Maybe catching a Dolphin show or the Pelicans fishing, fun beach games, building sandcastles, playing in the Gulf of Mexico, swimming in the pool, sitting in the hot tub. Then with Sand Key Park being in walking distance there are nature trails to explore, a great playground, picnic grounds and a pond which attracts many variates of birds.  Our Sunsets are breathtaking, as Mother Nature uses the sky as a canvas and paints with her most brilliant colors before the ending of the day … that too is cost free. You can end your evening sitting around our fire pit under the stars reminiscing about the day’s events. The Sheraton Sand Key has now have partnered with the local transit system so you are able to ride all buses and Trolley’s in the area for free by showing your room key. That certainly increase the exploration of things to see and do, you can use the trolley to take a tour and enjoy all sites our Barrier Islands offer and you can get on and off to explore those areas of interest. We do hope you will return as there is truly much more to explore and many memories to be made.

title: Perfect beach getaway!
review: This hotel has so many advantages: - Direct Beach and they offer a beach cart to drive you from hotel to the beach to avoid long walk  You can bring your own umbrella and chairs so not to pay daily rental 27.50 dollars - Swimming pool and pool bar and cafe - rooms with pool/beach view or bay views or parking lot view. Good size rooms but toilet and shower are small  - Small coffee machine and Starbucks coffee - vending machines and ice machines and coin laundry rooms on site - Small shops inside the hotel - 3 options to dine in at the hotel, check timing for each  - very suitable for families - trolley bus to take you downtown  - some food options at walking distance but if you need better options, take the bus or have a car - Concierge staff are so active, friendly and helpful,…

title: Great return visit
review: Been a while since we had stayed here, and we were meeting some friends who live in Clearwater and some from Ohio. Location is great, right on the beach with lots of shopping and restaurants close by. We all enjoyed our stay and the hotel and staff was great.

title: Pleasantly Surprised - GREAT experience
review: Food, wine and sports this area offers all this and more. Thank you for the review … being on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key, surrounded by great friends with all the amenities offered sounds like a win, win and thank you for sharing. That it was the experience anticipated is always gratifying and hopefully that will bring you back for another beach get-away again soon.

title: Lovely hotel with a full gulf view!
review: Having not been on a real vacation in six years, I was looking for a relaxing trip to the beach. Despite summertime crowds, I was able to enjoy an amazing, restful visit to the Sheraton Sand Key.  Above everything else, the staff was top notch!!!  What a difference it makes when everyone you encounter seems to genuinely care about you and wants to make you feel more than welcome. So, THANK YOU to the many people who did their jobs with pride and excellence.  Very impressed. Upon arrival, late at night, I was greeted by an enthusiastic and knowledgeable bellman, Tom. He took care of me immediately despite it being a very busy night. I knew right away that my stay was going to be special.  The folks at the front desk were consistently friendly and accommodating. A shout out to…

title: Top Notch Service, Food and Beachfront at a Great Price
review: Thank you! This review is truly informative and extremely accurate. After waiting six years for a vacation you did chose the right place for the relaxing beach get away you anticipated; with miles of white sand private beach, lovely views of the Gulf of Mexico, spectacular sunsets, hiking trails and the many types of birds and wild life in adjoining Sand Key Park. These Barrier Islands are geared to ensuring you enjoy all Mother Nature offers along with what the local business throughout the area offer and there are many fun and interesting beach towns you can check-out from the trolley along with more beautiful views, when not relaxing on the beach. There is entertainment, sports, shopping, culture and dining … too many venues to mention, free transportation, boating, fishing, water sports and much more. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly and sincerely enjoy their interaction with you. I have shared your thank you with those associates mentioned by name and including all of our associates by posting your comments on our associate recognition board.  I do see you were directed to some of our local favorites and thank you again for mentioning them. We appreciate all your comments and will address the negative ones mention. Please do not wait six more years and I hope your memories and our associates bring you back to this beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key soon!

title: Great Location and Beach
review: Located next to Sand Key Park, this beautiful hotel offers a great gulf view! The rooms are big enough and well stocked. When we forgot a few toiletries at home, we phoned the front desk and they gave us replacements. Staff was helpful and friendly, although sometimes overwhelmed by many visitors needing help at the same time in the lobby.  We thoroughly enjoyed Rusty’s, which is the upscale restaurant off the lobby. When we were there they had a dinner buffet with lots of choices including seafood and prime rib. Most items were tasty and fresh. The buffet, and most food choices, are quite expensive but as anticipated at a finer hotel such as this. Huge lobby with areas to sit and read or relax. The water pressure was a little low in the shower in our king bed room. But it was a…

title: Back after ten
review: We love the Sand Key area and Clearwater Beach. Last time here was 10 years ago.  So happy we planned a trip to return.  We love staying at the Sheraton Sand Key.  Very nice staff, nice location and overall great. Loved being on the beach and they have a nice pool.  The room was great and bed very comfortable. They do need better firmer pillows. Also we thought our room would get serviced daily. They missed us twice in the week. What was annoying was we saw the room attendant and she asked if we want our room done. Told her yes both times. When you are out of your room daily by 9:30 you expect it done getting back at 4 pm. This was not good. They did give us a credit of 25.00 which was nice.  This was the only negative I can say.  Also they now bring people down to the beach on…

title: Long weekend in a middle of the week
review: Your review was informative and insightful and we sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and your suggestions. Thank you for your return visit as there are many choices for lodging in the Clearwater Beach area and we are pleased you chose to spend your beach get-away on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We are a casual beach hotel where you will find breathtaking sunsets and beautiful views along with a large, private beach with many amenities inside and outside. We are away from the traffic, yet still close enough to enjoy all the activity Clearwater Beach offers.  Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize that the housekeeper did not follow up. I am pleased that you were compensated for that issue and it was addressed with the associate assigned to your room. Still that you did not receive the professional Customer Service that our associates are known to give and is a Sheraton brand is concerning. Our associates are known to be caring, efficient and friendly and take pride ensuring your stay is the experience you anticipated. When planning your next stay, remember we can change out your pillows on request. We look forward to that next stay and more fun in the sun.

title: Good but not my favorite
review: We just stayed for few days, last week, and we really enjoyed this hotel. Clean, staff very kindly, 🏖 very deep ( sand not exactly perfect ). If again in the area, we will go back to this hotel. The bar & restaurants prices, are affordable.

title: Wonderful staff and very clean
review: How much fun a mid-week beach get away, we all could use more of those … relaxation therapy at its best. It is always a delight to hear that we ensured that your experience was as anticipated. We are always pleased to share the beauty and serenity Mother Nature has surrounds us with. Our beach profile here is usually sandy although due to the break-wall to the North of Sand Key Park and at this time the dredging off shore there are times that waves or current action deposits crushed shells and reworks the sediments. We look forward to when next your travels bring you back to this beautiful and tranquil Island for another long week-end stay.

title: Very nice
review: We stayed here for 1 night.  Hotel was okay, not sure it was worth $200+ a night tho.  Beach was quite a walk to water but it was still private I suppose.  Rooms were clean, and staff was kind.  Pool area was kinda small.  Was really cool that they have a trolley that comes to take you around Pier 60 etc for free.   Overall, it was nice.  I would say we would return if in the area.  😊

title: Family Vacation
review: My family stayed here for a week in July, and I have to say the best part of the resort was the staff.  We arrived early, and our room was not ready yet. The bellhops offered to hold onto our luggage for us, and they would call us as soon as our room was ready. We took that opportunity to take a quick drive down to Clearwater to get an idea of how far everything was. We didn't get far before the front desk called (I was a little annoyed because if we had known it was going to be 5-10 minutes we would have waited). We got back and they have a policy that only the bellhops are allowed to use the luggage carts. At first I was frustrated because I got up at 3am (with 2 kids), flew on 2 planes to get here, and all I wanted to do was get to my room and unwind. In the end the bellhop…

title: Great vacation.  Beautiful beach.  Great service at hotel.  Hotel was very busy   yet no problem with service
review: Beautiful beach...Clean rooms.   Great service....Good food...trolley will take you to the pier, marina,restaurants free of charge.  Columbia restaurant across the street.   Kayaking on beach a d across the street

title: Perfect stop on way home from UF orientation.
review: Hotel at first glance looks slight dated, but the staff and the location make up for this.  Pool area is great, there is a significant amount of shade.  The waiter at the pool (Danny I think his name was) was very attentive and super nice to us.  The beach is very large at this hotel, with a nice sunset.  Being from Philadelphia we did not know the area.  Our room was on fourth floor facing pool/ocean..we enjoyed the view.  Club lounge very modern and well kept on top floor with great views of the bay.  Checked out and used hotel fitness center to shower after our last day at the pool, again very nice.  Walked across street to paddle board next to the Marriott, dinner at Columbia, lunch at Salt Water Marina on the way back to the airport.  Overall I would definitely stay at this…

title: Family Vacation
review: We spent a week on a family vacation at this hotel. We requested our three rooms together in advance and the front desk manager made this happen, our rooms were ready and waiting when we arrived and we received a very welcoming check in and then checkout experience.  The rooms were very clean and the housekeeping staff was terrific, cleaning around our hectic schedule and proving extra everything.  The beach itself is a long walk, but they have a modified golf cart transporting you from the pool area to the shore, which was very helpful to our multi-generation party.  The pool staff was did a very good job going out of their way to make us feel welcome. The only shortcoming was one day there was a storm for about an hour, when we came back out there were no towels, and there was…

title: Great family vacation.
review: Stayed here in June for five days for a family vacation. It is farther away from the pier and it's about a 5 minute drive to all the excitement of clearwater but definitely worth it. The hotel rooms are nice. They supplied two bottle of water every day. The view from our room was fantastic. The bathrooms are small but who cares  There was a area outside for the sink and a nice area across from the sink like a makeup area. Plenty of ro ok m. Also supplied free robes.   The pool area was amazing. They even supplied pool noodles for free to use. There was a nice bar and a nice fast service place to get food. But be warned that if you eat by the pool area you may be surrounded by friendly birds. There is also restrooms at the pool area. They also have a waiter coming around who will…

title: Enjoyable
review: We arrived at the Sheraton Sand Key after spending a few nights in New York and Orlando for our honeymoon. We were allowed into our room a few hours early and given the free drinks that come with being a Virgin Guest. Arrived in our room to find it fairly spacious but slightly outdated. The view from our balcony was over the Tennis courts which I didn't mind but unfortunately we didn't get to see any sunsets from there.  The pool is way to small for the amount of guests that were in the hotel at the time. There were many children around that didn't bother me but we could hardly get into the pool to cool off. When we could get in the pool we were splashed in the face by adults walking along the pool side.  On the first day me and my husband got sunburnt so wasn't able to sit in…

title: Enjoyable Trip and Friendly Staff
review: Dear guest Charlotte 19932013,  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  We truly value your comments regarding both the positive and negative.  These allow us to improve our facility as well as levels of service.  We will definitely share your suggestion regarding umbrellas for the pool chairs with our ownership for consideration.  We also will share your concerns regarding the high occupancy of our pool area.  We are a very popular property with families and our pool area is one of our premier attractions.  Again, we thank you for sharing and hope the next time you are in the area we once again get the chance to have you as our guest.

title: Noisy hotel, Lots of kids
review: Took a quick trip down to Sand Key for a couple's getaway. The staff at check in were great and explained all we needed to know about the hotel and transportation around town. Our room was what we expected with a view of the Gulf  as well as the pool. The Gulf is a bit far from the hotel but there is a golf cart that takes you to and from the beach area. However, if you want to stay close to your room, there are awesome hammocks right down from the pool that were hardly used. The pool is kind of small and does get crowded. If you want a shady spot get there by 7am to save your seat. I highly recommend renting seats with an umbrella down by the Gulf ($25 for the whole day). There is a drink/snack truck thay drives around so you can quench your thirst. Every staff member at the…

title: The most comfortable bed and pillows
review: First, the good:  the beach is beautiful.  And even though the water is 1/4 mile from the hotel, they run a free golf cart to and from the water if you don't want to walk on the nicely packed sand.  The beach chairs/umbrellas are $25 a day, but there is no drink or food service directly on the beach.  Our room was clean, but definitely not high-end:  small bathroom, single sink (but another nice counter/mirror for make-up application, hair drying, etc.).  The rooms have a safe, and the food in the restaurants were pretty good.  We found the service of all hotel personnel to be great, as well.    The bad:  the hotel rooms are noisy.  The doors to the hallways do not go all the way to the ground, so you hear everything going on in the hallways.  This seems to be primarily a family…

title: Nice hotel but not a resort
review: Dear Guest Banker BP,  Thank you for reaching out and sharing your comments regarding your recent stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  We thank you for your positive comments but also for sharing your concerns.  These comments allow us to hone our craft and become better hospitality professionals and better serve our future guests.  As you mentioned, we are a very popular resort and, especially during the summer months, do have a large amount of families that stay with us.  At times things can get a bit raucous but we do try to respond to these situations to ensure all of our guests are able to enjoy their stay.  As for food and drink service out on the beach we do normally operate a beverage cart that circulates up and down the beach and does have beverages and some food items available.  Unfortunately I'm unable to determine the dates of your stay to investigate further.  We are continually doing upgrades to our property to keep it fresh as occupancies allow.  This year has been a very strong and busy one thus far and we look forward to getting back into our rooms to freshen them.  Again, we thank you for your comments and hope you might give us another opportunity to once again earn your business.

title: Terrible Resort
review: Just back from our 16 day holiday 5 days in Washington and 11 days in Sheraton Sand Key, we left after 5 days and spent remaining 6 days in Tampa. To start, when we got out of taxi the concierge wouldn't help with 4 heavy cases, he told my husband "oh you have two teenagers they'll help you" which did not go down well at all. When I stepped into the foyer it smelled like a nursing home. It's a bit like a holiday camp atmosphere, not a 4 star hotel! The rooms are disgusting they are so outdated, the carpets stink the bed linen is damp and the smell of damp gets into your clothes. The bathroom is tiny you barely have enough room to turn around and close the door, the sink is outside the bathroom!! Breakfast is a joke, I've never seen such a small buffet 5 or 6 people at a time…

title: Sheraton Sand Key Resort - Clearwater
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I apologize for not reaching that goal and your expectations. We truly appreciate your business and feel badly that your stay was so disappointing .

title: Very good experience!!
review: Sheraton Sand Key Resort - Clearwater is a great place for a relaxing family vacation with a white sand beach, swimming pool, hot tub, children's pool, and poolside cantina, as well as four different restaurants, a Jolly Trolley bus stop for free tours of Clearwater Beach area.

title: Beautiful views
review: We’ve been there with my wife and my 7 years old son. Despite the hotel is not a new one, everything works perfect, and the facilities are in very good condition. Every employee is committed so they are extremely helpful. Breakfast buffet has all you need and more, just for 15,99.  The water temperature at the beach, is the best ever. And the pool area has all you need for having fun.  Perfect place to stay and also centrally located for a short drive to restaurants and shopping area.

title: Friendliest Staff
review: Beautiful views.  Great club lounge.  The club lounge is on the 9th floor with great views.  The pool is nice but small for the property.  The chair rental is nice but ask for chairs furthest away from the hut so locals do not put chairs in front of you.  Molly, who operates the beverage cart, was great.  The beverage cart only drives on the beach on Friday’s to Sunday’s.  The gift shop has beverages and cold salads.  The fitness center has great views of the water.

title: Needs some revival
review: The hotel is a little dated and a tad run down, but it sits right on the beach, the staff is friendly and most things you want can be found close by. There are some trips where I just look at it (as long as it's clean) as this is a bed I'm gonna sleep in and I am not here to spend my time in the room anyway. That's how we felt about this location once we arrived and saw our accommodations.  A lot of people assume that this sits on a private beach, but it does not. The beach is public and it's very big and quite beautiful, but anyone can get on the beach with parking across the street and a short walk along the wall of the hotel on the side of their property and walk right through the Sheraton area, lay in the hammocks or beach chairs, or walk to the beach and sit in the area…

title: Great location
review: Your prospective of your recent stay here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort was very informative and we appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. This time of the year can be a very difficult time for us to honor late check-outs as we are sold out most nights and it is virtually impossible for us to meet the upgrade requests of all guests including our loyal SPG members.  We are a casual beach resort and have been on the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key for many years.  Still, we take much pride in the appearance of the hotel and we are constantly making improvements. We also have many plans for future renovations, especially concerning the bathrooms.   Yes a beach get-away is truly all about the beach and the relaxation therapy you receive by being near the water. This is truly is a tropical paradise and I am pleased you enjoyed some beautiful mornings on the beach and I know you caught several breathtaking sunsets. Our 13 acres of beach front is considered private; however starting July 1, 2018, the law restricts local governments from adopting ordinances regarding customary use which establishes public access to private beaches, despite owners who may want to keep their beach front exclusive. In Florida, the "wet sand" area below the mean high water line toward the sea is public. The "dry sand" area above that belongs to the property owner. You are correct and as much as we try to ensure that only our guests are using our beach amenities it is hard to police the many acers of beach in front of the Sheraton Sand Key. We do check the immediate surroundings often such as the pool, beach games along with the shuttle and as you said the parking lot is manned by security, although it is truly not a gratuity based job. We are always looking for better solutions to keep our amenities available only to our valued hotel guests.  Concerning the cost for cabanas, many area resorts charge a resort fee that may include cabana charges whether used or not.  The Sheraton Sand Key does not charge a resort fee or a parking fee to our guests. Our cabanas are run by a private vendor that makes them available to our guests for a charge of $25 per day. We do hope your travels bring you back to the Clearwater Beach area as there is much more fun to be had and areas to explore.

title: Great stay and location
review: We were very lucky to have a great room/suite and had a lovely stay.  Trolley bus is free and takes in to Clearwater.  Recommend Maggie Mays - across road - for breakfast. Location of some rooms on grounds floor etc not so good and quite expensive but would recommend.

title: Quick anniversary get away!
review: We stayed here for a weekend getaway. The room was comfortable, and clean. They provided a cot for our child no cost. We got a club room that included breakfast. The beach is a pretty long walk but they have a golf car that takes you back and forth. Beach umbrella and 2 chairs is $25 for the day. There is a golf cart that goes around to all the umbrellas selling food and great drinks. The pool was great at 8ft. Overall a great stay. Great service.

title: Just amazing with the best staff!
review: I will start this review by saying I’m a Marriott Lifetime Platinum member and have only stayed at Marriott properties the past 15 years.  When Marriott and SPG merged we decided to try them out.  Man the Sheraton Sand Key did not disappoint!  Stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort 2 nights in April for our 29th wedding anniversary.  This place has a great professional staff that is not only knowledgeable of the industry and have to treat a guest but they really know Rj local area and then some.  Upon arrival your greeted in the parking area by Michael who will point you in the right direction if it’s your arrival day.  We got to the front desk and our room was not quite ready so they held our bags for us and gave us the opportunity to explore the hotel and go into Clearwater…

title: Great customer service, Steve at the concierge service is amazing.
review: We are a family of 10 flew from California and Virginia for our annual family get together. We decided to meet in Clearwater this year for the first time. We stayed 8 days in the Sheraton and it was great choice. Steve at concierge service was amazing and very helpful. He helped us plan activities. Not only, he made recommendations, but also called and made reservation and asked for price discount. The dinner cruise he recommended was great. He is very patient while we kept asking for questions and other activities to do. Actually, all employees we met with are so pleasant. The hotel also clean and have lots of activities on the beach for kids and adults. We are so happy we stayed at Sheraton sand key resort. We will recommend for friends and family.

title: Quiet, clean resort on a beautiful private beach
review: Family Reunions are the best! A time to share old memories and make many new ones. We truly appreciate you choosing to stay here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort; on this beautiful and tranquil Island which is truly a great place to enjoy fun in the sun and lots of relaxation therapy plus all the amenities offered. We do our best to ensure there is something for everyone and especially for this very special gathering. As said often a strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. Steve is often recognized for his continued efficient, knowledgeable and genuine caring attitude … no patients needed as Steve truly enjoys and takes pride ensuring our guests enjoy their time in the area and he defiantly knows where to go and the easiest way to get there. Steve has been added to our associate recognition program “Go Beyond” and thanks you. We look forward to the next time you plan another Family Reunion. Hurry Back!

title: Back to the Sheraton Sand Key again.
review: We stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key from Sunday through Friday and really enjoyed our stay. It’s difficult to find anything negative to say, but there were a couple of small things.   First, I will say that this is by far the best place to stay in the area. The hotel is right on the beach and they have everything you need right on property. The pool area is clean and nice (they have a fire pit at night also), the Turtle Bar is right by the pool for those tropical drinks (they have a complementary water station also), there are 3 restaurants and a small store with snacks, toiletries, beach and pool accessories and other miscellaneous items which is open 24/7. Very convenient when you get back to the hotel late at night with a 3 year old that only wants a yogurt and chocolate milk!…

title: Great reaort
review: Couldnt fault this hotel AGAIN. This is our 4th time, and again everyone  of the staff were polite and welcoming. You are now offered to have your room cleaned every 3 days, and if you do, then you get a $5 voucher for every day you stay, and you can spend it in the hotel. As we stayed for 18 days, this mounted up to quite a sum, we did very well. Of course, you could always decline this, and then the cleaners come in every day. Also, the Jolly Trolley is now free to ride back and forth to Clearwater Beach. You only have to show your room key. That is good, as parking is hard to find in Clearwater. We will certainly go again. Well done the SHERATON .

title: Perfect hotel
review: Staying on Sand Key is far from the Clearwater Beach action but definitely worth the distance. The plus is the trolley ride to take you to town and now the Sheraton and Marriott across the street pay if you can show them your key card. Sheraton has all the amenities you need for the stay, pool, bar, food, beach, volleyball and hammock plus cabanas by the ocean. The cabanas are rental daily for $25 plus taxes but totally worth it as you have access for the entire day. They have a truck that drives around selling food and beverage but I think it’s select days.  We’re definitely coming back for the peace and quiet

title: Fun weekend at the beach
review: Every year engineers and their families gather for a convention that is as much a fun weekend at the beach as it is a technical conference.  There's beautiful Gulf beach scenery to the west, and Clearwater Bay to the east.  It's a nice pool and hot tub, and we can stroll along the beach.

title: Overall it was a pretty nice place
review: We stayed in November of 2017. It was a nice winter getaway. The hotel was pretty clean and the service was great. The beach was a bit odd in that it was very far from the water. It worked out because they had beach volleyball, hammocks, and other things to do. The location was a little bit further than others but worth the drive since it was so beautiful. I would stay here again. One downside was the traffic. We missed a boat trip due to terrible traffic and being so far it took a long time to get to the main areas of Clearwater. Otherwise, it was a great stay.

title: Beautiful beach and pool area.
review: It is a delight to read that your experience was everything you anticipated a winter get-away would be. November is a great time to come visit you can fully enjoy the tranquility our Island offers along with the beautiful weather. The beauty surrounding us is breathtaking and we are always pleased to be able to share it with our guests. True the beach is a bit of a walk and I can empathize with you completely as it is a 4-5 minute walk through the sand, Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptionally large beaches. When the hotel was built the beach was much closer to the hotel actually right up to the break wall. Then the Sand Key jetty was built in 1975, since then sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused a wide beach.  We do understand the distance can be an inconvenience which is the reason we have added a 6 person beach complementary shuttle to get you back and forth to the beach whenever needed. You are correct about the traffic although it is not the traffic on Sand Key it is trying to get through the busy Clearwater area as there is much activity there. There are many options with less traffic if you go south of the hotel as each of those beach towns have its own character, although the beaches along the entire island are quite similar Thank you for your comment on the service as our associates genuinely care about our guests and they truly enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We are always working on new ways to better care for you, please return soon.

title: Average at best
review: This place was one of my top picks absolutely great spot. Pool area and beach couldn't be any better. And the staff here are top notch they make sure your stay is the best. I want to thank Sydney for all she did. We had a minor problem and she fixed it in no time. I stayed here for two nights with my family . My daughter, grand children and son in law . I won't put the other hotels name on here in Clearwater where I stayed for the other two nights all I will say is no comparison. If you want to have a great relaxing no worries time in Clearwater this is the place to stay at. Excellent service this is your place. Sydney you are the best thank you again and thank you sheraton for a excellent top notch hotel. I will be back in December and will for sure be staying here. Love that…

title: Beach access
review: We sincerely thank you for your wonderful comments … It is truly memorable when you are able to spend precious moments with your family. Although we cannot stop time, we can slow down our days and learn how to treasure the precious moments we have with our children and grandchildren. It is very gratifying to know we fulfilled everyone’s needs. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and they truly enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay and Sydney is a true example, Due to your comment she has been added to our associate recognition program and she thanks you. I am so pleased you enjoyed the Beach Shuttle, we here at the Sheraton Sand Key are always working on new ways to better care for you.  The location is truly a tropical paradise does offer the best in relaxation therapy while the area surrounding us the area offers activity’s, shopping, culture, entertainment, dining and more. We look forward to that December visit, see you soon!

title: Faboulous resort on a stunning beach
review: I took 2 high school grads here for 3 nights last week.  As we pulled in, it was dark and I was originally not thrilled that it was over the bridge from all the happenings of the Clearwater Beach "strip" area-as it's not at all near the pier.  Rooms were clean and had a fridge.  We had a harbor view which looked over the parking lot to the water across the street.  Not bad, but then again we were never in the room so who cares.  The pool is smallish, but fine.  The beach though, incredible.  You are driven down in a golf cart (you can walk if you want).  My girls did jet skiing on the beach, and for parasailing we took a 4 minute drive over to Shepards resort (free valet parking there).  I thought my girls would miss being near the action but NO-they never wanted to leave.  The…

title: Amazing place to stay!!!
review: Congratulations to the girls! I thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your informative review and love those words fabulous and stunning, it is always gratifying to hear when our valued guests enjoy their stay. Yes the beaches of Sand Key and Clearwater Beach are known for their vastness and beauty. We are a casual beach resort on our own safe little island still close enough to all the activity and as you said the trolley ride is complementary through the partnership between the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and PSTA which now makes it very assailable to find your way around the area and truly this area offers much to entertain you whether you choose to go North or South of the hotel.  After a day of all the activity and action of Clearwater Beach it is nice to come home to the Sheraton Sand Key and be able to enjoy the beauty and tranquility that the Island offers along with some more fun in the sun. Thank you for your remarks on the friendliness and detailed focus of our associates, they take pride in all they do. Another pool is truly high on our priority list and we look forward to your next visit … Your recommendation is greatly appreciated!

title: Really great
review: We loved this resort to the fullest! The beach is the highlight of this property. The water is as blue as you see in the pictures. Pictures don't do it justice. There are plenty of amenities & dining options right on property. We enjoyed our breakfast in one of the restaurants. There are plenty of choices & no need to leave the resort,unless you want to. LOVE IT HERE!! PARADISE for sure!!!

title: Thanks for a great conference!
review: What a great visual description and we are delighted that you felt it was an “Amazing place to stay” and yes this area truly is a tropical paradise, thank you. We love when we are able to share all the beauty that Mother Nature has surrounded us with especially someone who truly enjoys it as much as we do. That your experience here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort was as anticipated and that many memories were made bring you back for another beach get-away soon.

title: Perfect Beach Hotel with Great Staff
review: This hotel suited us perfectly...5 adults and one nearly 3 year old. Plenty of dun beds and nice pools. They could provide more umbrellas around pool. Not everyone wants to sit on the beach and pay for sunbed and parasol by the sea....very expensive! Breakfast buffet reasonable...15.99 plus coffee extra. Rooms a good size...we bad 3 rooms all with 2 beds in. Clean comfortable hotel on peaceful side of Clearwater beach. Trolley bus picks up at hotel so easy to get to pier and restaurants. Only had breakfast here. Would return. Lovely white sand and su sets.

title: Nice Hotel but needs updating
review: Older hotel but a nice stay.  Rooms are on smaller side and need updating. Excellent staff.  Great location on huge beach.  Loved the fire pits.  Has free transportation to other restaurants which was a plus.  We were only there 2 nights and weather was cool and rainy so unfortunately could not enjoy all the amenities.  Would return but only if rooms are renovated.

title: Lovely beach!
review: Unfortunately rain is never fun especially during a beach-get away, I am sure it was disappointing and truly the environment is completely different when the sun is shining. Your positive comments are very much appreciated; that you enjoyed the beach, fire pit and many of our other amenities that we offer along with complementary transportation options which enables you to explore the area and all the dining, shopping, attractions and entertainment is truly a plus. As was your comment on our associates their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care.
