The Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this island for many years and was designed in the style of the era in which it was built, although we are constantly renovating we realize there is always a need for more changes and improvements throughout the hotel. We do have several projects planned for the very near future and one is a total renovation of all bathrooms. I do hope that your experience with our associates and the tranquility of the Island of Sand Key will bring you back when next in the area so you can check out those improvements.

title: Lovely staff
review: While an older hotel, the restaurants, pool area, rooms have been well maintained.  The bathrooms in the rooms are a bit small and of an older style but are very clean and functional.  Our room was clean, the bed comfortable.  If you wish to have a lovely view, do not take room 219 (we were told the view was terrible before we went up).  The beach!  Wow, it goes on and on!  Lovely pool area and bar.  All the staff were attentive, food at both restaurants was wonderful.

title: To relax
review: Thank you for taking time to write a review ... The beach is wide, long, private and beautiful if you enjoy walking or running it does go on for miles and miles. Of course it is also perfect for just relaxing with the help of the sounds and the views or maybe just soaking up some sun. Studies say being around the water can truly clear the mind and can help put life in perspective. It is always encouraging to see the positive feedback and that you enjoyed the cleanliness and comfort of your room is excellent. Our associates strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. We are very proud of our culinary staff they are talented, creative and award winning. I am pleased that you shared that you enjoyed both the food and the service. We do realize that the bathroom areas are definitely in need of a total renovation. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this lovely tropical island for many years and that was the design of the era in which the hotel was built. Our main concern was to find a new design which would not take away from the sleeping area. Unfortunately, there are many variables and factors when implementing a project of this magnitude, this is scheduled to begin by the end of the year. I do hope the tranquility, the location and the service will bring you back for another visit

title: Good trip
review: The staff, reception and Steve concierge are some of the friendliest we have come across, really helpful and always happy. The hotel is nice, good food and clean comfortable bedrooms. Pool is rather small and guests reserve their sun beds and tables from about 6.00 am in the morning, how bizarre! Overall would recommend.

title: “Good to Great” for Clearwater (if not a few grumbles!)
review: We have just had a 12 night stay as our “babymoon” at the Sheraton so we are in a good position to give it a thorough review.  The things we liked... :)  - The hotel for daytime activities is in a great location, it’s on a private beach and although set back from the ocean edge it’s only a 2 minute walk so you get the privacy of the beach or pool if you prefer.  - The location also means there’s ample free parking which is a bit of a luxury in Clearwater & if your driving and staying a while (like we were) then this will save you a lot of money  - There’s no resort fee, again something setting it apart from the hotels in main Clearwater  - Our room was lovely, huge comfy bed and balcony over the pool / beach is money well spent   - The staff we spoke to / saw were all friendly &…

title: Awesome
review: Congratulations and how very exciting a baby! We appreciate the time you have taken to write this informative a detailed review and for your recent 12 night stay. We are uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home; whether you're staying with us for business or leisure we do our best to keep it a well-balanced environment for all. Our largest assets are; the tropical beauty that surrounds us, efficient, caring and genuinely friendly associates, a welcoming environment and of course our large private beach which is perfect for cooperate or group events and truly these business people are usually in their beach attire and relaxing as soon as those meetings are over. And yes there is plenty of room on our large beach for all without overshadowing our leisure guests who are looking for peace and serenity mixed with a bit of fun.  Being in close proximity to all the activity, live entertainment, shops and dining options that Clearwater Beach which is 2.0 miles away offers and with the many free or inexpensive options for transportation you are able to enjoy the best of both can be a plus. I have shared your suggestion with the appropriate management and actually more umbrellas has been a topic of conversation recently. There are servers out around the pool and their menu does include healthy items. Concerning the cabanas; many area resorts include those charges for the cabanas along the shore in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to include a resort fee. That is a private concession for the cabanas and they charge $25 per day for the usage should you choose to use them. We do provide complimentary lounge chairs and hammocks for you our guest. Please keep in mind that this is also a perfect spot for a family vacation hurry back … Thank you again for your feedback as we truly do listen to our guests.

title: Great hotel, great location
review: I would definitely recommend this resort. Comfortable bed, felt like I was sleeping in my own. Clean. Professional, the staff was exceptional!!  My husband and I were here for our 25th wedding anniversary and Im so glad he picked this hotel. The grounds were beautifully kept. There was alot of activities for young and old to do. Tennis courts. Huge chess and checkers games, volleyball courts. Though I wish they would give there hotel guests a discount for the use of the cabanas on the beach. Still very relaxing. We will be back..clearwater is gorgeous

title: Great staff. Nice hotel.
review: Congratulations twenty five years! We are delighted that you chose to spend your time on our relaxing, beautiful, tropical and romantic island celebrating this important milestone. Sunshine and fun during the day, walks on the beach, breathtaking sunsets, followed by nights under the stars relaxing around the fire pit with your favorite beverage and ending with a great night’s sleep on our “Sweet Sleeper” bed.  A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. I have shared your comment on the beautifully kept grounds with those associates who work rain, shine, hot or cold and often are overlooked, it was appreciated. We thank you for the recommendation as that is truly the highest compliment you could give and we here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort sincerely appreciate that comment. Clearwater Beach's inviting, small-town atmosphere surrounded by the beauty of Mother Nature and all the activity, entertainment, sports and shopping it offers is a great balance to the tranquility of the Island of Sand Key. Concerning the cabanas; many area resorts include those charges for the cabanas along the shore in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to include a resort fee. That is a private concession for the cabanas and they charge $25 per day for the usage should you choose to use them. We do provide complimentary lounge chairs and hammocks for you our guest. Now hurry back!

title: Never disappoints
review: This hotel offers a great experience.  The building is modern and the rooms are very nice.  THe grounds are well kept and the pool is very inviting and warm.  It does offer a number of restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner, but dinner would be better served at one of the many downtown restaurants.  We found the staff to be friendly and knowledgeable.

title: It's so easy at the Sheraton Sand Key
review: Just had another six days at the Sheraton Sand Key. Stayed last year for five days, and found it just as enjoyable this time. Having asked, we were fortunate to be given the same room (as last year) gulf, estuary, and park view, and with the sunset from our balcony. As always the staff are brilliant, always courteous and helpful, our housekeeper remembered us from the previous year, and still as efficient and thorough. We think her name was Fitoni?. The people on the desk, concierge, towel guys, all pleasant, helpful, and a pleasure to deal with. Martin and Dwayne in Rusty’s are also worth a mention. We found Rusty’s evening meals well cooked, and very well presented, and the buffet breakfasts weren’t to be missed. The beds were clean and just soft enough, and the linen was…

title: Lovely Resort
review: The Island of Sand Key can sincerely be an oasis from the outside world, a place to just relax and enjoy all the beauty in which Mother Nature has surrounded us with. The beach is beautiful, large and private and away from all the noises of the outside world. You will only hear birdsong and the waves breaking along the shore, there are many treasured memories to be made here.  I am pleased that you also enjoyed the warm and welcoming environment inside also ... along with many of our associates as they are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests, they are also caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. The associates you recognized have been added to our associate recognition program “Go Beyond” and I have also shared your comments with our Culinary Staff, your comments are appreciated and we look forward to that return visit as there are many more beautiful sunsets to enjoy.

title: Disappointed
review: My husband and I just came back a week ago from a stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  I must admit I looked over the reviews, some good, some not so good but looked at the beautiful pictures and decided to take a chance.  Most of the negative reviews were around the time of the spring breaks and April school vacations, that is why( being seniors) I always go the beginning of May and I am so glad I chose this resort.  It is just as lovely as the pictures show on the internet and so very clean.  We had a gulf view room with a king size bed on the 8th floor that was completely renovated from top to bottom, also the bathroom was completely retiled, painted and had new tub and yes it is very small.  The vanity and sink are outside of the room but my husband and I managed it very…

title: RECOMMEND, & WOULD RETURN.
review: Your review was informative and insightful and we sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. There are many choices for lodging in the Clearwater Beach area and we thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We are a casual beach hotel; you will find breathtaking sunsets and beautiful views along with many amenities inside and outside along with a large, private beach.  Our associates are caring, efficient and friendly. We are away from the traffic, yet still close enough to enjoy all the activity Clearwater Beach offers. And yes, there are many transportation options including the complementary trolley rides. It is always better when planning your time away that you research where and when you will better enjoy the experience you are looking for just as you did.  The environment of this beautiful and tranquil Island does change with the season. Spring Break and especially around Easter is the time for families. There are many other months that guests will find it to be a place to come for some relaxation therapy and fun. With all the activity that Clearwater Beach offers being so close there is more than enough to keep you busy if that is what you are looking for.   I have shared your comments concerning Tom and Steve and they have been again added to our associate recognition program, they thank you. I hope that your memories along with your positive interaction with our associates and the beauty that surrounds us will bring you back for another visit soon.

title: Staff is top notch
review: We canceled at the Hyatt and boy are we regretting it. A friend mentioned Sand Key resort so I called and was sold a deal.. they claimed I’d have a water view and when I asked about the cabanas located on the beach they claimed they were included in price. After reviewing my confirmation email I noticed city/ water view .. not what I signed up for so I called the Sheraton. A young man claimed I’d have a great room with a water view but did say there’s a fee for cabanas. I kept the reservation hoping the view would be great. I checked in two hours early and was sent away and told we would be on the fifth floor .. at 2:50 we returned and believe I frustrated the woman by asking if our room was ready I did apologize for bothering her and explained my daughter wasn’t feeling well. …

title: Would return
review: We recently enjoyed a five-night stay at this older but very well maintained Sheraton resort. We are platinum SPG members. Free parking and no resort fee make this a sought-after SPG property. Thought our junior suite was very spacious, clean and modern.  Only downside are that the walls are incredibly thin and we never could sleep in because of the family next door to us who let their children scream and do whatever they wanted. That is not the Sheraton's fault.  The club lounge was really good with a self-serve bar and lots of choices for food. It was so plentiful that we didn't eat dinner several nights because we ate too much in the lounge. Beautiful sunsets and the walk was not that bad to the beach - five minutes. You could catch a ride with the pool attendants and their…

title: Just average
review: We appreciate your review and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay. I am also pleased that you enjoyed the amenities offered and found your suite to be spacious, clean and comfortable. The Sheraton Sand Key offers; large private beach, beautiful views, lounging around our heated swimming pool, relaxing in the hot tub or just napping in a hammock. Ending your busy day around the fire pit or with a long walk on the beach to catch one of those breathtaking sunsets.  Customer satisfaction is something that we take very seriously and we sincerely appreciate your comment that our Bell staff ensured your experience was a success. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success.  The Club Lounge does offer our loyal Starwood Platinum Guest members a continental breakfast in the morning and nice variety of Hors d'oeuvres, some nice beverage choices along with a panoramic view of the area.  I do want to apologize for the noise and for your lack of sleep and hope that you will return at a time when this beautiful Island has a more tranquil environment.

title: Absolutely amazing! Can’t recommend enough 😍  🌅
review: We had a nice time in Clearwater but I was disappointed in this "resort". The restaurants/bars had zero ambiance. Reminiscent of a Denny's or bingo hall. The food was just ok. We had club access (except they didn't put it on all 3 keys so we had to get new keys-of course we discovered this by only having one key on us so down to the desk we trekked) which provided snacks and drinks. Atmosphere in there was not good either. very cafeteria like but the ladies that work in there are so sweet and worked hard to keep the appetizers coming out and the space clean.  The bathroom is SMALL...not good for 3 women to share. Beds were comfy and we had a pool view with partial ocean view.  Concierge was iffy depending on who you got.  Check out seemed hard for them as well. We split it 3…

title: Don't Fall For The Stock Website Photos!
review: I am delighted you enjoyed the beauty and tranquility of the private beach here at the Sand Key Sand Key Resort, I am sure the time spent with your friends must have been filled with many memorable moments for all of you. We are pleased to have been able to contribute to those memories. We have noted your comments regarding your arrival experience and that you perceived the hotel not having the ambiance you anticipated, along with the other issues mentioned. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on these issues. We thank you for your loyalty to the Sheraton brand and to our Marriott family and look forward to your travels brining you back to the Clearwater Beach area.

title: Quick Family Vacation
review: Absolutely stunning surroundings! The sunsets are absolutely spectacular, I would definitely add “visit Clearwater” to your bucket list!  The hotel was beautiful, well maintained, staff were friendly, polite and helpful. The private beach was a lovely and the ‘Jolly Trolley 🚋” was a highlight for children and adults alike! I just wish we could have stayed longer and can’t wait to return!  Highly recommend by the Whelan family 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

title: Parents Spring Break Central. Great views. A little outdated.
review: This hotel had amazing views from the pool/beach side! Overall, the hotel seems old and outdated.   The pillows are way too soft.  Sheets and pillows smelled like pool water.  The bathtub faucet would not stop running.  It seemed like a lot of families were there. But at night, many parents/families played loud music from their balconies, even shouting loudly as if they were olspring break teens. It was disappointing.   Elevators are slow and old.   Staff was pleasant. Bell hops were very helpful. The beach is gorgeous!  Don’t think I would stay here again unless the hotel has a major upgrade.

title: Perfect location, very friendly staff
review: We are delighted that you enjoyed the gorgeous beaches, the views and one of the breathtaking sunsets of Sand Key. Hopefully you found some time to enjoy the serenity that being by the water brings. You are correct Spring break on this coast of Florida is a time for many families and filled with children’s laughter and watchful parents, it is a time that many life time memories are made. I do understand that was not what you were anticipating when planning your stay and apologize for your disappointment. Please know it is a totally different environment during this time although there are many, many very tranquil months when you would find that the only sounds you would hear might be the breeze blowing, the waves crashing on shore and birdsong. Thank you for recognizing our associates as they are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guest, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. We are a casual beach resort and the Sheraton Sand Key Resort has been on this beautiful and tranquil island for many years and that was the design of the era in which the hotel was built. We are constantly renovating and definitely realize that the bathroom areas are definitely in need of a total renovation. Those renovations are scheduled for the very near future. I sincerely hope you will return at a more tranquil time when we are better able to serve your needs.

title: Our go-to place for April vacation
review: Let me first start by saying that I normally do not leave reviews, but after our amazing stay at the hotel, I felt inclined to write a review. We traveled to Clearwater Beach from Detroit with three hound very excited children. We arrived at the hotel at 11 am, well before check in time. Janet at the front desk was extremely welcoming and accommodating. She saw the excitement in my children’s eyes, she not only allowed us to check the in early, she put us in the perfect first floor room right off the pool and beach. Thank you Janet, you went above and beyond. The location was perfect, directly in the beach but away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Clearwater Beach. Great location for a young family. Every staff member we encountered was very friendly and helpful. The hotel…

title: Great family vacation spot
review: I sincerely appreciate you taking the time to write this lovely review. Love that statement” Amazing stay” Families, is what Spring Break at the Sheraton Sand Key is all about; fun in the sun, surf, swimming and enjoying those precious moments with each other which there are so few of in all of our busy lives. It sounds as if there were some life time memories made and we are delighted that Janet along with many of our other associates were part of that experience. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success, Janet has truly been part of that foundation for many years and she thanks you for recognizing her. The beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key is truly an oasis away from the hustle and bustle of all the activity of Clearwater Beach, still only 2.0 miles away if you are inclined to enjoy the activity. Hurry Back there are more memories to be made.

title: Pretty good but not what I expected
review: This is our fifth spring vacation we have spent at the property. It gets better every time we return.   The property is spotless and its main attraction—its (virtually) private beach—can’t be beat. The personnel can’t be friendlier or more accommodating.   Our rooms had two queen beds and a balcony. The bathroom is on a small-ish side. The balcony, if you get the beach view, is beautiful during sunset.   The property is located across the bridge from CB, which is the best part of the property—a quiet, laidback beach (and no dive-bombing seagulls!). The only drawback about the beach is that its sand is full of small shells versus CWB’s sugar sand. However, it makes up for it with a great of cart that sells great rum punch. (Don’t forget to bring your own straws—it’s not available…

title: Great vacation spot!
review: Love that this hotel has tennis courts, pool and beach access. Everything you need is here and the staff is super friendly.  You can take the jolly trolley to town for free.  Great location and great hotel.

title: White Sand Beaches, location, location, location
review: This area has it all, beautiful beaches, hotel and you can't beat the views. This area is some of the best the Gulf Coast of Florida has to offer. Just far enough away from the airport and the hustle and bustle of the city life.

title: Nice place, amenities are nice
review: A couple of things to consider. First create account thru spg.com. If you are a member of starwood preferred guest program you can book and take advantage of lower rates, free breakfast and complimentary cocktails and hors d' oeuvres. Also free wifi and bottled water in your room. Breakfast was a little on the chinz compared to other places. Room was average. Pool are was very nice for families and the outdoor bar had a nice variety. Nightly cocktails were nice 5-7PM and of course location location location. Beach is better up near pier60. Finally to the staff, nice job, including the choc covered strawberries

title: A Perfect Stay: Early April with a 3yr Old
review: Thank you for the informative review, we are uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home; whether you're staying with us for business or leisure we do our best to keep it a well-balanced environment for all. You are correct as you work your way up the tiers there are many perks when becoming a Starwood Preferred Guest which now include being part of the Marriott family. The Island of Sand Key is beautiful and tranquil and truly a place for relaxation therapy. The heated pool surround by lounge chairs, the hot tub, large private beach, evenings around the fire pit watching a breathtaking sunset with a beverage from our Turtle Bar has been known to melt any stress brought with you and make you refreshed, relaxed and ready to tackle whatever awaits you. It is also in close proximity to all the activity of Clearwater Beach, with many free options, such as free trolley rides to get you anywhere on our Barrier Islands and including many inland areas. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success I thank you for recognizing them. We look forward to a return visit soon.

title: Pleasurable 3 nights stay
review: We just got home from 5 nights...and my wife and I would say disregard the negative reviews. This place was perfect (for us). We're from Toronto and are a pretty picky couple as far as general cleanliness and service when travelling. It was my wife, our 3year old boy and I. The Sandkey is so well setup for family fun!! We cant say enough great things. Our room was great. Not enormous, but clean, comfortable and great balcony (we had an ocean view)...plus we were outside 99% of the time anyhow. It is a short drive or trolley to the more active Pier 60 area which is loads of fun for sunset time. The Sandkey's pool/beach zone is amazing. Tons of sandtoys for kids, paddle ball, corn-hole, volleyball nets, hammocks, and loungers/shade options for everyone depending on preference.…

title: Great location on the beach, average hotel
review: The location of the hotel is great. It is on the beach with a private access. The hotel, the staff and the customer service overall is average. The pool is quite small for the hotel. The food is average although the restaurants look nice. The hotel needs to provide better value for the price.

title: Easter 2018
review: I am delighted that you enjoyed the location, it is truly a tropical paradise with beautiful private beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views and close to all the activities our area has to offer. I do hope that you enjoyed a bit of relaxation therapy and that there were many memorable moments made. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests. They also are known to be caring, efficient and genuinely friendly, it is humbling that you did not experience that when interacting with them. We do hope you will return to the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key at a time when we may better serve you.

title: Spring break 2018
review: Having traveled to Orlando from Ireland we stayed here for a bit of down time and relaxation following two weeks of doing the parks. This was our first time staying and we really enjoyed it. Our room and the hotel in general was clean and we found the staff very nice and helpful. Food was also good and in our opinion reasonably priced. The beds were comfy and the first floor where we stayed was quiet leading to a good nights sleep, something that in our opinion is a very important factor and ensures you are refreshed for the day ahead! Poolside bar had a good variety of drinks. Overall we have no complaints, Clear Water itself is a lovely area and we would have no hesitation in recommending the Sheraton - Hopefully we will be back!!

title: Exceptionally welcoming staff, large beach front, but very loud if you are on the backside of the hotel
review: We had great time and the resort was very clean, accommodating, and the staff was incredible.  From the moment we arrived, we were greeted by kind and caring staff, and found that during our whole stay.  I really can’t say enough great things about the staff.  Loved the golf cart ride to the beach, as we often carried a lot along with us and the walk to the beach is about .20 mile.  The smoothies at the outside bar were incredible.  Get out to the beach early and reserve a front row cabana, they rent quickly.  The hot top is a bit too hot, at 104 degrees, but I am sure that hot temp helps kills germs.  It seemed like people put towels on chairs by the pool early in the am and weren’t anywhere around which was frustrating, so you may just need to get up early, put your towel out…

title: Older but very nice
review: The Positive:  1. The staff at the property seemed to have a genuine desire to find out about guests and make them (adult and kids alike) welcome. The beach area is large and lots of activities. 2. Because everything is so self contained, we could easily pass 3/4 of the day and then go off for doing something in Clearwater. 3. One thing I found odd was there was lifeguard at the pool. We don't vacation in Florida so this may be the norm, but I found it odd given in every place around the world I have been to, the pool had at least one lifeguard.  The Negatives  1. The property is a bit dated (not sure when the rooms were last updated).  2. Half the hotel rooms (those not facing the ocean, but the waterway) all overlook the ugly roof structure of the large conference center. The…

title: An old favourite
review: We have stayed here many times, but not for a good few years; we returned mainly for nostalgic reasons. It 's still a very nice hotel, but not quite as good as we remembered it. The Mainstay Tavern is not as cosy as it used to be, and Rustys Restaurant has not been improved by the introduction of a buffet type option (although you can still order from the main menu). The room was nice, if a little tired itself. That said it has the best beds - way better than some more grander places. Nothing can change it's brilliant location, and you just have to experience a walk along it's beachfront at sunset; breath-taking. The staff are nice and helpful (apart from one misery in the Mainstay). Would I stay here again - absolutely, but I will also treasure my memories of it's 5* days.

title: Thank You!
review: As a SPG Gold member, the Sheraton Sand Key completely exceeded our expectations.  After an extremely disappointing stay at the DoubleTree in North Redington Beach that necessitated us to check out a day early due to poor service, the Sheraton exemplified what true service is.  Even though it was spring break, I contacted the front desk the morning off and while on the phone, reserved a room on the SPG app using points while being ensured by the front desk that they would do everything they could to place us in a nice room at the last minute.  They were wonderful and came through on their promise and helped us rebound from a poor experience.  They truly value their guests and SPG members by going above and beyond.  The Sheraton Sand Key understands the value and loyalty of the…

title: Second Trip Here Girls Weekend
review: We arrived a day early, needing to leave Boston for weather.  As usual, the staff was super accommodating upon arrival.  The Club Lounge was closed upon our arrival, and when our room didn't have waters, the night desk was very helpful in providing me with plenty of waters.  There was also a birthday cake in our room (for my upcoming birthday).  It was cool our first two days...but it was still gorgeous.  Steve at the pool was fun to chat with and offered some great suggestions.  Once the pool bar opened, Gallo was the best.  He really hustles and took great care of us.  As always, the Club Lounge is fantastic.  I don't know if there is a better spread with beverages included!!!  Thank you for another great trip away from the cold with my friend! Only disappointments...our room…

title: Did not stay but did use the staff to send a gift to my daughters room.
review: The staff at this hotel went out of their way to accommodate me in preparing a welcome package for my daughters family.  I called and asked for some assistance and they were very prompt in call backs and preparing what I needed as a welcome gift for my daughters family. Before they delivered they took a photo and texted to me as well as called me when they were going to deliver. They even exchanged one item. I am very pleased with this service from the staff at this hotel.

title: Average
review: I thank you for your positive review, I am delighted to read that your experience with our associates even over the phone was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. It is gratifying they ensured your request was handled professionally and efficiently and that they added in some TLC. I hope there will be a time when you are able to visit the Sheraton Sand Key yourself and experience all the beauty and tranquility the Island of Sand Key offers.

title: Fantastic time
review: I visited this hotel with my boyfriend and his two boys. We had such a nice time! They have lots of things to do for the kids such as Cornhole, Paddle Tennis, a huge Chess game and more. The staff was so nice and although it was extremely crowded (due to the fact that it was Spring Break) I was able to relax. I would come back!!!

title: Horror show
review: When you're looking for a peaceful, relaxing vacation along with a fun-filled family getaway the Sheraton Sand Key provides the perfect setting to make new memories; heated pool, hot tub, large private beach and many beach games, which I am pleased you all enjoyed. Hopefully there was a Dolphin sighting, beautiful sunsets and maybe nights around the fire pit. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with the children and each other is a perfect break. Hurry Back!!

title: No Need For A Car Here
review: First of all, I have no idea where all the positive reviews come from but if you had never traveled elsewhere and have some sense of what vacation should be like you would never stay at the Sheraton Sand Key. It was very old, outdated and smelly hotel. The staff was rude to the point that as a SPG member I was told when asking for an extra shower gel that those are not given at the 2nd floor and we only qualify for the bar soap! When I got into my room the room smelled like old sweat and urine and on top of this there was food leftovers in the bed under one of the pillows from the previous guests. I’m still here because was refused to be accommodated elsewhere but can’t wait to get back home, take a shower and forget about this trip. My family and I are very disappointed with…

title: Just a little dated. Staff are excellent
review: It was extreamly unsettling to hear that you were disappointment with the appearance of the hotel and your experience was not as you anticipated. Those are not the usual memories that we want our guests leave our beautiful Island with. Spring is always a very difficult time for us as we are maximum occupancy with our many loyal guests. Which also includes many SPG members from preferred to platinum level and it is virtually impossible for us to meet the upgrade requests of all. As you can imagine, it is indeed our goal to provide the utmost in service and amenities to you our loyal guest, and it is humbling that we did not deliver to those expectations.  Nonetheless, our staff is trained to address that with our guests and, based on your feedback, we obviously fell short in how we handled your requests and I sincerely apologize.

title: Phillies Spring Training Visit
review: Small, Friendly, Resort With All The Amenities Of Larger Resorts. Fabulous, Huge Private Beach On The Gulf Of Mexico. Great Food, Meeting Places. The Trolly and City Bus (both are free if you show your hotel key) travel throughout Pinellas County. Hertz Car Rental has a facility open until 5PM at the hotel directly across the street if you want to rent a car to drive to Busch Gardens or a baseball game for the day. Great buffet breakfast and if you're lucky enough to have JeanMarie as your waitress, she will give you lots of helpful hints!!!

title: Perfectly ok but rather dated rooms
review: We stayed here overnight after a long flight from London, before heading south to Cape Coral. The welcome was good, but the hotel was super busy, and the restaurant we’d hoped to eat in was only offering a $35 fine dining experience, so we ate in the sports bar, which was so noisy! The rooms are fine, the bedding lovely, but it’s all rather dated. The staff are friendly, so we had a restful stay, but for £350 we felt it was rather expensive.

title: White sand and love
review: Good location, most of the rooms have the gulf view, the pool and the hot tub is nice! I liked the hammokcs! The staff is helpfull and friendly! Would go back for sure! The only negativity is the size of the bathroom!

title: Nice, but very busy
review: Stayed here for a family vacation and catching a few Spring Training games. This was our first stay in the Clearwater area.   While the rooms were updated and very clean, and the staff was really fantastic, I am not sure we would return. It is a busy, crowded hotel and the lobby and public areas are small. The walls are thin- we could actually hear conversations (and children screaming) in other rooms. The pool is ridiculously small and crowded for the size of the hotel, but the private beach was large and beautiful. Lots of game courts set up for the kids.  Transportation is provided to the shore line by a golf cart, and you can rent a beach set up and charge it to your room ($25 plus tax for two cushioned loungers and an umbrella or cabana).  There were things you don't expect…

title: Not worth the money paid
review: We were very disappointed with our room.  For $450 a night, we had a view of the dumpster and rooftop.  We stayed at Hilton Hawaiian for $450 a night and had an ocean view suite.  The room also was not the cleanest (candy and wrapper under chair, hairball in bathroom.  Our room was very small.  I'm not a big person and had trouble dressing in the small bathroom space.  There was no wi fi in our room.  We were told we would need to pay extra for it.  We opted not to.  The outlet near the sink did not work.  Cell reception in facility was minimal at best (ours is AT&T).  The beach was quite a distance from resort (about a city block plus some) which we were unaware of.  Also, we felt the prices at the gift shops and restaurants were high.  We basically left each of the two days we…

title: Great
review: I sincerely apologize for your disappointment concerning your experience. Concerning your view, we would have been pleased to upgrade if occupancy would have allowed. The Clearwater beach area has become such a popular destination, it has been rated #1 in the State of Florida for several years now. The resort and hotel rates in the area have increased with this new popularity from Clearwater beach to St Peter beach. We do acknowledge that we are not the newest hotel in Clearwater Beach, however, we are a warm and welcoming casual beach resort and we are the only resort property with a private beach. Yes, Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches and our island beach is large and private and truly a place to relax. When the hotel was built the beach was much closer to the hotel. The Sand Key jetty was then built and since then sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused an extra wide beach. We do realize it is a bit of a walk to the shore and we provide a complementary six person beach shuttle to bring you to the shore and back when needed.  I concur that the internet is something most all guests require nowadays. It is one of our standards to have a fee in place however just recently we have modified this in a small way and all internet in the lobby or The Mainstay Tavern is provided free of charge.  This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms but for now it remains as a fee based service. Also SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app.

title: Girls get away
review: Spent 4 days to get away from the cold The pool was great and the fire pit was amazing. The pool bar, when open is good, but it closes when it wants so don't depend on the hours. The inside bar was a big disappointment, no atmosphere at all The beach is a bit of a walk. The staff was friendly.  The best thing about this hotel is the sunsets.  I am so glad we got an ocean view.

title: Great Weekend on the Beach
review: We always appreciate when our guest’s take time to share their experience, thank you. What sets our associates apart is their desire to ensure our guests receive exceptional service with the personal touch and they are genuine when doing so. After a long cold winter the Island of Sand Key can certainly give you a renewed view on life. Especially with a Gulf view which can be so serene that it brings a calmness along with true relaxation. Of course even if you do not have that view just step outside there you will find breathtaking sunsets, walks on along the shore, beach games, a dip in our heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can nap or just catch some sun. True the beach is a bit of a walk; it is an island beach and far enough away from all the everyday noises of life. We do offer a complementary 6 person shuttle which will take you and all that might be needed to enjoy a day at the beach to and from the shore including needed trips in between. Ending the night sitting around the fire pit is a great place to enjoy each other or even meet a new friend. The Turtle bar is supposed to stay open till after sunset of course the weather and the amount of people out there makes the times variable, this is being reviewed with those associates, we apologize. Please hurry back as there are more memories to be made.

title: This will probably be my last stay
review: We were so happy with the Sheraton Sand Key. Being that I was traveling with my father, we were beyond thrilled about the location of this resort; across the bridge from the major touristy area of Clearwater Beach, but close enough that it was only a few minutes to get there if need be. The beach was beautiful, people were friendly, and lots of restaurants to choose from. Our only negative of the trip was that we decided to take the free trolley into Clearwater Beach one evening for dinner and ended up getting stuck there. For some reason, the trolley map was incorrect. We found the correct location after asking around and still got there 10 minutes before the scheduled trolley. None came. Standing outside in the dark and rain for over an hour with my dad was not pretty. I…

title: Can't wait to return
review: It is always very rewarding when we hear that we have succeeded in ensuring your stay was the experience you anticipated it to be. Yes this area does offer options for everyone restaurants, shopping, entertainment or nothing at all. This location is tropical and serene, with breathtaking sunsets. With beautiful views and great places to just sit and relax and share past memories made with your Father and make new lasting memories for you both. Your story about the trolley is very concerning and I am truly sorry that happened to you and very pleased Alan was able to help. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. I have ensured that Alan has been recognized by adding him to our “Go Beyond” program and have given him a copy of your comments and also shared them with the appropriate management and we all thank you. I hope that your experience with our associates and the beauty and tranquility of the Sheraton Sand Key will bring you back for another visit.

title: Good location away from the crowds
review: Have stayed here a number of times before in recent years. The negatives I would say are now beginning to outweigh the positives. The hotel still appears to be very popular with a very crowded car park and  thevstaff are certainly very friendly and helpful but this hotel despite its great location on the beach is now becoming quite tired and in desperate need of a make over. Many areas of the hotel including my room probably have not changed their appearance decor wise that much since the hotel was first opened 30+ years ago. Also have to say price wise when you factor in the various taxes etc as well that this hotel has now become a very expensive option when compared to some of the comparable local competition. Factoring all of this in I think I will definitely stay somewhere…

title: Good food, long wait
review: Due to the Saturday night crowd, our party had a long wait to be seated. They accommodated once available, and explained ordering pizza was a 45 minute wait because the kitchen was behind. So we ordered simple sandwiches and an appetizer. Our drinks and appetizer came out in a reasonable time. Two hours later our actual dinner arrived. We understand they were short staffed and just busy but that is still a long wait for items like a cheeseburger, BLT, and turkey sandwich.   All said the food once arrived, was good. I don’t know if it was 2 hour wait good, but still decent. I would recommend, but ensure their isn’t a long wait and that they are not short staffed.

title: Fabulous stay
review: I genuinely understand the inconvenience and frustration of this incident, as a Sheraton standard our goal is to provide you our guest with the highest level of hospitality and service. It truly is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting those expectations. This is not normally a complaint we receive and I have shared your comment with the appropriate management to ensure an incident such as this does not occur again in the future.    I do hope there were many positive and memorable moments made during your stay and that you will return at a time when we are better able to serve you.

title: GREAT! as always.
review: Stayed at this hotel in July 2017. Had the most a,azing time. Hotel is spotless and location is absolutely superb. Staff can't do enough for you, friendly and very helpful.  Pool area is fantastic and immaculate. We are returning in July 2018. Can't wait !

title: Nice location - Property could us an update
review: We sincerely thank you for your fabulous review, it is always gratifying to read that you our guest enjoyed their interaction with our associates. As with ambition, empowerment and heart their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Delighted that you also enjoyed; lounging around the pool, maybe doing nothing at all or playing the beach games provided such as Volley ball and beach tennis plus others. Or you might find yourself relaxing in the hot tub and ending your evenings gathering around the fire pit with a beverage and enjoying the beautiful colors in the sky after a breathtaking sunset.  Whatever fun is bringing you back we will look for you in July for another amazing time!!!

title: Perfect beach and wonderful staff
review: We have enjoyed staying at this resort for many years now. Always great to see familiar faces of the staff, who make our visits so memorable. Will be back next year. Special thanks to: Roberta, Heather, Monique, Esther, Autumn & Johana.

title: Just ok
review: We stayed once before in a suite and were stuck looking at the rooftop and parking lot. This time we thought we would try a king room with a view. Major disappointment when we saw our $300+ a night view was of the tennis courts. The bathroom is REALLY small. Not real impressed with either rooms & will probably never go back.

title: Wonderful place!
review: Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations concerning the view. The Sheraton Sand Key strives to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. We acknowledge that the bathroom areas are in need of renovations. We have continued to look into new designs, finally a solution has been decided upon and those renovations are planned for the very near future. Hopefully you enjoyed the location as this is a truly a tropical paradise with beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key, it is defiantly a place to enjoy some relaxation therapy along with some fun in the sun.

title: First time in America
review: Very not very hotel with beautiful beaches and kept very clean inside and out.  Customer service was top notch!  Very spacious and accommodating.  The local attractions are close by and easy to get to.  Downtown is a few minutes away.

title: Great location!
review: This was our first time in America. We were not disappointed with this hotel. The staff couldn’t do enough to help you, the room was cleaned to a high standard and very comfortable.    We ate in the Island restaurant during the day and the main restaurant in the evening. The food  in both restaurants was excellent quality and staff worked hard to ensure you had good service.  The only minor issue we had was confusion over the ‘green label’ which you place outside of your room if you don’t wish to have your towels / bedding changed.  Unfortunately the maid didn’t come into the room and make the bed, re stock tea, coffee and toiletries. Also the bins weren’t emptied.  I did contact housekeeping and they re stocked what was needed but didn’t make the bed or empty the bins.     This…

title: Sunsets and dolphins
review: The rooms are average, but not bad. Service is great! The pool and beach games are very fun! The cabanas on the beach are perfect to block wind or prevent too much sun. There is a golf cart for those who don't want to walk to the beach, but what is so bad about walking a little ways on the sandy beach? Just walk it and let your toes feel the sand. Definitely would stay again.

title: Paradise on America's no.1 beach
review: Absolute gem of a hotel, with its own private beach. The staff are friendly and efficient and the amenities are great. 2 restaurants serving good food and entertainment in the bar. The pool.is a tranquil haven whilst the fire pit allows for quiet evening get togethers.  The beach is the real gem it's breathtakingly beautiful. Stunning sunsets are an added bonus. Rooms are very good though for something special I'd recommend upgrading to a suite.  Negatives are few though I'd be upset if I had a ground floor room. The Restaurant service could be better in an evening too. Overall though it's a fab place a definite gem of clearwater.

title: Comfortable Get-Away
review: I thank you for this charming review, it seems as if there were many memorable moments made. I am delighted that you enjoyed all the beauty and tranquility the Island of Sand Key offers, we are always pleased to be able to share all Mother Nature has surrounded us with. Everyone does have a different preference in room types, families with children love that bottom floor with the convenience of being close to the pool area. Hopefully your room was on a higher floor and you are correct our suites are lovely. We have addressed the issue with the service you received in the restaurant that is not what the Sheraton brand service is about and I apologize. We do hope the memories of days on the beach relaxing in the sunshine and those breathtaking sunsets will bring you back to paradise soon.

title: Wonderful location, good staff
review: Just returned from quick week-end trip visiting daughter at college. We had seen info with Marriott/Starwood merger and thought we would try the Sheraton.  As Marriott Platinum members, supposedly we would receive the same benefits. While an older property, we were pleased with our visit. Staff was friendly and helpful and upgraded us to an upper floor ocean view room. The concierge room with beautiful view was nice for breakfast and drinks in the evening. While the restaurants were older, we had prompt service and all of our food was good and prices reasonable. We did not mind paying $25.00 for beach service as there was no resort fee or parking charges. Overall, we have stayed at higher-end newer properties, but that doesn’t always equate with a better stay. When traveling, we…

title: Pictures are better than reality
review: The location right on the beach is truly wonderful. The staff are warm and friendly. The room attendant, Mimoza was amazing. The beach is long, and relatively quiet. The water warm too. Only drawbacks, they allow people to reserve chairs around the pool for hours and they allow people not staying in the hotel to come to the pool and use the facilities. The gates to the pool area are open and unguarded?

title: Beautiful surroundings
review: Attended a conference recently and was excited by the photos. The property is ok but the rooms are older and the bathrooms are tiny. The beach seen in the photo is actually not part of the resort and you have to pay for use of the chairs and cabanas. Sorry to say but this place is nothing special. Staff was nice at all times however.

title: Restaurants need renovations
review: This was an interesting stay. Service was generally excellent, especially at the front desk. One day, we failed to receive housekeeping service even though we did not have a DnD sign on our door.   Rooms and facilities were generally clean and well-kept. The outdoor decks are a nice touch given the warm weather of the location. The pool and beach are very nice.  The biggest issue I had with this hotel was the dining facilities. I've come to expect a lot out of hotel restaurants, and this hotel is stuck in 1998.   Rudy's was so-so but the interior is very dated.   The more casual grill restaurant/hotel bar is a windowless room, with the outdoor seating area overlooking the hotel's parking lot. This truly blows my mind as the hotel has a great pool and private beach. How the hotel…

title: Excellent SPG Oceanfront Hotel - We love this place
review: It is always encouraging to see the positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most – you! Customer satisfaction is something that we take very seriously and we sincerely appreciate your comment that our team ensured your experience was a success. A strong team is truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. I am delighted you enjoyed the outside amenities that are offered. It is also rewarding to know that our associates ensured that the facilities were clean, comfortable and well kept. . The Sheraton Sand Key was built 43 years ago and the design of the building reflects that era. When it was designed our huge state of the art kitchen was built in the back of the building, due to that the locations of the restaurants have never been moved for convenience reasons, which is why it is windowless. We sincerely appreciate your suggestion and it has been discussed over the years and yes we agree it would be wonderful it those restaurants were built where they could have had a view. Our Chefs are award winning, talented and many of the locals sincerely enjoy their dining experience. I am truly disappointed that you probably will not be returning and do hope you will reconsider a return visit to the beautiful and tranquil Island of Sand Key.

title: Nice hotel with pool and great beach area - be careful when renting beach chairs
review: Beautiful location with oceanfront views.  We had have stayed in the suites here many times and will be going back soon.  The staff is professional and handle any questions or needs that you have.  The restaurants have incredible food and were even able to meet special dietary needs.  Quick access to the beach and their pool and pool bar are perfect.  WE LOVE THIS PLACE!

title: Nice Hotel but Isolated
review: I thank you for your lovely review.The Island of Sand Key does have the most relaxing environment; a place you can walk for miles on the beach, relax by the pool and read a book, bask in the sun or just nap in a hammock. At the end of the day enjoy a breathtaking sunset or sit under the stars by the fire pit all close by our Tiki Bar in case a beverage is desired. I absolutely loved reading your positive comments as it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guest, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. We do have a talented and award wining culinary staff and our Executive Chef does ensure many options are offered. We also have won Florida Trends magazine's  "Golden Spoon" award for the past 6 years in which is a great honor. We look forward to that return visit soon.

title: Nice get away
review: This is really a fantastic hotel with comfortable rooms. The pool area was great that had a bar as well as a fire pit area that the kids loved. The private beach is out of this world. Before getting to the ocean, there are volleyball nets as well as kids sand toys to use. The walk to the ocean is long, but easy as the sands is quite compacted. Once at the beach, you have an option to rent chairs through the hotel. You pay the fee and they mark your names on a seating chart. We got there nice and early and rented front row at the end so we could easily see our kids as they played on the beach. After a few hours, we went back to the hotel, got a bite to eat and headed back to the beach. Low and behold, our seats were occupied by somebody else!! We went to the gentlemen who was…

title: Nice place
review: Activities on beach ...music.. good bar....nice pool area...great fitness club go check it out worth it great veiws...Rusty restaurant worth it had filet minonge melt in your mouth...will stay again..FYI small waters in room free but large 3.50 or so house keeping and front door men will get you water just ask them free at bar also in cup though...about block away a strip mall eat at Columbia for authentic Cuban food  reservations for diner recommended ...down from that backwater bar grill have tini salad or grouper bring your appetite...free trolly from Sheraton to per 60 just show room key...the Sheraton is very relaxing around pool had a great stay...rooms nice clean get a water view if can...

title: Good pick with caveats
review: We enjoyed our three nights here in early Feb 18. It was expensive (ok, not as much as the big Clearwater resorts but with fees it was still over 400/nt) The property is well located, and we picked it especially because we like the one mile walk over the bridge to the bustle of Clearwater Beach, which we hiked each morning.The pool and beach arrangement were very nice, and the breakfast folks were super chatty. Now the bad: on check-in, we were offered a deal where if we did not opt to change our linens and towels each day we'd get a $5 voucher. The money wasn't much, but it seemed like a good green thing to choose. What we didn't realize is that we had opted for *no* housekeeping at all. No bathroom cleaning, trash collection, nothing. The instructions in the room said if we…

title: Slow, old school kind of beach resort vibe
review: Impressive, that walk over the bridge to Clearwater is great exercise and not for everyone although the view is breathtaking. Luckily for those who are unable to conquer the incline of the bridge we have partnered with our local transit system to enable our guests to ride the bus or trolley for free just by showing your room key. We have certain practices that promote environmental awareness. Taking this one step further, we have increased the number of green alternatives that we can provide to guests who are looking for a Green Resort experience! At check –in you chose our “Make a Green Choice” program. I do not think it was not communicated to you properly and this has been addressed by the Director of Guest Services. Choosing that program means that you chose to decline all housekeeping service, including the bathroom. This means our Housekeeping team will not enter your room; however other services such as the need for clean towels, coffee, the trash emptied or additional items can be acquired by dialing 0. As a thank you for your Green participation, each day you earn either a $5 voucher daily for food and beverage or 500 Starwood Preferred Guest points. Since the housekeeper is not allowed in your room that would not have seen a card left on the bed. You are able to dial 0 and inform them if you have changed your mind and would like your room cleaned, I sincerely apologize for any misunderstanding.

title: Anniversary Holiday
review: This is a nice hotel, in a nice location that is well maintained. Most of the staff are working VERY hard to be friendly and pleasant (except for the crabby early morning lady in the sundry store).   Great access to the beach and the park next door. Very family friendly with amenities in the lobby. Our room wasn’t great where it overlooked the parking lot/roof which was noisy with fans all the time, which meant we kept our balcony door closed.   On the whole though there is little to complain about. This is a pricey but nice hotel.

title: Beautiful pool, small updates, and dedicated staff
review: Had such a great time… my travel agent mixed things up along the way on our vacation, and the hotel was quick to make things right for us! I want to room was great the beach was awesome… I loved the little beach buggy that takes you down to the water, that’s a huge bonus with a long beautiful beach like that! Cannot wait to return!

title: THE most MEMORABLE trip -- EVER, EVER, EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: I'm not sure I can find the words to adequately describe how magical Sand Key is...and I haven't even stayed there myself!!! I booked a room here for my parent's 25th wedding anniversary. I was really worried about wheelchair accessibility as my dad is under hospice care and in the last leg of his long battle with cancer. So I emailed the resort to request a wheelchair to get dad down to the beach...and they did me one better...Jennifer from Sand Key CALLED me within a few hours to let me know she would ensure there was a golf cart available to him whenever he needed it. On top of that, the resort surprised my parents with a welcome fruit and cheese board amenity and a room view of the ocean (in case my dad wasn't feeling well enough to get down to the beach). But the very best…

title: John, Tom and Walter!
review: Jennifer was very touched as soon as she spoke to you, she definitely along with all of us thank you for including the Sheraton Sand Key in this beautiful and memorable moment in your parents lives. The Island of Sand Key is a tropical, tranquil and beautiful place to come to make memories. Times such as this are truly the reason many, many of our associates have chosen to be in hospitality; they take so much satisfaction in being able to touch people’s lives in a positive way. Living our brand every day, devoting their energy to bringing them to life for our guests and to be able to help you fulfill this special wish was sincerely our associate’s pleasure. Word-of-mouth recommendations are powerful because they are honest and unscripted and we certainly appreciate this one. Your family will continue to be in the thoughts of those this experience touched. Hopefully one day you will return so we may pamper you.

title: Lunch on beach
review: Just to say we have just completed a two day stay at the Sheraton, the hotel facilities were all as you would expect for a hotel of this classification, very good!  However what particularly outshone our expectations were the customer care, friendliness, professionalism of John on Reception, Tom the Concierge and Walter our Waiter!!  Thank you all for making our stay in a beautiful part of Florida being all the more memorable for your courteous contribution to our experience here at the Sheraton.

title: Florida Cup
review: It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most – you! Your comment on our associates John, Walter and Tom was very much appreciated, with ambition, empowerment and heart their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. A strong team is our truly our foundation and all of our associates are largely accountable for that success. I do hope you will return to our tropical paradise with its beautiful private beach, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views for a bit more relaxation therepy.

title: Great Hotel
review: Sheraton is a beautiful hotel. Perfect for families, business meetings, or honeymoon. It has everything. The clean baby powder like sand feels cool between your toes The beach is just breathtaking. pool area is great,nice chairs,bar area close. The sunsets are the best .

title: Great place to stay in Clearwater, Fl
review: Been here many times and always a great stay. Nothing to complain about and the restaurant, Rustys Bistro is second to none ! Free self parking is a real plus, no extra charges, no surprises, just a clean wonderful place to stay. The staff in the hotel and restaurants are fantastic.

title: Nice property
review: I thank you, your continued loyalty has sincerely been paramount to the continued success of the Sheraton Sand Key. Known for its “cuisine of the sun” laced with Floribbean touches, Rusty’s Bistro at Sheraton Sand Key Resort has an award winning and very talented culinary staff along with dedicate and professional servers. I am so pleased that it is on your list of dining experience in an area that has so many choices. As you stated we do not have the nightly resort fees that most area hotels charge when staying with us you are correct there is free parking and concerning the amenities you only pay for what is used such as cabanas and fitness center etc. We are very proud of our associates and pleased you always enjoy the positive interaction with our associates as they are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests.  They are truly caring, efficient and genuinely friendly and I am sure due to the longevity of many of our associates you have gotten to know them by name. We look forward to many, many more visits, and hope to see you soon.

title: Great place to stay
review: The Sheraton sand key is an older resort on a great piece of property, long stretch of uncrowded beach, many chairs for laying in the sun, clean rooms and property, convenient to stores and restaurants. The only thing that caught me off guard was the amount of screaming kids at the pool area, we thought going in a school week would bring us some quiet, no way it was screaming kid central day and night at the pool.

title: Treated like royalty
review: Thank you for the informative review, you are correct when school is in session you would have found the Sheraton Sand Key to be very tranquil. Although it is always a tropical paradise with beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. I am sure the noise was unsettling especially when unexpected. I sincerely apologize for the disrupted behavior caused by the visiting team of young people, we were assured that there would be more parental control. Better guide lines have been put in place so that there is no recurrence of this issue. This is a perfect place for families and of course there are many, many times that we truly welcome families and children with open arms. I appreciate all your positive comments and look forward to your return visit when you will receive all the relaxation therapy that is offered here on the Island of Sand Key.

title: Not Afraid but Beware of Stingrays
review: Visited here with family for new year. Great hotel on the beach with pool and hot tub. Beach games and lots of sun loungers.  A short drive to the pier in Clearwater beach.   Staff really friendly and helpful. Food good.   Try a massage it was fantastic. .

title: Decent but not for couples
review: I went here for my honeymoon;   In all honesty. The hotel is actually really good; clean and tidy, big, nice staff. I can't really fault it however, it's very much set up as a conference hotel so I doubt I would go back with family.   Again. It is a nice hotel and ticks all the usual boxes but it just didn't have the personal feel about it. Everyday, the place would be busy with people attending conferences.   Great for people attending conferences and short stays.   Not so great for people on an actual holiday.

title: Beautiful Gem on the Gulf Coast!
review: Congratulations on your recent wedding! I am very pleased you chose the tranquility of the Island of Sand Key for your Honeymoon. Thank you for the positive comments. It is truly unfortunate at this very special time when memories should have been made that last a life time, that the number of groups in house over shadowed the experience you anticipated. We always try to balance having leisure guests and business groups at the same time and we are usually successful. It is a high priority of our associates to ensure you are made to feel special no matter who else is staying at the hotel, your comment is concerning and I sincerely apologize. The Sheraton Sand Key’s environment chances from day to day depending on the time of year. During the holidays and summer it can be very family ordinated, most other times “Our Island” is tranquil even when there are groups in-house. The beauty of Sand Key is meant to be shared with everyone and we do hope you will return at a time when we may better serve your needs.

title: Great quiet location for family or business
review: We love the Sheraton Sand Key. We went for a conference in early January and it was an great choice.   The hotel is at the tip of the Barrier Island with a +500 meter powder sandy Beach! Immediately next to a beautiful county park. Most rooms have beautiful water views.   Even though it was cold (a rarity!) The pool and the Hot-tub were still great!  There are several nice restaurants on property and they also supply the room service with Lots of delicious food! Rusty’s Bistro is a must do for the Saturday night Crableg & seafood buffet and is a incredible value!  There are also many restaurants within walking distance or take the beach trolley!

title: MY FAVORITE PLACE
review: We sincerely appreciate your positive and informative review. Our associates do take pride in welcoming you and making you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. It is a beautiful and tranquil Island and one of the unique features setting this resort apart from others in the area is the location of Sand Key, which despite being connected by an elevated roadway is actually its own island. It’s this location that greatly contributes to a sense of rest and relaxation at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort as you enjoy the private beachfront away from the noise and crowds of the main beach area. Enjoying time at the beach is always better with warm temperatures and cool breezes, so we truly look forward to a return visit. Rusty’s Bistro’s Hand Carved Roast Prime Rib and Seafood Buffet has been a favorite of not only our hotel guest and many of the locals, I am truly pleased you enjoyed its offerings. You are correct there are many, many dining venues to choose from in the area. There is also much to explore and now the trolley is free to our guests by showing your room key. Thank you again and hurry back!

title: Don’t expect plantinum perks
review: Stayed here 2 nights. Sure a little dated in decor and a mild sea shore aroma in lobby but give a 5 star for value and solid seasoned staff. Louis our server for breakfast was awesome. look at the picture of our omelettes were beautiful! I appreciate a server taking care of  me and offered me coffee to go at end. Louis was good!

title: The DEEP FREEZE
review: I have been going to this hotel for 33 years! It is an old favorite but its been a while so I was really excited because kids are older and would remember this trip! We drove down from Chicago so we arrived around 8pm on a Friday night. The nicest guy checked us in Todd was his name! Our room was on first floor and was larger than years past! This room worked out great because it overlooked tennis courts but only 20 yards from HOT TUB and pool. We went into bar/restaurant for an incredible dinner that Autumn the waitress served us! She was very friendly and loved talking to our kids.  Great service too. The OUTBACK BOWL was going to be played on Monday so the SOUTH CAROLINA BAND and CHEERLEADERS checked in. Nice group of kids! On Saturday we took the free trolley that comes…

title: Starwood Platinum is not going to help you here
review: Thirty three years that is truly a loyal guest and we thank you for all your loyalty. I sincerely appreciate this truly positive and informative review. Although we have no control over the weather still it was disappointing to hear it shortened your memorable experience here on the Island of Sand Key with your family. It does sound like the perfect vacation; now that the children are older I hope you will return soon to do all activities you had planned like Busch Gardens or charging the seas on a Pirate ship ride and all the other things the area offers. Go Bucs! There are many other professional sports to enjoy also the Ray’s and our Lightning. If not looking for Cubs, Spring training showcases many teams in the surrounding areas. Of course that truly is a time for families and very busy. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests. They also are caring, efficient and most of all, genuinely friendly, thank you for recognizing them especially Todd, Autumn, Kyle and Nancie as they take pride in their part of making the Sheraton Sand Key the perfect place for a beach get-away, they truly enjoy the interaction with you our guest. Their satisfaction in a job well done comes from reviews such as this, we share these positive comments by posting them daily and they are a great thank you and motivator. It sounds as if your experience was as anticipated and we look forward to your return at a time when you can enjoy sunshine and cool breezes, days in the pool and nights around the fire pit. Hurry back!

title: Beautiful and quiet
review: I will start with the positive - the location, beach, pool and hot tub are certainly what you are paying for at this property.  The negatives are the rooms are SMALL, I mean the door almost hits the toilet small.  You could not really have all four people in the basic room at one time.  My husband and I with our two kids stayed here with Starwood Points for the end our FL vacation due to a very early flight out of Tampa.  We are Starwood Platinum and we stay at Starwood properties 75 stays per year for a reason, to get upgrades and access to the hospitality suite when we stay with the family.  Neither of those two things happened.  In fact upon check in we realized that it was very busy due to the bowl game in Tampa played Jan. 1st, 2018.  We had made our reservation way before…

title: For a resort it was pretty basic.
review: As a Starwood Platinum Preferred Guest member your loyalty is paramount to the continued success of the Sheraton Sand Key and the Sheraton brand. Customer satisfaction is something that we take very seriously and would never compromise under any circumstances. I am pleased that you enjoyed the beauty of the Island Sand Key and the amenities we offer. The bathrooms are scheduled for renovations sometime in the very near future, I am sorry for any inconvenience the size caused. I sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. Staying here I am sure you were anticipating the respect and recognition you deserved as a Platinum member, please let me assure you the Starwood Perks have not changed. Please know these truly are not the memories that were intended for you to leave with when experiencing the Sheraton Sand Key. We are a large Starwood Preferred Guest redemption hotel and a new member of the Marriott family; there are times due to occupancy and the amount of Elites and Platinum members in house that the Sheraton Club is at maximum capacity. We have put in place an alternative by offering the Continental breakfast in Rusty’s. As a teachable moment, we have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure the necessary guidelines are in place to correct these service issues with the Club Lounge. Please let me assure you that the Outback bowl which plays in Tampa same time every year did not affect your status, they are the band members and have so many planned activities off property that they typically do not affect the rest of our guests. Concerning the Latte we only serve Starbucks products and I do again apologize that you felt that we overcharge, the price is in line with the cost. We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention. We will share your message appropriately within the organization.

title: Older hotel but nicely kept
review: Staff on arrival were wonderful and friendly. We'd been upgraded to a gulf coast view room and it was perfect; 2 beds, small balcony and most importantly spotless!  I was slightly surprised that for the price per night you still have to pay for wifi, we had a little trouble with this at first and a random charge on our account but sorted eventually.  The pool looked nice and was heated but we were only there 2 nights so didn't use it. The beach; pretty and quiet. The sand was rather 'shelley' so sharper than actual Clearwater beach but it was fine once we started paddling. The sunset views were stunning and the main thing that stands out for me. Such a peaceful place to watch and we got stunning photos. Our first day was windy and overcast but I liked relaxing in the hammock and…

title: Second time as great as the first
review: This was our second stay at this resort. The staff really shines. It was packed (Christmas holidays), and they seemed to have added extra staff to take care of everyone. The staff always greeted us with a smile and seem genuinely pleased to help despite the fact that I know they were working so hard. We had three rooms for seven people for a family vacation. We can recommend the restaurant for breakfast as well as the bar for appetizers and drinks. The lounge staff (for elites) was spectacular. The front desk staff was excellent. The bellmen always greeted us warmly. I had to ask for housekeeping service two of the days, and they responded immediately. The only thing we had issues with was the rollaway bed for our 12 year old son. It was a really terrible mattress. After five…

title: Sheraton Sand Key Resort Experience
review: In terms of the staff, this resort scores a 5! The bed scores a 5😴. The cleaning staff also scores a 5. So, why the 4 and not a 5? This may seem trivial, but I found this one thing to be quite significant. Ready? I could NOT tolerate the smell of the cleaning fluid. Every day we left the room by 8:30 am and returned no earlier that 5:00 pm. I would walk into the room, gag, hold my breath, walk to the sliding patio door, and exit the room onto the patio.
