There I sat, slider open, book in hand, and read for 30 to 40 minutes before re-entering the room.  Fortunately, the smell lessened, so I could tolerate being in the room. Overall, I enjoyed my week at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.

title: Won't be coming back
review: My wife and I have stayed at this hotel many many times, we know it's good and bad points. When we decided that we were going to come back to Clearwater beach we did look into other hotels but we thought we'd give this old favourite another go. We wished we hadn't. We know that the rooms are old, the pool is too small and the bathrooms are even smaller but the good memories that we have of staying here for many years, along with its fabulous location right on the beach we decided to give it one more go. Knowing it's location we paid extra for a sea view as we love to sit in our room, sometimes laying on the bed, staring at the sea, watching the pelicans, and the sunsets. What a huge disappointment this was as we were given a room that basically looked straight at the other rooms…

title: Lovely older hotel on the beach
review: Good morning Bob H Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay.  I am so sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in the view from your room.  I understand it is  a lovely experience to wake up and be able to see the beach from your bed, and I feel terribly that you were unable to do that this year.  Your loyalty is very important to us.  I am unsure as to why we were unable to move the room, our Front Office team, try to accommodate guest requests to move, and be in a more desirable location, I don't know if we were sold out of the room type you booked, however the fact that you were not made to feel like a valued repeat guest is very disheartening to me.  I know that you have stayed before, and we pride ourselves on customer service, as I am sure you have experienced in the past.  I will review your comments with our staff, and I truly hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future.  I will be happy to personally make a reservation for you to ensure that your view is more to your liking.   I look forward to hearing from you Carole

title: Part of pre honeymoon
review: The room we had on the 3 rd floor had a nice view of palm trees 🌴 and the gulf.  The accommodations were nice and reasonably priced.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  We couldn’t have ask for more.  We would definitely go back!

title: Long weekend for the girls
review: Spent four nights with a couple of friends after Thanksgiving.  Nice location.  Nice amenities.  Beautiful beach.  I would definitely stay here again.  Everyone was helpful and friendly.  Room was clean.  Balcony was nice.

title: Nice hotel on a huge beach
review: I must say a long weekend for the girls can be one of the greatest forms of relaxation therapy and mixed with a bit of fun, I am sure many memories were made. Yes! The Sheraton Sand Key is a great home base with all the activities of Clearwater Beach only being 2.0 miles away. Actually the whole area offers much to do ... There are many options of free or inexpensive transportation to take you where you want to go safe and with-out stress. There is shopping, entertainment and many choices of dining venues or just doing nothing. It could be you girls just wanted to spend time sharing old memories and recent life events on the tranquil Island of Sand Key by; catching some rays, dipping in the pool, a little beach fun or even a nap. Ending the evening enjoying a beverage, sitting around the fire pit watching the sun falling into the Gulf of Mexico lighting up the sky with the beautiful stokes of color from Mother Nature. We hope that your experiences will bring you girls back soon!

title: A relaxing week at the beach.
review: Stayed here two nights for a conference. Ground-floor room had a boring view of the parking lot. Only two restaurants on the premises -- a coffee shop and an overpriced steakhouse. Typically refrigerated ballroom. It wasn't even that warm outside. Large swimming pool toward the Gulf, but then you had to walk about half a mile to get to the water.

title: Ecoresort
review: We thank you for your review we truly appreciate when our guests take the time to share their experience and concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on any issues. After a day of meetings we hope you were able to enjoy some of the beauty of the Island of Sand Key, which can certainly give you that tropical feel with views that are so serene it brings a calmness. When part of a group there are no specific rooms set aside for your group as they are contracted as “run of house.” The actual room is assigned at the time of check in and can be anywhere in the hotel. We will often upgrade when occupancy allows. I realize that was not the view anticipated when staying at the beach and I sincerely apologize. True the beach is a bit of a walk, Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptionally large island beaches. That is why we do offer a complementary 6 person shuttle to take you to the shore and bring you back. Concerning the temperature of our ball room, it can be adjusted by request as we deploy all efforts to be responsive to the group’s temperature preference. Along with Rusty’s bistro for breakfast and dinner and our Island Grille, we also serve a full menu in our Mainstay Tavern and we also have light offerings at the Pool side Café. If you care to explore the area there is also a choice of dining venues with-in a 5 minute walk. We continue seek to keep a balance between guest experience and restaurant operations. I have shared your comments on the food pricing in Rusty’s Bistro with our Executive Chef. Thank you again for your time and come visit us again when next in the Clearwater Beach area.

title: great location
review: I've got to tell you that this is a terrific place. The #1 thing that I noticed is the friendliness of the staff. From our arrival being met by Derin and Brent, part of the bell staff, to the first night visit to the bar to watch the games and get a sandwich these folks are genuinely interested in your comfort and relaxation. It's an older hotel but well maintained and on a beautiful stretch of beach. I give them an A. If I were still active in business I would certainly consider them for meetings and conventions. Terrific attitudes lead to terrific service.

title: Besutiful
review: Arrived at this hotel after 10 days InOrlando .  But if a drama getting here. Greeted by a lovely girl in reception. And the most amazing bell boy. Room was perfect. Spotless, water in the fridge. Amazing balcony with a stunning view of both pool and beach. First day was spent by the pool which I must say is stunning. Water was perfect on a very hot September day. Lots of sun loungers and umbrellas. Service round the pool was excellent. Amazing pina colodas 🍹. What ever time of day or night we came in or out of the hotel we were greeted by the amazing staff. Concierge. Well. Bloody brilliant .  Nice bar. Apart from the rowdy man with a very big ego and loud voice. Well I guess there's always one in every town. I have nothing bad to say about this hotel. Golf buggy down to the…

title: We are thrilled to be back at this wonderful resort.
review: Last night we checked in at our favorite hotel in Clearwater and had a very nice late meal at the Mainstay Tavern.  As usual, the staff is extremely welcoming and helpful. Our room is very pleasant and clean.  The beds are very comfortable. Looking forward to walking on this exquisite stretch of beach.  The Sheraton Sand Key is a gem that delivers 100%!  I recommend it highly for singles, couples and families.

title: Love this property!
review: Your loyalty is paramount to the success of Sheraton Sand Key and the Sheraton Brand. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their experience with us. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests. They are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly, many are loyal longtime associates and truly welcome you our guests as they consider you as not just our guest but truly friends. They take pride in their part of making the Sheraton Sand Key the perfect place for a beach get-away. We sincerely appreciate that recommendation and please enjoy that long walk on this beautiful day.

title: Good Hotel in good position.
review: We have been coming here going on 7 years! We know the owner, Russ. He takes so much pride in this property. It is always updated and clean. The staff is always overly friendly. The rooms are spacious and most have great views! Kids love the pool and we love the bar that's pool side! Highly recommend!

title: Short stay
review: Thank you for the past 7 years, loyal guests such as yourself are truly important to the continued success of the Sheraton Sand Key. Russ Kimball definitely takes pride in ensuring each and every guest is treated with the respect and recognition they deserve. That pride and Go Beyond attitude is instilled through training and his example to each and every associate. He also ensures that you enjoy your stay in a safe, clean and comfortable environment which also offers the needed amenities inside and out to truly enjoy your beach stay.  Of course Mother Nature does her share by surrounding us with beauty and tranquility. We look forward to many more years.

title: Great Lounge and Health Club, beautiful pool
review: Front Desk manager Jerry couldn't have been nicer to us, giving us a late check-out right away. Rooms were clean and quiet. Pool was large and lined with palms. Marsha ran the lounge and dispensed free drinks with a simile. The gulf was a bit of a walk from pool (1/4 mile) but great for strolling and shell hunting and had a shuttle if wanted. The luncheonette had unlimited frozen yogurt. Needs NBA league pass on their TVs.

title: Fantastic
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. The island of Sand Key is known for their exceptionally large, private, beautiful and serene beaches. When you step from the pool deck there is 13 acers of beach although the shore is a bit of a walk which helps to isolate you from the everyday noises of life and enhance your time away that world. There is nothing sweeter to cool you off after your time on the beach then a delicious frozen yogurt or two … It is gratifying to read that your experience with many of our associates was gratifying and engaging; with ambition, empowerment and heart their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Thank you for recognizing them by name and your comments have been shared with each of them. Their satisfaction in a job well done comes from reviews such as this, we share these positive comments by posting them daily and they are a great thank you and motivator. I have also shared your comment on the NBA league pass with the Director of Food and Beverage. You never know next time you visit you might be able to catch a game in the Mainstay Tavern, as we already have other sports packages in there. We look forward to that visit.

title: Great staff, location and amenities!
review: What a lovely location, so easy to get about. Hotel great views we stayed on the 5th floor below would have been trying to look through palm trees for your view. So suggest floor 5 or above. Gorgeous sunsets, and right on the beach front, large beach so if you don’t fancy the stroll you can take the buggy to the sea. Take a ride on the Jolly Trolley, this will pick you up from the hotel door and drop you off, just pick up a timetable and route map, it’s free to ride if you show your room card. Everyone so very friendly and helpful. Coeliac’s eating at hotel or out are well catered for.

title: Family vacation
review: Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; beautiful views of sunrises on the east side of the hotel and breathtaking sunsets on the west side, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or read your favorite book. You are correct above the 5th floor is a great view. It sounds as if you enjoyed several of our recently added amenities such as the beach shuttle and free bus and trolley rides. We truly thank you for your comments concerning our associates, they are eager to provide you with their “Go Beyond” service. With a spirit to serve our associates take great pride in exceeding your expectations. Your feedback is integral in our ability to recognize and thank these associates, it is shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to continue to deliver exceptional customer service.  Our Executive Chef was pleased that our Gluten free menu added to your dining experience, we are planning to adding more options in the future, There are many treasured memories to be made here on the Island of Sand Key.You must come back as there is much, much more to explore in the Clearwater Beach area.

title: Beware of Room 310
review: From the moment we entered the facilities we really felt very invited. All the concierge team were very friendly and helpful. Lots of smiles and welcoming comments from the staff over our long weekend. Great service to the beach and really an all in one holiday hotel. Great gym and pool. Good restaurant choices and snack options and a free tram in and out of down town. Fireworks on the beach and a very cool fire pit! Great for families!   Yes, will be back again!!

title: Nice hotel, verify your room location
review: The hotel is a great location for a business conference.  The meals, service, facility in general is very nice. Verify the location of your room before you accept the room.  My room was on the 3rd floor overlooking the roof of the restaurant and next to the ventilation fans, which runs 24 / 7.  The noise would disturb you if you are a light sleeper.

title: Great stay!
review: Good morning I am glad that overall you enjoyed your stay with us.  We value each and every guest, and want everybody to have a wonderful experience.  Unfortunately, sometimes, if we are busy, we are unable to upgrade reservations, however if we are able to do so we make every effort to accommodate guests in more desirable locations.  I do hope that you will come back and visit us again, and hopefully we will be able to upgrade if we can.

title: Very nice hotel!
review: We had a great time at the Sheraton Sand Key! The pool is clean and nice and the hot tub is huge! There is a snack bar out by the pool with reasonably priced food and a tiki bar. The gulf is a just steps away from the pool... kind of a long walk on the sand but there is a golf cart that will take you down to the water and back. There are also hammocks, volleyball nets and a small playground for the kids. Great place to stay, especially if you want to get away from the busy-ness of clearwater beach!

title: Never Disappointed
review: I am delighted you had a great time and found our resort to be an oasis from activity of Clearwater Beach. This is truly the right place to be if you desire tranquility. When longing for gentle, temperate seas lined by sandy shores, our beach was especially made for you. Sunshine and breezes during the day then sliding into the evening around the fire pit with spectacular sunsets. We look forward to that next visit.

title: Great hotel with a great beach
review: My husband and I enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The service was excellent, everything was nice and clean, great beach, etc.  I didn't care for the dinner at the main restaurant, but maybe that's just my palate.  My husband said his food was good.  Overall, we had a wonderful time.

title: Awesome location and great staff
review: I had to work in the Tampa area and decided to take the family for a mini vacation. We wanted a hotel on the beach with an actual beach, and not 20 feet of the water front. I am an SPG member, but don’t at Sheraton much in the states and I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel.   The hotel was very clean, fresh, and updated for an hotel with a beach. My room was very comfortable and housekeeping did a wonderful job. The location was excellent and the staff was very friendly and courteous. I would recommend this hotel for anyone on business or vacation, very kid friendly as well.

title: Happy
review: I am pleased you enjoyed the tranquility and the beauty of the beaches that surround us on the Island of Sand Key. We are also delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy life we live everyday and that you had a relaxing and enjoyable experience with your family. Our associates truly want to ensure that we provide a warm and comfortable environment here inside the Sheraton Sand Key also. They genuinely care about you our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper bed provides a comfortable night’s sleep. Our award winning culinary staff truly enjoys wowing our guests with the taste and creative presentation. Our fitness center provides not only top of the line equipment, it also provides a panoramic view of the Gulf of Mexico to look at while working out. We truly hope you will keep us on your radar when planning your next beach get-away.

title: Family holiday August 2017
review: We had a brilliant week at this very friendly hotel. Our daughter was married during our stay, on the beautiful white sandy beach, the hotel was clean. The food in all three restaurants was good. The big thing for us was the amazing staff who couldn’t do more do make our stay any better.

title: A great place for a conference
review: We are delighted to hear that all the dreaming and planning for that very special day became a reality here on the Island of Sand Key. Our standard is to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  I am so pleased you all enjoyed a wonderful time, it is a great location with much to do … Breathtaking views and awesome sunsets which make for memorable moments and beautiful wedding pictures. We definitely will look forward to your return as there are still many more memories to be made.

title: Fantastic, amazing, great!
review: Stayed here for 4 nights in August with my husband and two kids age 10and 14.Had a good size room with two large double beds , sea view and bathroom off a small dressing area. The room worked well for us and the views of the beach and resort were amazing! The staff in this hotel are probably the best I have ever come across. The reception staff and porters ( bell boys) were really welcoming and went out of their way to ensure we had a brilliant time. The bell boys were really knowledgeable about the local area and ensured we had maps etc of all the best spots. The pool area was very very busy,but again the service was excellent with towels available into the evening and a beach toy hire service for free which was a real bonus.we used the restaurant for one breakfast and one…

title: 2017 Family Vacation
review: This hotel is one of the families favourites, it is so homely. All the staff are very courteous and friendly, everyone was polite, and greet you every time you entered or left the hotel. We had 2 adjoining rooms on the fourth floor, which was excellent as we had a cot in one of the rooms, which allowed us to put the baby to bed, and still have some social time in the other room without disturbing her. This hotel is keep in excellent condition, the housekeeping service are always busy. We always leave a small tip in the room to show our appreciation for the exceptional service they provided. The beds were very comfortable, on times you didn’t want to leave it. We did eat and have drinks here on occasion. The pool area is also excellent, with a pool bar, and cafe very close by,…

title: Great.
review: I thank you for the very informative review. The Sheraton Sand Key can be many things to many people, it is so very gratifying to know that we are one of your family's favorites. We are pleased that you have spent many precious and memorable moments with your family here on "Our Island". Although no one cannot stop time, we can slow down our days and learn how to treasure the precious moments we have with our family. It is very gratifying to know we are able to make you feel welcomed and we are able to fulfill everyone’s needs during your family stays. With ambition, empowerment and heart our associates concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Thank you for recognizing them and we look forward to your next visit.

title: Wonderful location -and a friendly & helpful staff
review: Honestly amazing. Isn't at Clearwater but, right near there. Private beach was great. Saw dolphins. The hotel isn't luxury or anything but, is better than going to a crowded beach and staying in a 5 star hotel. Would come back every year if I could.

title: Sheraton
review: The Sheraton Sand Key resort is the perfect base, close to many attractions. shops, Pier 60, restaurants, sports and entertainment. Looking for the activity Clearwater Beach offers it is just 2.0 miles away. There are many options of inexpensive transportation to get you there and back. Florida free rides, two different Trolley options, Uber and Taxies. If you would rather walk over the bridge the view is breathtaking. This side of the bridge definitely where you want to be if you desire a true beach get–away. When longing for gentle, temperate seas lined by sandy shores, our private beach is the right place for you. Sunshine and breezes during the day then sliding into the evening with spectacular sunsets. Come back soon as there is much more to explore.

title: Great location!
review: We were here as part of a large group, a sailing camp at the Clearwater Community Sailing Center, run though the Never say Never Foundation.  There were probably 150 in our group -and there were multiple other business / social groups there at the same time.  Not only was the hotel kept clean -never out of clean pool towels, lounge and common areas well maintained -but the staff could not have been nicer.  Honestly, the service was the kind I would expect at small high end boutique hotel -very attentive, friendly and responsive.  We also loved the beach -the kids had enough room for a baseball game, while we collected shells and swam in the gulf.  We used the small shop for afternoon snacks -they have a great selection of fresh veggies, cheeses, salads, beverages.  Bravo to the…

title: Great Location - VERY Friendly Staff
review: I was highly impressed with this hotel.  It was clean and in a great location.  Upon check-in the guy standing next to the girl who was helping us overheard me ask about contact solution.  He called the gift shop and inquired (on his own without me asking).  I am always so impressed with people who go above and beyond.  Everyone we encountered from wait staff to cleaning staff were very friendly and accommodating.  I was here for work, so didn't get to spend much time relaxing, but I will definitely return.  The hotel rooms overlook either the Intercoastal Waterway or the Gulf (or both) and the hotel is set back a ways from the waters edge on the Gulf side, however the friendly golf cart driver is always available to run you out there.  Beach chairs and umbrellas/cabanas were…

title: Very nice hotel and staff
review: Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; beautiful views of sunrises on the east side of the hotel and breathtaking sunsets on the west side, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or read your favorite book. There are many treasured memories to be made here on the Island of Sand Key. Our Private beach is truly a great place to spend uninterrupted time with your own thoughts and listen to the birdsong mingling with the ocean breeze, this is true therapy at its best. We truly thank you for your comments concerning our associates, they are eager to provide you with their "Go Beyond" service. With a spirit to serve our associates take great pride in exceeding your expectations. Your feedback is integral in our ability to recognize and thank these associates, our guest comments are shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. We look forward to that next visit.

title: Nice locarttion on great beach
review: We stayed at this hotel for a few nights in September 2017. Two adults and three kids (16,14,5) On arrival to the hotel we were asked for assistance from the concierge with our bags etc.. We checked in and were upgraded to a room with a pool view (An absolute must), front of house were very helpful and friendly. Even though the hotel was dated in certain areas it wasn't over shadowed by the service and quality we experienced. Our room was a reasonable size an had all the amenities you would expect from this hotel chain. Prices are a little pricey on drinks etc but that's the same at every hotel in this area. Towels are provided for pool and beach access. The private beach owned by the hotel is beautiful and very well looked after.  Staff were exceptional and couldn't do enough…

title: You get what you pay for
review: Thank you for the compliment, for us to deliver to this high standard of excellence our associates truly are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you. They enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay such as that room upgrade. I am sure it was much more convenient to have a pool view with the children, especially the 5 year old. It is truly memorable when you are able to spend precious moments with your family. Although we cannot stop time, we can slow down our days and learn how to treasure the precious moments we have with our children. It is very gratifying to know we fulfilled everyone’s needs and we look forward to a return visit and new memories.

title: Great place to get away.
review: Spent 4 days at the Sheraton Sands last week.  Staff is great and were more than willing to help with any request.  Rooms are a bit tired but kept very clean.  The beach is very nice and if you like shell collecting there more than enough if you got down to the water early.  Location is very nice just over the bridge from the more touristy area.

title: A Pleasant Stay Because of the Staff
review: It started out to be a bit frustrating, as I was attending some technical meetings there and the reservation got fouled-up.  Working by phone in advance was not working, either.  Once there, they got everything fixed straight away, and it was smooth sailing thereafter.  It is a nice property in a great location.  Most rooms have some type of view, and the amenities are very good.  The bed is great. The in-house restaurants are also tasty and well staffed.   My only regret was that I couldn't stay longer.  : /

title: Excellent weekend
review: Thank you for such positive comments, it is very gratifying that our associates were able to take that frustrating start and turn it around. Those associates are definitely the heart of the Sheraton Sand Key; with their ambition and drive to make things better for our guests. They do whatever it takes to deliver a better stay. They love what they do, and give it all they’ve got. When not attending your meeting, the Island of Sand Key can certainly offer you that tropical feel with views which are so serene it brings a calmness. Add in a beautiful sunsets and walks along the shore with just your own thoughts, or maybe gathering around the fire pit and enjoying a beverage with your colleagues. There are many options to end your day, I am pleased you choose to enjoy the culinary delights offered by our talented Executive Chef and his award winning culinary staff. Another comfortable “Sweet Sleeper” bed awaits your return, maybe next time just for a beach get-away with no work.

title: Fair enough.
review: This is the second time here. I love this hotel. The beach is exceptional. We expend an outstanding weekend. The restaurants are very good. The service was A+.The hotel is a bit old but everything very clean and cozy. The waiters at the buffet were very friendly and professional. We hope to return soon. You will see.

title: Excellent place for relaxing
review: We sincerely appreciate your review, your loyalty is very important to the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and we thank you for becoming part of our Sheraton Sand Key family. We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay and that you found us clean and cozy. Our associates take pride in their part of making the Sheraton Sand Key the perfect place for a beach vacation, they truly enjoy the interaction with you our guest and in making you feel welcomed. Yes! Our private beach is beautiful, a place to enjoy some relaxation therapy along with some fun in the sun. We look forward to your return as there are many treasured memories to be made here on the Island of Sand Key

title: "Resort" is an overstatment
review: Have been there on a business trip , nice rooms , even though I do not like moquette in the room especially in a seaside hotel . Nice meeting saloon and bar. Exactly on the bay side, good ratio quality price , nothing unforgettable but it worth the visit

title: Visited for the 3rd time!
review: This was our 3rd stay in the resort. The second for our anniversary and still shines bright!  From the bottle of sparkling wine waiting in our room to the employees that make the stays unique. Just wanted to give a special "shout out" to Jane at the lobby who checked us in and Patrick who was our server/bartender the last two visits. The beach beautiful and the grounds impeccable. See you next year!

title: Another wonderful stay
review: Thank you for being a loyal guest and welcome back to “Our Island” Yes, we are always pleased when we are able to share a little of the tranquility we are surrounded by. In some of our lives there are moments when you can choose to pause, life long memories can be revisited and new memories can be made. They are far in-between for most of us, that is why perfect vacations are days cherished. Our associates satisfaction in a job well done comes from reviews such as this, we share these positive comments daily as they are a great thank you and motivator for those associates mentioned such as Jane and Patrick. It sounds as if your experience was as anticipated and we look forward to your next anniversary visit. It was gratifying to read your review.

title: Wonderful Clean Hotel!
review: We stayed for two nights back in June. 9 of us in total across three rooms. As always, checkin was swift and friendly, and we were given rooms straight away, despite arriving around 13:30 which was great.  The rooms are nicely furnished, clean and everything works. It’s a slightly older hotel and the room layout and decor reflects this but that takes nothing away from the experience. The rooms have balconies with either an ocean or intracoastal view. I think I actually prefer the intracoastal but I guess most people would want the ocean view.  The pool area is nice, with a shallow kids pool and hot tub. It can get crowded and it looks like there would be lots of room to put in a bigger pool. Then again, my son loved the 8ft deep end and I’d hate for that to go away!  The…

title: Another Wonderful Holiday
review: We are a older, casual beach hotel on the Island of Sand Key, a place where you will experience a tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; with beautiful sunrises on the intercostal side and beautiful sunsets on the Gulf side. Yes, a new pool is on the top of our priority list. You are correct we are one the very few hotels on the beach which does not charge a resort fee, parking is free and you only pay for amenities used. Loungers and hammocks at no cost available so you can just nap or read your favorite book. A private beach where you can spend uninterrupted time with your own thoughts and birdsong mingling with the ocean breeze, it is true therapy at its best.  We truly thank you for your comments on our associates, they are pleased to provide you with an effortless experience and make you feel truly at home by being genuinely friendly, caring and efficient. Your comment on the associates at the poolside café has been addressed, they were not conscious of looking like they did not enjoy their interaction with our guests. Without making excuses it is very hot this time of the year, being outside all day does wear on them. We look forward to a return visit and your comments are truly appreciated.

title: False advertising
review: Wonderful hotel! Clean rooms and very friendly staff! Everyone greeted and smiled us!  Special mentions to Jean Marie in Rustys restaurant outstanding customer service! And our housekeeper from Albania made our family so welcome and accommodated every need!  Plenty of parking and close to beach!

title: Private Beach is Worth the Walk
review: This hotel is in the Sand Keys area, which is over the bridge from Clearwater Beach.  The beaches here are as private as you're going to get, and compared to Clearwater Beach's public beaches, this is great!  The public beaches have a smaller beach between the street and the water, whereas the private beach here is pretty large.  Yes, there is approximately a 5 minute walk to the beach from the hotel pool area, but it's definitely worth it if you're not into crowds.  We did have the hotel staff drive us to the beach on golf carts a few times so there's definitely an alternative to walking to the beach, though I won't bank on it since it's one of those things where you have to be lucky to run into a staffer who has a golf cart available to them to drive you. It's definitely a…

title: Great staff
review: The staff at the Sheraton Sand Key is exceptional.  Everyone is efficient, pleasant and eager to help.  Rooms are large and well maintained.  Beach is very large and hotel has golf carts to take you to the Gulf.  Island Grill should have eveningb hours as evening dining options would be improved if they were open into the early evening.

title: more like 4.5
review: We stayed for a whole week before school started. Hotel is rather small (by global standards) which we really liked. Pool is very nice and pool staff is very attentive. Poolside grill offers rather traditional fast food variety with some more healthy options (salads and fruits), and service is very efficient. Turtle bar at the pool is great place for a beer or a frosty.  Front desk staff is world class, as well as their housekeeping counterparts. Rooms were rather small, with small bathrooms, but very neatly kept by housekeeping staff.  Beach starts right off the pool deck, but there is a bit of a walk to surf. There is a company that rents lounge chairs and umbrellas at the beach, but it is not worth it - hotel has a golf cart to shuttle people from pool to surf and back. Games…

title: Great Hotel
review: Hotel is Excellent, very clean rooms are so nice and cuzy  Stuff are very friendly. Beach is awesome. Great location , Kids had lots of fun and enjoyed our stay. I recommend this hotel to friends and fsmily.

title: Comfortable and relaxing family stay - would return.
review: Purpose of stay: Family with twin toddler visit looking to flop on beach, enjoy the pool and explore Clearwater.  If I am in Clearwater area again, I will stay at this hotel, either for business or pleasure. The entire experience was convenient, reasonably priced and most of all, slept well. Although the beds were a bit soft for our liking but that is a very personal thing I suppose.  Breakfast buffet: very good quality, excellent service and reasonably priced, children under 5 eat for free.  Pool area: cleaned and taken care of.  Location: on a very nice beach (Clearwater Beach), away from the town centre but only a 5 minute drive away.  Rooms were standard Sheraton and our room 507 was a decent size with a usable terrace overlooking tennis courts and beach.

title: Lovely stay
review: We spent 5 nights at the Sheraton after an exhausting 9 nights in Orlando and was looking for some relaxation. The hotel is lovely, really spacious and check in was great with really helpful staff. Our room had two queen beds in and a view to the beach and sea which was great. As other reviews have said the bathrooms are very tight for space but managed fine. We ate a couple of times at the pool bar and reasonably priced for good snacks. We also liked the small shop in the hotel for lunches, great fruit pots etc for a change! The hotel right on the beach and about a 10min walk to water. It was memorial weekend while we were there so hotel was busy but simply the pool is not big enough for size of hotel, we had to squeeze in at times and there was no chance of swimming. In fact…

title: NIAO17
review: A wonderful establishment, for conferencing and relaxing. Beautiful environment, great service personnel, great onsite restaurants, beaches. Met many international visitors and networked with many more locals. Coming back annually foe the next 5 years at least!

title: Comfortable Hotel.
review: Clearwater is just beautiful. The hotel is situated on an amazing white sandy beach which stretches for miles. The sea is warm with lots of tropical fish. The sunset at night is truly beautiful which attracts lots of people to the beach.  Hotel checkin prompt and receptionist very helpful. The hotel is slightly dated but the benefits to this was a large room with lots of storage, free parking and Access to the beach and lovely pool. Ate at a couple of the restaurants food not particularly warm on both occasions which was disappointing. Air conditioning in the room was quite noisy as switched on and off throughout the night. Beds very comfy and would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Weekend getaway
review: This was my second time staying there and it was wonderful!  I will be back.   My boyfriend and showed up before check in and our room was ready and it was an ocean view room!  Room was fantastic.  I highly recommend this resort.

title: Sheraton Sand Key, how I've missed you!'n
review: Haven't been here in a little while, but was craving a visit. Such a wonderful place for true rest and relaxation! As always, the rooms are immaculate and the beds so comfortable, the views amazing, and the staff really is Top Notch! Lovely place for families,and a romantic place for couples,too!! Won't wait so long to return next time😊

title: Fun Vacation
review: Stay with family with connecting rooms.  Good when you have grandchildren. Room was spacious and clean. Comfortable beds and pillows. Loved the pool area. Very pretty. Good food and drinks. The beach was great, walking distance or can get a ride from staff on golf cart. All had breakfast and food, service was good. All staff very friendly. Relaxing vacation 👍👍

title: Staycation with friends
review: The rooms are nice, clean, and comfortable. The coffee in the rooms are Starbucks and I appreciated the half and half cream pods rather than powdered packets most hotels have. The pool is small but nice, the fire pit is really cute and fun for a group. The pool restaurant food really needs help - it's very basic, low quality snack shack stuff, but the staff is friendly. This hotel is nice competitively priced for beach hotels, but nothing really makes it stand out and draws you back.

title: 22nd Wedding Anniversary
review: The wife and I spent our 22nd wedding anniversary staying at the Sheraton Sand Key. Love the area, visited several times, but first time staying at at S. Sand Key Resort. Only place with a beach front, access. The hotel amenities are great...pool side, the fire pit, the bar pool side, restaurant outside, and activity center-hut is great. Definitely a great family place or a getaway for couples. The Marriott is across the street and is nice as well, but the Sheraton takes the cake. Definitely returning. I'm sure I left a lot out, but you can't go wrong. The rooms are great to. The staff is very helpful.

title: Great place for a Florida getaway!
review: We arrived mid afternoon, and were given a warm wlecome by the reception staff, and it didn't take long to book in. Our room was a spacious family room, and had great views over the sea and local area from the balcony.  As a family room, it had 2 double beds - the beds were really comfy, and we had no problems sleeping - you culdn't hear a thing from outside the room!  The bathroom was quite small, but this didn't really matter...  There was a huge TV, with enough channels to make the occasional thunderstorms go by!!  The rest of the hotel was well presented. All the staff were polite and helpful, from reception, concierge, and housekeepers and the staff in the restaurants - we had a problem with our fridge, one phone call to reception, and it was sorted within 2 minutes!  The…

title: Great hotel
review: Stayed at the hotel for 7 nights after visiting new york. Lovely hotel and the staff were very friendly and accompanying.  The rooms are large and have everything you need it them.   The pool area and bar are good. I do have to say that the pool is on the small side though and drinks are a tad bit expensive.   Food in the hotel really nice and affordable.  Would recommend this hotel

title: What a great trip!
review: I just got home from staying here for a few days and I can't picture how they have all of these negative reviews on here. I travel a lot and this was the best service that I have received and I will come back for sure! Excellent front desk and management team, restaurant, maid service, bell hops and conference room assistance. I utilized all of it and they still got a 100%

title: Great family summer vacation!
review: This hotel is awesome.  My family stayed at this hotel last weekend for 3 nights at the beginning of our Florida vacation.  The kids had a great time in the pool and beach; the beach is just a few feet away from the pool, and there is a golf cart available to bring you back and fort. We had a nice meal at the main restaurant in the hotel once night and food was delicious! Our room had a nice view of the beach.   Totally recommend it! Hope to be back in the future.

title: Gorgeous hotel on the beach!
review: This place is awesome; super nice staff and great beach! It's pretty much a private beach, so there are not too many people in the area right behind the hotel. They provide towels by the pool and there is a service that provides umbrellas and chairs for $25/day. It's a far walk to the shore, but the hotel will take you back and forth on a golf cart. The only negative is that they charge $9.95 per day to have wifi in your room. Ridiculous, considering the price per night!

title: Nice hotel but long walk to the beach!
review: Pros: Nice rooms, very clean, modern appearance, great staff and lots of outdoor activities.  Cons: Very long walk to the beach, room service comes in very late (around 4:00 pm for our room), food prices do not meet food quality expectations, limited shade seating by the pool and charges $27 a day for beach chairs and umbrella rental.  Overall we enjoyed our stay at the hotel.  The staff was friendly and accommodating.  The food was a bit overpriced for the quality.  My biggest issues with the stay was the long walk to the beach (there is a golf cart that can often take you if requested) and the cost to rent chairs.  When you pay to stay at a hotel, I do not believe charging for chairs on the beach is ideal.  Especially at $27 a day for two chairs and an umbrella.  When you have…

title: Very helpful personnel
review: My son and I stayed at this hotel Aug 2-6. We had never been to Clearwater or this hotel so wasn't sure what to expect. We checked in at the front desk with Todd and he was extremely efficient and helpful. We had requested ocean view but there were none available so he said he could put us on a waiting list. I asked instead of maybe we could get some breakfast vouchers and he said he'd have to check w/ his manager and he'd let us know. I figured we'd never hear back but shortly thereafter we got a call to our room and said he had vouchers for the buffet breakfast. Awesome customer service!! They might not be able to do this all the time but never hurts to ask. The breakfast buffet in the morning, by the way, is VERY nice. Lots of variety. Todd continued to help us when we lost a…

title: Good Resort! Great beach access!
review: We stayed here for 1 night and had a good experience. This resort was close to all the things we wanted to do in Clearwater. At the end of our fun filled day we came back to the resort and enjoy walking down to the beach for the sunset, the hammocks, and a little swim in the pool. Everything seemed very well cared for around the property.  The room was clean and comfy. The pillows were amazing. The only complaint I would have is there is a pretty considerable gap underneath the door (about a good 2 inches) and I had to get up in the middle of the night and finally try to shove a towel underneath the gap of the door to block out light from the hallway and the passerby's noise. After doing that we got a pretty good nights rest.  I think we will be back to this resort when visiting…

title: Don't book through booking.com
review: The resort itself and the beach are beautiful and cannot be faulted.  What really let the stay down was the room and the so called facilities for 5 people.  Two double beds and one extremely small bathroom.  I booked one room with a sofa bed and had to argue with the assistant manager to get a foldaway bed!  In the room, there was not enough shampoo, coffee, water or towels for the amount of people and as I had already had to complain I didn't feel like to this again!  All in all one of the worst 4 stars I have ever stayed in room wide.

title: Great location but nickel and dime.
review: It is humbling that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. Please accept our apologies for the dissatisfaction of the room during your time spent with us. I am terribly sorry there was a misunderstanding regarding the room size and available bedding.  I am glad we were able to accommodate your family with a rollway and am sorry your issue was not handled with more tact and diplomacy. The amenities in the room should have also been increased based on the size of your party.  Rest assured your comments have been shared with the appropriate department heads so they can be addressed.  This is not the level of service we strive to achieve and feel badly it was a distraction to the lovely stay you had planned.  We are thrilled you enjoyed the beach and all that our resort has to offer. We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you should your travels bring you back to the Clearwater Beach area.

title: Beautiful Destination! VERY Nice Resort!
review: Great location, however they charge for breakfast 15 a person. They also had a kid go the bathroom in the pool and had it closed for five hours. Beach umbrellas 25 dollars, a resort should include things like breakfast and beach umbrellas.

title: Great Family Destination
review: Thank you for sharing a review of your stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.    There are those times when we do need to close the pool due to the need to chemically treat it for the safety of our guests.  It is a most unfortunate incident when it does occur, however, proper steps must be taken.  We have chosen, over the years,  to not charge a resort fee as many other resorts do.  For this reason the resort amenities are on an a la carte basis.  We feel rather than incorporating all amenities into a fee or room rate, guests can have the option to only pay for what they utilize.  We do realize many folks prefer an all inclusive scenario and always keep that in consideration.  I am glad you enjoyed the location and hopefully saw a beautiful sunset or two.

title: We liked this Resort
review: We stayed here for 5 nights at the end of July. A little away from the main part of Clearwater which can be reached via cheaply priced Trolley service. Car parking is free which is a huge bonus albeit on arrival I was slightly surprised there was nobody on the door to help us with our luggage. Check in was swift and easy and the rooms are nice a comfortable and or a decent size with a balcony. We had a Gulf view which was nice. The pool are is of a good size with plenty of sun beds (although shade is at a premium).  The sea is a little walk away but it is worth a walk with a nice warm sea to swim/ paddle in. There are a few nice bar areas and restaurants. There are also a couple of nice restaurants 10 minutes walk away. Service was helpful and friendly in the main. If you are…

title: Top Notch Service
review: We thank you for your kind comments, your review certainly pictured the experience we strive to ensure our guest enjoy. Being a Sheraton brand standard it is disappointing that no one was there to greet you, this has been addressed with the Manager of Guest Services and we apologize. I am pleased that the rest of your interaction with our associates was the positive experience you anticipated and that they are trained to give, although many do take pride and truly enjoy doing so. The area does provide many venues to choose for dining and the trolley does provide inexpensive transportation to explore the area. We hope you will return soon as there much more to explore. We appreciate the recommendation.

title: FADRA Convention
review: TOP NOTCH SERVICE at this hotel and it was very much appreciated!  We had a long day on our arrival day and Ben (concierge) met us at our car upon check-in and helped unload the car and got our bags to our room very efficiently and very friendly.  Check-in was busy due to the ASA Nationals Softball tournament, but while I checked in, my daughter managed the unloading process and we were in our room very quickly.    As a platinum rewards member, the concierge level was a real treat - breakfast was very good with healthy options and the happy hour was very nice with your choice of wine, cocktails, and beer. We went most days, and each day I said, "I feel so spoiled". Yes, we are platinum members, but it's nice that Starwood recognizes that and appreciates our business.  The staff…

title: Business and Pleasure
review: We appreciate your great review. What sets our associates apart is their desire to ensure our guests receive exceptional service with the personal touch and they are genuine when doing so. They love spoiling you!!! Being a Starwood Platinum member and your loyalty to the Sheraton brand is truly appreciated. Thank you for recognizing Ben by name and your comment has been shared with him and "it was his pleasure." Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; beautiful sunsets, walks on along the shore, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or relax. True the beach is a bit of a walk, although when you get there you are truly able to enjoy the privacy and beauty. We look forward to being your choice of lodging when next planning another beach get away.

title: Wedding In Julu
review: Great Resort Atmosphere. Close and Convenient to All that Clearwater has to Offer. Nice Host to the Convention. Friendly, Helpful Staff. Certainly recommend and Hope to have an Opportunity to stay again.  Thank You for a Great Stay.

title: It's okay...
review: I stayed at this hotel for 4 days and I can't say that I was impressed. The hotel needs a makeover the hallways and rooms look like they're stuck in the early 90's. First impression I had while walking into the room was it smelled like dirty carpets. I took my shoes off and the carpets felt sticky. The bathroom is very small and I felt too tall for the shower. The comforter and and sheets had spots on them. I didn't feel comfortable sleeping in the bed being as though it wasn't as clean as I would've liked it to be. The phone in the room needed a good wipe down as well. Room service food was okay nothing special and its's a lot cheaper ordering from a local pizzeria. The pool was very small and over crowded I didn't even waste my time going in or sitting around the pool. The…

title: Well trained staff!
review: Thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key for your recent stay. I truly want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer.  I can assure you your comments will be shared so that improvements can be made. Although we are an older hotel we are constantly renovating and making improvements where needed and another pool is high on our priority list. There truly is no excuse for the condition your room was in and is certainly not the impression we at the Sheraton Sand Key or the Sheraton brand wanted you to experience. This along with the condition of the carpets has been addressed with the Director of Housekeeping and please let me assure you a solution is being discussed today! Concerning the beach chairs along the shore, many area resorts include those charges in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to include a resort fee. There is a private concession for the chairs and umbrella they charge $25 per day for usage should the guest so choose to use. There are loungers in the sand, several with umbrellas which are free of charge. Our food prices are in line with all area hotel and you are correct the area does offer some less expensive options. Yes, our beach is private and beautiful and there are many treasured memories to be made here on the Island of Sand Key which I do hope will bring you back for your next beach get-away.

title: Extremely disappointing -avoid
review: I called last minute to book a sister weekend for my sister's birthday. In the course of the reservation conversation they asked if there was a special occasion. I later got a call that evening from Jerry, the front desk manager who had gone to a lot of trouble to add special touches to our stay, including sending up a cake to be waiting there on check in.  Throughout the stay, staff from every department was courteous and friendly.  The place was packed, and the smiles didn't fade with the additional demands.  I'd definitely return! Oh, did i mention they had hammocks on the beach?  And yeah, I'm a native, so I'm picky!

title: Fun Weekend!!
review: I love your review, sister time is a very special time, and in our busy life there are not many times we are just able to relax and enjoy some memorable moments. Which will truly be needed as we grow older. I am sure you had many past memories to share and new memories to make during this stay. Our associates such as Jerry are inspired by our guests and driven to ensure that your experience is more than anticipated. They take pride in their part of making the Sheraton Sand Key the perfect place for a beach get-away, they truly enjoy the interaction with you our guest. Their satisfaction in a job well done comes from reviews such as this, we share these positive comments by posting them daily and they are a great thank you and motivator. It sounds as if your experience was as anticipated and we look forward to your return. I have shared your comments with Jerry who thanks you. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay on the Island of Sand Key and the Clearwater Beach area and we hope you will return to the area in the near future.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Our room was dirty- sticky carpets, hairs and grime in the bathroom, the phone thick with grease. Small, dubiously smelling towels. I asked for a deep clean but it never happened. Our air conditioner broke twice. Our room card failed to work 5 times which meant returning from the 6th floor to reception each time. Staff were efficient with this but it remained our problem not theirs.  The pool is too small for the hotel. No umbrellas offering shade are available in the pool area- making it dangerous to be out for too long with children. Pool towels are stained and unclean. When I returned a yellow stained towel, the pool guy laughed and said I'd had one of their 'specials'. The hotel advertises a beautiful beach- which it is- but no sun beds are provided. These are an extra $25…

title: Needs a little work
review: The view is awesome!  The kitchen is great!  The master bedroom has 2 queen beds that are uncomfortable and squeaky.  The beds need replacing.  The screens in master window are so worn out they obstruct the view. There is an old fashion door to get to the patio from the master.  The sofa is not pull out.  The queen in spare room in back is nice.  Second Bedroom is as pictured.  There is a huge closet in master with toys and beach stuff.  Also awesome.  Master bath shower is great.  This condo had the right Reno in sight just needs to finish the Reno and update and will be perfect!   We loved the area and would go back.  Owner just needs to do a little fixing and will be great!

title: Overall, nice experience!
review: Thank you for sharing your experience on the “Island of Sand Key.” Here at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort we do offer the same beautiful views along with those same breathtaking sunsets. Yes this area is a tropical paradise with large private beaches which are so serene that it brings a calmness and true relaxation therapy. Although we do not offer the property described, we are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay on the Island of Sand Key and the Clearwater Beach area and we hope you will return to the area in the near future.

title: Good option
review: We recently stayed at this location with a group of friends and had a great time. Overall, the location was very nice, with a beautiful beach within walking distance (or golf cart shuttle available most times). Rooms were clean, however toiletries and towels seemed sparse as there were two adults and two children within the room. The restaurants on property were excellent, with a variety of family friendly options - prices were very affordable and the food was delicious! The pool is very small and overly crowded, which was unfortunate because there appears to be ample room for growth, with potential for scenic seating on the grassy area to offer more shade and better ambiance. The outdoor fireplace area was amazing!   We found this to be a nice property, but not necessarily a…

title: Awesome Location;  small hotel rooms but clean
review: We spent 4 days in this resort. Staff is friendly. Resort is in good condition but you can tell it needs some upgrades. I did not know this area had  stingrays, which makes it interesting when it comes time to go to the beach. I wish I had known that earlier.

title: Sand Key Resort is a great romantic getaway and perfect for families too!
review: I am pleased that our associates treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key, They truly love the interaction with you our guest. Please know that we are constantly renovating and realize there is always more that needs to be done. Sting Rays in Florida is just part of Nature. I do not want you to think that stingrays are lurking like an army along the shoreline of Florida beaches. You do not need to live in fear that your next step will be on top of one. The only reason they sting is in self-defense. This is truly is not an everyday occurrence on Florida beaches. Visitors and locals can swim for weeks without an incident. Just be aware when you enter the water, especially in the early morning or as the sun is going down in the evening...and shuffle your feet when walking on the bottom so not to step on one. We do hope you will return for another visit in the near future.

title: Great for a family vacation
review: Our family enjoyed a few days of vacation at the Sheraton. We enjoyed the beach, but the pool appeared to be a great option as well. There are a few dining options on site as well as a gift shop with plenty of snack and drink options. Staff was friendly and the rooms were clean. If heading out to the beach, grab towels at the pool and use the optional golf cart ride if needed. Chairs and cabanas are available for $25 plus tax. There are a few shops and other dining options within a block or two. It is a short drive to the Pier area. Great choice

title: Loved the location, but could use an update
review: We appreciate that you took the time to write this informative review. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. It is a great place to take relaxing breath. You have finally reached a place of clam and peace before you head back into the real world. I would also like to thank you for recognizing that our associates truly care and that their attention to detail is obvious, they are always finding more and better ways to take care of you …Hurry back!!

title: Disappointed. Over Priced. Crowed.
review: We stayed 3 nights, joining my sister and her family. All were Starwoods Preferred Guests, but for whatever reason, their two rooms were on the SPG level and our room wasn't. They had a nice beach and ocean view, which our kids would have loved. We didn't. I was also told at check-in that because I was an SPG member I got bottled water free in the room and a newspaper every morning, but we never did. Those weren't huge problems for us though. Not even enough to complain to the front desk. We aren't too picky and weren't in the room much.  The rooms, overall, need an update. They have air conditioning units in the rooms and ours sounded like a strong windstorm all night long. Thank goodness I had packed my ear plugs as I am a light sleeper. No one else in my room was bothered,…

title: Lots of kids and families
review: As Starwood Preferred Guest members your family’s loyalty is essential to the success of Sheraton Sand Key. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on these issues. We are constantly renovating please know there are many changes in the future. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Concerning the difference in rooms, I apologize for your disappointment, there are many variables to why the room views were different, it could be you are a different status then your sister. Although we do our best to assign all Starwood Preferred Guest members to one of the rooms set aside for them. There are times also where the occupancy does not permit us to do so. We will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance, I also apologize that the AC was noisy. Enjoying all the action Clearwater Beach offers then returning to Sand Key for; relaxing times around the pool, walks along the shore, nights around the fire pit, and a comfortable place to lay your head at the end of the day is what a visit to “Our Island” is about. Thank you for the reviews on the food options as you mentioned there are many in either direction. The six person beach shuttle is a new amenity put in place just for the reasons you listed. We realized it was a trek with children and all the stuff needed for a great day at the beach. Yes the new pay forward with beach toys and beach chairs is a great addition for families created by pervious guests. Please know that the water and paper have also been addressed. May many fun family memories have been made and a return visit planned.

title: Stopped at Mainstay Tavern for lunch
review: We booked spontaneously for birthday stay without searching much. Room was $280 with Trivago. This got us a small ground floor room adjacent to reception and shops with a view of reception drop off and main parking lot. The room itself was ok - no frills and no mini-bar but did have a refrigerator. Water was provided in room at $3.50/each but warm. The pool is sized inadequately for the property. It was very crowded and not inviting. The walk to the beach is long. They provide a shuttle to water but that is inconvenient. We did not eat on property so no insight there. They have a snack shop with coffee which was nice. We will not revisit. Disappointed with price and property in general. Much better values elsewhere.

title: Small pool, crowded, loud. Don't expect a relaxing stay
review: As a lifetime Starwood Platinum member (>50 nights a year in Starwood properties globally), this hotel barely qualifies as a "resort". Was a bit disappointed that I was given a run-of-the-mill room but understand it was a holiday. The fact that internet is only for 3 devices is very outdated when you consider a couple with phones, laptops and ipads. Haven't been to another property with this restriction in years. Pool is way too small for this size hotel and it was packed all day--not relaxing at all. Easy to get a good chair at the pool. A major hike to get to the beach. Guests with boom boxes playing over the steel drum musician. The staff is very accommodating--the 1 waiter who ran around the entire pool getting food was a great guy but needed 4 more of him. The bartenders…

title: Wonderful week stay!
review: As a Starwood Platinum member your loyalty is essential to the success of Sheraton Sand Key. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on these issues. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I sincerely apologize that your loyalty was not recognized and that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected. You are correct you should have been treated with the recognition and respect you deserve as a SPG member and this has been addressed. We do deploy all efforts to upgrade our Platinum members. We are large Starwood Preferred Guest redemption hotel and at full occupancy during the holiday week-end, which does make that a challenge. There are many new luxury hotels in the Clearwater Beach area and yes we are just a casual beach resort and it is a great place for families. Please let me assure you there are many tranquil months on the Island of Sand Key, it is a completely different environment during those times.  Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests. They also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. Thank you for recognizing them, your comments have been shared.

title: Island Grill
review: We just checked out and was sad to have to leave. We had a great week there! Yes, pool is rather small and was insanely crowded at times. And yes the bathroom is soooooo tiny. BUT the incredible private beach (and it's an easy walk!), super friendly staff (especially Roberta at the restaurant!) and comfy beds made up for these cons. We would definitely come back!!!!

title: Romantic trip for two
review: Sand Key can certainly give you that tropical feel with views which are so serene that it brings a calmness; beautiful sunsets, walks on along the shore, heated pool, loungers and hammocks available so you can just nap or relax. We do realize another pool is needed and yes it is on the top of our priority list. The beach is beautiful and truly adds to the island experience. The walk to the beach actually has many mental and physical benefits, although we realize that our new addition of the 6 person beach shuttle is very convenient and needed for many. All our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. Roberta she does enhance your morning visit to Rusty’s, she has truly become a friend to many. She so enjoys the interaction with the guests and is full of all sorts of area and hotel information. The comfy “Sweet Sleeper” bed does offer a great end to the perfect day, thank you. We look forward to your return!!

title: Not family friendly
review: What a great lunch and atmosphere for a quick good lunch. The hostess/manager, Sandra was especially wonderful. Very professional and she has a delightful positive disposition. She was attentive and organized, seemed to command natural respect and admiration from the wait staff. What a great lunch!!!

title: Excellent stay twice in one month!
review: Can't say enough good things about our two stays. On vacation for two weeks in Florida. Traveled elsewhere in the state between stays.  During both stays the hotel staff was courteous, helpful, and attentive (especially Jerry at the front desk). The room was comfortable and clean. The hotel itself was quiet and relaxing as well. There is a bit of a walk down to their private beach but it was nothing more than 5 minutes or less. There's a free buggy going back and forth if preferred. I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to a return stay.

title: What a beautiful resort beach hotel!!
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I was pleased that our associates treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key. I have shared your comment with Jerry, he has been added to our associate recognition program and he thanks you. It is also gratifying to read that your experience here at the Sheraton Sand Key was positive enough to bring you back for several visits in less than two weeks. Thank you for mentioning our new amenity, the 6 person beach shuttle as it truly has become such a welcomed addition. We look forward to that return visit when you can once again enjoy our beautiful private beach and a bit of relaxation therapy.

title: Disappointed
review: We love Clearwater, but we were unfamiliar with the Shearaton.  We made a great decision to stay here - it is right on the beach, but a bit of a walk.  The hotel provides a shuttle to take you to the beach, but we chose to walk.  It took about four to five minutes.  The Gulf is fabulous!!  Our room was well appointed - we overlooked the beach and the tennis courts.  If you want a sunset view you will need to ask for beachfront and pool view.  The sunsets are amazing!  Our only concern is that the pool is too small for the hotel size.  The pool is well kept and there are plenty of chairs, but the pool is way outdated.  With this type of property I would expect to see a more family friendly pool with zero entry, water fountains and twice the size.  I know this would be a huge…

title: vacation
review: Thank you for your great compliment and I am so delighted that you were pleased with your decision to stay with us here at the Sheraton Sand Key. Walking the beach is very therapeutic, although I am pleased that you mentioned our new 6 person beach shuttle for our guests who need or prefer a ride. Having a Gulf view always adds to a beach stay, a great trip starts with good planning. I am glad you realized that when making your reservation. You are correct and a new pool is on top of our priority list. Thank you for the comment on our Hand Carved Prime Rib Buffet, it is also very inexpensive and children under 5 are free. Yes, the panoramic view in Sheraton Fitness is awesome and helps with your workout. Keep in mind there is always another amazing sunset waiting for you when planning your next visit to “Our Island.”

title: Great for families
review: Our experience was ruined for the moment we checked in. The managers decided to give us the run-around stating they are fully booked, even though we expressed our discomfort and concern with our room. Jerry ignored our request and Kevin barely accommodated any needs. Given that this vacation was highly anticipated and booked months ago, the actual hotel and its service was below par. Certain employees only decide to treat certain persons fairly given their ethnic backgrounds. I have never been treated so poorly in a highly spoken hotel before, and am greatly distraught by the level  of service and communication expressed from the management. Given this stay, the reputation of the Sheraton franchise is now tainted. Never again staying at the Shitadon. Treading back to Hilton's…

title: MEMORIAL DAY BEACH GETAWAY
review: Hello beach fans , I just returned from another great beach escape in Florida at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort at Clear water beach area.This was a quick beach getaway for the holiday and also a house hunting trip to think about for a 2nd home. We had a super great time at this resort and it was everything we always look for in a beach resort .It had a great beach just a few hundred feet from the Gulf a huge  pool and a super nice beach area at the resort itself. They would shuttle you and family and all your gear via a golf cart anytime you would like to go over to the big beach which is public and you can go for miles north or south almost to John's pass or north to Tampa .They had plenty of room to sit by their huge salt water pool or hot tub and a separate  area to get away…

title: Beautiful, high class place, with friendly staff, beachfront, family-friendly atmosphere,but also fancy at the same time
review: Wow! I truly appreciate that you wrote this great and very informative review. It is gratifying to know that it was the experience you anticipated and again thank you for sharing it. We are not a luxury hotel, this is a casual and welcoming beach resort where you can just enjoy all that Mother Nature offers. Outside you are surrounded by13 acers of private beach with waves crashing against the shore, warm breezes, and blue skies and sunshine. We also offer many amenities to help you enjoy the many beach activities which are available. It is definitely a place to come to clear your mind and enjoy some stress-free time. Throughout the hotel you will find yourself surround by associates who are pleased to provide you with an effortless experience, they are genuinely friendly and genuinely caring. They sincerely enjoy the interaction with our guest and are here to ensure great memories are made. Good luck with the house hunting, living here is truly like being on vacation everyday. This is definitely paradise, breathtaking views you will love it.

title: Non existent WIFI
review: This place definitely exceeded our expectations! Beautiful, 5 star facilities, you feel like you're in a very high class place just walking in from the conference side! I am a single mom, so this was just a leisure trip for my son and I, and this definitely felt like more of a splurge, but thankfully I got a great deal through work and a travel agency! I recently signed up for Starwood Rewards for Sheraton and Marriott properties, but was sad to learn that you only get to earn rewards if booked directly through them, which would've meant paying much higher, and not as great of a deal for the trip overall. However, the staff and facilities are wonderful, every staff member you encounter is friendly, courteous, helpful, and very upbeat, I'm thinking that Sheraton takes good care…

title: Great beach
review: This was a very heartwarming and informative review, thank you for sharing your experiences. I am so pleased you and your son were able to experience a bit of fun and relaxation in your busy life. This is truly a bit of paradise, a place where precious memories can be made. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guest, they also are caring, efficient and genuinely friendly, thank you for recognizing them. Being on the island of Sand Key with visions of the pirate ship on the horizon and Dolphins at play is a forever memory for a young boy. I am delighted that you enjoyed lounging around the pool, apologies for the hot tub (I have noted the temperature issue.) There are many ways a child can enjoying our large, private island beach; swimming, building sandcastles, picking up sea shells, chasing birds and ending the evening with mom around the fire pit and one last dip in the pool. So pleased you also were able to enjoy the beautiful colors in the sky after a breathtaking sunset. Again thank you for taking the time to share your feedback; it is truly appreciated. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Another pool is high on our priority list, children under 6 do eat free from both Rusty’s breakfast and dinner buffet. Most of all hurry back!!!

title: Great location, def recommend!!
review: Wifi is horrible.  I was told by front desk "it is probably slow, because a lot of people are on it". .... ya think? That's what folks do when staying at a hotel ... they use your wifi.  Then, the same clerk connected me to "their help desk". ... which was in another country.  TERRIBLE service.  And, rooms very outdated.  I was in room 531 which had a joining door to the house cleaning storage/break room.  At 7:00 am until 3:00 pm - there was loud noises, talking, laughing, doors shutting, etc.  I understand this is house cleaning's "space" , but why would the Sheraton put anyone in an adjoining room and charge for the noise is beyond me.  Stay at Marriott across the street.  Worth the extra money.

title: Marriott has some work to do with this one!
review: This is definitely and older hotel that needs a renovation, which is fine. However, when you product is lacking a little bit, you need to make up for it with cleanliness and service, both of which were lacking unfortunately!  It started at check in. We arrived a little early-around 2 pm. My room wasn't ready, which was fine. However, the front desk associate reminded me 2-3 times that check wasn't until 4, and made me feel uncomfortable for inquiring if my room might be available for an early check in. Each time I approached the front desk for anything, they just stared at me! I was always the first person to initiate the conversation and decide which associate I was going to go to- very weird.  The room was disappointing. It was very old, and reminded me more of a Days Inn than…

title: Nice rest from Orlando !
review: I apologize for the impression you were left with upon your arrival. You are correct, you should have been treated with the recognition and respect you deserve. Our check-in time is 3:00pm although we deploy all efforts to have you in your room as soon as possible, when we are at full occupancy there could be some added time to your wait. Not meeting our goals and your expectations is very concerning. We have noted your comments and they were shared with the appropriate Directors. It is loyal guests such as yourself which keep us informed of these unfortunately missed details. As part of our continuous strive for perfection, a number of added checks and measures have been reviewed to ensure mistakes like these do not occur again. You deserve the best and we will make sure that you will get it with us. I understand this apology does not resolve the issues you experienced. We are pleased to now be part of the Marriott family. I am sure there will be some new and innovated ideas on the way.

title: Great place, great location
review: Nice hotel with huge beachfront access. Pool was a little small in my opinion and could be so much more but I guess with that huge beach it's not a problem !
