The shuttle to Clearwater stops at the hotel.  The breakfast restaurant is very nice.  It has activities for families like tennis; beach paddle tennis and volleyball.  Cons:  The resort is very far away from the water.  There is no bar/hut on the beach.  The beach is basically shells and not powdery sand like Clearwater's.  There is no "fun" bar at the facility.  If I come back I would probably stay at the Hilton in Clearwater as that hotel has more to offer adults and is centrally located.

title: Very Disappointed!!
review: We had narrowed down our vacation to 4 hotels in Clearwater and we chose Sand Key for #1-right on beach, #2 the reviews were unbelievable!   Come to find out, yes, we couldnt believe the reviews- they certainly werent what we experienced. Im not sure what Sand Key resort they were at, but not this one!! My husband surprised us with an upgrade to a "Deluxe Bay View"- what a joke- the bay was way off in the distance and our view was primarily roof top and AC units. So ugly- we paid extra for this????? I asked for an upgrade, and to  no surprise, we were told none available but put us on "the list" in the 3 ring binder-huh? Lots of names before ours- seems like lots of people wanted upgrades- what does that tell you?  The room was extremely dated but clean. The bathroom was the…

title: Great Location   Our favorite Starwood in the area
review: I sincerely apologize for the series of unfortunate incidences that you experienced during your stay with us. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail. I will look into each issue that you have noted, in an attempt to ensure that this does not happen again.

title: Loved it here
review: Came to the Clearwater area for Spring Break and also to visit family in the area.  We usually stay at a condo facility but used points for this trip.   This is a really amazing Sheraton property.  It is quite large but doesn't feel too big and the staff is amazingly attentive.  Front desk staff were so helpful and sweet.  There are so many family activities, the pool, beach volleyball, tennis courts... just perfect.  There were a TON of kids of all ages which was fine with us and the two 12 year olds with us.  The beach is really really deep and quite a walk to the water.  We were worried about that but it was always so lovely out, we made the walk several times a day including the amazing sunsets each night.  The parking made it super easy to get in/out and about for food.  We…

title: A pleasure again
review: What delightful reading and it is truly gratifying to know that your stay was exactly the experience you anticipated. Spring Break can be pretty hectic it is so gratifying that you enjoyed "Our Island Oasis" where sunsets and relaxation therapy are our specialty. We truly are tranquil especially compared to the many activities going on in Clearwater Beach which is just 2.0 miles away ... of course it is all in what you are looking for in a vacation.  Coach Rino who is in charge of beach activities ensures there is lots of fun things to do on the beach for all ages, of course I imagine 12 year olds can think of much to do on their own. We appreciate your comment on our associates they are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for you our guests, they are truly caring, efficient and most of all, genuinely friendly. We look forward to more memories being made on your next visit here to see your family.

title: Great stay!
review: Went for 4 days w our 2 kids, 4&5.  The weather didn't cooperate though- it was 55 degrees and we couldn't go in the pool until the last day.  But when we did it was great.  Nice and warm and kids had little floats allowed in there.  Note the shallow end is 4ft so kids can't stand, but very little kids have a small 1' deep splash pool available.  Also saw the hot tub with many people in it all the time.  Nice Fire pit area to sit at too.  The beach is quite a walk from the hotel but it is beautiful and will definitely return here.  The hotel has 2 vehicles to bring you to the water if you need to.  Very convenient for older adults and very little ones with a lot of stuff!  The hotel grounds are well maintained.  There is a cute little playground on the side of the hotel my kids…

title: Weekend away
review: Fantastic weekend! Our waiter, Adam, made our night great! Mudslides at the bar by the pool were fantastic! Great sleep on the hamics on the beach! Trip advisor is making me write more and I don't want to!

title: 5 Star Mini Vacation
review: It was a delight to read that your experience was everything you anticipated. “Welcome to Our Island” we are always pleased when we are able to share a little of the tranquility we are surrounded by. In some of our lives there are moments when you can choose to pause, spending time relaxing on the beach in a hammock with your favorite cocktail available nearby is one of them. With associates nearby that genuinely care about you our guest, they truly enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Thank you for recognizing Adam he is a breath of fresh air, I have shared your comment with him and he was very pleased. No need to say more … Fantastic week-end!! Was enough.

title: Beautiful
review: Stayed for 2 days to spend time with the Grandkids who were down for a spring break trip. We were upgraded to an Oceanview suite. The room was clean, beautiful and expansive. Service was great. We took the kids to dinner at Rusty's on site restaurant, where they are free while we enjoyed the buffet. The pool and adjacent beach area was clean and comfortable. The pool was heated, which was a blessing since we were there during a cold snap. The only disappointment, and it was not associated with the hotel, is that the Jolly Trolly did not appear at the hotel between 12:15-2 PM on the dy that we wanted to go into Clearwater for lunch. We would return again in a heartbeat!

title: Pleasantly Surprised
review: So pleased you enjoyed your Ocean Suite, there is something so serene when looking out at a large body of water. Being with your grandchildren is truly a precious memory that will last forever for all of you. What a great place to come no matter what their age. There is a casualness here in which you can just totally relax and feel at home. Our associates, many who have been here for years and years who truly care and keep a watchful eye out. A large private beach, not crowded where you can easily keep them in site. There are shells to collect, sand castles to build, the pool to enjoy and young children never really care too much about the weather, warm sunshine would have enhanced the stay. We have just added a 6 person cart to take our guest to and from the shore, although many of our guests enjoy “the being on an Island experience” while walking and children can really use their imagination. We also now have beach wagons available to put all that stuff that goes along with taking children to the beach. Yes there is one thing when traveling by trolley, which is always a hit with the children … PATIENCE, I must say that was quite the wait. We hope you will keep us in mind for your next mini vacation.

title: Great visit again....
review: Rooms were smaller than some hotels but clean.  The view of the roof from two different rooms was disappointing.  If you want to see the sunrise, stay on the bayside. Sunset was incredible every night. People gather on the beach each night for the view.  We did not feel well after eating blts in the restaurant one night. The lunch in the other restaurant, however, was fresh and flavorful.  Walk to the nearby strip mall for dinner. The food there was fabulous. Best to make reservations.  February is not beach weather. Not warm enough for a swim. But the hotel had volleyball, a beanbag toss game and chairs and hammocks set on the sand near the hotel pool and bar. The food service near the pool is basic and pricey. I preferred to get food from the lunch restaurant and eat it…

title: Spring training break
review: Had a great stay with fabulous service, gorgeous views and good food. Awesome happy hour and healthy tasty breakfast on the concierge floor. Beach, pool and the gulf swimming second to none. Check in, housekeeping  & bellman service excellent. Highly recommend.

title: business conference
review: Thank you for the delightful review … We welcome you to our tropical paradise, where beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. I am delighted that you enjoyed the efficiency and attitude of those associates and the panoramic view of the beaches and the area that surrounds us from the Sheraton Club. The exceptional service and personal touches that all our associates give our guests demonstrate our commitment to turning everyday moments into memorable branded experiences. Thank you for the recommendation and please return soon.

title: Not my usual
review: My wife and I stayed six days for a conference and found this hotel to be very accommadating.  The staff was all very nice and helpful.  Iwould recommend it for a conference or a vacation.  The food at the restaurant and the cafe was very good.  The bar was very comfortable.

title: Nice Resort
review: We here at the Sheraton Sand Key are uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home – Our associates are genuinely caring and friendly and are here to make your stay memorable. Whether you're staying with us for business or leisure, we're always working on new ways to better care for you. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … There are beautiful views, breathtaking sunsets, a dip in the pool to enjoy when not busy with your conference. Hopefully memories were made which will bring you back in the near future.

title: Recent great stay
review: I am going to say this was not the usual Sheraton experience for me but that said it's because I am usually spoiled by Sheraton. Sand Key is gorgeous! The grounds are beautiful , everything is clean and well kept up. The room was average, the bathroom tiny with no exhaust fan and the sink outside the toilet room... I suppose that's not a big deal but there wasn't much room to get ready. The beach is huge! The history of being the first hotel in the area is great but for me personally, the walk back and forth was a pain... literally to the bottom of my tender foot, I would recommend water shoes if you have a sensitivity. The cabanas are nice and the beverage cart a nice touch. Everyone was pleasant and helpful... the pool area was pretty, the hot tub malfunctioned each day we…

title: Vacation with Granddaughter
review: The room was clean, beds were comfortable, view of ocean was beautiful, wonderful pool and every hotel staff member was friendly and helpful!  Loved the atmosphere at this hotel! The breakfast buffet was delicious!

title: We Will Return
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with your grandchildren is a perfect break. It is our associate’s favorite part of their job, interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. I am pleased that you felt comfortable and welcomed and we hope that will bring you back for another visit.

title: Spring Break
review: We're not the MacArthurs, but we're confident of a return. This is a very fine, friendly place with great access to the beach. Now, for some of the details: We arrived late for a short vacation due to a cancelled flight (Spirit Airways). Check in was fast and friendly and set the stage for unrelenting positive attitudes from all the hotel staff. The "problem," if it really was one, was the imperfect view of the Intracoastal and the searing morning sun preventing pleasant use of the balcony. (is there a way to make rooftops more pleasant looking? I'm positive there is). So, I called the front desk and found we were lucky and rebooked after the second night to a room on the gulf side. Big difference! Thank you Jerry from Brooklyn for being so helpful: "Trust me. Take the room." I…

title: Great location
review: It is our associate’s favorite part of their job, interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. It is always gratifying to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated. Jerry is a star and is always pleased to assist our guests in any way that will enhance their stay. It was a delight to read your review, it was very informative for any future guests. This is truly the right place to be if you desire to get away. When longing for gentle, temperate seas lined by sandy shores, our beach was especially made for you. Sunshine and breezes during the day then sliding into the evening with spectacular sunsets it is truly a place for a great place a little relaxation therapy.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Concerning the comment on prices of activities and non-activities along the shore for your next visit; the beach chairs along the shore, many area resorts include those charges in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to include a resort fee. There is a private concession for the chairs and umbrella they charge $25 per day for usage should the guest so choose to use. There are loungers and “your sweet spot” hammocks in the sand which are free of charge. There are Wave Runners, Kayaks and power sports available also by private concessions on our beach. We do not set prices, we do ensure they are in line with other concessions in the area. Along with beach tennis, Coach Rhino provides an array of activities for guests of all ages. Such as beach tennis clinics, sand volleyball games, corn hole and other outside activities. It is always fun to see our guests busy and smiling. Next we have considered putting in a Starbucks Kiosk, there are many reason why it has not been done. I have shared your suggestions on the Sheraton Fitness area and plants on the room top with the Director of engineering, thank you, your feedback is important to us as we strive to improve our products, services, and overall customer experience We look forward to your next beach get away.

title: Great conference site!
review: Great time at the Sheraton Sand Key!!  Spring Break with 2 teenage daughters staying in suite rm 823.  Worked perfect for us!  Everyone so friendly pool bar great, beach great with cabanas and turtle lady served light fare and drinks at request.  Pretty lengthly walk from hotel to beach...but not terrible at all... who could get upset at such a large stretch of beautiful sand?!  Great way to get some exercise in!  Would definitely stay here again!

title: great relaxing vacation!
review: Everyone here was so wonderful.  Our room has a beautiful view of the ocean.   Jerry was a huge help and so kind.    He recommended places for dinner and places and assisted my mother with printing her boarding pass. I  would recommend here to anyone.

title: A relaxing but disappointing experience
review: We welcome you to our tropical paradise, where beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. I am delighted that you enjoyed the efficiency and attitude of our front desk manager “Jerry.” I have also shared your comment with the Director of Guest Services. Yes! Jerry wholeheartedly enjoys going “Beyond”. He defiantly knows where to direct you as he has knowledge and much experience of the area, he enjoys the interaction with our guests and enjoys ensuring he helps personalizing your stay. It is always nice when you are with a parent as those are precious times and certain to be a lifelong memory, I am pleased that we are part of that experience. We hope that memory will bring you back for another stay.

title: great stay nice hotel great beach with all watersports and umbrella,Friendly people
review: A well located all encompassing resort that misses overall. While an attractive wide sandy beach abuts the Gulf, we were annoyed to learn that chairs and umbrellas near the Gulf carried a stiff daily rental charge and were not  complementary as we have experienced in similar resorts. After complaining we were offered a one free day as a management grant! Having requested a higher level room when we booked months before , upon checking in we leaned this was unavailable due a large number of convention attendes soon to arrive later and that the hotel was full. We were offered to join a wait list with no hopes for change during our one week vacation stay. As to food services the many dining options did provide choice, but quality of cooking and selection choices of the preparations…

title: A Stay in Paradise!
review: I am sure when you booked your trip at our resort you had high expectations of your experience, and I can see clearly why we failed to reach those expectations. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on these issues. Thank you for the comments on the location, this is a beautiful, tranquil and relaxing island.  Concerning the beach chairs along the shore; many area resorts include those charges in a nightly resort fee, which means you are paying for them whether you use them or not. We have opted not to include a resort fee. There is a private concession for the chairs and umbrella they charge $25 per day for usage should the guest so choose to use. There are loungers and hammocks in the sand which are free of charge. Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for all our guests. I am pleased that they were able to arrange a relaxing day on the beach for you.  The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. Please let me assure you there are many months in which our business is totally leisure and no conventions. We have a very creative, talented culinary staff. We continue seek to keep a balance between guest experience and restaurant operations. We're always working on new ways to better care for you.  We have looked into several options for re-designing the bathroom, however, we have not found a solution that does not take away from the rest of the room.  Rest assured these items are always on our mind and we do hope that someday we will find an improvement. Although it is disappointing you will not be returning to our hotel I am pleased that you enjoyed the area and will return.

title: Wish we could have stayed longer
review: Stayed there with my family and it was a wonderful exsperinace.had fun doing and enjoying everything at the hotel an so much to do so close.would recommend it to everyone.Restraunts good food,beach was very clean and the poolside is very comfortable.Beds clean and first rate

title: The Garden of Eden at Clearwater, Florida
review: People make the difference.  This Sheraton has a great location which is supplemented by a friendly, knowledgeable and professional staff.  Jeanne and Moe at the front desk could be Mr. and Ms. Sheraton.  Check out Moe's jacket of the day!  Robert the "Watch" Pool attendant makes a day at the pool into a real joy.  Gallo did a great job keeping snacks and drinks filled at the pool.  Nate the Bar Tender makes the best drinks in Clearwater.  Steven the Bell Man helped us with our belongings and having to say good bye to such a wonderful hotel and resort.  The Absolute best.  While this resort is a bit pricy you get what you pay for and it was worth the rate.  The property is clean, convenient and right on the beach.  Large beach area, pools, hot tub, fire pit in the evening with…

title: Nice hotel
review: Our associates are the people who live our brands every day and devote their energy to bringing them to life for our guests. They also are caring, efficient and most of genuinely friendly. Thank you for recognizing them by name and your comments have been shared with each of them and also with all .concerned. Delighted that you enjoyed lounging around the pool, relaxing in the hot tub and ending your evenings gathering around the fire pit and enjoying the beautiful colors in the sky after a breathtaking sunset. Hurry back!!!

title: Quiet location next to great birdwatching
review: When we checked in (on time), we were told our room wasn't ready yet, and ended up having to wait over an hour, but they made it up to us with an upgraded balcony room & free breakfast. Overall, Great

title: Nice place.
review: As an SPG Gold member your loyalty is very important to Sheraton resort and hotels. Upgrades to the Club Floor are not part of the SPG Gold benefits, although if there is room an acceptation might be made. As you know, the SPG program does have different levels, and Sheraton Club Lounge is only a benefit of the Platinum level. Due to being a high redemption property the amount of Platinum SPG members with access to at the time of your stay the Sheraton Club was at full capacity. We would like to sincerely apologies for not being able to provide you with this request. Concerning your late check-in here at the Sheraton Sand Key our associates are here to assist you in with smart solutions and an effortless experiences that free up your valuable time so you are able to experience more. I sincerely apologize your first impression on arrival was not the experience we anticipated for you. I certainly hope the follow up from the front desk and their resolution was to your satisfaction. We look forward to your return so we are better able to serve you.

title: Great hotel and off the beaten path!
review: Nice pool and beachfront. Restaurants and room were satisfactory but rooms are a bit cramped for a family. Nice touches, though, included live steel drum music by the pool, great staff at poolside bar, sand tennis courts, and a kids' menu with interesting choices. We also liked this hotel because it is next to a lovely little park, Sand Key Park, with a marsh perfect for birdwatching, and busy Clearwater Beach is just across the bridge.

title: business
review: Very disappointed.. Quiet at night without the staff during the day..Had to tell client I would have to call back because of the loudness in the hallway.Peeked out the door and staff  was laughing and carrying on in their language. I assume because a lady standing their in a white shirt and dark pants was a manager laughing and carrying on also. Hotel is very outdated and needs  to be renovated.. Bathrooms are extremely small. Will check different hotel options on next business trip

title: Beautiful Resort
review: We strive to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. We have noted your comments regarding the level of disturbance coming from our associates outside your room and would like to apologize for these occurrences. We know how frustrating and disappointing that can be. I understand your concerns and have shared your feedback with the appropriate department manager. I feel confident you would not experience these situations in a future stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  We can also appreciate your comment regarding the size of the bathroom; it is on our wish list to find a more suitable, yet workable solution. Please rest assured that we do take your feedback very seriously and that we will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time, given a chance.

title: UNEVEN VISIT
review: This is a beautiful resort with sugar sand beaches and heated pools. Rooms are nice and most have a view. The staff are wonderful and the resort is really comfortable. I highly recommend visiting this resort. I'm coming back.

title: Had a very enjoyable guest experience
review: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort through Trip Advisor reviews. We welcome you to our tropical paradise, where beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. We are pleased to ensure that we provide a warm and comfortable environment here inside the Sheraton Sand Key also. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We look forward to your next beach get-away.

title: Conference Couple Time
review: This property would ultimately received high marks from me if it wasnt for a convention that was attending.  The front desk was friendly and helpful, the rate was reasonable, the room was quite nice,  the location above the pool was beautiful to view, but quite noisy.  The convention goers decided  to hold court by the pool at midnight.  A call to security was needed and it took an hour for them to respond and remedy the situation.  Front desk the next day tried to explain that the long wait was due to numerous problems caused by this group in various places around the property.  Its a shame that it prejudiced my stay as all in all it is a beautiful property with an amazing location at a very reasonable rate especially when you contrast it to some of the rack rates nearby,

title: Conference attendance at the Sand Key
review: I stayed at the Sand Key the week of January 23 2017 for a technical conference. The hotel is in very good condition and the staff were helpful. The food at all of the inside restaurants was top notch. They did a real nice job on homemade cookies and an ice cream sundae bar every afternoon for our conference. I played tennis Tuesday and Wednesday. The courts(3) were in reasonable shape but could really use some lighting. It is dark after 6 in January and this really shortened out playing time. With a little TLC and some lights this could be a tennis destination hotel. The rooms were a little dated but the bed was very comfortable and the pillows were excellent. The thing that sets this resort apart is a huge free parking lot. It is such a joy to arrive and be told you can park…

title: Plus and minus
review: Plus : nice beach area with chairs and hammocks, easy bus ride into Clearwater and surroundings for only $5 day ticket. Minus : old property which needs a modern make-over.  Small bathroom/toilet. Would suggest to take out the bath-tub and put in a walk-in shower.  Even if Housekeeping does a good job, old furnishings give the room a dreary look.

title: Winter getaway
review: DearJin 29, We greatly appreciate you choosing the Sheraton Sand Key and want to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting this area. The beach is exceptionally large and private, that is the beauty of being on our island; this area is known for their exceptional beaches, beautiful views and fun activities. It is the perfect place to relax, refresh and recharge. The Trolley system is a fun and an inexpensive option. We are elated that you enjoyed our location.  Unfortunately you are correct we are an older hotel, although we are constantly renovating still there is always more to be done. The furnishing were all updated in the past couple of years, as you probably realize due to our constant heavy occupancy it does get much use. It is being redone several rooms at a time. We have also looked into several options for re-designing the bathroom, however, we have not found a solution that does not take away from the rest of the room. Rest assured these items are always on our mind and we do hope that someday we will find an improvement. Thank you for that awesome suggestion on the walk-in shower. I have shared your idea with the appropriate people. We're always working on new ways to better care for you, return soon.

title: Fun in the sun
review: We've stayed here a few times and love the hotel and the area. The hotel is clean the beach is beautiful. There is a trolley you can catch in front of the hotel and it takes you all over Clearwater. We ate at Rusty's and the food was delicious- highly recommend. Columbia Restaurant is across the street.

title: Beautiful Property
review: Top notch staff, great beach comfortable room.  This property is perfect in every respect.  Old Floridian style on the outside with a comfortable modern inside.  The staff's main aim is to please.  The hotel restaurant is excellent.   We are already planning our next trip to Clearwater Beach and without a doubt we will be staying here again.

title: Amazing anniversary getaway! Thank you Sheraton Sand Key Resort!!
review: Just returned from celebrating our 14th anniversary at the SSKR...A-amazing getaway at a wonderful property. Our experience was enjoyable from our early arrival...our room wasn't quite ready but we had a prime view/location so we waited. Reception checked us in, took our phone number and guided us toward several excellent places for lunch while we waited. Staying on property was an option but we chose to explore. We received a call as we finished eating that our room was ready and waiting.  Gorgeous property, short walk to the shore. It was chilly (we brought winter with us from Indy 😩) our entire stay but the large hot tub and nightly fire in the outdoor fire pit were great. Bar beverages were strong and delicious. Service by the pool/hot tub could not be beat and we were…

title: Amazing
review: You are welcome! Your review was gratifying … I am delighted that celebrating your 14th anniversary at the Sheraton Sand Key was everything you anticipated and more. Starting with the Front Desk check-in to Joey Quintana, Rusty’s Bistro/ In-Room Dining manager and his staff who take pride in being detailed oriented and is sincerely caring. I have shared your comments with Joey and our creative Sous-chef de cuisine, Chef Jeffery Hiott and his culinary staff, we are so pleased you enjoyed their efforts on our Hand Carved Prime Rib/ Seafood Beef buffet. Our associates and our location are what makes the Sheraton Sand Key a place for romance, relaxation and fun. The associates are focused on exceeding the expectations of our guests by ensuring efficient, warm, and genuinely caring service.  It is rewarding that you recognized the ones who truly go that little extra to ensure that you time on “Our Island” is truly memorable.  Beautiful views, breathtaking sunsets, long walks on the beach and cool nights around the fire pit ending by slipping into our very comfortable “Sweet Sleeper” beds for a great night’s sleep make for that all around special experience you were anticipating. We are also a great place for a family vacation bring your daughter for the next getaway, there is much more to explore.

title: Decent property with a great location on the beach
review: This is perhaps the most cordial hotel I'm every stayed at. Every about this place is 5 stars. They aim to please, no doubt about it. Never having been to Clearwater, FL. I literally picked this hotel out of a hat. I felt like I'd won the lottery. I very highly recommend this hotel.

title: Fantastic stay
review: It is defiantly rewarding to read that your experience with our associates was truly positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Their goal is to provide you with an effortless and positive experience. We are truly honored that you compared us to winning the lottery …  Your recommendation is one they highest compliments we can receive, we thank you.

title: Time to upgrade
review: The property is nothing special, but it was clean and had a nice pool area. The main draw is the proximity to the beach and the fact that it has an extended beach area that nearby property don't also have.

title: family time
review: i love this place , 3rd time i visited this hotel, always nice friendly service .kids love the pool area, i love their private beach.will be going there soon. they made a mistake on my friend reservation ,they corrected it and they upgraded his room ,very professional.

title: Beautiful private beach!
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and the Sheraton Brand, thank you. I am pleased to read that you have enjoyed “Our Island” enough to return often. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. The beaches on Sand Key are known to be exceptional; here at Sand Key our beach is large and private, meaning only guests of hotel are allowed to use it. You will not find the crowds you would at the areas public beach. It is a great place to take relaxing breath, you have finally reached a place of clam and peace a place to make memories that will last a life time. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service, I am pleased we were able to resolve our mistake to your friend’s satisfaction. We look forward to that forth visit.

title: Top notch hotel, best service ever.
review: Although the hotel sits back a bit from the water, the beach is beautiful.  We were here for a conference and we love this location.  The rooms are a bit pricey, but the location is simply excellent. I was on the 6th floor and want to thank Anna in housekeeping for making my trip so enjoyable.  She is so nice and friendly.  Anna really goes above and beyond to deliver excellent customer service. I will be back.

title: Wonderful!
review: DNapoleon, Manager at Sheraton Sand Key Resort, responded to this review  The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind; it reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax, that is when not busy with your conference. Our beach is truly large and it keeps us away from the shore, which also keeps us safer from storms. It is around a five minute walk and you can defiantly always find your own private beach space. Being away from the hotel gives you a true Island experience. We are constantly updating throughout the hotel and housekeeping is very efficient at keeping the hotel clean and comfortable, I thank you for recognizing Anna. I have shared your comment with Anna and the Housekeeping manager. Anna "appreciates the comment." We will look forward to your next visit.

title: Perfect!
review: What a wonderful place!  First of all, the service was outstanding. I had made a mistake in booking the wrong type of room (I mixed up "bay" and "gulf.")  They bent over backwards to find us a gulf view room, in spite of the fact it was I who had made the mistake. Then, they remembered my feather allergy when they had switched our rooms (even when I hadn't thought of it), and sent up a housekeeper late in the evening to "de-feather" the bed before bedtime.  Every person we encountered was dedicated to exceptional customer service, from the Concierge/Bellhop (Paul) to the check-in desk (Todd, Katie, Monique), to the waitstaff at the restaurant (Theresa) and manager (Kevin).  On the rare occasion something was amiss, they made it right. The room was immaculate, beautiful, with a…

title: Beautiful
review: The beach is the whitest you'll ever find and the grounds are quite expansive.  Food, etc., is expensive, but reasonable for a resort of this caliber.  Service was good and the room was very clean and complete.

title: Nice Family Friendly Hotel
review: The Sheraton Sand Key resort is the perfect base for a beach get-away.It is a place that many memories can be made. Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful expansive beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. There is no elixir quite like the smell of salt air and the surf. Concerning the pricing on the food, we do keep our prices competitive with other area hotels. There are less expensive venues to dine at in the area and inexpensive transportation, although many are in walking distance. Thank you for recognizing our associates they are efficient and take pride ensuring they do all they can to make your experience exactly what you anticipated. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Beautiful resort!
review: Stayed here for a conference. Room was clean and simple. Bathroom was small and underwhelming. Could see the ocean from my balcony, which I appreciated. Service was excellent. The ratan chair in my room was totally uncomfortable. Room could have been cleaner, but my bed was always made nicely and by friendly staff. Wish that I could have been able to charge things to my room instead of having to carry cash or a credit card. The ocean is quite a walk from the hotel, despite it being right on the sand. Being from NH, I had no problem swimming in the ocean in January. The pool area was nice. I wasn't impressed by the culinary options in the hotel, but it is near some great other spots. You wouldn't regret staying here.

title: Relaxation
review: This is a great place to stay for several reasons. The staff is always exceptional; I stayed here a few years ago and remembered them for their top notch service. The hotel is clean, casual and has lots of amenities. It's not over the top ritzy but it's nice.  There are 3 restaurants in this Sheraton that range from a bar to fine dining. The pool area is very well kept and nice. You can get food and drinks out there as well. There is a fire pit just off from the pool area if you feel up to sitting around the fire, chatting and making new friends. From the pool area you can step right down into the sand and walk out to the ocean where there is really nice beach area. There are sand volley ball courts along the way out to the beach. Across the street from the Sheraton and just…

title: Now I'm a Believer!
review: Wow! Your review has left me speechless. You have covered it all and done it perfectly. We strive to ensure everyone’s experience is exactly what they anticipated. It is extremely gratifying to hear that we succeeded, so much so that you returned and enjoyed yourself once again … that is the perfect compliment. We want to be the place where new memories for you are continued to be made and look forward to that next visit.

title: Fantastic
review: My wife and I stayed here over the recent long holiday weekend.  I was a little worried because of some complaints (on Tripadvisor) about this property.  I am happy to report that these weaknesses (i.e. small bathrooms and long walk to beach) were blown out of proportion.  Yes, the bathrooms are not gigantic and to make it to the water/ocean requires a casual stroll, but the positive greatly outweighs the negative.  I would describe our stay as nearly perfect.  One front desk associate and the bartender in the small indoor bar should probably be reminded that they are in the hospitality business and not working in a prison.  Other than that, our stay was perfect.  (No place is perfect.)  Some things that are really nice about this hotel/resort: lots of activities, free parking,…

title: We would stay here again
review: We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your business! Thank you for staying at the Sheraton Sand Key for your holiday week-end. I realize that people perceive things differently many times due to circumstances we are not aware of, although it is very refreshing to hear your perception of the walk to the shore. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; you certainly should have been treated with the warm, caring and efficient attitude our associates are known to give. I am saddened to read that those members of our staff let you down and did not exemplify the “can do” attitude they are truly known for. Your comments have been shared and addressed by the appropriate managers. I am grateful your interaction with our other associates was gratifying. I thank you for this wonderful and informative review. I hope you will choose us once again for another beach get-away.

title: Weekend visit
review: I stayed here with my husband & our three kids for two nights recently.  Upon checking in, our room wasn't ready (we were early), but the staff checking us in said he was going to upgrade our room since I was an SPG member.  That was a nice surprise.  The bartender by the pool was fantastic.  The soda dispenser went down for a bit, so she gave my kids each a free bottle of pop.    All & all the staff went out of their way to make our stay more enjoyable.  This was a great value I though.  I'd highly recommend.

title: Beautiful beach - terrific staff
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with your children and each other is a perfect break. It is a tropical paradise; beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. Building sandcastles, watching Dolphins at play, collect shells or maybe catching a glimpse of the Pirate Ship on the horizon are memories that will be with your children forever.  The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. It is nice to catch some of the activities of Clearwater beach it is also nice to come back and enjoy the tranquility of Sand Key. It is our associate’s favorite part of their job, interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. It is always a delight to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated. We look forward to your next family vacation.

title: The staff was very helpful to our needs
review: We took the family to the Sheraton Sand Key and were very satisfied with our stay. We were able to check in early, with no problem. The pool/beach area were fun, with many fun activities to partake in, such as beach tennis and sand volleyball courts.  The rooms are a little dated and need to be updated. We will stay again when in Clearwater.

title: Nice family destination
review: We stayed here for three nights.  We were in town for my daughters gymnastic meet.  Everything about the place was great.  We could have had better weather to really enjoy the amenities but that's mother nature not the hotel.  The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The pool/hot tub/beach area was very well kept and beautiful.  The entire staff was so friendly and accommodating. Very easy hotel to park at and get around.  It's a good location too.

title: Nice but over priced for what you get
review: It is our associate’s favorite part of their job, interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. It is always a delight to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated. It is a tropical paradise; beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key.  What a great place to make memories with your daughter. I hope she did well at her meet. It is even more beautiful here when Mother Nature cooperates, there is much to do and explore when visiting this area. When planning a future vacation please keep us in mind.

title: Nice, but had better for my dollar
review: Came into town for the National Championship game.  Being a SPG member thought this would be a good option to be away from all the hype down town Tampa.  The hotel is a little dated but overall nice.  However, they certainly knew fans were coming as the pricing was really jacked up for the dates.  I understand that but it seemed excessive.  My room was on the 5th floor and had a partial ocean view and was over the tennis courts.  The weather was blustery so spending time on the expansive beach or by the pool wasn't really feasible but it was certainly nice looking.  I did use the hot tub and 9th floor exercise room both of which I enjoyed.  On my first morning I tried the breakfast buffet.  Avoid it.  Spend $15 on anything else like a drive over the bridge to IHOP.  The food was…

title: Relaxing family resort
review: Thank you, it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I sincerely apologize it was not the experience anticipated. Concerning your comments regarding the pricing of our hotel and services, we would like to advise you that our room rates are very competitive with the same category hotels of the area. Please note that hotel room rates fluctuate depending on the level of business, seasonality and events such as the National Championship game. We were also at 100% occupancy with other groups in house. Unfortunately it is the rule of supply and demand, during periods of low activities the rates do drop significantly. We never raise the prices in any of our Food and Beverage Outlets or actually anywhere else in the hotel. I do apologize for the disappointment of the breakfast buffet, I have shared your comment with our Executive Chef to be addressed. We also have a nice breakfast menu which is reasonably priced. I do hope that you will return when the sun is shining and the temperatures are where they usually are and you can enjoy the many amenities being on the beach offers.

title: Wonderful to return
review: This is another one of those places where you don't get much for your dollar, we had arrived after staying in Naples, Miami and Orlando and this was the most expensive hotel per night but certainly not the nicest accommodation we had, don't get me wrong the rooms were nice, they were spacious, clean, excellent TV channels, useful fridge, starbucks coffee, beautiful view but I wasn't wowed!! The bathroom was very very small, this is something I don't usually moan about but it is the first time I've ever felt claustrophobic in a bathroom. We went to go to breakfast the first morning and we had to wait so we went across the road and had breakfast at Shorty's grocery and gourmet Deli, it was fantastic and a great price we also got to see a pool of dolphins swimming in the sea. The…

title: Good choice
review: The location its great. New and comfortable rooms and the staff is great and kind. The pool is great for kids and the beach is beautiful. The only things is that they not offer chairs in front of the beach

title: Nice place off the main beach
review: It is paradise here, and I am so pleased we were able to share it with you. I always appreciate when our guests take time to share their experience with us. I am pleased that your children enjoyed the pool area, which hopefully means you were able to relax yourself. We try to provide the perfect place for memories to be made and hope you will return soon.

title: Amazing staff
review: We love this hotel. Has it's own private beach, so it's not near as busy as the main beach. The food is good and not over priced. Rooms either have balcony or patio. Staff is very friendly. The only downfall is that the beach is probably 300 yards from the hotel.

title: A break from the hectic pace of orlando theme park's
review: We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your business! Our beaches are beautiful and semi private and never crowded, there are many treasured memories to be made here. Being on the Island of Sand Key is defiantly a place to come to relax and refresh your body and mind. It is also gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Their goal is to provide you with an effortless and positive experience. I am pleased you found our culinary choices to be of value and tasty. We are very proud of our award winning and talented culinary staff. Concerning the beach chairs along the shore, many area resorts include those charges in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to include a resort fee. There is a private concession for the chairs and umbrella they charge $25 per day for usage should the guest so choose to use. There are loungers in the sand which are free of charge. We are not able to put them along the shore for liability reasons. We look forward to a return visit soon.

title: Family Stay
review: We visited this property for one night during Christmas. The property is fairly dated and could use some major updating but has been kept fairly well.  The staff was amazing and very helpful. We went with our little one and they were very helpful to warm up food and milk for our child. It was Christmas and they put a smile every time we went down to the lobby. As far as beach and pool, pool was heated and my daughter loved it. Ample of activities for children on the beach and lots of area just to hang out.  Only negative was the lady at the front desk at check in. She seemed like she didn't want to be there. We asked for late check out as we have spg status and she declined right away but when we asked someone else, they were fine with it.

title: Is that the ocean out there?
review: I stayed at the Sheraton using Starwood points after a week with family around the holidays in Tampa.  My first impression of the property was that it appeared to be older and smaller than many properties in Clearwater. Not impressive curb appeal. I was stopped by a security guard when parking and my guests were unable to park at the hotel. Was told they could park "next door". Next door was over a mile away. I had to check-in and then pick them up and bring them back to the hotel. The bellman were great and took my luggage to my room. Check-in was smooth. I got an early check-in and the room I booked. The room was a bit tired as I expected, but adequate. Bed's were comfy. Free water and Wi-Fi offered.  The pool and pool area are small. There is a bar off of the pool and a small…

title: Nice Hotel right on the Beach!
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to the Sheraton Brand. I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended.  We do realize that the pool is very much a part of your beach vacation experience, I sincerely apologize it was not what was anticipated. Our guests have free parking and the security guard is there to ensure that there is a parking space for you. It was unfortunate that your visitors were unable to park in guest parking, this occurs at all hotels on the beach when we are at full occupancy. I personally know how annoying that can be. Yes we are 2.0 miles from the activity of Clearwater Beach, Sand Key is a tranquil Island and most of our guest come here for relaxation therapy. I am pleased that you agree we have everything to enjoy a beach getaway. We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your business!

title: Great Beach Getaway
review: Went to Celebrate my birthday (Xmas Eve) Check in was a breeze, they upgraded us to an ocean view room Everyone at the front desk were very professional, smiled and were very courteous. Room 631 was amazing! We paid extra for the club lounge and it was well worth every penny. The happy hour was amazing and I would go back and pay extra just for the happy hour. My only small complaint would be that breakfast was basically the same every day. The young lady (older ladies) in the club lounge (I can't remember her name) She was informative and helpful with how to get around and attractions to go and see. She is truly a gem to the Sheraton Sand Key. I saw her go around and help anyone who wanted her knowledgeable assistance. She told us how to get the Jolly Trolley ($5.00 for an all…

title: Lovely
review: It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive and that they were able to effectively meet your expectations. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care.  I am pleased the Front Desk was able to upgrade your room and we were able to make you feel like the VIP that you are, especially on your birthday. Delighted you enjoyed your Birthday dinner prepared by our award winning culinary staff and served by our professional servers. The Sheraton Sand Key resort is the perfect base close to many attractions; Clearwater Beach offers plenty of activities to fill your vacation, although you still have the tranquility of “Our Island.”  The Shoppes of Sand Key is convenient 5 minute walk from the hotel with a choice of venues for dinning or shopping. I have shared your comments with both Joey the Bistro manager who looks forward to sharing birthdays next year and Peggy the morning hostess upstairs in the Sheraton Club. She is very informative and truly enjoys interacting with the guests. Christmas vacation does bring many families to the pool, we look forward to you coming back to wear those bathing suits. May & September to November bring a much more tranquil atmosphere around the pool, maybe we will see you than. We look forward to seeing you soon.

title: Nice hotel...
review: My husband and I stayed here for a quick getaway from the freezing temperatures and the holiday season craziness. We drove down from Ohio and spent a few days lounging on the beach and by the pool. It was nice to be at a property with easy access to both. Everyone on staff from the registration desk, concierge, housekeeping, and maintenance were all super friendly and helpful. Peggy in the Club provided great recommendations for dinner in the area. The spa seemed to be a bit of an afterthought, but I receive a relaxing facial. We are already planning our net visit.

title: Beautiful beach, dated interior
review: Although the beach and property is beautiful, the inside of the hotel is awkward laid out and bit dated. The most surprising part was that the one restaurant that the hotel has feels like its in a basement. Awkwardly low ceilings and NO windows. With such a beautiful view outside it is baffling that they don't make the restaurant in a location to see outside. I came for a business trip and was really displeased that there were no working areas, restaurants, bars etc that had a view.

title: Excellent, excellent, excellent!!
review: I appreciate that you enjoyed “Our Island” we do have beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and outstanding views. I empathize with your disappointment that there are no widows in Rusty’s Bistro to enjoy these views. It is a comment often made and we truly agree. Although we have searched for solutions to where to relocate the restaurant throughout the years none has been found. The restaurants were built in the middle of the hotel due to the need have quick access to the kitchen. When the hotel was designed the kitchen was to be centrally located in the middle/back of the hotel. It services the banquet area, Mainstay Tavern as well as Room Service and Rusty’s Bistro. Without moving our rather large completely renovated kitchen we would relish any suggestions on where to relocate it. As recently as 2014, we had a massive overhaul of the resort’s overall theme, modernizing everything from the main lobby, meetings rooms, cafes, restaurants, bars and all 390 rooms and suites. Since then we continue to renovate on a regular basis. I do hope there were moments you enjoyed during your experience at the Sheraton Sand Key.

title: Nice hotel in which to end tour
review: I honestly cannot say enough good things about our stay here last month.  We had planned to originally stay only for 2 nights, but loved it so much we ended up staying for 4 nights!  The location is ideal, right on the beach, I know others have commented that the beach is a long walk from the hotel but it wasn't bad at all.  The pool area was very nice (and the pool was heated), the hot tub was also very good.  The pool bar had drinks available and the hotel itself was nice and updated.  However the staff really made the stay exceptional, they went above and beyond to accommodate us and really made us feel like valued guests.    We had a suite facing the gulf side for the first night, it was nice and the sunrise was gorgeous.  For the other nights we moved to an ocean facing…

title: Mixed feelings
review: We truly appreciate the awesome feedback and thank you for taking the time to write such an informative review. I am delighted that you enjoyed your experience enough that you extended your stay. Our location is truly the right place to be if you desire a beach get –away. When longing for gentle, temperate seas lined by sandy shores, our beach is especially made for you. Sunshine and breezes during the day then sliding into the evening with spectacular sunsets and time around the fire pit. It does seems as if you truly enjoyed some of the areas offerings, there are many restaurants to choose from. It is our associate’s favorite part of their job, interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. It is always a delight to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated. The Sheraton Club does offer many perks to our SPG members from breakfast to Happy Hour. Thank you for being a SPG member. We hope you will think of us the next time you plan a beach get-away.

title: Nice stay
review: Recently stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key for 3 nights at the end of a tour of Florida.  Really liked this hotel although the view from our room wasn't great just looking into a corner of the rear car park but didn't spend much time in there so didn't spoil things too much. Hotel has access straight onto the beach from the pool area to the rear and what a beach it is thoroughly enjoyed just walking along it and collecting sea shells which we brought home with us. There were signs warning of sting rays when walking in the sea but didn't see any on the occasions we walked the beach.  Nice area at the top of the beach near the hotel with sunbeds and hammocks where you can while away a few hours. Across the street there is a small mall area with restaurants and shops providing plenty…

title: Friendly staff
review: I was at the hotel for a conference and really enjoyed my stay. All of the staff were very friendly. The hotel is right on the beach. One downside is that there aren't many restaurants nearby. I eat at the sandwich shop/deli and had the soup/salad bar ($8.50 all you can eat) each time. Nothing fancy, but every soup that I had was very tasty and there were enough add-ons to make a good salad.

title: Great location. Nice beach and pool
review: Although we thank you for dining at our Island Grille, a five minute walk will take you to the Shoppes of Sand Key there you will find several options; The Columbia Restaurant, which is known for their authentic Spanish cuisine, it is the best in fine dining and also has a separate casual food area.  Backwaters which is a local casual restaurant serving lunch and dinner, Maggie May’s and Dunkin Donuts great for breakfast and Al & Stella’s which is authentic Italian food. There is also the Marriot which serves all three meals. I apologize that you were not made aware of the options available. I am pleased you enjoyed our associates they are efficient, caring and genuinely friendly. Hopefully you will return to explore all our area has to offer.

title: First time visit.... will go back
review: We stayed here for a four day weekend. The rooms were very nice and the location was perfect.  The hotel was right on the beach and the pool was very nice to hang out. Views of the beach were good from our room. There are a couple of restaurants walking distance from the hotel. We used Uber the whole weekend and it was only $5.95 to get from the hotel to Clearwater Beach. We would definitely stat at the Sheraton again.

title: perfect stay.
review: I always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their comments with us especially when they are as positive and as informative as yours. The view does promote relaxation and we are always pleased to share the gifts of beauty and  tranquility Mother Nature has surrounded us with. We will look forward to your return visit.

title: Fifth visit in less than four years
review: We used to go to Clearwater every year in the 90's and early 00's staying on North Beach. This is our first time back to Florida since 04 and the North Beach was now out of our price range. This did us a favour as the Sheraton was brilliant. We drove up from Disney and arrived early about 1ish our room wasn't ready (which was fair enough as check in is 3) but the front desk staff took care of our luggage pre checked us in and directed us to a great local bar. The room was good with views over the Gulf (see photo) and serviced every day to a good standard. Plenty of  soft towels (very important) and free coffee for  the coffee maker. The beach at the back of the hotel was suberb we used the cabanas 3 times ( great sunsets) and the staff were helpful and friendly. Both the pool…

title: 6th birthday weekend
review: I gave this resort the high ranking I did based on the amazing staff alone. They truly made our weekend amazing. My daughter turned 6 and we were surprised by a birthday cake from the staff. She felt so special. The rooms were small and bathrooms are tiny. Great for simply resting your head. Loved the beach front!

title: Stay away!
review: It is our associate’s favorite part of their job, interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. What a delight to read that they succeed in making your families stay a special memory and especially for your six year old, who should truly be made to feel as special as she is. Yes we are an unpretentious hotel, a clean and comfortable place to come and relax while enjoying fun at the beach. Swim in the pool, build sandcastles and maybe spot some Dolphins at play. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Great resort for a family
review: The customer service at the front desk is the worse that ive ever seen. From the front desk clerk to the general manager. My roo. WAS on the 8th floor untill the worthless front desk clerk(s) decided to place an entire family including very young children next to my room. This family proceeded to spank their children and cause such a raucus that prompte my plea for them (fron desk) to do something about it. The best they could do was to downgrade me to the fifth floor. All the rooms have double adjoining doors. So if You ake the mistake to stay here, please be prepared to listen to every conversation that takes place in the adjoining room.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: I am very concerned that you experienced the issues noted, it is definitely not the genuine service we strive to deliver. Pease accept my most sincere apologies for this negative experience.

title: Awesome Beach
review: This is a wonderful resort for a family with young kids and teens.  Loved the private access to the beach and the heated pool was nice even in November. They provided free beach toys, balls and towels for the guess. The rooms were decent and well appointed.

title: Not up to normal Sheraton  standards
review: If you want peace and quiet at the beach then  this hotel should not be on your list, no mention when we booked that the pool bar is under reconstruction with noise all day long then to add insult to injury they had a Jazz festival who took over the whole hotel.  I have stayed in many Sheratons but never experienced anything as bad as this, air con  in the rooms is horrendously noisy and uncontrollable, and because of the position of the hotel very few rooms  actually have a sea view and most overlook the car park areas.  The hotel is also not in the best location  situated out of town although there is a trolley bus and it is walkable at a stretch.   Give this place a miss if it's peace and quiet you are after there are far better hotels for the same price in the main…

title: Fab location and pool area
review: I do understand if you came for a tranquil, peaceful and relaxing vacation and we failed to meet your expectations. Especially at that particular time, unfortunately there would be no way to inform you in advance as you booked your room through a third party. The Sun Coast Dixie Jazz Festival which has been with us for the past 26 years is always the week before Thanksgiving and is very popular. Like any musical event there are times it can be a bit loud. It is group of people of different ages although the majority of them are over 60. They enjoy the music of word famous musicians and are personally not disruptive. Concerning the noise due to the repairs on the Poolside Café. The repairs were unavoidable due to the damage caused by hurricane Hermine. It was a bit of wait with permits and contractors which made us unsure when that would happen. We did our best to control the noise as much as possible. Still that is no excuse for you having to endure all of that disrupting noise. When we realized both events were happing at once we did try to compensate by offering the use of the cabanas at no charge to take our guests away from the noise. Being on the shore line you are totally away from any of those noises we are trying to escapee from. We also had permission to offer our guests the use of the Marriott pool which is a 5 minute walk. Being away from the activity of Clearwater Beach is actually a positive for many of our guests. They enjoy being in-between both worlds. We are at most times a truly very tranquil Island. I also apologize for any inconvenience the noise from the air conditioner caused, I hope maintenance was called and that was quickly adjusted. We do hope you will return to the area even if not to visit us.

title: Nice Hotel!
review: Booked for 3 days for our honeymoon. Pool area and beach are beautiful. Hotel is dated. Main bar is very dated. Staff very friendly. Good access to public transport. Quiet area. Stunning views. Little shop is very convenient.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Congratulations! We are delighted to hear that all you’re dreaming and planning for that very special day became a reality. We thank you for choosing to spend your honeymoon with us on our tropical island. relaxing days and fun evenings made just for the two of you. It is a great area with much to do … Breathtaking views and awesome sunsets which make for beautiful memories. Yes! The hotel is older, it is clean and comfortable and we renovate daily. We will look forward to your return, perhaps on your first family vacation!

title: not spg standard
review: I stayed here for a few nights on vacation. I was on the first floor, they have their own little "everything" store where you can buy meds, food, coffee and even alcohol! It was nice I visited that store almost daily for things. They also have several restaurants. One of them, I can't remember the name of, but it's at the entrance when you walk in, had a very delicious breakfast buffet and some of the most friendly service I've ever encountered!   The ocean is a loooong walk from the hotel. I mean, a long walk...so make sure you have everything you need when you go out because if you forget something, trust me, you won't want to double back for it once you finally make it to the ocean. Watch out for stingrays. One got me in the foot unexpectedly (no words for the pain…

title: A comfortable hotel in a good location
review: My wife and I stayed here in a run of the house room for two nights (11 and 12 November 2016).  This was the first time we had stayed on the Gulf Coast of Florida and we were not disappointed.  The Sheraton is a comfortable hotel right on a beautiful beach of fine white sand.  Our room was comfortable with all the amenities we needed and more.  Although there was a choice of restaurants we used Rusty's exclusively firstly because breakfast was served there (we had vouchers) and secondly the restaurant offered a very good value buffet in the evening.  We thought the outdoor pools were quite small for a hotel of this size and always seemed crowded whenever we passed by so we did not use them during our stay.  Car parking was good and it was refreshing not to have to pay a "resort…

title: Another Nice Stay at Sheraton Sand Key
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. It is here on the West Coast of Florida you will find beautiful beaches, awesome sunsets, and friendly people.  It is a place that allows you to kick back and relax. We do have a talented and award winning culinary staff. I am pleased you enjoyed our Hand Carved Prime Rib of Beef buffet. You are correct we do not charge a resort fee for exactly the reason you mentioned, you only pay for the amenities used. Our pool is standard size although a larger pool is something we hope will planned in the future. We are proud of our associates their exceptional service and personal touches ensure you stay is the experience you anticipated.

title: Amazing long weekend
review: My wife and I had originally stayed at this property 9 years ago for an anniversary. We returned for our 33 rd anniversary last weekend. No regrets at all. the staff are excellent. From reservations, front desk, housekeeping, bellmen. Every single person you deal with will be helpful, courteous, and professional. We paid extra for Club Room priviledges, which we enjoyed greatly. The Club Room up on the 9th floor had mixed drinks, beer, wine hors derves each evening, and coffee and minor breakfast items in the morning. If I had one suggestion, it would be to add a few more selections to the AM offerings.  The ocean view king room we had was very nice. The bed was fantastic. Sunsets on the balcony were awesome to view.  I think next time I would opt for the bay view to save a few…

title: Amazing hotel on the beach
review: I do hope on your walk down memory lane some new memories were found. We appreciate that you choose to return and delighted it was not a disappointment. It sounded as if you planned this special get- away perfectly from the Sheraton Club to the beautiful room view. Our associate’s favorite part of their job is interacting with our guests. They truly enjoy having empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make you our guests stay memorable. It is a tropical paradise; beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. Relaxing under a Cabana with cool beverages right next to you what a great way to spend a day. Enjoying the smell of salt water and the gentle roar of the waves which all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. I did share your comment on breakfast with our Executive Chef. The Hot tub awaits your next visit and thank you.

title: Weekend getaway
review: This Sheraton resort is top notch. Everyone is friendly and very helpful with anything you needed. Our gulf view room was amazing and no need to travel to go see the sunset when it was perfect from our balcony!!! The sweet dreams bedding was fabulous and we tried two of the three restaurants where the food and staff were awesome! Definitely a great resort for this couple who celebrated our birthdays and soon to be 40th Anniversary!

title: Sheraton Sand Key Resort
review: We were married at this hotel, sight unseen, 2 years ago! We loved it so much we returned to celebrate our 2nd anniversary! The staff is EXCELLENT! The pool area is great, and they offer an outdoor bar, hammock area and beach volleyball. It's a short walk to the waters edge where you can rent umbrellas and chairs. Conveniently located between Clearwater Beach and Indian Shores with cute shops and restaurants within walking distance! Definitely more return visits in our future.

title: Clean and fun
review: We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their experience. You covered it all … It is a great place to make memories, and enjoy some relaxation therapy or just explore the area and have fun. We thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key to celebrate your anniversary and hope you return for many more.

title: enjoyable place to stay
review: This is the second time I visited this hotel. Always clean rooms and friendly staff.   Nice pool with towels available.  Close to the beach as well. Loved the hammocks out back as well. Restaurants are very good too   Free parking and access to the trolley.

title: Awesome place on the beach
review: We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your loyalty. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. It is very rewarding to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. We upgraded the pool last January, it was gratifying that you enjoyed the pool area and you were able to relax in our new hammocks. Hopefully you were able to enjoy the fire pit and a beautiful sunset or two. It is an expansive beach and if that is what you’re looking for we provide plenty beach games and amenities to keep you entertained. The Executive Chef does his best to ensure there are many selections for you to choose from, I am pleased you enjoyed your selections. Free Parking is one of our many amenities; parking and having the choice of many inexpensive options such as two different trolley systems enables you to explore the area and makes doing so relaxing. No looking for places to park, the ability to see the sights without the worry of driving and the option to get on and off when you choose. We look forward to you returning for your third visit and many more after.

title: Very nice.
review: Came here with wife and 2 young grandchildren.  Purpose was to visit aquarium (which was 10--15 minutes away).  Found this staff to be extremely friendly, courteous, helpful and all around just nice.  Gave us tips, information, and helped with our visit to the aquarium as well as other places. Wi-Fi available throughout hotel.  plenty of self parking, plenty of beach.

title: Beautiful beach resort
review: The hotel is an older building but is quite lovely. Rooms are clean and staff is nice. Pool and beach activities are fun. Pool bar is a great addition too. Beach is gorgeous and huge! Perfect spot if you are wanting to stay close to Clearwater beach but not around the chaos.

title: Sheraton Sand Key Clearwater
review: Our goal is to provide our guests with a memorable and enjoyable experience from start to finish and we are delighted to hear that we succeeded. It is an Island Oasis quite, relaxing and Mother Nature surrounds us with much to do. The pool bar, the fire pit or just taking a little nap in our hammocks all are here for your enjoyment and as you said Clearwater Beach is just over the bridge if you’re looking for more entertainment. We hope you will come see us again.

title: Great choice for Clearwater
review: My wife and I spent three days at the Sheraton Sand Key as a mini-staycation at the end of October.  We really enjoyed our stay, nice rooms, good experiences at all three restaurants, great pool area/fire pit,  dry nice club room and good service by the staff all the way around.  Was a great getaway for us and we definitely recommend the resort.

title: Exellent Hotel
review: So pleased that your stay was successful. October and November are one of the more perfect times to be here on the beach, rainy season is over … nothing except sunshine and breezes. Traffic is light, pool is usually not crowded and the beach is even more private than usual. As always our associates are here to be attentive to your every need. You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings, shell collecting all truly showcase Florida’s natural beauty! It is also the busiest time of the year filled with Festivals; may it be Super Boat Races, Stone Crabs, October Fest, Jazz, blues or local craft shows, you will find something to do. Thank you for your recommendation

title: Huge, impersonal...
review: A family holiday following on from a week at Orlando - so some R & R was required!  Can't fault the hotel. Great service, great staff throughout and an amazing location that provides the best of both worlds - a lovely clean pool area and it's own beach. The facility provided just what we needed: enough to keep the (young) kids occupied to give mum & dad some time, and a relaxing pool area and quiet beach (I'm sure the time of year helped).  Food was great in the main restaurant, provided enough options for the kids and was reasonably priced.  Not much to do in the evenings but only a short trip to Clearwater South Beach with transport from the hotel sorted that. Would return.

title: Not a 4 star room
review: Stayed for 3 nights at the end of October. The reception area and staff were very welcoming. Room was clean and ok, bathroom was very small and not very modern.   First night were were woken by drunk guests in the hall shouting at 2am in the morning. At 6am someone in the hotel ran a bath. The plumbing was so noisy i got up to see if our bath was running. At 8am building work started on the outside of the building chipping the render from the outside.   This continued for the other two nights.   If we could have checked out early we would have done but the payment had already been taken from my card.   Really disappointed with the resort. Wish we stayed at tradewinds at St Petes beach for the same money and a first class resort.

title: Nice hotel.
review: Please accept our apologies for having missed the opportunity to impress you. I am sure when you booked your stay at our resort you had high expectations of your experience. Due to all the disturbances you encountered I can see clearly why we failed to reach those expectations. I realize this apology does not resolve the issues or the inconvenience you experienced. Hopefully you enjoyed the activities of the Clearwater Beach area and some relaxing time on the beaches of Sand Key, along with the amenities that were offered.

title: Weekend get a way with friends
review: We requested and received early check in which was nice.  The desk staff was friendly.  The bathroom was quite small but that was fine.  We ate in the restaurant Saturday evening and had the seafood buffet.   The ambiance was pleasant.  We enjoyed the pianist.  However, the service was quite slow, and the food was a little disappointing for the price.  The pool are is pleasant and the hotel is close to the beach which is nice, though the beach is full of shells.
