title: If you are looking for oceanfront this is NOT the place for you!
review: It is gratifying to read that you received an early check-in. Delighted that your experience with our Front Desk was positive. Their goal is to provide you with an effortless and positive experience. Our large beach gives you a true tropical Island experience. The shore is far enough from the hotel and the main road leaving the noise of the outside world far enough away. Clearwater and Sand Key can only be reached by bridges. Still we are close enough to restaurants, entertainment and shopping.  Leave your cell phone in your room and you will be guaranteed the only sounds you will hear will be your own thoughts, the waves crashing on the shore, or the birds squawking at each other. I am pleased you enjoyed our new pool upgrade, hopefully you caught a nap in one of our new hammocks. It is concerning that you your service or the food was not the experience anticipated. I can honestly say with our award winning culinary staff and our professional servers it is not the usual comment received I apologize, I do hope that we will have a chance to redeem ourselves at some stage, when next you decide to visit

title: Excellent
review: We went down for Frenchy's Stone Crab Festival and used our time share points here.  LOVED it.   Our two children (11 & 7) will love it when we come back down.  The beach is awesome compared to the crowded Clearwater beach scene by the pier.  And let me tell you, we found MUCH better shells on this side of the causeway. The beach is a slight walk from the hotel but you will be glad when there is a wedding outside so you can still go to beach and have fun.  I could see why people complain about the pool during warms months it would be WAY to crowded.  However, when we were there,  it was in low 80's and not many swimming.   It was not our favorite Sheraton for romantic getaway, but was very nice and kid friendly.  Cant wait to take our kids back!!  We did not eat at hotel. …

title: loved it
review: From the moment we checked in with Tony we felt a valued customer. Our room was beautiful, we paid for a harbour view  and we weren't disappointed with views of the Gulf. Roberta in the restaurant was fab you felt like her friend from the beginning. would love to go back sometime.

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: You are truly a valued customer, it is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care, with both associates their friendliness is sincere. Their goal is to provide you with an effortless and positive experience. I have shared your comment with Tony and Roberta and they thank you. We do look forward to another visit.

title: Lovely Stay
review: I love this hotel.  Has a resort feel and yet so friendly and beautiful.  The food is amazing and the house staff for 700 wing is amazing.  They really go out of their way especially the black woman whom I forgot her name.  She welcomed me each morning and I felt she took a special care of me and my room.  I will say the woman who is at the restaurant with the salad bar who seats you is just so rude.  To deal with her daily was painful.  I love the staff at bar and welcome desk.  You cannot go wrong here

title: Nice place
review: “Welcome to Our Island” It is beautiful and we are delighted to be able to share it with you. Thank you for your comments, our associates are pleased to provide you with an effortless experience and they are genuinely friendly. They enjoy being here to ensure your stay is the experience you anticipated. Thank you for the kind remarks regarding the cuisine. I have also shared your comment on your room attendant and his staff with the Director of Housekeeping he will ensure she gets your message. Although we do have many different trainings that our associates go through in regards to customer care that incorporate sensitivity training it seems good judgment was not used. I am sorry you were not pleased with the hostess, it has been addressed. Please except our apology and I appreciate that you did not let it ruin your stay. We're always working on new ways to better care for you.  We do hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back.

title: Great experience overall, recommended!
review: We stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key as our friends were getting married here, so didn't pick the hotel personally, but it was a lovely, relaxing stay. The rooms are clean & the staff are all very friendly and attentive. I would say the pool is a little small but you have the beach right next to the hotel so it was never that crowded. We did go in October though so not sure what it would be like at busier periods.  We had breakfast at the hotel on the first morning as we didn't know the area that well & we didn't eat there again. There is a lovely little diner a short walk away, opposite, which cost us about $15 - $20 for 2 of us, at the Sheraton it was $36 but I guess that's to be expected. I was a bit disappointed with the buffet breakfast and as a vegetarian, there wasn't a lot…

title: RETIREMENT
review: I TRAVELED THIS MONTH ON MY RETIREMENT CELEBRATION. We traveld the flordia Western coastline visiting beaches. I planned to get to Sheraton on Thursday, but arrived a day early. Jane House at the front desk, help make my stay great and put us in same room as the later reservation. It was flawless, easy, and very much all I could have asked for in a resort. Thanks and I will be returning soon. Beth

title: Sheraton sand key stay
review: Retirement a whole new road in life to explore, congratulations! We are delighted you decided to include us in your journey of celebration. It is gratifying to read that your experience with Jane House was very positive. Her concern is for your satisfaction and her attention to detail is obvious and shows that she genuinely cared. Her goal was to provide you with an effortless and positive experience it seems as if her goal was reached. Knowing Jane she took great pleasure in doing so. I have shared your comment. We all look forward to a return visit.

title: Great service
review: Entire 4 day stay was met with genuinely helpful smiling staff. My display goods were misplaced in mail room. I felt like i had they whole hotel on my side helping  me. Daily pleasant interactions. Of course maybe the beautiful beach as your workplace helps too.

title: Oct 19, 2016
review: Our experienced Sales Department impeccably plans your event and ensures that it is done in a warm and comfortable environment. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Their favorite part of their job is interacting with our guests and that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make you our guests stay memorable. It is always a delight to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated. Truly ending a busy working day by relaxing on the beach, sitting around the fire pit and catching a beautiful sunsets is definitely a plus.   We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Your comments have been shared. Hopefully you will consider coming back and staying longer for a more leisure stay.

title: Pretty hotel on the beach
review: Went to the hotel for dinner with my kids. Mainstay staff was great but our waiter Eric was so great. He was so pleasant that my kids even were happy the whole time. He made sure that everything was great and seemed to care about our experience there! Would recommend not only the dinner but the staff!! Great experience... thank you Eric!

title: Just ok
review: Even after making our reservations 5 months in advance, as "GOLD" SPG members we were given a room with a "harbor view" or so they said..... The room was on the eighth floor. We had requested a king bed as well and yet received two queens. The room was listed as an executive suite. There were 2 balcony doors. but the balcony was not very pleasant as we seemed to be right over the dumpster area. The harbor view was there, past the roof top, across the street. The furnishings were adequate but not all that comfortable. The room was "almost" clean, except for the Cheetos that were stuck to the pillows on the couch.... YUCK! The cleaning staff were friendly & pleasant to deal with.

title: Not bad... but could be better
review: As an SPG Gold member your loyalty is very important to the Sheraton Brand resorts and hotels. I apologize that you were disappointed in the location and view of your suite. There is no excuse for the condition in which you found the couch pillows, it is definitely not the genuine service we strive to deliver. Your comment was shared with the Director of Housekeeping and has been addressed. We will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance.

title: Gorgeous hotel
review: Unfortunately apparently our double room request didn't make it through to the hotel from our travel agent (although it did at all 5 other hotels on our trip) so 2 queen beds it was.  The size of the pool and pool area is too small for a hotel of this size, they need to build a second!  The beach area is nice but cabana hire is a bit expensive. Good volley ball and tennis courts, you can use the equipment for free.  Drinks at the pool bar were good but a bit pricey.  Rooms pretty clean but in need of a refurb.  Generally not bad but I wouldn't return.  If you do visit, go the Columbia restaurant 2 mins walk down the road, it is brilliant!!

title: Another Fantastic Holiday !
review: I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. Your reservation was based on room options chosen through your travel agent.; anytime you book through a third party you should call the property itself and confirm the type of room, view or bed in your case.  Do that soon after the reservation is made and before check-in. You could have request a reassigned room at that time, we would have been pleased to relocate you if possible.  You will find at many resorts these charges are included in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to do that, and only charge for usage of cabanas should the guest so choose to use. The Cabanas do not belong to the hotel they are a concession so we do not set the prices. We do ensure the prices are in line with other cabana concessions in the area. Another pool is on the top of our wish list also. The renovations of this hotel are ongoing. It is our loyal customers that inform us of any issues that need to be addressed. There are many wonderful restaurants in the area the Columbia being one We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service.

title: Wedding Weekend!
review: We stayed here in September 2016 for 2 night's while we renewed our vows for our 25th wedding anniversary.  Hotel was clean friendly and rooms very spacious with lovely views.  We were given a complimentary bottle of champagne by Cydney on reception for our wedding anniversary and enjoyed our stay so much we added an extra night.  Would definitely return and wouldn't hesitate to recommend.

title: Thank goodness there were restaurants!
review: My partner and I chose this hotel because there were no on site parking charges.  A lot of the hotels nearby charge daily fees for parking.  The service we received at this hotel was 10/10.  All of the staff said hello and were happy to help if we needed it.  Joey the restaurant manager at Rusty's was particularly friendly, and also one of the receptionists that helped us out with an owing toll fee of $0.75.  Our room was clean and spacious, but the bathroom could've done with modernising.  The sink was outside the bathroom, the toilet and shower were inside the bathroom.  Everything was clean though.  The hotel had 3 restaurants.  Rusty's Bistro, Mainstay Tavern and a Grill restaurant (which we didn't visit).  Thank goodness these restaurants were here.  We ate at the hotel 3…

title: Nice!
review: We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time relaxing on the beach and enjoying our associates concern for your satisfaction during your time spent at the Sheraton Sand Key. Their attention to detail is obvious and they genuinely care. Your remarks regarding the cuisine is appreciated. We do have a very talented culinary staff, they are very creative. I have shared your comments with them, they thank you. I am sorry you were disappointed with the surrounding high-rise condos, they are recent additions. There is only one other hotel on the island of Sand Key across the street. I realize tall buildings are tall buildings no matter if they are condos or hotels. That is a true picture of our beach it is 10 acers of sand, you usually can find plenty of privacy there. I truly understand the kind of peace you are looking for. We are still very much an Oasis from Clearwater Beach. I do hope some memories were made

title: Nice little escape
review: We spent 2 days after hurricane Mathew, for that reason I think the beach it wasn't as clean as always, but the pool was really nice, and the have toys and swimming diapers for free. The breakfast it's ok! And the rooms very clean!!

title: Great hotel with brilliant staff
review: We appreciate the nice review. Sand Key and the Clearwater area are known for their exceptional beaches. The recent hurricanes did effect the beach; with Matthew it was just the wind and surf and wave action, storm surge can stir up the sea bottom and suspend particulate matter to the shore. It was back to normal quickly. Our associates enjoy taking care of our guests whether it be with interaction, assisting you with needed services or ensuring the hotel is clean and comfortable inside. they truly care.  We're always working on new ways to better care for you and look forward to your next visit.

title: okay hotel
review: We traveled from only about an hour away to spend the weekend with family for a wedding. The staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. Our room was not ready for check in at the specified time and we were given vouchers for free breakfast the following morning, as well as an upgrade to a better room. Rooms were clean and comfortable. The only complaint I would have would be the temperature felt warm during the middle of the night unless we turned it down extremely low. Pool area was nice and we spent a few hours by the tiki bar, which had some yummy drinks to choose from.  We will definitely be back to stay again!

title: best resort ever
review: So, the price of this place is amazing! it has SO much to offer. This has the BEST beach of all of clear water.. The restaurants were great, breakfast was great, room service was awesome! we even ordered a move. The pools and hot tub were amazing!  The room was on the 8th floor, it was insanely beautiful; we could see in most directions. Waking up to that view was unforgettable. We will be staying here every trip. They had extra toys for the kiddos and extra towels. We brought our then 2 year old. He loved it! We stayed for a week, and every day was incredible...  The service was AMAZING. Every staff member was impeccable and went out of their way to help. We did not have any issues. The room was clean, all the guests were nice, the drinks were great. They have babysitters to…

title: Labor Day Weekend
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with your child and each other is a perfect break. Welcome to our Paradise; forever memories can be made here watching the Dolphins playing or to see the Pirate boat on the horizon. Building sand castles, finding treasures on the beach and ending each day watching the sunset. That is a great suggestion about the shade on the playground, I will share it with the appropriate people. As an SPG member, your loyalty is very important to the Sheraton Brand and our hotel. We hope you will experience another stay with us on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.

title: Tagged along to my husbands conference
review: We came down to Clearwater for Labor Day Weekend. Unfortunately this was right during and after Hurricane Hermine. The major drawback was that the entire beach area was flooding. This was in no way the hotel's fault, but it's worth mentioning that hotel staff confirmed that the beach is flooded after all major storms. Only a small strip of sand was left standing. In order to get there, you had to wade through waist deep water for about 150 meters. The hotel itself is very nice, and set up well so that you would never have to leave the resort. The size of the pool was really fine. I'm not sure why people on here have complained about it. The staff were excellent! We were upgraded to an ocean view suite, which was a beautiful and large room. We will stay again, but hopefully…

title: very nice spot!
review: It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Their goal is to provide you with an effortless and positive experience, it seems they were successful. I can appreciate your comments about the beach itself. Flooding does happen with heavy rainfall, hurricanes, and tropical storms when Gulf waves come on shore... Storms can pack a powerful punch, with soaking rain, when this happens we usually pump 24 hours a day. Prior to Hurricane Hermine we were informed that no pumping or vehicles would be allowed on the beach by the Florida Department of Environmental Protection Agency. Due to the storm winds, tidal surge and extensive rainfall, there was a need for all beach activities to halt until the shoreline could be inspected for turtle nests and subsequent assessment of loss or damage.  Though this was established fairly quickly and beach services were able to resume, we were not allowed to pump the water off until permits were issued by the state. Though we would have preferred to have this occur sooner. Thank you for your understanding and I do hope some great memories were made. We look forward to your next visit evening

title: Below expecations
review: Got her one day before hurricane Matthew.  Easy check in and nice room.  Plenty of space, comfortable bed. Small balcony with "partial gulf view" - across the parking lot and tennis court.  Since the room was paid for by the company, no complaints.  But if you are expecting a view, beware.  This is the closest hotel to the sand key park, but the beach is very wide and the trek to the ocean would be a long walk with little ones.  We were here during a hurricane do I can't say much about the pool or poolside bar. Sadly we could not use these facilities although they were open most of our stay.

title: Had fun getaway to the beach
review: We wanted to take our one year old daughter and five year old son to the beach before visiting Disney World. He loved the balcony he could go on to look at the beach and pool.  The staff were very nice to us and the room was nice.  We enjoyed the pool area and the music they would play.  The only downside was the hike you had to take to get to the beach.  If we didn't have to carry her, it might have been ok, but quite a ways when carrying a child.  We saw beautiful sunsets, sunrises and a rainbow in the sky for our last morning there.  As crowded as Clearwater is (we didn't know what to expect as we haven't been here before), this resort made you feel like you were not in a too crowded area, which we liked.

title: Relaxing time
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with your children and each other is a perfect break. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches and beautiful sunsets. They give you that being on a true Island experience. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Good Hotel
review: Beautiful hotel with the most attractive atmosphere, clean, luxury and everyone very,very friendly and professional. Always comfortable going to every single spot at the property.  The pool and beach....incredible. We recommend it 100%plus. Is great for EVERYTHING. Bussiness,Family reunions, Weddings, For couples to relax or just to get away from stresss.  Thank you!!!!

title: No way, not if you want to relax...
review: Thank you! Our associates delight in interacting with our guests they relish having the empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will influence our guests stay and ensure it is memorable experience. It is always a pleasure to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated; comfortable and clean inside and a tropical paradise outside. Beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. We appreciate the referrals. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Enjoyable
review: Good hotel, trolley bus stop outside of hotel, staff very friendly and helpful, Carpets could do with a clean in bedrooms, bathroom one of the smallest we had in our tour of america.  Nice to have a balcony and views of sea and beach with beautiful white sand, pool a bit on the small side but beach right there if you want it. Still took towels away even when you hang them up as requested to do, if you did not want them changed. Nice to get a bottle of water free in room. very comfortable bed.

title: I want to like this hotel but to much room for improvement
review: My partner and I spent 12 nights here / my sister her husband and her son plus my brother and his partner also booked into the hotel as my partner and i were getting married ( not at hotel) / there are positives but also negatives about this place -   The positives Nice large and clean resort on the beach   Rooms are large and cleaned every day  SOME staff are lovely and helpful , esp reception staff   Jolly Trolley stops right outside and takes you into Clearwater for $5 return   Rustys ( main restaurant ) serve a lovely evening meal   Heather ( staff) serves in mainstay tavern ( bar in hotel) and is lovely and friendly   The negatives  They do not provide umbrellas over the sun loungers at pool ! Not great and I've never been in a hotel that doesn't provide shade at EVERY…

title: great hotel
review: Congratulations! I do hope many wonderful memories were made on your special day. We thank you for being an SPG Preferred member and for your loyalty to the SPG program. I am sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. Yes! The area itself certainly is paradise; beautiful beaches, awesome sunsets and great views. Our associates are commitment to providing you and all our guests with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. I am pleased you enjoyed many of our associates and have passed on your comment on to Heather. The associates are empowered to take initiative to make decisions that will enhance your experience with us. Thank you for the positive comments and I will address the negatives; please accept our apologies for the unprofessional service you received from Eric. Although we do have many different trainings that our associates go through in regards to customer care which incorporate sensitivity training it seems good judgment was not used. Concerning the water we encourage housekeeping to take notice of how many guests are in the room, with that being said you should have gotten two bottles a day and you are correct they should have been in your room for the duration of your stay. We continue seek to keep a balance between guest experience and restaurant operations. Hopefully next time the menu is updated they will included the coffee. We're always working on new ways to better care for you.  I am confident all these issues have been addressed.  The trolley is an inexpensive, stress free and fun way to see the area I am glad you experienced it. We appreciate your review.

title: Dixie Hollins High School 50th Class Reunion
review: We always enjoy our stay at this hotel.  We arrived early and it was a joy to find out that our rooms were ready.  We were travelling with family and they had never stayed at the hotel before.   Our rooms were clean and as requested overlooking the park. Now for the negative - It was a shame that the staff do not warn you about the mosquito problem.  The beach was in a bad state still waterlogged, but you could walk through it even though it was knee deep and warm. The hotel were using pumps to drain this and really didn't affect us that much. The park was closed due to the hurricane damage. We went for a walk around the gardens in the hotel and was bitten to pieces by mosquitos, so much my sister had to go and see a doctor as she had a severe reaction.  We ate at rustys bistro…

title: Great place at great price
review: Your loyalty is very important to the Sheraton Sand Key … thank you. It is gratifying to read that your experience with our hotel and our associates is always positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that we genuinely care. I do understand when you are enthralled with an experience you are excited to share that same experience with family or friends. When it then turns out to be so disappointing because they did not experience it in the same light it leaves you with a feeling of nonfulfillment. I do apologize, although we must blame it partially on Mother Nature.  I understand those mosquitos were annoying, uncomfortable and very disappointing for your family. We have had the property treated for the mosquitos on a regular basis and will continue to do so. Sand Key Park which you are aware of boarders our property had the same issue and is treated by air, which also has benefited us. As you know mosquitos usually are not an issue to the degree it has been these past months. It was an unfortunate oversite that no one communicated this issue to you before you went to the gardens, it has been addressed. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Great Food AT A HIGH SCHOOL CLASS REUNION
review: We had a large group, about 250, everyone enjoyed the facilities. Conference rooms, banquet halls, hospitality suite, poolside there was a fire pit, tiki bar, live steel drum entertainment. Beach was wide area well kept and clean. They arranged a certain amount of reduced rate rooms for our group. The banquet meal was great salmon, roast beef, and all kinds of sides and a fruit and dessert bar. Great dance floor area. No complaints were heard and everyone had a marvelous time.

title: Loved Everything About It
review: I may not have chosen the best time to visit the Sheraton Sand Key following the recent hurricane but I still loved the place.  The staff was wonderful, the rooms are clean (I even saw an employee vacuuming the elevator threshold), and the location is perfect!  Yes the pool is a little small but the beach was underwater due to the storm so that was where everyone went.  There is only a 50 yard or so walk to the beach so I imagine under normal circumstances the pool is just fine.  Nate in the Tavern was awesome.  I threw all kinds of specialty drinks at him and he did a fantastic job.  The resort is positioned a little weird so I don't think any of the rooms really look directly out at the gulf but they all have balconies and you still have a wonderful view.  Plus, there is a…

title: September 2016 holiday
review: Thank you!  We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us -- and may we apologize for the "bad manners" of Tropical Storm Hermine.  That was not expected, for sure, and we're sorry it prevented you from having the full beach experience.  We appreciate your comments and compliments (we'll let Nate know you said hello) and are so pleased you hope to be back with us again!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Great stay
review: Just got back from our holiday to Florida had an amazing time and the Sheraton was a lovely hotel.  Perfect location right on the beach although there was a little walk to the beach that was fine for us we didn't mind that. We payed €27 each day for two sun-beds all in which was fine with us as we preferred to be by the beach than the pool, Sam sorts you out with your sun-beds he was such a lovely fella helped us loads with advice on which restaurants to visit and things to do etc.  Personally I wouldn't have breakfast at the hotel as lovely as it was we found it little bit pricey we went to maggie mae which is 10mins walk from the hotel lovely little cafe they do breakfast and lunch.  The beds in the hotel are amazing we found it hard to get out of them in the morning we had…

title: It was a pleasure
review: Thank you!  We're delighted you had such a lovely stay with us on our "private little island" of Sand Key!  We so appreciate your kind words about our staff.  They are so eager to please each of our guests and make their stay memorable!   So glad you enjoyed our fabulous Sheraton sleeper beds -- we believe you need a great night sleep after all that hard day at the beach!    Nothing would please us more than to learn you're already planning your next visit.  We know you travelled a long way, but we do love seeing our guests again.  Please at least stay in touch on our Facebook page for news!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Sheraton Sand Key Resort - Great Choice for a Vacation Base
review: Loved it here.  Nice pool.  Great room.  Best bed and pillows ever !    Staff were great.  Recommend Maggie Maes for breakfast.   Also the lobby bar does excellent food at very reasonable prices, actually cheaper than outside the resort.

title: Nice Hotel
review: We spent 3 days in that Hotel during our trip through Florida. Unfortunately we had rain and storm for 3 days, therefore we could not do any great activities outside.  The Check-in was fast and very friendly. We got an upgrade to a beachview room.  The room itself was ok and offered everything what was needed. The only thing what i need to get used to was the semi-open-space batchroom. There was a 3 qm room with toilet and shower and outside of this room there was the sink... Besides the room everything was very nice, they even offer and self-laundry service which is not that common in a 4star Hotel.  We did not utilize the restaurant and therefore cannot say anything about the food, but i can say that the prices of the inroom service/restaurant were reasonable and not…

title: Great location, nice rooms!
review: This was our second trip to Sand Key Resort this summer, the location is great, away from the crowds of Clearwater Beach. We only left the resort one time, everything you need is right there. The walk to the beach was not a problem, quite a distance but a nice walk. There are not a lot of ocean front rooms, the first stay we booked ocean front but did not on the second stay hoping for an upgrade since we were staying mid week. There were none available, so be sure to book that if that is what you want. The pool area is nice, the pool may be a little small for the size hotel but the grounds are beautiful with plenty of lounge chairs. The hot tub is great as well. There is also a fire pit which was nice to sit around at night. The Mainstay restaurant was our favorite, Justin was a…

title: Weekend getaway
review: Thank you for writing about your recent stay here.  We're so pleased you've become a repeat visitor and we appreciate your compliments about the resort in general.  Please know that guest feedback from reviewers is shared with our top managers so we will address the comment about the Turtle Bar staff.  Our goal is that each and every team member provide all our guests with courteous, friendly service.  We'll look forward to your next visit so you can see for yourself how things will improve.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Everything you need in one place
review: Hotel was nice looking and secluded. Staff was friendly. The beach is not as nice as the public beach. Due to the Hermine storm, the walk way to the beach from hotel was flooded about a foot of water. Beach has lot of shells and secluded. Has nice gym with nice view of the beach.

title: Great beach, great hotel.
review: Went for a short weekend getaway. We live about an hour's drive away but it felt completely seperate from everything. The private beach is quiet and clean and we could bring our alcohol. Many options for drinks from the Turtle Bar by the pool to bottles of various wine and spirits at the convenience store near the lobby. Restaurants on sight had good breakfast and dinner buffets and were reasonably priced for high end and casual dining. You can order from a menu also. Staff was pleasant. Many other shops and restaurants 5 minute walk from the resort. kid friendly. We will definitely go back!

title: Very good
review: Nice middle of the road hotel.  A little dated but no problem at all with staff and accommodation. Visited a week after hurricane hermiane, everything running as normal just a little standing water towards the beach. Was given a good impression of all being dealt with.

title: Room is nice, pool area is super busy.
review: Thank you for your kind words and for taking time to write a review about your stay with us.  Yes, Tropical Storm Hermine did cause a bit of trouble so we're sorry if the standing water was an inconvenience to you in reaching the Gulf.  We're pleased at your compliments to our staff -- everyone sincerely wants each guest to have a fine experience here.  Sure hope you'll return when you're ready for more sun fun.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: One of best beach in USA
review: Our room was nice we had a gulf view from our room.  The room was nice.  It is a long walk to the gulf if you want to go into the water.  The pool area was unbelievably busy.  People were ordering pizza from off sight to have it delivered to the pool, taking up lots of space.  Could barely move 2 feet in the pool without more people in your way.  Party was difficult, saw people parking in the lot, walking through the lobby to go use the beach (maybe the pool as well since a key card wasn't required).  They did not have the resort sticker in their window that we were given at checkin and they were pulling their own beach chairs out of their trunk.  Having to park at the back of the lot while they were taking up space at the front was annoying.  They walked in at the same time as…

title: Beautiful resort directly on the Gulf of Mexico
review: Thank you so much for taking time to write a review following your stay with us.  We're pleased that overall you enjoyed your stay and accommodations but we can understand your chagrin that apparent outsiders used up space in the pool and gained access to our beautiful beach.     We do have passkey access at the entrance walkway but, as you say, some boldly just walk through the hotel and there are times when our staff are unable to identify them.  Please know that your feedback will help us once again address this situation with our top staff because we do have our facilities strictly for the enjoyment of registered guests.  May we also thank you for being a valued member of our Starwood program, and please let us close by saying you and your business are very much appreciated here.  We hope the next time you seek a beach holiday you'll stay with us again and let us earn your trust back.  We want your vacation to be one of complete enjoyment.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Fabulous Location, Beautiful Beach - Nice for Families
review: Property might need updates but overall everything works well This is best location the beach is great chairs umbrellas for $25 a day Next to pool several volleyball courts from there a quick 5 minute sandy walk to beach For quieter rooms go 7 floor and up

title: Nice Visit
review: We stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort on Labor Day 2016, just after Hurricane Hermine had hit Florida. While it was not a direct hit to Clearwater, there had been heavy rains and high winds just 2 days before we arrived. Except for some localized flooding you would never know. The staff were completely up to speed and the resort was operating well. We enjoyed the pool and the beach. The room A/C was nice and quiet and the beds were comfortable. We would visit again.

title: Good Resort, Excellent Service
review: Thank you so much!  We're glad you stayed with us and are sorry that Tropical Storm Hermine prevented you from having the ultimate beach experience.  Your comments on our staff and resort amenities are so appreciated.  Our goal is that you - and each of our guests - leave with wonderful memories.  Thank you for sharing yours and we hope to see you again.  Please stay in touch on our Facebook page if you'd like!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Solid 4
review: We chose to spend our vacation at the Sheraton Sand Key thanks to some free nights from a recent SPG promotion. The resort is situated about a mile from the busiest part of Clearwater Beach, over a bridge in a quiet area called Sand Key. The location is plus/minus depending on what one is looking for - it is definitely quiet and secluded, and the hotel features a large beachfront. However, it is almost a certain short uber ride to reach any meaningful area of restaurants/nightlife. We didn't mind the short car rides to Clearwater Beach and even walked one night. There are also scheduled trolleys available.  The resort ground was excellent. It has a large beach with umbrellas/chairs rental (daily charge, cash only). The beach was large enough to feel like we had all the privacy…

title: Wow!!!
review: First off, may we say again, "Happy Anniversary" - and we're honored you chose to spend your special day with us!   We were delighted to offer those touches that would make your stay even more memorable, and we thank you for your comments and compliments.  Regarding our closeness to restaurants and nightlife, while we do have our on-site award-winning Rusty's Bistro on site and there are at least three restaurants across the street, the public part of Clearwater Beach is across the beach, a few minutes away.  For customer convenience, the Jolley Trolley does come out to our rear lobby entrance.  We also thank you for being a valued SPG member and hope you'll be back with us again for many more special memories.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Eh
review: Very nice hotel and all personnel is friendly and accommodating. The two reasons why I would not give 5 are: breakfast (overpriced and service was not particularly good); access to the beach (not sure if this was because they had a major tropical storm two days before, but the access to the beach was across a shallow lagoon, yes, you need to walk in a water about knee deep to reach the beach).

title: THERE IS NO BEACH
review: They claim to be beach front.  The beach is about 4 football fields away from the hotel.  I guess it is beach front since there is nothing in between.  Almost impossible to drag a cooler that far.  I would never recommend the hotel.  Finally, I would never recommend Clearwater beach.  We last visited Clearwater Beach about 20 years ago and it was great.  Today, it has turned into HOTEL CITY.  The growth has KILLED to the entire area.  I will never return

title: Sun, seashells, excellent beach, and clean room!
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience staying with us and in Clearwater.  You are correct; Clearwater Beach has seen dramatic changes since you were here twenty years ago.  Some like the growth and the newness and some prefer it as it was back then, with smaller resorts and a more intimate community feel.  As for us, we're sorry you felt disappointed because truly, we want every guest to leave with good memories.  There actually is no deception on our part - our beach does front the Gulf of Mexico.  Indeed, it is a bit of a haul but had you asked for assistance, we could have helped.   As you can read from many other reviewers, they enjoy the fact that we have a private beach, uncrowded and very peaceful.    We and our Starwood family thank you for your business and hope future vacations, wherever you go, will be more to your liking.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Wonderful Groomed Beach
review: I stayed here for three days for a quick beach visit. I very much enjoyed my stay. The hotel was clean, the staff was very friendly, the outdoor area around the hotel (pool area, firepit, etc. were very nice), the beach was beautiful and uncrowded, and I loved seeing all of the stingrays! There were a lot seashells which was great too! I'd also like to say the staff was very friendly. Restaurant in the hotel was just ok. It was very nice to be on Sand Key!

title: Excellent
review: How nice of you to share feedback from your recent stay with us.  We do appreciate your compliments and are so pleased you left with good memories (and maybe a few shells for keepsakes?)  We do hope you'll be back with us again and invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook page.  We love hearing from our guests!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Nice Overnight Stay
review: Our room overlooked a roof and air conditioning units so the balcony was useless.  During the early evening everyone else was out on theirs and even with our door shut it was extremely noisey. Later, the noise ceased and sleeping in the comfy bed was very easy to do. The resort had decent restaurants, a lovely, though completely filled by children pool, and a great groomed beach that was perfect for walking, dipping in the Gulf and beach volleyball.  The gift and sundry shops were very sparsely stocked so shoppers beware.

title: Our favorite place
review: Excellent customer service  We got married here in 2008 and from then on we come back atleast 2 times a yr. if we come to celebrate our anniversary they always send us a nice treat, upgrade our room if possible and accomidate us as much as possible. We were just there celebrating my sons birthday and my birthday and we we moved to pool view and surprised with cake and candles. My son loves it so much he prefers to stay in the pool and not go to the beach. The beach is a bit of a walk but well worth it this place does not dissapoint. When it's time to leave I always hate to but look forward to our next stay.

title: Anniversary Retreat!
review: What a wonderful review -- thank you!   You know we love seeing you come back for your special days and we're thrilled your son now considers us among his favorite places!  It was our pleasure to help you celebrate and we hope you'll be back many times in the future.  And...we hope you're in touch with us on Facebook.  We love staying in touch!  Darla Napoleon

title: Great sand
review: Wow, where do I start. Between the wonderful friendly service at the door, or one of the many restaurants or on site bars too choose from.  This place is amazing to just have a weekend getaway.  Perfectly secluded yet right at the beach the Sheraton is a wonderful place to stay and get away.  Our room was absolutely on point, not a stitch out of place and the level of cleanliness is exactly what you are looking when you go out for a long 3 day weekend.  So much more to say about our stay, but it's a must visit for yourself.

title: When you really want to getaway
review: You just made our day!   Thank you for your lovely words and compliments -- and for sharing your special day with us recently.  Belated Happy Anniversary!  We're thrilled you left with great memories and enjoyed our "private retreat".  We're all about making special memories and are glad we accomplished that with you.  Are you on Facebook?  We'd love to stay in touch...and hope you'll be back ASAP!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Great Hotel
review: Just over an hours drive from Orlando this is heaven. Plenty of car parking spaces. Friendly & very welcoming. The layout is really logical and it's very easy to find your way round the huge building. Rooms were spacious and had everything  I must say,the staff are really exceptional,especially the gift shop lady who was there a long time and the funny friendly barman...hic Clearwaters a lovely place made so much nicer by this hotel. Well done Sheraton group

title: Huge property
review: Everything was clean and the staff definitely took great pride in it. The elevators and the floors that lead from the elevators to the beach/pool area could have been a real mess but they really kept after it. The beach area was a little walk but beautiful. The pol area was crowded and full but there were plenty of chairs and tables. There are lots of families with kids but everyone was respectful and just having a great time. The pool bar was good. The bartenders nice. Our room was large, clean and lots of amenities. The only two negatives we encountered was first, the food at the pool snack bar was a little limited. It would have been nice to have more options. Secondly, the walls in the rooms were really thin. We heard everything that our neighbors were saying. Granted, they…

title: Nice Resort
review: Thank you so much for detailing your recent stay with us.  Feedback from guests helps us since excellent customer satisfaction is our ultimate goal.  We're glad you enjoyed the beautiful beach (yes, it is a long walk!), pool and other resort amenities.  So sorry you had noisy neighbors!   Yes, the pool bar menu is limited since most guests nosh on snacks, saving their appetite for a great meal at our award-winning Rusty's Bistro.  Hope you had chance to try it!  Thanks again - we'll look forward to having you back - and we'd love to keep in touch on our Facebook page!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Okay
review: The hotel itself is clean and tidy, and the staff were very friendly and accommodating especially Ester in the shop. Some of the pictures in the brochure make it look way more attractive than it is in reality. The bathrooms are tired and in desperate need of an update. It was also difficult to sleep at night as the air conditioning unit sounded like an aircraft taking off. The food at the hotel was great. On the whole a nice place to stay after a hectic 10 days in Orlando.

title: Short Break Paradise
review: Thank you!   We're so glad you stayed with us following your vacation time in Orlando.  You're right, we are a great place to unwind and relax following treks around the fabulous theme parks!  We appreciate your comments and feedback and will share your staff compliments -- everyone here wants each guests to enjoy a fabulous vacation!    We'll pass along your feedback on the a/c and bathrooms -- management does value opinions of our guests as our goal is to provide superb guest experience.  Thanks again for staying with us!  Darla Napoleon

title: Amazing Resort!
review: This Sheraton was very clean through out; even the elevators. We were here for an overnight business function.  Evening buffet was very good with a varied selection of foods to chose from.   We had breakfast at the in-house restaurant. The Sand Key eggs Benedict would be a do-over!  The hotel is right on the beach; the pool, however, is the size of a small sink!

title: Brits guide to Sheraton Clearwater family of 5 do not judge this hotel by its cover
review: We booked this hotel based on the advertising,photos, pool beach  Let me begin we arrived on a Saturday afternoon, to a plush very inviting clean reception area/foyer luring you into false thinking  After reading previous reviews the first thing we enquired about was the sleeping arrangement for 5 they said it would cost another $10 for a rollout bed, we said when booked the room we booked for 5 people so surely this should be accommodated for and no extra cost. So if the room could not accommodate 5 people this should be made clear at time of booking  Anyway we made our way to the room, it's very dated & tiny for 5 people I would say it is more suited to 2 people the Bathroom is the size of a telephone box,literally,the sink is outside of the bathroom. Room overlooked the car…

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: Thank you for taking a moment of your time to provide us with your candid feedback. It is disappointing to learn that your stay did not meet your expectations. I can understand your disappointment with the size of the room and the bedding. While we do allow maximum occupancy of 5 people per room, it is a personal preference regarding adding the rollaway bed or even adding an extra room. I can understand your frustration with having not been given these options ahead of time and am sorry that these choices were not relayed to you at the time of booking. Please know we do our best to accurately photograph/represent the resort as it is never our intent to mislead. Unfortunately, though we renovate constantly, we are unable to change the size of the room. We have also looked into several options for re-designing the bathroom, however, we have not found a solution that does not take away from the rest of the room.  Rest assured these items are always on our mind and we do hope that someday we will find an improvement. Please know your feedback will be used to continue and improve our overall guest satisfaction.  Thank you again for sharing.

title: Disappointed, but nice location
review: This was a short vacation for my mom and I, but one that my mom's been waiting for for a long time. We stayed in this hotel for the first time 40 years ago, and for the past few years, my mom has talked about going back to Sand Key. Don't get me wrong, we've been to Clearwater Beach and stayed in several other hotels on Clearwater Beach over the years, but my mom has always had a love for the Sheridan. Why? It's the ONLY hotel on Sand Key with the best view of the sunset.  From the time we pulled in, the staff was extemely attentive and friendly. Carlos at check-in was awesome. I mentioned to him the Google reviews about the charge for Wifi, and he gave me the code to use it for free. Since all I carry is my phone, I had no need for it the entire time I was there. My phone had a…

title: Breakfast on the beach!
review: Your review just made our day!   We're absolutely thrilled that your mom (and you) had a wonderful time while here.  We did have to laugh - because you're right, your Mom must have done a double take when she saw how much our beach has "grown" compared to what it was back then!  Your comment on the coffee bar will be shared with management.  It's because of customer feedback such as yours that we can fully understand the needs of our guest, so thanks.  Yes - please tell your Mom we want you both to come back soon.  Forty years is too long between visits!  Thanks so much again, and glad you left with great memories.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Beautiful hotel in a quiet area
review: I really struggled how many stars to give. I really want to give 3 but want to not be detrimental to their rating. It was a nice stay. It was clean. It had comfortable beds. It was a nice location! But considering the price we paid, it lacked on some of the comforts of home that would have made our stay better. There were no microwaves, in rooms or in a central location. The service gentleman offered to take our plates to a microwave in the back but he would have to do it. They do not allow you to use the luggage rack, and I know it's a nice hotel and they want to serve you, but some husbands do not like to use bell hops and would rather make numerous trips from the parking lot than use a bell hop. Again, nice stay, but kind of old fashioned from other hotel chains that make…

title: Great Service and Good Food
review: Stayed here for 2 nights/3 days over a weekend. For how old the hotel is and the amount of foot traffic in and out of the beach that it gets, the hotel staff does a great job in maintaining this place. In addition, this is one of the only resorts under SPG that I have been to that doesn't charge a resort fee. The parking is complimentary too so you can't go wrong choosing this hotel if you're in Clearwater Beach. We were out by the pool by 10AM with margaritas from their bar outside and rented the cabanas that are available on the beach. At night we ate at the buffet inside the hotel and it was surprisingly very good. They even had someone playing the piano... while people ate buffet. It really made us feel like we were somewhere far and not in Tampa. Great hotel and will…

title: Fantastic!
review: Thank you!   We appreciate your compliments and are so glad you chose to stay with us.  You're right - not having a resort fee plus offering free parking is a big plus for visitors coming to Clearwater Beach.    We're glad you enjoyed our award-winning Rusty's Bistro!   Our executive chef and his team want to "wow" every patron, so thank you.  Most of all, we're glad you'll be among so many guests who can't wait to come back.  We'll look forward to having you.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Girlfriends Weekend
review: The staff is so helpful, housekeeping does a very good job...rooms were very clean.  The pool area is great and the attendents were engaged and did a great job with the kids!  10 out of 10.....can't wait to go back!!

title: Nice Hotel
review: How nice of you to take time to compliment our housekeeping staff.  We'll share your words with them because they want each guest to have a great experience - and a spotlessly clean and well maintained room is important!  We're thrilled you're ready to come back -- just what we love to hear and we'll look forward to seeing you again.  If you're not already on Facebook with us, please join us.  We love staying in touch with our guests!  Darla Napoleon

title: Wonderful!
review: Had a girlfriends weekend here. Concierge service was very accomadating, friendly, went over and above. Room was comfortable, coffee in room ( not so good). Walk to the beach was very long! Pool, bar and fire pit were great. Staff was very friendly. Breakfast Buffett was accomadating, fresh squeezed OJ and oatmeal was delish. My friends and I will stay again.

title: The good, bad & ugly mosquito problem here
review: The room and hotel itself was very clean and quiet with usual amenities.  The room had a very small fridge and no microwave but if you need something warmed up, the tavern downstairs will gladly do it for you.  Okay, for the bad & ugly.  The beach at the resort is very rocky with tons of broken shells.  Your best bet is to take the trolley to the beaches at the Pier 60 area where the sand is fluffy & white with much less broken shells.  It is sooo much better.  Next time we will stay at a place in that area.  This resort has a huge mosquito problem.  You cannot sit outside or swim at night & enjoy yourself because the mosquito's swarm all over you.  Its was very very bad.  The hotels response was to get some waterproof repellent. Ummm, no.  They should be more proactive in…

title: Lovely hotel for a largish group.
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your review on your recent experience at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. I sincerely apologize that your stay was so disappointing as it is our goal to always effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Not meeting our goals and your expectations is very concerning.  Our area has received an inordinate amount of rain over the past 2 months and we are aware the amount of wind and rain has taken a bit of a toll on the condition of our beach and surrounding area. The beach has had a lot of shells deposited onto it lately, and though a shell collectors dream, I can understand it being a nuisance to some as well.   We have also been in contact with the Pinellas County mosquito department in response to the mosquitos and have had additional treatment done to our property as well as the adjoining Sand Key Park. The safety, comfort and well-being of our guests is a top priority at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and I am so sorry your stay was marred by the mosquitos. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the area and will be returning to Clearwater Beach.  Again, thank you for sharing.

title: Bitten
review: Little things mean a lot.  Very clean room and bath, amenities included the usual shampoo and conditioner, but added shower gel, a shower puff, and a package of Q-tips and cotton balls.  Staff went above and beyond from the bellmen (Chris) who offered to park my car because it was so hot, registration, housekeeping and food service personnel.  Food and drinks were very reasonably priced.

title: One of the better Sheraton hotels...
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay during your business trip - and we hope next time you'll be with us for pleasure!  We'll pass on your compliment to Chris.  He represents so many of our staff who work hard to ensure every guest has a wonderful experience.  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook - we love hearing from our guests!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Very nice hotel, property, and staff!
review: As soon as we walked into the hotel lobby I was bitten by a sand flea. Continuing throughout the day I got bitten. However as it reached the evening we went to the beach and I got bitten 68 times. I understand the hotel can do nothing about this however they could have made a warning.  In addition we booked a room for 5 and when we got in the room there were only 2 queen beds which meant one of had to sleep on the floor.

title: Lovely setting for a birthday & father's day
review: We stayed one night at  the Sheraton for our daughters 4th birthday which also tied in nicely with father's day to celebrate with the hubby. Upon arrival we were told our room wasn't ready yet and waited for a total of 30mins. The receptionist was apologetic and offered us a complimentary breakfast for the next day. The hotel pool is great for children and qa

title: Great location
review: Thank you!   We're honored you chose to stay with us to celebrate your daughter's 4th birthday -- and Father's Day as well!   Your comments are appreciated and we're so pleased that you enjoyed the services we have to offer.  We hope you'll be among so many other families who bring their children back for more beach fun.  We enjoy seeing our little guests grow up - and some of us have been here long enough to remember when the parents of today visited when they themselves were children!  Thanks again!  Darla Napoleon

title: Bitten to pieces
review: We stayed for a week in this hotel and had a family room, which comprised of two American queen size beds (UK king size) and very small ensuite facilities. We were told we had a view overlooking the harbour which also a view over the roof of the conference suites. However, the room was spotlessly clean and made for a good base for the week. Facilities include a pool bar, lounge bar, a daytime restaurant and a more formal restaurant. There are 3 conference rooms and during part of our week two of these were being used and the building was incredibly busy.  The pool includes a smaller children's pool and there is a jacuzzi. The pool was very busy but my son loved the inclusion of kids games - he came away with 4 medals! There are beach volleyball nets and tennis courts and they…

title: Nice location
review: How lovely that you took time to write about your family's stay with us -- thank you!  We're so glad you found what we offer here at the resort to be just what you needed for a wonderful beach vacation - and how nice to hear your son won 4 medals -- brilliant!  Hopefully you'll return to see us again, even though we know it's a long way for you.  In the meantime, please stay in touch on our Facebook page -- we do enjoy hearing from our treasured guests!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Nice time
review: Nice hotel, polite helpful staff but unfortunately our visit was severely affected by being bitten to pieces by sand fleas and maybe mosquitos.  Apparently after several days of rain the week before, the rainwater had collected on the stretch of sand at the back of the hotel and encouraged the bugs.   We got bitten around the pool and on the walk down to the shoreline. I realise the hotel can't control nature but if we'd known we wouldn't have walked on the beach in the evening.My poor daughter had 65 bites after just a couple of hours staying at the hotel.  The next day we kept away from the hotel and went into Clearwater and up to St. John's pass where we had no problems with bugs.  Also rather strangely we booked for 2 adults and 3 children (10, 15 and 17), they gave us a…

title: Disappointing as a Starwood Property
review: The only nice thing about this hotel is the staff. The hotel is in desperate need of a refresh and some new pictures to show how it really looks on the website. The pool was smaller than the one we have at our house, and crowded! The beach was a short walk, past standing water on a football field size area that had pumps running continuously. The pumps weren't draining anything so I'm not sure why they were even there, other than making noise. The beach was pretty much covered in small shells that you had to walk through to get to the water. You could rent chairs and an umbrella for $25, they are not supplied for free! Oh and they close that at 6pm! When we got to the beach around 5pm they told us they close at 6pm and walked away picking up chairs. So I guess get there earlier…

title: vacation
review: As an SPG member, your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood Hotels. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback; it is truly appreciated. I was so sorry to read your experience was so disappointing. As a loyal Starwood guest you have come to expect a level consistency across the brands and I am sorry we did not live up to our brand promise.    Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience.  Our beach has grown over the years as the sand that erodes from points south collect here due to the Jetty at Sand Key Park.  I hope you found its beauty and tranquility were worth the walk and I am glad your daughter enjoyed the water. We are very aware that the weather has taken its toll on our beach and we know that it has played a part in the disappointment of our guests.  Our area has received a tremendous amount of rainfall and the beach just will not absorb more at this point. We do attempt to clear the water by utilizing pumps, however, this environmentally approved process tends to be slow.   We have found over the past several years that our business has changed and we are experiencing more vacationers than convention attendees.  We realize this does mean more guests at the pool area and have been exploring solutions to this change in our business.  We are very excited about these solutions as we know it will enhance the guest experience considerably.  It is feedback such as yours that leads us to these improvements so we thank you for sharing your thoughts.  Again, I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended.  On behalf of our entire team, we apologize for not reaching your expectations.

title: Great location and hotel
review: Hotel was nice. Our first room had little ant like bugs in it, but staff was super helpful and got us a new room right away.  New room was great. No breakfast provided so you are on your own. Restaurant at hotel but it's a little expensive. Pool area is very pretty and relaxing with a fire pit.  Beach was ok, there were prettier beaches elsewhere, but if you want privacy and peace/quiet this is nice. Nothing close so you have to drive to anything.

title: Busy and dated hotel that does try and mostly succeeds, as long as you stay out of room 215
review: Thank you for providing feedback on your recent stay with us.  We're so sorry that your room had insects in it and we're glad our staff was able to relocate you immediately.  We immediately had our contractors on report to do another treatment.   So glad you enjoyed our beautiful beach and peaceful resort setting.  Hopefully you'll join us again for more fun in the sun.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Disappointing-If you are looking for a luxurious getaway, this is not the hotel for you
review: Stayed at Sheraton Sand Key for on week.  Hôtel is in good shape and nice and clean.  The pool is nice but too small for size of hotel and amount of guests.   Good food at hotel, albeit naturally expensive.  Service was good and no complaints.   Nice to have free parking.   Location is great. It's not as busy as Clearwater beach but only a 5 min drive away. Good central location to explore the area.   Yes the walk to the bean is a bit longer but it's like a Par 3 only about 200 yards from beach. It's a nice and relaxing walk and only takes 3-4 minutes. Tough to complain about waking to the Gulf on white sand!  The sand is a bit better at Clearwater beach as it is more powdery but no issue here.   Last couple days couldn't go to the water with kids due to active stingrays. But I…

title: Nice property on the beach
review: The Studio Suite is very comfortable for a family of four. It has two queen beds and a separate lounging area with sofa and a small dining table. The pool was closed during our stay but were offered access the another hotel’s pool which was across the street.   The hotel is on the beach but it’s a short walk up to the ocean.  Cabana rental is available from a vendor for $25. Towels must be picked up from the hotel as you walk to the beach. Since the pool restaurant was closed a “buggy service” was made available for service on the beach.  The hotel also has 3 tennis courts available plus nets for beach tennis and volleyball on the sand.  Rackets, balls and beach toys are available for borrowing from the attendant or concierge desk.   We ordered room service one night and tried…

title: The most amazing hotel i have ever stayed in
review: Thank you!   We're so pleased that you and your family stayed with us during your recent stay - and we also thank you for being a valued member of Starwood.    Our Studio Suites are perfect for families and we're glad you enjoyed the spaciousness as well as other resort amenities.   We hope you caught some of those beautiful sunrises from the Club Lounge -- and gorgeous sunsets from the beach at night.  Our ultimate goal is that each guest leaves with great memories and we do hope you'll be among those who return year after year for more enjoyment.   Thanks again.  Darla Napoleon

title: Ok
review: Have not stayed here for a few years now but the memories are still strong.  Simply the most luxurious hotel I have ever stayed in.  Rooms and facilities are amazing and the private beach is superb.  The staff are amazing and make you feel really special.  Hopefully we will return to this lovely hotel one day and relive the happiness again.

title: Favorite Clearwater getaway!
review: We loved reading your review - thank you!   What pleases us most is to know you are among those who've returned again for more beach fun - and that you enjoyed your entire experience.  Special thanks for commendation on our staff -- each person here wants all our guests to leave with fabulous memories.  We're delighted you're already planning to return.    If you're not already following us on Facebook, please do -- we love keeping in touch with our guests!    Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Short Stay
review: First time stay on business. Hotel is on south end away from the hustle and is near the residential/condo area. I was surprised it isn't true oceanfront. There is what appears to be a large tide pool area between the back of hotel and the beach where stagnant water was collecting and had to be pumped out.  Bugs. Couldn't really hear the waves from the hotel/room.  The front desk reps were very professional and each one I encountered was consistent in their delivery. The other staff however, not so much. The food at the restaurant was good. Room average, bath small.  Pool area was nice.

title: Nice hotel
review: This hotel was right on the beach. They also had a pool, a little on the small side but still was nice. My husband and I took advantage of both the beach and pool. They had a fire pit going. It was nice just to sit by the fire with a few drinks.  The one thing that really bothered me was that the hotel rented out half of the pool to a private party. There was no where to sit due to the fact that the party took up most of the area along with the lounge chairs.  The room was clean and the food at the bar was good. They made a great Bloody Mary!

title: Another wonderful stay.
review: Thank you for writing about your stay with us.  We're so pleased that you and your husband enjoyed our resort - and we we'll share your compliments on that great Bloody Mary.  We're sorry that you were inconvenienced by the private party taking up room by the pool.  Your comments are appreciated so we can share them with top management since our goal is to work toward complete customer satisfaction.  If you're on Facebook, we'd love to have you stay in touch with us.  And, we do hope you'll return when the need for sun and sand calls to you.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: BEST place to stay if traveling to Clearwater
review: Third year visiting Sheraton Sand Key.  We love the location of the resort. Easy  access to the beach makes it very easy with little ones. Granted it is a little walk to the shore line but we have perfected the walk over the years. (Bought a beach cart)  We also love that the beach is not over populated we can sit on our chairs and still have a clear view of our children playing with out a million other guest around them.   Lots of activities on site tennis courts volleyball nets, hammocks, fire pit, and a  play ground.   Short drive down to the pier or a 10$uber to avoid locating parking. On Friday and Saturday they have street vendors, performers and a outdoor movie. Sunset festival starts two hours before and after sunset.   Can't wait to our next visit.

title: Excellent
review: Thank you!   We love our repeat guests and it pleases us so much to read that you had another find vacation with us.  Your comments are appreciated and you are right,  our beach has plenty of room for all!  We hope you're staying in touch with us on Facebook to get ideas, deals and enticements to come back!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Beautiful, didn't want to leave
review: We stayed here at the end of July with 4 adults and LOVED every minute of it.  The hotel has been recently renovated and is done very nicely.  The rooms are spacious and clean and most importantly the beds/pillows are comfortable.  There were plenty of outlets for four people and I really appreciated the double mirrors outside of the bathrooms.  (makes it easier for four women to get ready!)  The pool and beach area were kept clean and the staff was always friendly. Most importantly, the beach is not as crowded as across the short bridge to Clearwater.  My group really appreciated the pool staff on 8/2, especially Matthew, for going above and beyond in customer service.  Matthew and the pool staff gave my friend a small birthday cake for her birthday with candles- how…

title: Quiet location, close to Clearwater Beach
review: Quiet location, close to Clearwater Beach . Jolly trolley easily accessible for ride to Clearwater. Housekeeping services weren't the best. Located directly on beach , quiet enjoyable atmosphere . Pool was nice as well as outside bar. Do need to pay for Wifi .

title: beautiful
review: Thank you!  We appreciate that you took time to review your stay with us.      Please know that your feedback is very important to us and your comments will be shared with our top management, including those about the housekeeping issues, because our goal is to provide exceptional service to every guest.  We hope you'll be among those who have come for business and return for pleasure. Thank you again.  Darla Napoleon

title: Beautiful:)
review: My husband and I were staying here for a medical conference. This is a very nice hotel. The room was very nice and had a comfortable bed, nice size and great balcony.  The staff are all very friendly and helpful. The beach is wonderful. The food was great and the layout of the hotel is easy to manage. I recommend 3 things to improve on at this resort....1 Please update the bath towels for each room and please update the towels for the pool/beach area. The pool towels are very worn and not smooth when you have a sunburn. 2. Please add more shops to the hotel....it would be nice to have more to choose from. It would also be nice to have some books about the Clearwater area for people to buy.  3. Please add another area for kids to have a game room, especially when it rains.…

title: Wonderful holiday in Sheraton Sand Key Resort, Clearwater
review: We stayed there at the end of july ,2 adults 1 kid. Just for 1 night,very nice beach.2 very nice restaurants,beach bar also outside. Its agreat place to enjoy the sunset:)) The only little downside is the little pool,too little for the size of the hotel. Was too crowded so we didn t get in there.very friendly staff! A hotel to recommend!!

title: Only for a night....
review: We spent 10 days at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort in Clearwater in June and had a wonderful holiday. While there were a few minor problems the staff at the Sheraton made sure that they were addressed and resolved quickly. It was our 41st wedding anniversary while we were there and we had a very special meal in the restaurant with excellent service throughout.

title: Great weekend Get Away
review: Checked in on a Friday night and stayed till Tuesday.  My friend and I took our 13 year old daughters with us.  Had a terrific time!! so glad we chose to stay here because Sand Key is less congested than Clearwater.  The hotel was immaculate and constantly being cleaned and serviced throughout our stay.  Staff was super friendly and helpful.  Best private breach with beautiful sunset views. Happy we paid extra for pool/Gulf view.

title: Great Hotel
review: I really liked this hotel. It had its own private beach with beautiful sunsets. The pool area was nice. Hotel's location is good. You can drive into the touristy part of the town with no problem. Hotel is clean and nice.  Very friendly staff.

title: This hotel has it all!
review: Thank you so much!  It always pleases us when first time guests let us know they've enjoyed their experience with us.  You're correct - we do have beautiful sunsets!   Also, the location does afford easy accessibility to other area fun spots - and more beach.    Our staff will appreciate your compliments.  Making our guests happy is their ultimate goal.  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook - if you're not already.  We love hearing from our guests!  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Nice hotel and amenities
review: This Sheraton is located in a great spot. Parking on site is free. The property is well maintained inside and out. The Sheraton offers something for everyone. The staff throughout the hotel are friendly and accommodating.  Nice room. Comfortable bed. Plenty of towels at all times. Starbucks coffee and teas available in your room. There is a 24 hour store on the premises that offers snacks, beverages, and other items.  The outdoor pool and its surroundings make it an enjoyable experience. The walk to the beach is quite a distance but ask for a ride. They will gladly drive you. Chairs and umbrellas are available on the beach for rental.  We ate at two restaurants and were satisfied. Whether couples or families, I'm sure you will enjoy your stay that feels more like a resort than…

title: Great Beach hotel
review: Thank you so much!   We're delighted to hear you that you enjoyed your stay here -- and we sure do appreciate your compliments!   You gave great tips to readers of reviews of what to expect when they get here.  We're pleased you enjoyed the resort itself, pool, restaurants and that wonderful stretch of pure white sand.   Our staff will appreciate your comments on their service since it is their desire that each and every guest receive top service.  Hopefully you'll be among so many others who return for more fun on the beach.  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook for photos, news and special events.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Great Place, really good Customer Service
review: We stayed in the hotel for a week with my wife and son. Everyone in the hotel was really nice and helpful. The hotel is great and the rooms really good. The pool is a litle small but fine, you have a great Beach and the water is great.  All the restaurants in the Hotel have a great service and food. For sure we will return

title: 3 Star Hotel with 5 Star Potential
review: How nice of you to take time to write about your family's stay with us -- and we do appreciate your compliments!  We want every guest to leave with good memories and we're glad to hear you're already thinking of returning.  Over the years, we have seen families come year after year and watched their children grow up.  Nothing pleases us more.  We hope to see you again.  Sincerely,  Darla Napoleon

title: Great place on Clearwater Beach
review: We had a really good experience here and I think that for the right price, we could have had a great experience.   The best thing about our experience was the location and staff. The location of the hotel is just far enough away from downtown Clearwater that you avoid much of the chaos surrounding the Pier 60 area. (Just a note on convenience, we had a much easier time getting off the key by heading south and crossing back east on 688 into the Largo area.) Also, every person we met from the front desk to the pool deck to the hospitality staff was friendly, professional, and helpful. That is worth so much in and of itself!!  That being said, our room was an average chain hotel room: - Our room was a little cheaper, so we had a nice balcony with a view of the bay (once you looked…

title: Pro and Pros and Pros
review: How nice of you to take time to write a lengthy review following your stay with us.  Thank you so much!  Please know that your comments - and that of other guest reviewers - are shared with top management - at their request - so that issues such as the room amenities not being fully stocked can be addressed and corrected.    You're absolutely correct in that the Suites offer a bit of luxury and extra comfort, especially for those staying for a few days.     We appreciate your compliments to Rusty's Bistro - our award-winning Chef Preston will be delighted you enjoyed his special cuisine of the sea.  Again, we thank you - and we hope you'll be among the many who are repeat guests. Yes - in the off season, it is a bit less crowded -- and, it is a great time to come.
