During our stay in Florida we used 7 hotels, this was a good standard, would be happy to stay again.

title: Great family hotel
review: Walks on the beach, it is the best therapy and workout. Breathing Gulf air, the sound of the waves is ever so relaxing and all improve your health and slows aging. We appreciate your comments, staying in seven different hotels does make you an aficionado. I am truly sorry you were unable to enjoy the fire pit. The atmosphere created by a fire pit is relaxed and informal, and the heat generated by the flame adds to the cozy ambiance. The perfect way to end an evening. We hope someday you will make a return visit and stay longer.

title: Wonderful stay!
review: My wife and I stayed here for 5 nights on points. We had our choice of view online when booking, we chose bay view, and the choice was honored at check in. Hotel was completely full over the weekend in mid April, however, by Sunday night it was much quieter and stayed quiet through the week. Check in was smooth, although I wish I had taken the bellhop up on parking my car for me (all it costs is an optional tip).  Our room was very nice. It appeared to have been very recently renovated. We saw employees pushing around TVs and paint so I think this is slowly rolling out to all rooms, however, unless you were really paying attention, you never would have known they were working on the hotel. Bathroom is very tiny, just a toilet and shower, but there is a sink and 2nd vanity…

title: Clearwater beach and Sheraton Sandy Resort
review: stayed  here for 5 nights recently with the aim of having a completely relaxing break after a 9 night stay on I-drive. We were not disappointed. Room was excellent, with good views of the gulf (we had requested this in advance so thank you!!!). Very comfortable beds and very clean. The restaurants were all very satisfactory. Room service was as expected. All staff were welcoming and pleasant to deal with. Biggest plus was the direct access to the stunning beach - a real plus. The pool was not overly big but was adequate with plenty of comfortable seating arranged beside the pool. The beach was very impressive and definitely worth visiting, especially for morning walks before the sun got too hot!!!

title: Recent Stay
review: Welcome to “Our Island” Yes we are always pleased when we are able to share a little of the tranquility we are surrounded by. In some of our lives there are moments when you can choose to pause, life long memories can be revisited and new memories can be made. They are far in-between for most of us, that is why perfect vacations are days cherished. It was gratifying to read your review.

title: Relaxing
review: We stayed here 4/12 to 4/15, we were on the 7th floor, gulf view and it was absolutely amazing.  The pool and beach were very nice and clean.  I booked through Expedia with a room rate of $300.  We wanted to stay and extra night, but were told it was $439.  They were not accommodating with offering a standard room to help lower the nightly rate so we ventured to Tampa where our last night stay was booked.  Were ready to head right back because the Tampa area was not what was advertised and would have if the weather were cooperative.    I truly wish if there is availability and a guest wishes to stay an extra night they would had better customer service and optionds available and yes, there were more options available because rooms were listed on expedia.  Also, Candi was rude…

title: A great vacation
review: It is always a delight to read that we succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated; a tropical paradise beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. Due to you booking on Expedia in advance it was much less. Being at full occupancy there were no standard rooms to book and that you were trying to book at the last minute the price was higher. Many times there are reasons that what is available on Expedia is in reality not truly available through the Sheraton Sand Key as those rooms are allocated to Expedia. It is unfortunate and happens often in March and April. I am sure it was disappointing. Although we do have many different trainings that our associates go through in regards to customer care that incorporate sensitivity training it seems good judgment was not used by Candi, I apologize. I have shared your comment with the Director of Guest Services to be addressed. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Nice Rooms, wait Staff and Sandy Beach
review: I had a heavy working week in Orlando and was recommended the Sand Key resort. As  an SPG member i though i should try a Sheraton Sand Key Resort. Made a reservation for two days but only stayed one day. The staff is excellent i was treated very well and got a great room with a beautiful view on the beach. The only disappointment was the pool. I guess maybe because the resort has its own beach, but this does not mean that they should have such a small pool which was full most of the time, and when it was not the water on the pool looked "tired". The other point that looked strange was that although it was a private beach, you still needed to pay for the beach beds near the sea for the price of 25 dollars. However there are some additional beach amenities nearer to the hotel and…

title: Some negatives but we liked it a lot
review: Let's get the negatives out of the way first; 1. The bathrooms are VERY (unacceptably) SMALL indeed and have the look and feel of a budget rather than an upmarket resort hotel.  2. The bedroom decor is dated - hessian style wallpaper on the walls and blown vinyl on the ceiling are well off the pace compared with newer similarly priced and equipped properties. 3. If you walk down to the gulf water's edge, the beach gets more and more covered in shells - not as nice as the white powder sand on neighbouring Clearwater beach.  4. It's expensive - we paid £1,150 for 4 nights.  Now the good stuff; 1. The bedrooms are very clean and the beds are very comfy 2. All of the pool and beach activities (beach volleyball, bag toss and tennis courts including equipment) are free of charge. 3.…

title: Nice hotel, very expensive beach hire
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I apologize for not reaching all your expectations. We are always working on new ways to better care for you. The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home. Wakening up in a “Sweet Sleeper Bed” to a beautiful Gulf view is defiantly a great way to start a day. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax and enjoy some fun in the sun. Unfortunately though we renovate throughout constantly we are unable to change the size of the room, we did change the wallpaper last year. We have also looked into several options for re-designing the bathroom, however, we have not found a solution that does not take away from the rest of the room.  Rest assured these items are always on our mind and we do hope that someday we will find an improvement. Please keep in mind our rates vary throughout the year as they are based on the season and on occupancy. That amount differs in the off season. You can watch for specials on our web site. Hurry back ...

title: A disappointment for the Sheraton brand.
review: Reception area and grounds are excellent. Swimming pool is small for the size of the number of guests, however, there is a very large beach with easy access into the sea. A buffet breakfast was included in our deal. The buffet was re stocked frequently and had a hot breakfast plus cereals and fruit. The selection of fruit was the same everyday although you could order a greater choice if you ordered from the menu & paid extra. The bar has a good choice of bar meals, there is access to the internet on several computers and large screen TV's. The restaurant serves good tasty food, with a good choice of meals and wines. The rooms were typical Gulf coast, slightly dated but clean; the rooms had all amenities ie kettle hairdryer, fridge, TV. We had a small balcony with a side view of…

title: Good but too far from excitement
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy Clearwater beach area. We try to ensure you have everything needed to enjoy your stay. You don’t need much to enjoy a day at the beach. Clear skies, warm weather, cool breezes not too many people and liberal amounts of sunscreen – that’s about it. It’s here that you can tune out the world, your worries and your obligations and just reflect. Seeing historic sites or markets is all well and good but sometimes you just need to strip it all away – you may not know how much you need a vacation like this until you actually get there and come away utterly refreshed. Most hotels on the beach do charge a resort fee we only charge for the amenities you choose to use. I agree the buffet could use some new ideas, I will share your comment with our Executive Chef> I do hope that you will return in the near future.

title: Great stay!
review: We are frequent SPG brand travelers, and this was overall one of our worst experiences  The location was good, out of the hustle of the Clearwater beach scene, but that was the only upside outside of the bellman who was awesome, helpful and engaging!  Disclaimer, we were there during Spring Break.  The hotel needs upgraded.  Our advance request for early check in was unavailable, but we were told the hotel would phone us when the room was available.  No such luck.  Rates were pricey, the upgraded "park" view a joke and wifi barely.  Both the woman at check-in later in the day, and the bartender in the main restaurant were flat out rude.

title: Karen
review: This hotel is a real mixed bag so I'll try and set out the positives and negatives. Positives: nice location away from the hustle and bustle of the main Clearwater stretch and set on a lovely beach. Outside space is nice and the beach activities are great. My children aged 9, 7 and 4 loved Coach Rhino who organised activities periodically during the day. The staff on the whole where nice but a special mention should be made of Roberta who served breakfast. Roberta was lovely and made us feel very welcome. The food at breakfast and the evening dinner we had once in the restaurant was good and value for money if you have children as under 5's eat free. The shop on site is very convenient and prices are not over inflated considering its captured market, and the shops and…

title: Totally overrated
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy Clearwater beach area.  I was also pleased that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! Steven Cutler (Coach Rhino) is our pool and Beach Activities Director he coordinates activities and provide resort guests an array of activities for guests of all ages. I am sure your children enjoyed all the activities the beach and pool offer.Roberta has been with us for many years and truly enjoys interacting with our guests and ensuring they are receiving great service. I will share you comments ... I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. We are constantly renovating, it is of course an ongoing project. We just upgraded the pool area and installed a new fire pit. Last year we did the entire hotel, it does get constant use.  Unfortunately there were no suites available that would have made all the difference for your husband and in your stay. It does seem as if your room had to be over crowded. Reserving of lounge chairs with towels is a problem and we continue to look for a solution. This is a first time complaint for us and I cannot understand how the frog got to the second floor. I really do not know what to say except I apologize. We have just installed non slip surfaces in the tubs this year. We do offer bath mats if you prefer you just have to call the front desk and they will bring one right up. Actually the wash basin being separate is more sanitary and convenient when you are trying to get a family ready at one time. I hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you so you can experience our resort in a suitable manner.

title: Unbelievable
review: We booked a hotelroom with a view over the see and paid a lot. We got a room looking over a roof top. A dirty swimming pool for a price 470 dollars a night. A real theft. What a disappointed. The restaurant is average, no decent bar.....brrr.. Charging around 50 dollar would be ok. One has to say the personnel was very friendly. After all they must see this as well.

title: A long walk and extra $
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood Hotels. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Hopefully you were able to see one of our breathtaking sunsets and enjoy the location. I apologize for your disappointment in the hotel.

title: Great place to relax and recharge!
review: I have stayed in many Sheraton's and this one far surpassed all others. Amazing room, view and staff. I would recommend this hotel. The amazing private beach, pool area and recreation things to do........not a dull moment. You can lounge or be as busy as you desire.

title: The only way to end a night mare vacation
review: I flew to Florida to visit my kids in college on March 20, 2016. By the early morning hours I was in St. Anthony's Hospital following a heart attack. The day I was being released my kids grandmother (my former mother-in-law) was being checked in and ended up in hospice the day before I arrived to this resort. As you can imagine I needed some down time and was looking forward to some Sun in the sand. Unfortunately, mother nature had other plans and it rain or was total over cast the three days/nights I was there and the small pool was full of small kids. That being said I want to thank the amazing staff at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort for taking such awesome care of me. The front desk staff couldn't do enough for me, Rosario took excellent care of my room, Gina from room service…

title: Nice hotel. Away from spring break mayhem.
review: It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Their goal is to provide you with an effortless and positive experience. I have shared your comments with all of our associates. My heart truly goes out to you. It is a tribute to your character that you can find good out of even the worst situation. I am pleased you will be returning.  You deserve to experience a vacation on “Our Island” the way it should be; surrounded by the beauty of Mother Nature and sprinkled with fun in the sand. We look forward to your return.

title: Perfect resort on a great beach
review: We spent a few days in Clearwater Beach during spring break. Typically we go  to St. Pete, but we wanted to try something new. The Sheraton SandKey is nice because it's south of the bridge for Clearwater Beach--separating it from all the crowds and craziness. It's a mile walk to the main town -- which we did to play putt putt one afternoon. For convenience, there's a small shopping center across the street that has a variety of restaurants, shops and even a small grocery store. Our room was clean and good -- it looked over the tennis courts. The beach is very wide -- it's about 200-300 yards from the hotel to the Gulf. The sand is more coarse than the powder white sand in St. Pete Beach. But the hotel has a bunch of volleyball courts-- which were very busy. The pool is…

title: Good for relaxing
review: Thank you for choosing Sheraton Sand key for this stay. It is great that you were able to explore what the area offers. The wide spectrum of our area beaches present many possibilities. St Pete is filled with historic charm, urban yet quaint, Clearwater is social and filled with energy and Sand Key is serene a placed to get relaxation therapy. It is truly the best of both worlds. There are many venues to choose from when it comes to dining. The strip plaza across the street offers three options for al fresco dining. Most of the hotels in the area do charge a resort fee, we do not.  We only charge for amenities used such as the internet and beach chairs. We renovate on a regular basis maybe the next time they renovate around the pool they will take your suggestions.  Please rest assured that we do take your feedback very serious and that we will do our utmost to better meet your expectations.  We hope you will come back and enjoy the tranquility of Sand Key.

title: Some rooms unsuitable for guests due to horrendous view
review: We've stayed here a number of times although it had been more than 15 years since our last stay.  I'm glad to report that things haven't changed ( and I mean that in a positive tone).  The hotel is still in great shape.   King size rooms are large, beds very comfortable, chair and ottoman and desk with chair.  The room includes a fridge - great for keeping water, pop/soda and fruit cool.   A nice sized pool - not the type for swimming lengths - especially when it's busy.   The hotel was busy for the week we were there but it never seemed over flowing.   There's lots of lounge chairs around the pool, the hot tub and on grassy areas and beach.   The ones closest to the pool do suffer from the eternal problem of early morning towel reservation but we never had a problem finding…

title: Excellent family vacation
review: This was our first time in Clearwater.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the hotel and enjoyed exploring the area.  We were elated at the level of professionalism and politeness by the staff we encountered throughout our entire stay.  Except for a very busy bartender who was "short" and a housekeeper annoyed that we weren't ready to have our room cleaned, everyone was beyond friendly!  Our hotel room was very clean and prepared nicely, daily!  The food was good at Rusty's.  The shop was very convenient and open 24 hrs. It offered quick breakfast items, liquor, cold beer and snacks.  The pool was crowded at times but the resort fully uses all the surrounding space to accommodate all the guests.  You can always find a lawn chair to relax.  We chose this spot because it is on the…

title: Great hotel and can cater for gluten free
review: Stayed here in March 2016. Lovely private beach and the pool is slightly heated. Room was great with each having a sea view. There are 3 resturants in the hotel and 2 of which can serve gluten free, I had a great turkey BLT sandwhich at Island Grill and at Rustys Bistro they even had gluten free pasta at the Easter buffett. Staff at the Mainstay Taven were very helpful and always cheery. There is a fridge in the rooms at no extra cost, aircon and even Starbucks coffee provided free of charge in the rooms.

title: Lovely and Peaceful Hotel
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. Yes this time of the year it is perfect if you are looking for a breeze there is usually one to be found here as we are between the Gulf and Intercostal. Our pool is heated year around at 82 degrees. We do try to ensure that we have foods that we can incorporate into all dietary needs such as your Gluten free diet. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; I am pleased that you were treated with the warm, caring and efficient attitude our associates are known to give. We look forward to your return.

title: Professionalism at its best
review: My husband and I stayed 3 days in February (2016) and we were overjoyed at the quality of this hotel.  The location is wonderful because you are very close to Clearwater Beach (you can travel there by trolley), but it is calmer and more peaceful.  The accomodations were good sized and very comfortable.   The outdoor pool was beautiful and it even has a private beach. We would definitely stay at this hotel again!

title: Good location but service improvements needed
review: Our goal is to provide our guests with a memorable and enjoyable experience from start to finish. Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise. Time at the pool, relaxing on the beach, nature trails right next door and plenty of relaxation therapy. Yes we are close to the activity with a no stress ride on the Trolley. When you finish playing you can come back to home here on “Our Island” and rest …

title: Great family friendly resort
review: This is our first time to Clearwater, FL and we will definitely be back. The Sheraton Sand Key Resort is a wonderful place to stay. The customer service is fantastic. Everyone is exceptionally kind and helpful. The resort and rooms are very clean and comfortable. The views are outstanding. We love the wide, gorgeous beach. I highly recommend Sheraton Sand Key Resort.

title: Spring Training - Spring Break
review: Sand Key and the Clearwater area are known for their exceptional beaches, Clearwater Beach was just voted #1 in the USA. Whether you are looking to have fun, relax and to make memories with the family or are you looking to enjoy all that Florida has to offer you have come to the right place. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Hope you truly enjoyed quality time at a wonderful & peaceful place.

title: Business Owner
review: I really enjoy this hotel.  I have stayed here twice with my son over his spring break. It is always clean and comfortable. Staff is very friendly. It is a short drive to Bright Field if you have an interest in seeing the Phillies at Spring Training.

title: Great hotel for the whole family
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is a fun place to stay while catching a Phillies Spring Training game or two. This is defiantly an experience you and your son will remember for years to come, sound like it is already becoming a tradition.  After watching a game thoughts of just coming home to the Sheraton Sand Key and cooling off in the pool or just laying around on the beach. Maybe a nap in a hammock. A little exploring for a local place to dine, relaxing around our new fire pit discussing your favorite play at the game. Then a good night’s sleep on “Our Sweet Sleeper Beds” We hope to see you next year same time …

title: Expensive but available
review: Best Staff period in the Tampa Bay Area.  Great Food in the Restaurants, Great Private location but still close to get to other venues and activities. Booking a stay here is a no-brainer. If you are Looking for a great place to relax and de-stress but still be able to find some fun activities, this is the place.

title: Excellent beach getaway
review: My family and I stayed here for a few days to relax on the beach, and this hotel did not disappoint.  As an SPG Platinum member, I received several benefits: -Upgrade to beach/pool view room on the 7th floor -Access to the VIP lounge -Vouchers for continental breakfast in the main restaurant since the lounge had been crowded.  The hotel room was in excellent condition and offered plenty of space for all of us.  The furnishings were stylish and in great condition.  The views were fantastic and the noise from the pool area was minimal even during this busy spring break time.  The pool is nice, although it got crowded with almost no elbow room by mid-day.  Most of the poolside chairs were "reserved" by 8:30a although very few people would actually come down and use them until 11am…

title: Spring break with kids
review: Thank you for your review, you certainly covered a lot. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Our associate’s favorite part of interacting with our guests is that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. It is always a delight to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated a visit to a tropical paradise; beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. It is nice to catch some of the activities of Clearwater beach it is also nice to come back and enjoy the tranquility of Sand Key.

title: A short break from Orlando site seeing
review: Just stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort this past week and had a wonderful time as usual.  This was our 3rd visit to the hotel and we were pleased once again with the stay.  This hotel has everything that my family likes when vacationing.  I have 2 college age children and 1 in High School and they loved the hotel property and private beach.  Sand Key has been our spring break destination for the past 3 years and we will continue to stay at the Sheraton.  Thanks to all the staff for a pleasurable experience.

title: Off the beaten path
review: In some of our lives there are moments when you can choose to pause, life long memories can be revisited and new memories can be made. They are far in-between for most of us, that is why perfect vacations are days cherished.  Welcome back to “Our Island” Yes we are always pleased when we are able to share a little of the tranquility we are surrounded by, add some fun in the sun, beach games and sunbathing. I am sure being teens and young adults your children enjoy all this area offers such as sun sets at pier 60, just walking the strip at Clearwater beach, shopping and taking in the scenery or doing what teenagers do these days.  It was gratifying to read your review and we look forward to many return visit.

title: Great location, just out of town, and on the beach!
review: After visiting the Sheraton Sand key resort last year I couldn't wait to get back. From the food, to the pool side cocktails to the impeccable service - this place really is heaven on earth. Can't wait to see you again soon and thanks for making our trip so special.

title: Good Beach Location
review: This is an average Sheraton location, the hotel shows its age--furnishings are worn but very clean and beds are very comfortable. Rooms are clean and there appear to be balconies for each room. The location is straight on the beach and far enough from the busier part of the town. But close enough to be a 5 minute drive to resturants. The pool is a bit small for the size of the hotel I can imagine it gets very crowded in the high season. Beach looks great and parking is free.

title: Great getaway
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood hotels. I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended.  We do realize that the pool is very much a part of your beach vacation experience, I sincerely apologize it was not what was anticipated. We felt upgrading the pool area and adding a fire pit as great gathering place would enhance you our guest’s future stays. There is much to do and explore in the area. Great places to eat, lots of activities to keep you busy, entertainment and sports. The Sheraton Sand Key is a great place to come for a casual beach vacation. We hope you will return soon.

title: Good location, decent food, cheap trolley shuttle to downtown
review: My husband and I have gone to Sheraton Sand Key every year in February for over 10 years now. I love this hotel. First of all, it's over the causeway in a more residential area and away from the downtown Clearwater tourists and spring breakers. It's located right on the beach with gorgeous white sand and literally next to Pinellas County Park where I walk the trails every morning. Try to reserve rooms on the 4th floor or above facing the pool area for the most beautiful sunsets viewed from your balcony. The gym is complimentary with great views from the top floor while you're on the treadmill. The main restaurant, Rusty's, is as good a restaurant as any of the restaurants along Gulf Blvd. I recommend breakfast, lunch or dinner. Lovely menu, beautifully prepared food and ready to…

title: Way under staffed
review: Your repeat business doesn’t go unnoticed thank you for 10 years of being a loyal guest. Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood Hotels. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates and your time spent with us is always very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Yes!!! Beautiful beaches, nature trails, panoramic views and total relaxation is our specialty. Our award winning culinary staff truly enjoys wowing our guests with the taste and creative presentation. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Can't wait to go back
review: I recently visited this resort for a conference for work.  My girlfriend came along with me and we were there Tuesday night to Friday afternoon.  It happened to be sort of chilly (55F) and windy while a storm rolled through over the first day or two, so we didn't have the chance to get out and enjoy the beach there at all, but it looked nice, as did the outdoor bar that was not open while we were there.  There is a nice outdoor fireplace, though, which looked like fun, but with the weather we didn't get out to enjoy it. Our room was clean and housekeeping did a good job of keeping it that way while we were there, however, the view we had out our window was of the roof above the entrance to the hotel - storage space for ladders, etc. - which gave us very little natural light and…

title: The beach is the thing
review: My room overlooked maintenance equipment and the parking lot. Ugly. Dining at the hotel is uneven. Some good dishes.  Some not.  But there's a huge long beach that might compensate.  You can go across the road to a highly regarded but mediocre seafood restaurant.

title: Very nice stay
review: I sincerely apologize for the view, unfortunately there are certain times of the year when we are fully booked and must honor the room type that was reserved.  If you are a beach person Sand Key and the Clearwater are the perfect place to be. The area is known for their exceptional beaches, I am pleased you enjoyed them. There are some wonderful Seafood restaurants in the area. Many have their own boats and their fare could not be fresher. If you return for another visit be sure to check with the Concierge … they know the best places to go.

title: Very friendly for such a large hotel chain
review: Stayed at the Sheraton for five nights. We enjoyed the restaurants, pool and fitness room. Our room was comfortable and clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Our meals at all the restaurants were very good with friendly service. Great beach and pool area.  We would certainly stay here again in the future.

title: Prepare to wait for your tennis court view
review: Thank you for your comments, our associates are pleased to provide you with an effortless experience and they are genuinely friendly and efficient. They enjoy being here to ensure your stay is the experience you anticipated. Thank you for the kind remarks regarding the cuisine. I am so pleased you enjoyed our newly updated pool area and that we were able to share our beautiful beach … a gift from Mother Nature. It sounds as if this was the experience you anticipated. We're always working on new ways to better care for you, return soon.

title: Good for families
review: We stayed here last week, returning today.  It is a great place to stay. Staff are friendly, with a really lovely welcome on arrival - very much appreciated after a long day travelling. The hotel is large, with shops and a restaurant, a bar and a cafe on the ground floor (conference centre too). Rooms are a little dated, but spotlessly clean and have all necessary needs for a stay. The grounds are pretty, the hotel is right on the beach ($25 for a cabana hire...bit much I think?) There is however a lovely pool, bit busy but we were there during Spring break so understandable, and well looked after; beach towels, bar, cafe. Live music on the weekend, which gave it a lovely atmosphere.

title: Great beach
review: The hotel is set back from a nice beach right beside Sand Key Park.  The beach around the hotel is relatively quiet as compared to Clearwater beach across the causeway, but the sand is not as nice. The hotel also has a small pool. Rooms were clean. The hotel is somewhat dated, but is a good destination for a family seaside retreat with close proximity to restaurants and seaside tours.

title: Great experience
review: We came for a family vacation with our 6 and 10 y/o. We hardly left the resort. The beach is barely a walk from the pool. The staff (everywhere we went) were very helpful and friendly. There are 3 restaurants to choose from. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Great Location In Clearwater Beach
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an Oasis for your family. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with your children and each other is a perfect break. Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches, they give you that Island experience. The beach is a great place to bring children; building sandcastles, swimming in the pool, chasing the birds or just walking the beach looking for treasures. I am sure new memories were made for you and your children and we look forward to a return visit

title: Lovely clean, large rooms - great ocean views!
review: My husband and I travel to Clearwater Beach, Florida almost annually for Phillies spring training.  This was our first time staying at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  Although not on the same island as Pier 60 we found this location ideal.  The hotel has a private stretch of white sand beach designated specifically for the hotel but is situated right to Sand Key Park if you want to go for a walk or bike ride.  The Jolly Trolley stops at the hotel and it is a quick ride to Pier 60 and surrounding activities if that is what you plan to do.  Also there is a lot of construction currently on the island and the Sheraton is away from that congestion.    There are also a number of restaurants and bars in the hotel if you prefer to stay on the property.

title: Immaculate  and  super service
review: Welcome to Our Island.” Yes! This is an Oasis from all the activity of Clearwater beach, close enough if you want to join in. It does sound like you were here to enjoy a spring training game or two. After the game come home to the Sheraton Sand Key and relax … it just takes minutes.  Make memories walking the beach with your husband, chilling in one of our new hammocks, making new friends around the pool bar and ending the day watching a sunset from an Adirondack chair in front of our fire pit. We are pleased you have enjoyed us for your first visit and we hope it will not be your last.

title: Great Place to Stay
review: Just got back from the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We were there with our daughters lacrosse team. Before this stay, it had been 25 years since we were there. Wow, how things have changed.  Our stay was great. Absolutely loved our king size bed. It was so comfortable that I am going to contact the hotel and find out who supplies there mattress and pillows. I want one.  The pool/beach set up is great. There were plenty of chairs for sunning in the pool area. We elected to stay in the grass area away from the pool. Less noise.  It's about a 300 yard walk out to the ocean all on beautiful white sand. And its not crowded either. Plenty of room to lay out in the sand should you desire.   Utilized there breakfast buffet several times. It was excellent each time.  Upon arrival was…

title: Full service resort
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood Hotels. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with most of our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Steve is a great asset to team and I have shared your comment with him. I am terribly sorry you did not experience the same warm, caring service our associates are known for. There is just no excuse for the responses you received from our Reservation Department regarding your reservation.  I have shared your comments on the service you received with our Director of Guest Services. I am confident these issues have been addressed and would not be experienced in a future stay with us. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. All were chosen with your comfort in mind, I am pleased we succeeded. So I can help you with your inquiry call 727 593 6000 ext. 2023. Please do not wait another 25 years to return.

title: FANTASTIC HOTEL...
review: First off.  It you come during spring break expect the hotel to be at full capacity.  Pool is small but they have a million loungers so even if crowded you can find one no problem.    Loungers on the beach.  Loungers by the pool.  Loungers on the grass.  Something for everyone.   They are an incredibly reasonable pool bar that stays open late-ish.   They have Adirondacks and a fire pit.    There are cabanas with beautiful chairs and cushions to rent for $25/day which is w bargain.   They have volleyball and beach tennis and regular tennis.    Music at the pool would be a great addition.   Be mindful 2/3 rooms face the gulf.  The other 1/3 face the bay / convention center / parking lot.  Not too much an issue on higher floors but could be challenging on lower floors.   Free wifi…

title: ..fabulous week relaxing in the sunshine escaping the British winter!
review: Yes! This is a great family hotel this time of the year, a place reconnect and make new memories. And I bet to catch some Spring Training games. Everyone can find something to interest them. You truly described the resort as it is. Thank you for mentioning all the new additions we just added; Hope you had your turn relaxing on one of our new hammocks. We have started keeping the pool side bar open later for our guest’s convenience. We do have music at the pool Friday thru Sunday and starting this week there will also be many promotions with give a – ways this month. We have beach tennis Pro, Steven Cutler (Coach Rhino) as the Pool and Beach Activities Director to coordinate activities and provide resort guests with beach tennis lessons. Along with beach tennis, Coach Rhino will be providing an array of activities for guests of all ages. He will be coordinating programs such as beach tennis clinics, sand volleyball games, corn hole and other outside activities. Spending quality time with your friends and family does not have to end as soon as the sun goes down. Enjoy our outdoor fire pit, it is great to prolong outdoor activities into the evening. Either you are a Platinum member or you know about our new program, SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. either way I am pleased you enjoyed that perk. I do hope you will return.

title: Stellar manager makes my vacation A+
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks back in 2009,on a 10 week road trip from east coast to west coast and back again... It was a fantastic clean,friendly hotel right on the beach we had a ground floor suite over looking the pool and beach...

title: Better Customer Service
review: As I am ready to book a 50th birthday celebration for the first week of August I have narrowed my resort choices to the Sheraton as well as a few others in the Vicinity of Clearwater Beach. I call the hotel directly to ask a few important questions related directly with the Sheraton Sand Key and to my dismay the person I spoke to from the Reservation counter seemed to be annoyed with me asking a couple simple questions relating to the resort. I don't feel like asking the difference between the standard room and Entry room (which had the same sq ft and similar amenities) and the proximity to beach with intrusive or problematic questions. Sorry to have bothered you maybe the folks at the Hyatt or the Marriott will be more accommodating

title: Amazing
review: Receiving comments of this nature are quite humbling.  It is very unsettling to know that we failed in creating a pleasing experience for you when trying to book this very special event. I am terribly sorry you did not experience the warm, caring service our associates are known for.  Our standards for service are very high and there is just no excuse for the responses you received from our Reservation Department regarding your questions. Your comment has been shared with the Director of Guest Services to be addressed. Please know your feedback is appreciated.

title: BEAUTIFUL PROPERTY
review: It was our first time staying here and was only for 2 nights ( wish it had been longer)  This hotel is situated just over the bridge from Clearwater Beach next to Sand Key Park.  The hotel feels very modern even though it's an old property and the rooms are pretty spacious with good views from the higher floors.  As you walk into the room there's a sink and vanity area with Starbucks coffee maker,  to the side there's the toilet bath / shower.  We had 2 large beds that were the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in. There's a large flat screen TV and fridge.   The hotel has a small pool with pool bar and a place for snacks like pizza and chicken tenders etc. The hotel has an excellent restaurant called Rustys and our evening meal was amazing.  There's also a cafe that's open…

title: We'll Be Back!!
review: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sheraton Sand Key and we do hope it is just the beginning of a new relationship. Thank you for your comments, our associates are pleased to provide you with an effortless experience and they are genuinely friendly, Thank you for the kind remarks regarding the cuisine we do have a very talented culinary staff for Rusty’s Bistro. Our Executive Chef does try to ensure there are some menu options everyone will enjoy in all of our hotel restaurants. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. All were chosen with your comfort in mind, I am so pleased to read that our efforts were a success.  There is such a serene feeling here with tropical views and beautiful sunsets, it is truly a place to relax.  It sounds as if this was the experience you anticipated. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. There are many friendly associates waiting for you to return soon.

title: Dwight's Stay
review: Traveled there last week with 10 people and we all just LOVED THE PLACE!! Huge sand beach area, great recreation and volley ball courts, hot tub, pool and fantastic restaurants.  The staff at the front desk was above and beyond!

title: All good
review: As said in other posts the front desk staff was top notch. Our reservation was made through a discount site so although we were gold members she did state we earn point for incidentals and suggested next time before we commit to call them directly. The resort was booked so changing my view or floor at this point was not an option but she did offer free wifi. There are some other options but I needed the wifi. The rooms are just as pictured. The bed and bedding are amazing. I want to buy the mattress it's so comfortable.  I'd stay here again, clean and friendly staff from the front door to the cleaning and maintenance staff.  My only negative, if you call it that, is the walk to the water. The plus is that the sand is packed pretty well all the way to the waters edge. I also had…

title: Great beach hotel
review: As an SPG Gold member your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood hotels. To call directly is a very valid suggestion as we do our best to assign all SPG members to one of the rooms set aside for them. There are times where the occupancy does not permit us to do so after the fact. SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. As you know, the program does offer many perks. Our Island is a tropical paradise; beautiful beaches, breathtaking sunsets and awesome views. Ah! The hammocks they are a hit, picture you’re self-lying in the hammock with a warm breeze, not a care in the world and the gentle roar of the waves. That defiantly spells relaxation. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience. You can arrange for transportation to and from the shore by speaking to one of our pool side attendants. It is our associate’s favorite part of interacting with our guests is that they have empowerment to take initiative to make decisions that will make our guests stay memorable. It is always a delight to read that they succeed in making your experience just what you anticipated. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. All were chosen with your comfort in mind. You are able to buy a bed on line. I apologize for the noise from Sheraton Fitness, we are working on a solution. All you have to do now is hurry back.

title: Perfect Spot
review: I had a business conference here, and I'm really impressed. The rooms are comfortable, the hotel has everything you'd need for a nice vacation. The decor is a little tired, but the food was good at the restaurants, the pool is nice, and the beach was fantastic. I will definitely plan to bring my family back here to enjoy the beach.

title: Great Beach Resort
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. We try to ensure that your meetings are impeccably planned and followed up by our experienced Sales Department and that it is done in a warm and comfortable environment. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Our award winning culinary staff truly enjoys wowing our guests with the taste and creative presentation. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … when not busy with your conference. Our beach is large and you can defiantly find your own space.  It sounds like you enjoyed your experience here and we look forward to you bringing your family on your next visit.

title: Lovely beach
review: Spent just two nights here on two of the coldest days I think but the hotel made up for the weather.  Stayed on the 8th floor in a suite overlooking the Gulf and the pool area.  Room was super with a long balcony facing the sun most of the afternoon.  As you would expect the room had everything you need.  We did get given free wifi but I think this sometimes has to be paid for but of course free in the lobby area.  Super comfy bed, luxury bathroom and the fridge and coffee machine make a welcome addition to the lovely sitting area.  Brilliant views from the balcony.  Ate in both Rustys and the Tavern restaurants in the hotel and enjoyed both.  All staff really friendly and helpful.  Super stay, thank you.

title: Awesome Trip!
review: My husband, our two children 8 and 4 and myself had a wonderful time at this hotel. Staff were all very friendly and welcoming. The pool was fun for the kids and the beach was right there which made it easy. Our room was very clean and had great storage. Only thing I wish was that we didn't have to bother having housekeeping come in every day... we're very neat and felt bad they had to waste their time. We hope to be back, my kids are still talking about it. Very close to town which was fun. When we left the gentlemen at the desk gave the kids 2 stuffed mini Dolphins, my daughter was so excited by this. Great job!

title: Amazing place, wonderful staff
review: Perfect family vacations are days cherished; in some of our lives there are only a few moments when you can choose to pause and life long memories are made. It was gratifying to read your review and to read your experience was success. We have just enhanced the pool area and we are pleased that your children enjoyed your time spent there. This is the perfect location to enjoy the beach; sand castles, views of real Dolphins, shelling and just splashing away. I hope those Dolphins give to the children will bring memories of the Sheraton Sand Key for months to come. You can fill out a card for housekeeping or request at the front desk to not have your room cleaned daily. I apologize you were not told about our Green Resort experience. We look forward to many return visits.

title: Great experience!
review: We were fortunate enough to WIN a holiday here! Despite some dodgy weather, the whole experience was wonderful - so near to walk to the beach, fantastic facilities, lovely (little) pool, great food, ideally located to hop on the "jolly trolley" into Clearwater.  Could have easily spent 2-3 weeks here and not been bored!  Really comfortable beds, excellent selection of food for breakfast (fresh squeezed orange juice addictive!) , handy little mini mart, attractive and spacious rooms, very friendly and helpful staff.

title: Relaxing, family friendly
review: The sand might brush off, the salt may wash clean and the tans fade but the memories will last forever. Congratulations!! Winning a trip to Paradise how exciting … that alone must have been a memorable experience. It is a delight to be part of this unforgettable event, we are so pleased it was the stay that was anticipated. Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. We are pleased you enjoyed our location. It is our associate’s goal is to be attentive to your every need and to ensure they have taken care of details that will impact your stay. There is much to explore and you are correct there is no getting bored. The weather it is beautiful for the most part and I truly wish it could be perfect for all our guests stay as you know there is no guarantee.  Hopefully you will be able to return someday in the future.

title: Excellent Location and Hotel Staff
review: We moved to the Sheraton after a bad experience at the Wyndham. Such a supior hotel!!!! Loved everything ---- room, cleanliness, room service, beach, amenities etc. The staff was friendly and helpful. Totally recommend this property. We called ahead to confirm our booking.com reservation and requested the best room possible. We got a great room on the fourth floor overlooking the pool and beach.

title: Great Family Gathering!
review: I enjoyed this hotel 40 years ago, just after it opened.  I came back with family to celebrate my wife's 60th birthday.  It was even better than I remembered it.  Close to Tampa, so easy to assemble the family from all over the Northeast.  One of the most beautiful beaches in Florida, and very private.  Great food and service.  Wonderful staff.  Clearwater Beach has become a pretty busy place, which makes this location, across a causeway on Sand Key, feel like a whole different world.  We'll be back.

title: Good place for family vacation
review: Welcome back to “Our Island” Yes we are always pleased when we are able to share a little of the tranquility we are surrounded by. In some of our lives there are moments when you can choose to pause, life long memories can be revisited and new memories can be made. They are far in-between for most of us, that is why perfect vacations are days cherished. It was gratifying to read your review.

title: Breezes and blessings
review: Really nice and quiet place.  Much less crowded than the adjacent Clearwater beach.  The guest washing and dyer machines are a big plus for family.  Room view is beautiful and restaurants are fairly good.  The downsides are small pools and the long walk to the beach.

title: Discriminat
review: It is a delight to read that your experience was everything you anticipated. February is a great time to come visit you can fully enjoy the tranquility our Island offers. Yes! Clearwater Beach was just voted # 1 beach in the state of Florida. It is nice being so close although far enough away. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and they truly enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We are always working on new ways to better care for you. We have just renovated the pool area, added a fire pit, new loungers and much more. It truly is nice to have the washers and dryers in house also. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience. We do offer transportation to and from the shore if needed. We hope you will want to return to see all the new amenities added.

title: Great place to spend a few days, seems particularly good for families with young children!
review: A friend and I decided to sneak away for a night with no kids, pets or spouses. The resort was beautiful, and centrally located. I was disappointed that there was no spa but the gym is wonderful. We will go back in the future, with and without family.

title: restaurant
review: the restaurant of the Sheraton is vey good. We had a very tasty evening with some succulent day specialities .this restaurant is much better than the other restaurant in Clearwater. We were living by friends si we can't tell a lot more on the hotel other than people are very friendly and service oriented

title: Amazing weekend
review: Thank you for the kind remarks regarding the cuisine. We are pleased that you enjoyed some of the creative delights prepared by our award winning culinary staff. I must say that is a great compliment as Clearwater area does have many wonderful restaurants. Our associates are trained to be warm and efficient, their genuine friendliness truly comes from their heart. We do hope you will join us for many other future dining experiences in Rusty’s Bistro.

title: Completely relaxing
review: We really enjoyed our stay the the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  The room was amazing, the staff were very friendly.  It was on the Beach, so we had very nice walks, too bad the weather was a bit cold but good.  Easy to get too

title: Dated Property in Need of Overhaul
review: Thank you for your comments, our associates are pleased to be provide you with an effortless experience. They are here to assist you in enjoying your stay by being efficient and informative, they are genuinely friendly and enjoy the interaction with you our guest. We were so pleased that you enjoyed our miles of beautiful beaches; the area is lovely with beautiful views, breathtaking sunsets, a place to enjoy your own thoughts and the beauty of nature. Return soon for another amazing week-end get away when the weather is better.

title: Get comforting rest, even when here for a Conference. Apnea machine friendly
review: I visited with a friend in November 2015.  We were greeted pleasantly when we checked in (we arrived late in the day) and the process was very smooth.  We booked a basic room but were upgraded to a room with a view of the beach!  The room was very clean.  The room staff were very helpful when we needed anything or had questions.  The bathroom was divided, bathtub/shower and toiled in a room, and the sink and vanity outside the door.  This was nice, so one could take a shower while the other was getting ready.  We mostly went to the beach right outside the hotel.  Many complain it is a long walk, but the walk is well worth it.  One of the best beaches in Florida right next to the hotel.  The people at the pool were nice, and those handing out the towels always had smiles and were…

title: Really nice stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort
review: I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort for a long weekend getaway. I really enjoyed the hotel and thought the room and all the hotel facilities were modern and clean. Our room had a great view of the beach area which was nice.  I would love to go back and stay here in the summer so I can really enjoy the beach. The beach area by the hotel looks to be really good spot in the summer.

title: Nice stay, great fries!
review: We are pleased you enjoyed our location, as a top year-round destination Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. You do not have to wait till summer to enjoy being here. April and May are perfect months just before summer vacation. Then September and October is great not much rain, balmy breezes, beautiful sunsets, sunny and warm days. There is much going in the fall. Beach festivals, art festivals power boat races, Jazz and Blues festivals and great food booths. The area culture really shines at that time of the year. We are pleased you enjoyed our location. We look forward to your next getaway.

title: Beautiful
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key in Clearwater the week between Christmas and New Year's. Though this is an older property it had recently been updated. The rooms were spacious and the staff very accommodating.  The baths and showers could use some updating.  A shower fan would be a good addition as would new shower faucets.  The French fries in the pub, lunchtime restaurant and delivered by room service were the best fries I have ever had!  They put a coating on them that makes them extra crispy on the outside.  All in all we enjoyed our stay!

title: Very nice
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood Hotels. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  Thank you it is a delight to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I agree that the design of the bathroom needs to be addressed. We are unable to change the size and lay out of the bathrooms due to losing space in the sleeping area. We are always looking into workable solutions. I shared your comment with our Executive Chef on the French fries and I must say he was pleased. Yes! It is the coating. I do hope you will return and the French Fries will be as memorable as they were this time.

title: Excellent hotel
review: A great hotel in a place that felt like old world America. Small pool and did get quite busy. You had to be down at 8 am to get a good spot. However the beach is beautiful white sand there is a short walk to the sea as the beach is quite deep but worth it. Didn't eat in the restaurants but there are lots of places to go if you have a car for food.

title: Wonderful property in a nice location
review: Spent 4 days here recently. Property is in a wonderful location. The beach area is huge and a walk to the water but very well kept and private. Hotel rooms were fine, not spectacular. Accommodations inside the hotel were great.  restaurant and bar area are all very nice. Meeting rooms were great. All of the staff in all areas were especially nice and easy to deal with and work with.

title: Great hotel in superb location.
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … when not busy with your conference. Our beach is large and you can defiantly find your own space we do have transportation to and from the shore if needed. Hopefully we will see you at your next conference or maybe before.

title: Lovely views of beach from balcony and right on beach
review: We ended our 12 day Florida vacation with two days at the Sand Key Resort and we are very glad we did.  Nearly all aspects of our short stay were great.  The beach area in front of the hotel is fantastic and the pool area on the hotel grounds is very nice.  The staff we encountered were very nice with the exception of one front-desk staff member who maybe was having a bad day.  Our room was very nice and had a fantastic view of the ocean and Clearwater town/beach.  We paid for an upgrade with points and were very glad we did.  We received free breakfast every morning and cocktail hour every evening which definitely helped our travel budget.  We hope to be able to visit this resort again soon and would highly recommend it to others.

title: Nice hotel, but..
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be a great place to take a relaxing breath. You have finally reached a feeling of calmness and peace before you head back into the real world. The beaches on Sand Key and Clearwater are known to be exceptional, large and beautiful. I am so pleased you enjoyed your room view. There is nothing nicer than a view of the Gulf of Mexico, it gives you a very siren feeling. As an SPG Platinum member your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood hotels. Being a Platinum member you are able to enjoy many perks such as upgraded room rate, continental breakfast and cocktails at the Sheraton Club. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; it is our goal to treat all our guests with the utmost respect and recognition. I truly apologize that you were not made to feel that way by the Front Desk associate. I have shared your comment with the Director of Guest Services to be addressed. I do hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you in the future.

title: Sheraton Sand Key, Clearwater Beach, Fl.
review: A very good hotel as you would expect with a Sheraton, excellent staff, friendly and helpful. Rooms large and comfortable, very clean, lovely beds. We had found one bug a large cockroach in our bathroom, but staff were quick to respond, caught the bug and sprayed the room, apparently it is a palmetto bug that is a cockroach that flies. Yuk. We were offered a 25dollar credit off the room, luckily the bug was seen on our last night not the first! The staff dealt with it very well. Great place to stay, if you like a peaceful spot on beach.

title: Quick Overnight Getaway
review: I'm glad I didn't pay too much attention to the "Terrible" posts.  Everything is about perspective and expectations!  The Sheraton Sand Key Resort is a great place to stay on the beach.  Walking to the water is easy because they grate the sand...it's nice and tightly packed.  Our room was booked through a travel website and so we didn't get to upgrade to a king room but we had two queens...we slept just fine!  Bathroom is not a normal set up, but for an overnight stay we weren't worried about that too much.  Our room was clean, and all of the staff members were kind and helpful from the bellmen, the housekeeping staff, to the help desk.

title: Great staff and beautiful beach setting
review: We are not everyone’s preference … if you looking for a day or two at the beach we are the right place. Caring and efficient associates. The Sheraton Sand Key is casual and relaxing, with a semi private beach, lounge hairs if needed, the beach buggy bringing around drinks and snacks. All you need to bring is suntan lotion, maybe a good book to read or your favorite music. Then for perfect ending to a relaxing day in the sun, catch a nice dinner at our award wining Rusty's Bistro. Sit around the fire pit and then climb into our “Sweet Sleeper” bed and think about a return visit.

title: Awesome Customer Service before Arrival
review: We had not been to the Clearwater area before so I am pleased that we choose this location just over another causeway from Clearwater beach proper. It was between this hotel and the Hilton on the strip.   Sheraton was much more secluded and it was a short drive back over for dinner intown.The town is very touristy and it must be packed with traffic in season.  The location of this hotel would add another star by itself but the desperate need for room renovations are holding me back. The mattress was horrible,  sure hope they saved some of that capital $$$ from refinishing the pool for new mattresses.  Using points, we were booked into a club level beach front room with a nice balcony. We knew that the pool was being renovated and the hotel was very generous with hotel credit…

title: Hospitality Excellence
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, White sand beaches and the azure waters of the Gulf of Mexico greet you at the Sheraton Sand Key.  Beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. Being only 2.0 miles from the Clearwater Beach area with all its activity is great as you are able to enjoy all that area offers and then drive back and enjoy the tranquility of our island. Renovations are an ongoing project. All of the rooms were redone in 2015 with new furniture, beds carpets and drapes. With the hotel being at 100% occupancy they have gotten much use and are ready to be upgraded once again. Please accept our apologies for the dissatisfaction of the bed during your time spent with us. This is certainly not the Sheraton Sand Key experience we aim to provide our guests and I truly apologize for your experience.  The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. Studies have shown that it can be hard for people to adjust to vastly different levels of comfort than they experienced at home. Thank you for being understanding while here. We were working on many projects that will ensure your future visits will be the experience you anticipated. We do hope you will return.

title: Very pleasant stay
review: I am going to arrive at the resort on Jan28th, booked through SPG. I called to check for the status of my booking and for some special requests. I want to extend my appreciation to Catheline at Front desk who attended my call At 3:30AM, she was so attentive and professional that I felt her smile with her customer service skills on phone. I like the way she guided me so well.  I am so excited already to visit their. If it is before a Start then I cant imagine how much wonderful will it be when I will reach there.

title: Another Great Trip!
review: We stayed at this hotel from Dec. 18-24, 2015 and loved it. This was our second stay at this property and it was just as good, if not better, than the first. The service was very nice again, a special thank you to the front desk manager, Jerry, who made our stay extra special. Our room (207) was very nice, large with a small table/sitting area. The restaurant Mainstay Tavern was very good, we did not try the other restaurants in house, but I'd also recommend Maggie Mae's and Al and Stella's in the plaza across the street. The beach was nice, and the pool, although closed during our stay, was also nice when we last stayed in Dec. 2014. The location is great, close to Clearwater Beach but away from the traffic and busyness. It was a perfect beach getaway for us. All in all, we'll…

title: Would definitely return ..
review: “Welcome to our Island” It is a very tranquil environment. Just over the bridge Clearwater Beach it is more congested, lots of activity. You can enjoy the both of two worlds without driving to far. I would like to thank you for being a loyal guest to the Sheraton Sand Key. We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your repeat business! It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I will share your comment with Jerry, he is a great addition to the Sheraton. He truly enjoys the interaction with our guests. Yes! there are many venues for dining in the area. There is nothing like time away to just relax, unwind and recharge.  We will look forward to seeing you for your next getaway.

title: Just OK
review: Let's start with the people who make a stay memorable ..   Anthony:  what an amazing bellhop.  He's the first person we met upon arrival, hence our first impression.  Wish more hotels had bellhops like him.  Steve:  again, amazing concierge.  I went to see him several times with questions.  Always had a smile on his face .. was very helpful .. with a sunny disposition.  Clone him.    Marilee:  I would have breakfast downstairs just in the hopes of seeing her!  Wonderful lady.  Great service.  Very helpful to tourists.  I hope someone shows her this.    Hotel located right on the beach.  Nice pool area.  Towels for pool/beach always available.  Lovely beach.    Would definitely return ..

title: Great views, good service but has serious drawbacks
review: It is our goal to make ensure you enjoy a memorable experience. Our main concern is to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I will share your comment with the associates named, Marilee who has been an asset to the Sheraton Sand Key for many years. Her charming personality and her willing to do hat is needed is almost always noticed.. Steve is well informed about the area and enjoys being here to inspire new experiences and to guide you. Antony takes pride in sharing his knowledge of the hotel. . He is here to guide you with the correct information. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Great customer service!
review: Facility is nice enough, but can't say that the staff is particularly helpful.  Came here with a group on a group rate and seems that boxed me in for restricted customer service - couldn't upgrade, couldn't even buy access to concierge lounge.  They are doing work on the pool so it's really noisy over there - front desk warns you about it, but it does create a  relaxing-by-the-pool-to-the-sound-of-jackhammers-and-cement-cutters experience.

title: A very nice, peaceful stay
review: I had read many reviews and was a little nervous about this hotel, but the moment we walked in and checked in, my nervousness was gone.  The front desk and concierge were friendly, knowledgeable and amazing.  The room was a perfect, clean with plenty of space. We had a king bed and roll out for three people-plenty of room.  Yes, the bathrooms are small, but really, do you spend your vacation in there.  We did not have a "beach view" but we still could see the ocean from our room.  The pool area was wonderful, relaxing and fun.  The beach is a bit of a walk but the walk is through sand, so relaxing.  Every staff person we met greeted us with a smile and kind words. We drove over to the "Clearwater Beach" area and hated the chaos, parking was expensive and construction was…

title: Lots of dining options and activities
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time with your family and each other is a perfect break. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that being on an Island experience. I am also pleased you enjoyed the comfort of your room and your bed, a great place to end your evening. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We hope we will continue to be your choice of the hotel for your family get-away.

title: Great location, great hotel
review: If you never want to leave your resort, stay here.  Access to large private beach.  Pool is super warm if you are visiting in the colder months.  Lots of dining options and activities on the beach.  Lots of smokers on the balconies which made it almost impossible to enjoy our last two days outside on the balcony of our very expensive Beach View room we paid for!  Beds comfortable, but hard to get to sleep with all the sliding doors opening around our room.  Probably won't stay here again on a long trip.  Great for a short trip when you are enjoying the beach and pool amenities and less time in your room.

title: Just perfect
review: I sincerely apologize as it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Not meeting our goals and your expectations is very concerning. We will have those sliding doors checked. The Sheraton Sand Key is a smoke free hotel which means there are no smoking rooms within the hotel and only designated area outside the area. It is very unfortunate when rules are not followed. I hope you called a manager or security. We also assure you that we will be taking steps to insure such occurrence is not repeated and we thank you again for your feedback. The beach is beautiful, private it is the perfect place to relax and recharge. Our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds are a great way to end the day. We hope you will return we have just renovated the pool area, put in a Fire Pit surround by Adirondack chairs, it will be a great gathering place. There is so much to see and explore. We do hope you will return so we will be better able to serve you.

title: Nice hotel by the beach
review: The hotel was on the beach and a great location on Sand Key, quieter than Clearwater beach across the bridge. The room was clean, the staff was great. The bathroom was shockingly small, but it worked. Nice Lanai off of each room, I believe all would have a water view, either the intercoastal or the gulf.   Didn't have an opportunity to try any of the restaurants, but folks we were traveling with said they enjoyed their meals. There are several restaurants just across the street that were delicious. The hotel gift shop has drinks and sandwiches that would be perfect for a beach picnic. If you plan to go to Pier 60 or Clearwater beach plan to take a cab or a pedi cab the walk across the bridge is a little far to be easily done. The pool was gorgeous, had a nice bar and a little…

title: Beautiful place, for all ages
review: It was a wonderful five night stay here with a great pool, great bars and very good access to downtown. It was a really long walk to the gulf, but worth it because the pool was usually EXTREMELY crowded. It was still okay to lounge by. If you get a room with a gulf view its amazing and worth it. The service was average and we often felt talked down to but mostly we didn't have to deal with workers. Disappointing with no continental breakfast as all of the food here is overpriced.

title: Location...location...location...
review: It is unfortunate that even though you enjoyed your stay our associates were lacking in the warm, caring service they are known for.  Our standards for service are very high and there is just no excuse for the responses you received from some of our associates. You should have been treated with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect.  We are right in the middle of an exciting new project. We are renovating the pool area and adding a fire pit which we are hoping will become a great gathering place to end the evening. I am hoping for a return visit so we are able to better serve you.

title: Great staff
review: We wanted to have a week away in the sun where we could just "park it" and enjoy the sun, the sand and the surf.  The Sheraton Sand Key Resort was the perfect choice. Our room had a beach view; the beach was stunning; service was outstanding; resort was clean and well-maintained - great location - away from the "concrete jungle" of Clearwater Beach.

title: A perfect anniversary
review: We are a completely different environment then Clearwater Beach even though just minutes away.This is the perfect place to “park it” You don’t need much to enjoy a day at the beach. Clear skies, warm weather, cool breezes not too many people and liberal amounts of sunscreen – that’s about it. It’s here that you can tune out the world, your worries and your obligations and just reflect. Sometimes you just need to strip it all away – you may not know how much you need a vacation like this until you actually get there and come away utterly refreshed. Here at the Sheraton Sand Key our hotel is very comfortable and unpretentious. We hope you will return sometime in the future.

title: Don't beach? Then pool!
review: Every staff member we saw checked on us, if we needed anything and to make sure or stay was perfect.   They designated parking for us and made sure each day the spots were available.   The rooms are a little small and dated, but the bed is wonderful.  It literally wraps you in comfort and you don't want to ever leave.  The ladies in the gift shop/ snack shop were very nice and helpful. The restaurants all share a kitchen and offer a good selection of food.

title: Very Underwhelming!
review: For the same price/category of this hotel there are much, much better options out there! The rooms are very average looking and small. The beach is a hike, (especially if you have small children), and the hotel provides no amenities by the beach other than charging you for chairs. The staff is friendly, but not accommodating, unless you are in a private party or there for a conference. Which is the only way I would recommend staying here. If you are on vacation or with your family, don't waste your time, their are better options...

title: Nice Destination - Love the location
