review: I am terribly sorry that your impression of our resort was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I sincerely apologize for not meeting those expectations

title: Haven't even arrived yet. DISAPPOINTED!
review: Love the location, you don't have to go over the bridge into Clearwater and deal with parking, etc. You can take Jolly Trolley to get around if you don't want to drive.   The hotel was in good repair, beds and pillow comfy, the view was nice. The pool was under renovation, but we heard you could use another nearby. We were to busy exploring other things for the weekend.   We found it incredible everyone would greet and chat with us in the elevator and common areas.

title: It's Not Just for Business Meetings
review: So pleased that your stay was successful. We are surrounded by Mother Nature and yes this is a beautiful location lovely beaches and wonderful views. The Trolley’s does let you get around stress free and without worries about parking. We want to ensure that we provide a warm and comfortable environment here inside the Sheraton Sand Key also. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. They do truly enjoy the interaction with our guest. Our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper bed provides a comfortable night’s sleep. We are excited about the upgrade to the pool area. There is so much to explore … so many places to go and so much to see. We hope you will come see us again.

title: Wonderful Birthday Visit
review: As a SPG platinum member, I get to see many of the different SPG hotels. And while I'm sure there are many great things about this hotel, don't expect their in house reservations to help you without PENALTY!   We have NEVER had this problem at any other property.

title: Ok place
review: Hotel is located on the beach which is a plus. Although a long walk to the water it was still nice.  Pros Clean rooms Free parking Comfortable beds  Nice staff  Cons Tiny bathrooms Water temp changed from hot to cold during shower which was very unpleasant.  Thin walls Noisy with new pool construction but only during the morning and day.  Was told we had a pool/ partial water view, instead it was a view of a few huge palm trees and back of pool house.   We are used to staying at the Marriott which is a nicer hotel and rooms. Better larger bathrooms with controlled water tempts.  Overall A descent hotel if the Marriott is booked (right across the street)

title: We love the Sheraton Sand Key
review: I am delighted you found our location a positive. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that being on an Island experience. Most of the time, It is such a tranquil, relaxing place. Yes this time of the year due to occupancy we are renovating. Which is done to enhance you our guests future stays. We are excited with the upgrading and looking forward to our new gathering place which will be focused around our new fire pit. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. All were chosen with your comfort in mind, we are delighted that you enjoy a comfortable night’s sleep. Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. They genuinely want you to ensure your experience is what you anticipated. I apologize about the water temperature and I personally spoke to the Head Engineer yesterday and was told it that we have temperature balanced control valves and it needed a new Moen Cartage. That was replaced the next day. Our Housekeeping Department checks the temperature when they turn over the room for the next guest. We do hope you will return so we can better serve you

title: Perfect getaway
review: Recently stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key for business meetings and had a great visit. This was not our first time to stay at the SSK. We love the views of the sunsets and the competent friendly staff. We spent Sunday evening watching football in the Mainstay Tavern (Lobby Bar) and had excellent food and service from Heather! The meeting services provided by the hotel staff for the meetings I participated in were excellent. The hotel in in the middle of a major pool renovation which should be complete in a week or two.

title: All around great stay
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … when not busy with your conference. Our beach is large and you can defiantly find your own space.  It sounds like you enjoyed your time in the Mainstay Tavern with Heather and I will share your comment. We are excited about the Pool renovations and our new Fire pit. I picture watching a beautiful sunset, maybe a walk on the beach and ending the evening setting around the fire pit discussing the day. You must revisit us soon.

title: Weekend getaway
review: My husband and I went to Sheraton for our anniversary. It is a perfect place to relax and be away from the crowds. The hotel was immaculate, the staff was super friendly and room was very nice. If you want to be close to all the action, stay 1 mile north. The beach was beautiful with plenty to do even in November. Drive a few miles to Largo and find every restaurant imaginable. We are already planning a second trip!

title: Beach Resort Hotel
review: Fantastic location directly on the beautiful white sands of the Gulf Coast in Florida.  There is a Jolly Trolley bus which picks up and drops of directly outside the hotel entrance.  The restaurant sold excellent food and there was a special each day.  Staff were very attentive.

title: Nice place for a get away
review: I am delighted that your stay was successful. Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings, shell collecting. Yes the Trolley is a convenient mode of transportation and can be fun. We do have a very talented and award winning culinary staff and we just won the prestige Golden Spoon Award for the 4th year in a role.  Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Nice place
review: We just came down for a quick get away, and this is just what we needed.  The facility is very  clean and well maintained. The staff is friendly and help full. The restaurant and room service were good.

title: Dissapointing
review: Welcome to Our Island.” We do hope you will plan another quick get-away. This Island is a place to come to for relaxation therapy. Whether you're looking for a peaceful, relaxing vacation or a fun-filled family getaway, we provide the perfect setting to make new memories. So pleased that you enjoyed your dining experiences we do have a very talented culinary staff. It is our associate’s goal to ensure the comfort of our guests. We are pleased you enjoyed the interaction with them.

title: Nice place to stau
review: We did not read the other reviews before booking our room but did so after arrival. I am surprised at some of the negative reviews because we found this hotel to be.... conveniently located, clean, very comfortable with good customer service, a nice pool and pleasant dining facilities. We ate at Rusty’s and the Grill, both were excellent. Check in was a breeze and we had a nice view of the pool/ocean from our deck. We found the staff to be friendly.  Had a great time and hope to return.

title: Over priced stay!
review: I wouldn't recommend this hotel for the price. We were first time leisure visitors. They gave us a room with a view of the top of the building. It was horrible for the price. The walk actually is quite a way through the sand especially when carrying bags, coolers, and stuff for the kids. The staff in the outside bar/food area were not friendly. The pool was nice. The food in the restaurant was good. The sunset is incredible. We were not impressed and would never return!

title: Great for family vacation
review: We have noted your comments regarding the pricing of our hotel and services and we would like to advise you that our rates are very competitive with the same category hotels of the area. Please note that hotel room rates fluctuate depending on the level of business, seasonality and events in the area. Usually, during periods of low activities the rates may drop significantly. I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer.  I can assure you your comments on the lack of friendliness of those associates will be shared so that improvements can be made. We do have transportation to the shore and back for our guests and I am sorry you were not informed. I sincerely do wish you would return for another visit so we would be better able to serve you.

title: Wonderful place to stay on the beach
review: Stayed 5 nights in August. Too bad the beach was flooded but that was the weather and not the hotel. The service was excellent, lots of choices for eating and even though we had to wade through rain water, the beach was very close and convenient.

title: Disappointing
review: Yes the weather took its toll on our resort and we now know that it played a part in the disappointment of our guests.  It is refreshing to know that you understood. Our efforts to pump the beach were thwarted by the immense amount of rain received.  I am pleased that you seemed to have made the best of the situation. I do hope you will return at a time where you can enjoy all that this area has to offer.

title: A Great Facility
review: We booked this hotel after reading the TripAdvisor reviews and wanting to stay on the beach. What a gorgeous facility, extremely friendly staff, and fantastic beach! We arrived late after flying into Tampa and needed something to eat. The bar was still open and they were extremely accommodating in meeting our requests for food. In addition, the food was fantastic, even that late at night. We will come back again and stay longer next time. I highly recommend this hotel for a beach stay!

title: Fantastic Hotel!
review: From the minute we walked into the Sheraton, we were made to feel welcome. We stayed here from 8th to 15th November. Got checked in early as we were going to Tampa to a football game. Emailed ahead and asked for a room with a view which we got on fifth floor above tennis courts overlooking the beach and Gulf. Room itself was excellent, two double beds, which were oh so comfortable,fridge, coffee maker, large screen TV, complimentary toiletries and plenty of white fluffy towels. Free wifi in public areas and free use of PCs in Mainstay Tavern, which was useful for checking in on flights home and printing out boarding passes. All the staff were so friendly, from front desk to cleaners, pool service guys friendly too. Always got a sun bed in pool area, which was a lovely warm pool,…

title: Can't Wait to Return!
review: Hope your team won!! It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Waking up in the morning with the sun shining through your window. It sound as if your experience was what you anticipated and we will look forward to a return visit.

title: Lovely location, needs a substantial remodel
review: We stayed at this hotel for five days in October 2015.  We arrived later at night (around 10pm) and received a warm greeting.  Check-in was easy and fast.  The front desk was always willing to help and every staff member we passed greeted us with a smile.  We booked a club level room and were impressed with the club lounge.  They had a great breakfast and evening snacks/drinks.  Most nights the evening appetizers were so substantial that we didn't need a separate dinner.  The employees in the lounge were great, especially with our young toddler.  Also, the view from the lounge is amazing.  We will return to this property next time we are in Florida!

title: great holiday
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our outstanding associates. They truly enjoy going above and beyond to make your stay special. We are thrilled your vacation was one to remember and hope to see you again soon! Whether you're looking for a peaceful, relaxing vacation or a fun-filled family getaway, we try to provide the perfect setting to make new memories. I agree that view is breathtaking … a beautiful sunset awaits your next visit.

title: Clearwater
review: The views of the ocean and beach are fabulous. Having a sea view from your bedroom is really essential. The outside area and pool are nice. The hotel itself needs a lot of renovation. Bathrooms are tiny. The balcony and rooms are very tired. I first stayed here over 30 years ago and to the decor and rooms are pretty much the same. Charging $9.95 for in room internet (in the lobby it is free), especially for SPG members is not good service. When we checked in we were told they wouldn't honor the late check out as part of the rate we had been sold directly by SPG. After holding our ground with the check in staff, we eventually got it resolved, but our visit didn't start well. Love the area, however I am unlikely to return here until the hotel has a major renovation.

title: One of my favourites
review: A fabulous, family friendly hotel in a great location on Sand Key at Clearwater Beach.  The staff are fantastic and can't do enough to help, aid or assist anything you may need to have arranged.  Love the swimming pool and also the walk down to the Gulf.  If possible to get a great view ask to be on floor 5 or above.

title: Not impressed at all
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. The Sheraton Sand Key and their associates are uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home. You will have to return so you can check out the pool upgrades we are planning this month.

title: Thank you Thank you
review: Why were we not impressed by this hotel?  1. Small room 2. TINY bathroom 3. Outdated property and decor 4. Not so good location 5. Long walk on the beach to reach water 6. Strange smell from the AC unit.  The thing that bothered us the most was the cleaning staff. They collected the plastic cups we used from the bathroom vanity, however, they didn't put new ones back. They didn't even re-fill the shampoo and shower gel even though they were half empty.  BTW, if you can't afford a room that faces the ocean, you view will involve ugly giant industrial fans and ugly roof of another part of the building.

title: Relaxing and off the main drag
review: Please accept our apologies for having missed the opportunity to impress you. I apologize that we did not meet your expectations and have taken particular note of your suggestion that the hotel needs refurbishment/redecoration. In regards to the renovation, we are currently putting in new AC units and upgrading the pool area. Though we renovate constantly, we are unable to change the size of the room. We have also looked into several options for re-designing the bathroom, however, we have not found a solution that does not take away from the rest of the room.  Rest assured these items are always on our mind and we do hope that someday we will find an improvement. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that true Island experience. It is a prime location with 10 acers of beach. I do apologize that it was not what you were anticipating. I am very concerned that you experienced that issue with housekeeping as it is definitely not the genuine service we strive to deliver. I have shared your comment with the Director of Housekeeping. Please rest assured that we do take your feedback very serious and that we will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance.

title: Great Staff - Cold Pool
review: This was one of the best places we have stayed at. It was so beautiful and the staff was great. Brandon the gentleman who checked us in went above and beyond for us, he made our stay very memorable. Thank you Brandon

title: A Truly Great Hotel on a Pristine Beach
review: The Sheraton sand key is the best hotel on the best beach in Florida… extremely clean with wonderful views of the ocean or bay this is the place to stay in or around Clearwater Beach...  With 290 rooms and suites this hotel is a full service hotel and resort with three restaurants a wonderful pool and terrific beach access

title: Nice location, ok hotel
review: White sand beaches and the azure waters of the Gulf of Mexico greet you at the Sheraton Sand Key. It was delightful to read that your experience was everything you anticipated. As a top year-round destination, Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. We are pleased you enjoyed our location and we look forward to your return.

title: Excelent for relaxing with family
review: The hotel seems to be rather old.  The pool is very small.  There is indeed a huge beach in front of the hotel but most of the beach is open to the public.  There is a small park next to it for kids.  The room was fine, seemed to need some work.  Overall it was fine hotel for weekend away with the kids.

title: Mega Disappointment
review: We are an older hotel, although we do renovate constantly. We are working on some major projects during this time. We are upgrading the pool area and are very excited about the changes. The beach is a private beach, being next to a public park we do get a few people wondering over. There are many newer hotels going up in Clearwater beach. We feel very lucky to be on Sand Key where it is very tranquil and really a perfect place for a family vacation. We do hope you will return again with your children.

title: Nice Oceanfront Property!
review: After a few days of Disney and Legoland we decided to relax and Clearwater is a beautiful place for that purpose. The beaches are very nice. The hotel has all the amenities needed to have a great time, the service is very good and very friendly reception. Thanks Sheraton Sand Key!!

title: please do not eat here
review: you might have to stay here for the rate or confernce - but DO NOt eat here.  Please go anywhere else if you want a dining experence.   if you just need food - then proceed, but if you want to enjoy dinner and feel it is part of a vacation  - head elsewhere

title: Fifth time at this place
review: I am sure when you booked your trip at our resort you had high expectations of your experience, and I can see clearly why we failed to reach those expectations. I am terribly sorry that your impression of our restaurants was not as you had expected nor what we had intended. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; you certainly should have been treated with the warm, caring and efficient attitude our associates are known to give. I sincerely apologize that you did not find the food or service to your liking. We actually have a very talented and award winning culinary staff. You are correct there are many other restaurants in the area which offer something for everyone’s taste. Again I apologize.

title: Great hotel, great location, even better beach!
review: We keep coming to this place and never get enough of it. I guess, something really clicked for us there.  If I start rating each individual component of this property separately, it won’t be, probably, the very best in each individual category.  But putting all things together, we find this place very attractive to us, and we keep coming back during different time of year.  The stuff is absolutely the best (special thanks to Jerry at the front desk), enormous beach where you never feel cramped, many places to visit if you don’t want to stay put. It is about 30 min walk to Pier-60 where you can catch some entertainment and find many restaurants (the best for us was Heilman).  St. Petersburg with many museums and attractions is about 40 min drive. Already planning the next trip to…

title: Not what we expectet.
review: Thank you for your comments. We are pleased you recognized our associates as they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests. They genuinely are friendly and caring. I will share your comment with Jerry. We greatly appreciate your repeat business! WOW! Five times you are defiantly part of the Sand Key family. We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the cuisine, Great restaurants, famous museums … have you been to Ringling Brothers yet? Fun places for people watching. Island beaches and breathtaking sunsets. We will look forward to a return visit.

title: A great place for a time out.
review: I just stayed here for eight days, the last week of October, and have stayed here a number of other times as well, and I'm always happy! From check-in to check-out the staff is exceptional.   The hotel is a bit dated, but very clean and well kept. The rooms are nice sized, all with a balcony, mini fridge, small tables and chairs. It's important to note the location of the room. The west (pool side) has the better views by far. I've been on the east (park) side before and that view can be bad. I noticed another review mentioned the gap at the bottom of the doors. Yes, that is true, so you do get some hallway noise.   The pool area is beautiful. Surrounded by palm trees, pool deck has lounge chairs as well as tables and chairs. There is a bar and a "fast food" type restaurant out…

title: Will be back again!!!
review: This was my first time in Clearwater beach and the first stay at this hotel!  I will say that this is one of the best hotels/resorts I have been to!!! The rooms were clean and perfect sized! The view from balcony was amazing! The pool area was very large with many chairs and tables to relax at! There was a poolside bar and poolside grill. The beach chairs and umbrella were very comfortable and convenient!  All the workers were friendly and helpful!! Hope to be back soon!!!

title: Amazing in every way
review: As a top year-round destination, Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. We are pleased you enjoyed our location. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. This area is a place where memories are made and we will look forward to many more visits.

title: Nice meeting place
review: My husband and I stayed here for our Honeymoon. Every staff member we came into contact with was nice, happy and very helpful. When we got to our room they had gone above and beyond what my husband asked for in the room. They made our stay so special. I would stay here again in a heartbeat, that's why I tell everyone if they're down that way they need to stay here! The restaurants are all close (the ones in the hotel are great as well) and the beach is out the back door. The pool is very nice, we were able to relax our entire trip and did not want to leave. Definitely planning on returning.

title: In every way, a fantastic stay.
review: Congratulations!!! May you spend many happy years together. Our associates sincerely enjoy the daily interaction with our guests, they truly are caring they want to ensure you experience many memorable moments here on the Island of Sand Key. They enjoy being a part of those memories. It is a place for romance; beautiful beaches, awesome sunsets, moon lit nights. Whether you are sitting in the hot tub or enjoying a long walk along the shore you can leave the daily stress and the noise behind and enjoy the sounds of waves crashing on the shore and the sounds of nature. Yes! there are many great venues for dining. Then at the end of the evening I was pleased you enjoyed your room and the comfort of our “Sweet Sleeper” bed.  We look forward to many return visits.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Attended a business conference there last week and enjoyed it.  The room was big, clean, comfortable and quiet. The staff was friendly and the amenities were first rate.  I had no complaints and would go back anytime.  In fact, this was a repeat as I'd been there two years ago.  If you like a cosmo beach resort, this is a good one.

title: Great Experience
review: Went here for my honeymoon. First of all the beach is beautiful. The hotel facilities were extremely nice and the one thing we enjoyed the most was how clean the place looked and smell. Everyday we came back from the beach to our room everything was impecable and it smelled amazing. The food was all great and the service was top notch. Definitely coming back.

title: Great hotel with Great Beach
review: Congratulations!!! I am sure many memorable moments were made during your stay here on the Island of Sand Key. This is the perfect place for a honeymoon; long walks on the beach with beautiful views. Watching breathtaking sunsets may you enjoy many more together throughout the years together. Your own private space on the beach or maybe a tropical cocktail while lounging by the pool … Just the two of you in Paradise. We have an award winning culinary staff and knowledgeable servers who truly enjoy the interaction with our guests. We will look forward to many return visits. Our associates enjoy ensuring everything is taken care of for your comfort. Their goal is that your experience is exactly what you anticipated.

title: Absolute Facility for Military & Retired Military
review: Lovely room with a balcony looking over the sea. Great size room and comfy with Starbucks coffee in your room. Would go back and even take the family as the beach is superb.  Nice good swimming pool along with a separate pool for kids.

title: Not Worth the Money
review: I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay, the view and your room. This is a great place to bring your family for a relaxing time on the beach, beach tennis, volley ball, swimming, and sand castles to build. Great places to eat, sports and entertainment. Centrally located to amusement parks and historical points of interest, just so much to do or nothing to do if so inclined.  We look forward to a return visit next time you are in the USA.

title: Clean, comfortable, great beach!
review: Iwas very impressed with the staff and hotel in general.  I have used hotels like this when I worked in Pharmaceuticals and this is an OUTSTANDING hotel.  The front desk help me find a GOOD physician when I got sick and helped pull through my illness in comfort-40th wedding anniversary and gave us a nice gift with a lovely hand written note-NICE VERY NICE

title: Did not want to leave!
review: We recently took a trip to Clearwater FL and enjoyed our stay here at Sand Key. The hotel is clean, our room was updated (standard room), great staff who is are very accommodating, quick and friendly.  Our view was great overlooking out the front of hotel on the 4th floor.  For being a 40 yr old hotel I was impressed.  Cleanliness and service is of most importance when we stay in a hotel and this hotel had that.  The beach is beautiful with great sunsets.  The pool is on the smaller size but being there in October it was not crowded.  The walk to the beach is approx. 3-5 minutes but not a bad walk with the view you are heading to.  The only thing we wish they had was continental breakfast with room purchase.  You can pay $40 a day for brkfst and oerderves/drinks from 5p-9p.  We…

title: Wonderful Beach!
review: October is the perfect time to visit the Island of Sand Key. The weather is perfect, not too crowded and not much traffic. The area is busy with craft shows and beach parties and festivals. The bellmen will be pleased to inform you on what is going on and the best way to get there. Yes! Maggie Mae’s has a great breakfast there are many local places serving breakfast this time of the year. My favorite breakfast is stopping in the Blue Waters and picking up a little breakfast picnic, walk over to Sand Key Park find a picnic table or a wooden glider and enjoy the morning and the view. I am delighted you enjoyed your room, the view and our genuinely warm and caring associates. What a way to end a day a beautiful and peaceful sunsets, the waves crashing onto the shore and cool breezes. Hurry back!!!

title: Average hotel
review: Was there with wife and grand-kids for a business meeting. Nice pool and spa, great  (wide & flat!!!) sandy beach for volleyball fans and players. Good place for a swim in the Gulf or in the pool. Hotel facilities and staff where more than adequate. Very pleased.

title: Weekend with Thelma
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … when not busy with your conference. Our beach is large and you can defiantly find your own space.  Spending enjoyable time with your grandchildren and each other is a perfect way to enjoy your meeting and a little time with your family.  I am also pleased you enjoyed our associates, they genuinely enjoy ensuring your stay was experience you anticipated. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Paradise
review: Overall an average hotel, slightly disappointing for Sheraton we usually like a lot. Pretty old property, 40 years or so, but well maintained. Restaurants adequate but unfortunately no possibility to sit outside. Brach access possible but the hotel dies not provide  beach chairs. And wireless is not included and the charge for this extra.

title: Just amazing!!!
review: This hotel was just wonderful. We were really impressed by the staff. They are just friendly and helpful. They are courteous and very professional. The hotel is nice and the private beach area is amazing. We did not try the food. However, drinks and cocktails by the swimming pool area are just delicious. It can be a little pricey but it is totally worth it. I have stayed in three stars hotels in South Beach where the staff is unhappy and rude to the point they make you regret taking time for a vacation. To all the staff at Sheraton Sand Key Resort, a big thank you!!! we had a great time at your hotel and we are already recommending this hotel to all our friends.

title: Nice hotel but the beach is the bomb
review: Welcome to our Island; so pleased you were able to experience this tropical paradise we call home. Our associate truly take the success of your stay personally. They are genuinely warm, caring and efficient.  Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their large beautiful beaches they truly give that Island experience. Laying by the pool with a cocktail in hand and a cool breeze blowing is truly a perfect way to relax. We do hope that you will make a return visit.

title: Sheraton Clearwater stay
review: In some ways, this hotel is rather basic to slightly upscale. The pool is a mid-range size. The beach is a bit far away. The restaurants are not terrible but not that amazing. The staff, however, is actually pretty fantastic. Front desk, hotel and cleaning staff are wonderful. In the end, though, the beach is definitely something to write home about. I was a little disappointed when I got there and saw how far away the ocean was from the hotel. But then I spent some time out there on the beach and WOW. Soft, lovely sand. Glorious perfect temperature for the water. The sunsets are jaw dropping. Be sure and pay the extra $40 for the Sheraton Club. It's worth it. They took a standard old style resort hotel and they milked it for what it was worth and you will definitely enjoy your…

title: Very nice resort
review: You don’t need much to enjoy a day at the beach. Clear skies, warm weather, cool breezes not too many people and liberal amounts of sunscreen – that’s about it. It’s here that you can tune out the world, your worries and your obligations and just reflect. Seeing historic sites or markets is all well and good but sometimes you just need to strip it all away – you may not know how much you need a vacation like this until you actually get there and come away utterly refreshed. Come back again soon.

title: A week to relax
review: Hotel front staff was very friendly, rooms were great they automatically upgraded us which made the stay even more special. The beach is fabulous , I think that the rates for the beach chairs are way overpriced but I understand that this is an outside service, Most people were not using them. The pool area was busy and looked great. Love the room but I found the bathrooms very small.

title: Beautiful views with quiet beach.
review: We spent three nights at this hotel when we came to visit Winter and Hope. The hotel is not adjacent to the Clearwater beach or Pier 60. But just couple miles away. And it's own private beach is nice and quiet.   Hotel has a great view of the ocean and beach, makes it a great place for family leisure without crowd feel. The room is kind of old, and we noticed it is a 40 years young hotel. So it may need some make-ups. The room is average size, with a small balcony which you can sit and enjoy the wind and views. It is just working distance to Sand Key Park, which is a nice place for some jogging, biking.   Being a loyal SPG member. I always have a high expectation on SPG hotels. This Sheraton is a nice hotel with a lot potentials. But it is not outstanding. I will still recommend…

title: A wonderful experience!
review: Yes we are lucky to house those area celebataries right here in Clearwater. Five years and one day after “Winter” was rescued, baby Hope was found by a boater trying to nurse from her mother who had died. It was later determined that the best place for her rehabilitation was at Clearwater Marine Aquarium. Many of our guest are here to visit them. They are both an inspiration. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis for your family. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience. Taking time away from the busy everyday life that we live and experiencing a relaxing and enjoyable time. The renovations of this hotel are ongoing. It is our loyal customers that inform us of any issues that need to be addressed. I thank you for your support, I hope that you will return to the Sheraton Sand Key soon

title: Great summer experience
review: Hello from Arizona! My mother and I were recently reunited after 53 years and I traveled to Orlando just last week to meet her for the first time. What an amazing experience! As part of our celebration together, we stayed here for a couple of days and nights and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and each other. From the moment we arrived until the moment we were assisted to our car upon checkout, we were treated so well. by so many friendly staff members. I took notes and here is a list of people I want to acknowledge and thank for making our stay so memorable.  Jerry, front desk, he heard the story of our reunion and congratulated my mother and me and then sent a bottle of champagne to our room with a nice note.  Brad, bellman, was so friendly and helpful.  Bonnie, our bartender…

title: Beautiful  hotel, view and outstanding  service!!
review: What a heartwarming story and we are so pleased to be a part of this memorable event. I hope the memories made here at the Sheraton Sand Key will stay with you for many years to come. We are not the newest hotel or the largest hotel in the area, what makes the difference is our associates they are defiantly some of the most genuine, warm and caring people you will meet. Your comments have been shared with all the associates mentioned and all managers. We do hope that you and your Mother will someday return and thank you for sharing ... Jerry, Brad, Steve, Bobbie, Vince, Hugo, Molly, Nelson and Heather thank you.

title: Beautiful beach
review: I loved my room. My bed was so comfortable and the pillows - AHHHH! Slept like a baby. Pool was packed but the ocean was right there and warm! I loved the long walks along the white clean sand. Going back in November for my 50th birthday! Looking forward to it!

title: Wonderful Birthday weekend celebration !
review: I just returned to Fort Myers, FL after my birthday weekend at the Sheraton Resort in Sand Key!   I highly recommend the resort.  My sister and brother spent the weekend with me and upon arrival we were treated with the utmost respect and professionalism......giving us everything we asked for while checking in the hotel.   Everyone was GREAT.  Cudos go out to Jerry, Mgr and Todd at the Concierge desk......even to delivering a birthday cake to our room with candles!    What a surprise and wonderful gift.   Sept. 25-28, 2015 stay.  Tiki bartender, jitney guy.....waitresses at the sports bar and Rusty's were all great.   Clean room and surroundings!  What can I say but THANK YOU AND WE WILL BE BACK!

title: A good stay but a bit outdated
review: Thank you so much for your kind words.  It is truly our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  We are pleased you recognized our associates as they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests.  We are honored you chose to spend your birthday weekend here, and are so happy we were able to help make it a special one.  We look forward to seeing you again.

title: Return visitor
review: This wasn't the typical 5star experience but you get a good deal in florida standards.  Beach is nice but its a bit of a walk to get out there.  Catering mostly to older people or conferences so we didn't see much romance seekers like ourselves there.  The hotel is far from everything but if you have a car you will be fine or just uber everywhere.  The clearwater beach by the pier is much nicer than the hotel's beach. The rooms are very outdated for sheraton standards but its an ok hotel in terms of service and all others.  If you get a good deal and want to stick with clearwater area I would recommend staying here.

title: Paradise & heaven
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure.  September is a slower month for vacationers, so we do tend to have more conferences in the hotel at that time.  I hope you found the beach tranquil and our sunsets beautiful. Our resort was built in the early 70’s, and we understand that the room size doesn’t parallel newer hotels. We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix any worn out areas.  We are always looking for ways to better care for our guests and you can see changes from year to year in our resort amenities and appearance. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience.  The public beach near the pier is a favorite and has won awards for being a great beach. Our location is unique in that you can enjoy our serene atmosphere or just head over the bridge and enjoy the activities of Clearwater Beach.  We hope you will return soon.

title: Great Hotel
review: Currently Spending 2 days here at the Sand Key Resort. Have stayed here a number of times in the recent past. Always receive a warm welcome from the staff and the rooms are comfortable and well maintained. The only slight negative is the compact bathroom layout. Not the best on that front if I am being honest but that aside I like this Hotel and will return in the future.

title: feeling at home
review: Once again first class service by your associate JANET,at the front desk made our stay at this resort memorable. She always manages to smile and remember us from stay to stay, and greets us with a warm hi welcome back , happy to see you again, when this happens she makes us feel right at home. She also makes it a point no matter how busy she is, if she sees us to ask how our stay is and if there is anything she can do to make it better. I guess she does not realize that the way she responds towards your guest's and their needs, IS WHAT MAKES OUR STAY !!, and keeps us coming back. Hell when we leave and are checking out if we have not been lucky to have Janet checking us out. She will see us and still wave and say thanks for visiting us again and hope to see you soon. What more…

title: The Good, The Bad and The Ugly
review: Thank you for your wonderful comments and especially your words regarding Janet.  She is indeed a wonderful ambassador for us and makes us proud every day.  Your comments are exactly why Janet was the recipient of our "Associate  Of The Year" award 2 years ago.  She is truly a joy and we are thrilled she is the reason you keep coming back.  We hope all of our associates exude a warmth that makes you feel at home, and I know Janet leads that endeavor by being a great example to all of our associates.  See you soon!

title: Nice enough
review: Overall the hotel was clean, tidy with caring and very attentive staff.  Pros: Nothing was too much trouble for Brandon on front desk, Lisa in Mainstay Tavern was a star despite being overstretched night after night by loud and drunken guests. Housekeeping was superb. Cons: Hundreds of noisy conference personnel blocking lobby and walkways, loud and drunken conference personnel partying in Mainstay Tavern.  Rusty’s Bistro unable to cope with large numbers of guess attending on Labour Day. The server was continually apologising for food delays.

title: Sheraton Sand Key
review: We appreciate you sharing your comments with us regarding your recent stay. It is our goal to always provide exceptional service to our guests and I apologize that we fell short of reaching that goal.  I am pleased you had a good experience with several of our associates; they are committed to providing warm hospitality to all of our guests’.   I am sorry your stay was interrupted  but the conference group we had in-house.  I will look into exactly who that was and note that in the file.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write this review.  It is important for us to hear the voice of our customer so that we can focus on improvements needed. We hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.

title: Family vacation
review: The Sheraton was a nice place to stay. The staff, save for one rude front desk clerk, was very helpful and courteous. The pool was pretty small for the size of the resort, and very crowded. I found the oddest thing was the distance to the beach. It was a long hike! They had ample volleyball courts, I thought it would be a good idea if they have some sort of sign up to play as most people don't have enough people with them to get a full game going. One nitpicky thing is the bed was extremely uncomfortable, sagging in the middle terribly. Another negative is just based on a personal preference, there weren't any restaurants or bars or places to get ice cream within walking distance via the beach. It's surrounded by tall condos. You really do need a car. The fridges are small. I…

title: Would go back to stay at Sheraton; Nice access to the beach; No complaints.
review: Here are highlights of our stay that we liked. Would definitely go back. I am a Gold status member of Starwood and was treated very well. We visited as a family with a 5 year old.  Early checkout - No problem Our room had the view of The Gulf of Mexico. Pool - Excellent Access to beach - They have a 10 acre beach that you got to cross after which you will get to the water. They have chairs and umbrellas to relax on the beach. Late checkout - No problem Parking - On site and free No resort fee.

title: 9 day hotel stay
review: As an SPG Gold member your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood hotels. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of all our guests and provide excellent customer service. It is gratifying to read that your experience here with us was very positive. The view is beautiful and hopefully you were able to see one of our breathtaking sunsets from your balcony. The beach is a great place to bring children there are so memories to be made. Children love to scoop, and pour sand to their heart’s content. There is So much for a 5 year old to do, splashing in the pool, chasing waves or birds, engage in imaginative play and it is also educational. They might even catch the Dolphins playing or see the Pirate boat on the horizon. We hope we will continue to be your choice of the hotel for your family get-away.

title: Great place to stay
review: This is a very nice hotel with a nice pool and just a short walk out to the beach. I was disappointed that they would not honor my request for a view room on a higher floor, even though I made my reservations about 3 months in advance. Service at the Tavern Grill inside the hotel is EXTREMELY slow but food and drinks are good.  Overall, I was satisfied with my stay, but not jumping up and down.

title: Great Hotel in an amazing location
review: Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood hotels. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service and focus on these issues. I have shared your comments about the Mainstay Tavern with the appropriate managers and it has been addressed. They are concerned that you experienced slow service as that is definitely not the genuine service we strive to deliver. I also would like to sincerely apologize that we were unable to fulfil your request to assign you to a room on a higher floor. Unfortunately, there are certain times when we are fully booked and must honor the room type that was reserved. It seems that we missed the opportunity to impress you and we do hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back in the not too distant future.

title: Excellent getaway, breathtaking views, pristine beach
review: I recently stayed at the Sheraton for two nights, wished I could have stayed longer!  Staff were very accommodating at check-in, bell staff also.  The rooms were great, very quiet, nothing could be heard room to room.  For a 40 year old hotel, I had no complaints.  Excellent beach behind the hotel, like your own private space.

title: Good hotel, pity about the view
review: Upon arriving at the Sheraton, we were greeted with a friendly face who was helpful in getting us sorted.  Room was spacious with all the amenities you would expect, however be careful about drinking the larger bottle of water provided in the room as they do charge for it. The price is printed in small of the paper tag around the neck of the bottle.  We had a balcony but it overlooked a wall so we never really used it. We also weren't too phased though as we had planned to be out sightseeing and enjoying the sweltering sun.  All the staff we encounter were cheerful and polite. Rooms were also kept clean.   Grounds were well kept and view of the ocean was really good. (Was quite a walk to get to the beach).  Overall had a great stay.

title: Fantastic stay in Clearwater!
review: Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. I am pleased you started off with a good impression at check-in, it is always nice when your experience starts out on a positive note. Our associates take pride in ensuring that whatever their duties are such as housekeeping or grounds men that they are done correctly to enhance your experience. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience. We do have many rooms with a view and I do apologize that your room was not one. I do hope you caught a little breeze while enjoying that sun and that you found many sights to explore. We look forward to your return visit.

title: Lovely accommodations with a fluffy cloud-like bed
review: Having high Sheraton status, on arrival we were upgraded to a large balcony room overlooking the ocean, superb view. Very comfortable rooms with everything you need, very helpful staff who are knowledgeable about the area and what to do. Parking is secure and easy. The Tiki bar by the beach is a great way to relax with a chilled cocktail. Highly recommend this hotel and I think the only area for improvement is the food. Great for lunch type sandwiches, light food, but not great for the evening. We ate out every night after the first night.

title: Excellent location, excellent beach
review: I am delighted that we were able to upgrade you to a lovely room with a view and that you found the room to be comfortable. Our associates enjoy being able to help our guests enjoy all the area offers.and they are very knowledgeable,.they truly enjoy the interaction with our guests. It is a slice of paradise to be able to relax on the beach or around the pool and then refresh with a chilled cocktail from our Tiki bar and hopefully catch a beautiful sunset. I am disappointed as I am sure you were also that you did not enjoy our evening fair. We do have an award winning and talented culinary staff. There are many venues in the area for dining so I am sure there was not a shortage of choices. We look forward to a future visit if ever you plan a return to the area.

title: Paradise
review: Greeted by friendly staff upon arrival. Entered room, which was very clean and had it's own climate control on wall.  Loved the goodies in the bathroom, including a little loofa scrub - nice touch!   Although, the light fixture over the vanity has harsh lighting (not flattering for make-up application), I have no complaints.  I felt like I was sleeping on a cloud!  Bedding and pillows were quite comfy!

title: resort staff
review: Once again Janet at the front desk made our stay fantastic her customer service skills are superior compared to anyone else you have on staff there. actually she is best customer service minded person I have ever had the pleasure of meeting! HANG ON to her she does more for your resort than you can ever imagine. Thanks Jan !!!!!!

title: Last Minute Family Vacation
review: Janet is a ray of sunshine and truly enjoys her guests she is an asset and I have shared your comment with her. All our associates truly want to ensure that you our guest enjoy your experience with us and return again. Janet along with all our associates look forward to your return.

title: beautiful beach
review: Somewhere under the Rainbow on Labor Day weekend.  Thanks for a wonderful mini-vacation.  Our family can always count on Sheraton Sand Key for a last minute trip at an affordable price that gives us the feeling of being at an exotic location even though it's less than an hour from Tampa, FL.  We really enjoyed the professional staff, great food and the view was amazing as always.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

title: A beachside departure from the hustle and bustle of Clearwater Beach.
review: Somewhere over the rainbow sea gulls fly, Dolphins play and memories are made. Beautiful sunsets and amassing views surround us at the Sheraton Sand Key, we are always pleased to welcome you to our island and share the peace, tranquility and family fun. Janet is a ray of sunshine and truly enjoys her guests she is an asset and I have shared your comment with her. All our associates truly want to ensure that you our guest enjoy your experience with us and return again. I am also pleased to hear you enjoyed the talents of our Executive Chef and his culinary staff. Janet along with all our associates look forward to your return.

title: Great Place to relax at the Beach
review: Staff was great very friendly and helpful....we had just stayed several nights n Orlando at a less than nice hotel so this was very refreshing clean rooms clean area. Kids loved the pool area and free games at the beach...oh the beach could not have been nicer..cant remember place we ate breakfast but just ask front desk its n a strip mall area across the street u must try but prepare for the wait again was very clean for a standard hotel

title: Back Again and Glad We Were!
review: This is just an update, since I reviewed the hotel in 2013 when we first came here. I am happy to say that it remains the pinnacle of service and friendliness. When we checked in at 10 pm, the desk person told us they had a room with an ocean view available ( no extra charge) if we wanted it. (He said that he had to "ask" because this room had 2 queens instead of our requested king, so he wouldn't move us w/o our permission...) We said "of course!", and so instead of our usual "Bay View", we were treated to an Ocean View, Thank you!  The thing that strikes me the most is how friendly EVERYONE who works here is - whether it be a supervisor, a doorman, a maintenance worker or a maid - no one passes by w/o a smile and  saying "hi". Every morning I went for an early run outside, and…

title: Relaxing vacation
review: It was delightful to read your review nothing pleases us more than a guest who truly enjoyed the experience of being here with us on The Island of Sand Key. It was a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your room upgrade and that you were able to enjoy your stay right up to the last minute. Our associates truly enjoy the interaction with our guests. They are warm, caring, efficient and genuinely friendly. It is a great place to run, there are also some great trails in Sand Key Park. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Very nice hotel and staff
review: Excellent stay at the sand key resort. My family and I stayed the week of 8/24/15. We absolutely enjoyed it. The hotel staff was outstanding, everyone is so friendly & helpful. The front staff and concierge were always ready to converse and give out local hot spot tips. The pool staff was great and pool area was always in tip top shape, Nancy in the island grill and her staff were fabulous. Nelson and Craig from the pool bar & pool cafe were courteous and provided excellent service. I am from New Jersey, so the walk to the beach was no biggie and the beach was beautiful.Did jet skis two days with my kids,was a blast. The resort store staff is fantastic and coffe was slamming( according to wife). Our room was always in tip top shape. Did the Clearwater aquaruim with my little…

title: Lovely Hotel, Lovely Location
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I will share your comments with Nelson, Craig, Nancie and her staff, thank you. I am so pleased that your daughter got to meet our local Movie Star “Winter” and friends. I bet she will love sharing such happy memories for years to come. It sounds like Dad had a good time on the Jet Skis and the kids. Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. We do offer something for everyone. The coffee is Starbucks and we are pleased your wife enjoyed and hopefully she enjoyed this beach escape and relaxed in the sunshine. Unfortunately, though we renovate constantly, we are unable to change the size of the room. We have also looked into several options for re-designing the bathroom, however, we have not found a solution that does not take away from the rest of the room.  Rest assured these items are always on our mind and we do hope that someday we will find an improvement. Your loyalty is very important to our resort and to Starwood Hotels. We will look forward to having you join us again in the near future.

title: Beach too far
review: Our room was very nice and clean with a side view of the ocean.  It had a king bed that was clean and comfortable and a sitting chair that was very much appreciated.   All the staff was great.   The front desk could not be nicer and house keeping was right there when was asked then to clean our room when we went out. Unfortunately there were tons of kids all over the pool area and the ocean beach was a LONG walk from the hotel.   This would be my only complaint as it appeared to be a beachfront resort and its a good 2 block walk on sand to get to the ocean.  But we had a great time visiting the surrounding areas.

title: Great hotel but no umbrellas by the loungers at the pool
review: This is a great hotel, can't fault anything except there are no umbrellas by the loungers at the pool, so there is no shade. So people have to sit on chairs at tables with umbrellas, which is not as relaxing at the loungers. It's an easy issue to fix so not sure why the hotel hasn't fixed it already.

title: Very nice location with great service
review: It is very satisfying to hear that most of your expatiations were fulfilled during your stay. You don’t need much to enjoy a day at the pool. Clear skies, warm weather, cool breezes, a good book and liberal amounts of sunscreen and lots of shade. I have shared your comment with the appropriate people and hopefully that issue will be rectified soon.

title: Great vacation
review: Stayed here for a few days while visiting the area.  The accommodations and staff are great.  This hotel is a conference center as well so there was a large group staying at the hotel during our stay.  The pool is very nice however it is very small for the size of the hotel.  The beach is great, although it is a decent walk from the hotel to the water front.  We ate one meal at the hotel restaurant and it was average.  It was breakfast so the meal was part of the buffet that was available, but it was not exceptional by any means.  The hotel is rather old but they have done an amazing job of keeping it in great shape.  It's obvious that some upgrades are needed to the building itself to make it seem a little newer but there were no real issues or concerns with anything.  All of…

title: #1 Hotel Choice in Sand Key...but, there aren't many 4- 5 star choices.
review: As a top year-round destination Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. We are pleased you enjoyed our location. The beach does promote relaxation and play; we have Volley Ball, Beach Tennis, Corn Toss and Jet Ski’s or you can just lounge about. Yes we do have a new pool on the top of our wish list, hopefully soon. I have also shared your comments on breakfast buffet with our Executive Chef to be addressed. The beach is a bit of a walk but well worth it especially when you are relaxing and enjoying the sounds of waves crashing along the shore. Yes we do have many conferences, we take pride in blending and creating a pleasant environment for both leisure guests and conference attendees. I thank you for recognizing our ongoing renovations. We will look forward to your next stay.

title: Nice hotel
review: Excellent service, great food and great location. The manager jerry was very helpful and accommodating.  The store in the lobby was nice if we needed anything.  Food was very fresh.   We would definetly return!

title: Staff Makes this Hotel A Must Stay
review: I can't say enough about our stay.  We stayed for 2 nights to celebrate our 3 kids birthdays and my own as well.  The staff at the front desk, were awesome, and somehow placed a wonderful birthday cake up to our room, when we were out by the pool.  This kids were amazed.  There is a bit of a walk to the beach from the hotel, but it isn't that bad.  The pool is rather small, but adequate.  It does have separate kids pool and a secluded hot tub, which was nice.  We dined at the 2 open restaurants, both were very good, but did have some moderate service times.  Even though they were doing some clean up from the recent flooding in Tampa, it never felt intrusive. We will definitely return to this hotel in the future.  A+++

title: Home Sweet Home Away From Home
review: Perfect family vacations are days cherished; in some of our lives there are only a few moments when you can choose to pause from the daily life we all lead and life long memories are made. It was gratifying to read your review and that your experience was success. How much fun celebrating family birthdays together and having fun in the sun. Our associates are genuinely friendly and professional. I was pleased that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! They genuinely enjoy being able to do the little thoughtful things that make your stay memorable … such as sending a birthday cake. I have shared your comment with the service times with the Food & Beverage Director, it will be addressed in training. I also thank you for being so understanding about the flooding. We will look forward to your return

title: Stay away unless you like old, crowded and noisy
review: My husband and I checked in on Thursday August 13th. Our stay this time was for home buying in the Clearwater/Palm Harbor area. Our check in was fast and welcoming smiles all around. Our room was amazing as usual. Updated, with a great view of the gulf on the third floor above the tennis courts. Very quiet!!!! We ate at Rusty's Bistro, and the Island Grille. Drinks from the Turtle Bar were fantastic. A shout out to Ester, who is such a lovely lady, and bubbly personality. Thanks to Estefan, whose service at Rusty's Bistro was way above par. And of course the amazing Jerry Walters, who is always there with a story or two, and a few laughs. Thanks for making our stay at the Sand Key, another amazing stay!!!!!

title: Nice for couple of nights
review: Welcome Home!!! We thank you for your loyalty to the Sheraton Sand Key It is always satisfying to hear that our guest’s experience is what they anticipated. It is also gratifying to read that your experience with our associates is always very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Frist impressions can set the tone for your whole stay … I have shared your comment with Jerry, Ester and Estevan, and they thank you. We do have a talented culinary staff they are very creative and the server staff is very professional. Our Executive Chef ensures there are many options in all the Food and Beverage Outlets. I am pleased you enjoyed your dining experiences.  We were so pleased that you enjoyed our miles of beautiful beaches; they are lovely, a place to enjoy each other without the outside interruptions of everyday life. We look forward to your next visit

title: Another Great Stay
review: We arrived right before 4pm check-in time. We had a room with 2 queen beds reserved. When we got to the room, it was on the first floor, right by the only exit from the hotel to go out to the pool/beach - so noisy can't describe it. We lasted about 10 minutes and went back to the front desk. They said the place was "sold out" and the only thing they could do was to move us to a single king bed room with a rollaway for our 20 yr old son. As our only option, we agreed to that. Jerry at the front desk did give us vouchers for 2 breakfast buffets which was nice. The room we ended up in had a view of the tennis court and road used by the maintenance trucks. Couldn't sit on the (small) balcony because we were right above some huge a/c units that wailed 24/7. Bathroom was small with…

title: Great hotel!
review: The staff was very friendly and welcoming. The hotel is beautiful. Our room was spacious and the bed was really comfy. The pool is great and there's a private beach, which was also a great site for sunset watching! Had the breakfast buffet and the staff was so attentive. I have a dairy allergy and the manager (JoAnn) was so knowledgeable and helped me to eat well and stay safe! Family-friendly, yet still a lot of professionals around and a 24 hour convenience shop.

title: Awesome family resort; private beach; club lounge is a MUST
review: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback; it is truly appreciated. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. It is always gratifying to hear that you stay was a success. It is our goal to ensure you experience was exactly what you anticipated. Mother Nature’s canvas, purple, pink and orange mix in a little gray, yes the sunsets are beautiful. Our beds are “Sweet Sleeper” beds and were purchased for your comfort. Our associates concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I will share your comment with JoAnne she is very knowledgeable. All of our servers are trained on all food allergies, your health and safety are one of our main concerns.  I hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you in the future.

title: Family getaway
review: We came to this hotel for 7 days with 4 kids (ages 12.8, 5, 4) and it was a great experience.  We had 2 conjoining rooms and that worked out great.  The bathrooms are TINY so if you're swaying between getting 1 room or 2, I would definitely go with 2.  And oceanfront is a MUST.  The club lounge is the best we've ever visited and we've visited many.  Free continental breakfast (which was nothing to brag about... oatmeal was the hot option every morning).  But the afternoon snacks and drinks were SO great!  We looked forward to it every day.  We didn't even have to eat out for dinner since the snacks were enough to fill us all up!  And the free wine, cocktails, and beer was really nice.  Mia and Peggy in the club lounge were so amazing and helpful!  Yes it's a haul to the beach…

title: A bit dated but enjoyed our stay. Flooded between beach and hotel
review: I am delighted that your stay was successful! This a great place for children, they certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico to play and splash in. The beaches of Sand Key perfect for building sand castles, dolphin sightings, shell collecting and using your imagination when spotting the pirate ship on the horizon. They can explore Sand Key Park which also provides perfect running and nature trails. Mom and Dad enjoying a tropical cocktails at the Turtle Bar or just lounging on the beach watching the children play. Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise.  I am also Pleased that you enjoyed the Sheraton Club and I have brought your comments to the attention of those concerned, Mia and Peggy thank you. A new pool is on the top of our wish list also, hopefully it will be soon.  I agree that the design of the bathroom needs to be addressed. We are unable to change the size and lay out of the bathrooms due to losing space in the sleeping area. We are always looking into workable solutions. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Pleasant family stay at the Sand Key Resort
review: Had a great time in a family friendly environment. Wanted to mention Jeanne at front desk who made us feel very welcome, and steve the bellmen who treated the kids as part of the family. They are assets to the resort. The kids love it and we will return.

title: Sheraton Sand Key Clearwater
review: What an amazing hotel in an amazing setting! The Clearwater Beach and Sea was stunning! A high point of our stay. Stunning Hotel, Pool, Food and Service was fantastic. A long drive from Miami and we were greeted by Janet on reception who was so welcoming and a lovely person. All the staff we so friendly and always there to help.  Will defo stay here again next time we come to Clearwater!  Say thanks to Janet!! From Sean, Janet & Family!

title: Easy access to fun!
review: As a top year-round destination, Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. Our goal is to provide our guests with a memorable and enjoyable experience from start to finish we are pleased your experience was a success. I am so pleased you enjoyed your dining experience we do have a very talented culinary staff. It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I will share your comment with Janet she is a great addition to the Sheraton Sand Key. We look forward To your next visit.

title: Last Minute Find
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is a bridge away from Clearwater Beach.  There is a trolly that will bring you to areas in Clearwater, but we rented a car (Suburban $350 for the week from Sixt) and there was no charge at the hotel for parking.  The hotel was clean and the service was terrific.  The beach is a distance from the hotel/pool area.  You can rent 2 chairs and an umbrella for $25….each additional chair is $8.  The beach is FULL OF SHELLS!!!  On our last day, there was sightings of jellyfish, but we didn't see any early in the week.  There are lots of good restaurants in the hotel.  On rainy days, they had activities in the ballroom for the kids to hang out and play.  If you are going to hang out at the pool, you can bring floaties or noodles.  We didn't have to worry about…

title: Amazing views of the Golf of Mexico!!
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home.  Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax. Our beach is large and you can defiantly find your own space. There are a new treasures to be found on the shore daily. Thank you for mentioning the rainy day activities, our associate’s main concern is that you enjoy your stay. We try to be proactive when it comes to ideas for entertaining the children. We hope you will return and the weather will be more appropriate for a beach vacation.

title: A relaxing birthday trip.
review: Beautiful white beaches without the overcrowding associated with Clearwater just over the bridge. I observed a number of families from international locations. This was a last minute, same day booking and stay. Views of beach were excellent, room was clean, loved having a balcony to view beach.  There is no valet parking, surprised me for a Sheraton but I haven't stayed in one for years, perhaps there level of services included is decreasing or it's just this local, idk.   Breakfast was not included, however I did eat in the hotel restaurant. Standard buffet fare but no made-to-order omelette station. Everything was the right temp and fresh.   Altho check out was 11. I was able to stay full day at beach and shower in gym before leaving that evening. Luggage stayed at concierge…

title: Very nice resort
review: We stayed here with our grandsons and found it to be very nice. It is a beautiful resort in a nice quiet area with all the amenities we needed. It has a huge beach, that happened to be flooded while we were there, and a nice pool that was very crowded, probably because of the flooded beach. I was disappointed in the prices of everything there. They had a wonderful breakfast buffet, but it was $15.95 for adults and $5.95 for kids under 12.  The Bistro Diner had a great dinner, but was too steep for us ($25-35). The two cafes that offered some less expensive meals closed at 5:00, and we weren't usually ready to eat by then, so we left to eat elsewhere. They had an Internet cafe with computers and a printer which was convenient, but I had password problems and couldn't  use the…

title: Fantastic quick getaway!
review: It does sound as if your family vacation was as anticipated except for the few issues mentioned. We would like to apologies for not reaching those expectations; our food prices are in line with the other area hotels. There are several venues off property with-in walking distance that are less expensive. I sincerely apologize if no one communicated that to you. We thank you for the positive comments on the quality of the buffets. Grand children are the light in a grandparent’s life. I am sure there were many new memories made with your grandsons. Any of our associates would have been pleased to assist you with logging in the pass code for the Link @Sheraton. SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. Becoming a SPG member is free and there are many perks that go along with becoming a member. The beach was flooded due to the water table being high and preventing proper drainage due to the record rains the Tampa area received. The beach is back to normal. Perhaps you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

title: Great beach hotel
review: My husband surprised me with a quick getaway and this was such a relaxing surprise! The hotel is wonderful...it is not the Ritz but it was clean, staff was friendly and accommodating, the restaurants were very good and the amenities were top notch! Our hotel bed was extremely comfortable...we ate breakfast every morning at Rustys Bistro which I thought was FANTASTIC, the "convenience store" on site had everything you could possibly need (or forget) while on vacation, the Tavern was a great spot to grab an after dinner cocktail and in my opinion the pool area was perfect. I read a lot of reviews complaining of the pool size...could it be bigger, of course but was the size troublesome, not in the least! My only complaint was the "lake" you had to tredge through to get to the…

title: Anniversary celebration
review: What a thoughtful husband!!! I am delighted that we were the experience you anticipated. Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. Thank you for your comments. We are pleased you enjoyed our associates as they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests. We greatly appreciate your business! We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the cuisine, and the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds! It is gratifying to hear that you enjoyed your meal in Rusty’s Bistro we do have an award winning culinary staff and they appreciated your comments. The beach is back to normal, the rains encompassed the whole Tampa Bay area. We will look forward to another visit

title: Large wedding party
review: Checking in was a breeze! Being an SPG platinum member, I was upgraded to a terrific king suite. The room huge, with a 50+ inch flat screen tv, desk sofa and wet bar.  The pool could definitely be bigger. But let's face it you're there for the beach! Which is a decent walk from the pool, but well worth it.  You can rent 2 lounge chairs and an umbrella for $25 a day.   A great time was had by all.

title: A most relaxing vacation!
review: As full disclosure, I love this hotel!  I have stayed here many time before and each time I find myself liking the hotel even better.  Even when things go amiss, the hotel staff treats you as you truly matter and that they honestly care about you.  This most recent visit was intended to be a two night relaxation stay.  One of the reasons why I like the Sheraton Sand Key so much is the beach and the pool provide hours of entertainment for our two teenaged children so I don't have to personally entertain them.  Unfortunately, we arrived in the midst of a horrific storm with torrential rains and high winds.  The bad weather continued throughout the night.  I was actually surprised that it was not considered a true tropical storm.  This kind of blew our first evening and morning…

title: A Lovely Weeks Stay
review: You do truly matter … I would like to thank you for being a loyal guest to the Sheraton Sand Key. We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your repeat business! It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Storms such as that are something we do not usually experience unless it is a tropical storm. We do have a very talented culinary staff and I shared your comment with them, they thank you. We are so pleased that you stayed an extra night and enjoyed some sunshine and the amenities we offer.

title: Awesome time here!
review: We travelled as a family and have stayed here once before about four years ago but only for one night. We stayed for a relaxing week after spending 4 nights in Orlando and before travelling on to New York. We weren't too lucky with the weather as it was quite mixed but the hotel did it's best and opened one of the conference rooms for indoor activities during the bad weather for the many children at the hotel, which was a nice touch. We ate mainly at the hotel and the food was really good - in fact Rusty's restaurant is quite highly regarded in the area.  The staff were extremely helpful and friendly and made us feel extremely welcome.  The hotel has a pool which is not huge but is deep and there are signs that there is no lifeguard on duty so you do have to make sure you keep…

title: Not for adults. loud, loud, loud!
review: Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise. I have brought your comments to the attention of those concerned.We are pleased you recognized our associates as they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests. Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. We greatly appreciate your repeat business! We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the cuisine, Rusty’s Bistro is an award winning restaurant and the culinary staff is very talented. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Awesome Resort
review: Spent four nights here. Every single employee we came in contact with was friendly and truly seemed to enjoy working there. We had terrible weather which prevented spending much time outside but the sand volleyball courts looked like fun. I had notified the hotel prior to our arrival that my daughter was celebrating her birthday and there was a birthday cake waiting in our room when we got there! Nice touch Sheraton!

title: Wonderful Getaway!!!
