review: We stayed on the 8th floor, facing Sand Key Park.  Very quiet side of hotel (opposite pool area), still good gulf views from balcony.  Very clean, extremely friendly staff.  We ate breakfast buffet every morning, hit the Mainstay bar in evenings (extensive frozen drink list--YUM).  Well stocked gift shops (including snacks/drinks) and open 24 hrs a day.  Free bottled water in room a very nice touch--especially since we arrived late in evening and it saved us a trip back downstairs.  Be aware---the beach is a good long walk away---and it was flooded when we there (yikes, I'm told this was very unusual due to massive amounts of rain before our arrival).  There are chairs & umbrellas for daily rental.  Pool nice but kinda small & filled quickly on nice days.  Very generous with…

title: Nice hotel....BUT....
review: The rain is over and the sun is shining, and the sand is dry … we are back to normal. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. Yes! A new pool is on the top of our wish list also. We are pleased that you will return soon and may that visit be filled with sunny days.

title: 4 Day Family Trip w/ Toddlers
review: My family stayed 3 nights/mid July at this hotel.  It is located across the bridge, away from the hustle and bustle of ClearwaterBeach, which we really liked because the main part of ClearwaterBeach (where the Hyatt and Hilton are located) is so loud and packed with traffic. We made it a point to only drive into Clearwater to eat during "off-times", which is important, otherwise you'll be sitting in traffic longer than it would've taken you to walk. As for the Sheraton, upon check-in, David (I think, that was the nice gentleman's name at the reception) greeted us with a smile and gave us key cards to our fabulous room, which was located on the 7th floor with a unobstructed view of the Gulf, the beach, and SandKeyPark. We enjoyed free wifi, free use of the fitness room, 2 free…

title: Really Enjoyed our stay at this hotel!!!!!
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy Clearwater beach area and that you had a relaxing and enjoyable experience. Our associates concern for your satisfaction during your time spent at the Sheraton Sand Key is truly their pleasure. Their attention to detail is obvious and they genuinely care. I was pleased that David treated you with warmth and the comfort of home, he is truly a sincere person. I will be pleased to share your comment with him. The free internet, Sheraton Fitness and cocktails must have been because you are a SPG Platinum member, we thank you for your loyalty. A beautiful view is a great way to wake up and to end the day with a view of the sun setting into the Gulf of Mexico. It is a bit of a walk to the shore but worth it as you look for the treasure for the day. We do have transportation to and from the shore if needed. Another pool is truly on the top of our priority list. When it happens we will look forward to your return.

title: Great location!
review: My husband and I were looking for a quick convenient 4 day escape from NJ with a 3 year old and 1 year old and wanted to stay somewhere that we did not have to rent a car and worry about car seats and also wanted a pool and the beach for convenience.  The Sheraton Sand Key was a great hotel for this.  The pool was great, there is a small round kiddie pool for little ones and the beach was gorgeous.  It is definitely a little bit of a walk to get to the water (wide beach) but well worth it and didn't take more than 5 minutes. And if my husband and I weren't each carrying a kid along w/ our gear I would never had even thought twice about the walk.  We packed a bag w/ some snacks and walked out there and rented one of the cabanas for $25 and stayed there for hours.  The water was…

title: Always do a girls trip here!
review: Love this place! One of my favorite hotels in the world! They have a great bar, and a great restaurant ! I love getting a cabana by the beach and just ordering drinks from the bar! Berns restaurant is in great proximity from the hotel and it's a great place to have dinner at !!!  I can't wait to be here in September !

title: So much potential, some upgrades needed
review: Thank you for the positive comments … Vacations with special friends are days cherished; in some of our lives there are only a few moments when you can choose to pause and life long memories are made. A lounge chair in the sun and a tropical drink in hand is the perfect way to relax and forget get those daily pressures we all experience daily. It was gratifying to read your time spent here with your friends is always a success. We are surround by many wonderful venues to dine at and Bern’s is one of the best. We look forward to seeing you in September!!!

title: Family friendly hotel
review: Note the rating: It's a 3-star resort but for that calibre property it's rated a 4 in my opinion.  Read on.... We visited with a large group and overall enjoyed ourselves at the property.  The location is wonderful - much better than the Marriott across the street and other chain hotels/resorts I researched around the area (Renaissance, Hilton, Marriott, Ritz, Westin, etc.).    LOCATION: The main reason for that statement is the beach - this property has a great beach access location next to a county beach park.  Albeit the walk to the ocean from the hotel pool is a bit of a hike - if you have small kids, it's a slight effort but the hotel does offer a golf cart-type transport to those challenged.  And in the summer (which is when we visited), it's HOT and highly recommended for…

title: Summer vacation
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. We are so pleased you enjoyed our location, if you love the beach this is the place to be. Two things determine the size of sand on beaches: the energy (height) of the waves, and the size of the material furnished to the beach. Other things being equal, the higher the average waves on a beach that day, the coarser the sand. We appreciate your in-depth review you definitely covered a lot. Another pool is at the top of our wish list, we realize one is needed. I agree that the design of the bathroom needs to be addressed. We are unable to change the size and lay out of the bathrooms due to losing space in the sleeping area. We are always looking into workable solutions. We are always renovating the hotel, due to the amount of business it is an ongoing project. We hope you will return some day in the future to experience one of our beautiful sunsets.

title: Great hotel, just a bit removed
review: Had a 3 day business meeting at this hotel, not the best idea. It is summer and families with lots of kids are to be expected but races down the hall at 2 am made it tough to sleep. Overall the hotel is nice, rooms updated, food is good, had a lobster bake on the beach, very nice. Pool is small by todays standards but you have the biggest beach at your back door. It is 1/4 mile to the water and it is great sand all the way. worth a visit, esp. if you have kids.

title: Summer Vacation
review: The restaurants in the hotel were fabulous!! I recommend the breakfast buffet at Rusty's.  The hotel was clean and nice but the rooms were kind of small. The elevators seemed to always have problems and were very slow.  Overall, the service and the great location on the beach make this hotel a must for Clearwater. We will be back.

title: Weekend trip
review: Thank you! We appreciate the kind remarks regarding the cuisine, we do have an award winning culinary staff preparing your meals they are so creative and our servers are genuinely friendly and professional. I was pleased that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! They sincerely care … Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches, they are beautiful. I have forward your comment on the elevators to the appropriate person. It could be that we only have those four elevators and it is a very busy place. It is loyal guests such as yourself that take the time to inform us on these issues so we can focus on getting them taken care of properly and in a timely manner. We will look forward to your return.

title: Location, location, location!
review: Very clean hotel with a decent location.  The pool area is very nice, a bit small, but we always found seats.  A bit of a walk to the beach and a little rocky, but the kids loved it.  The room was a nice size.  The biggest disappointment was our view.  We literally looked at air conditioning units from our balcony and had to listen to them churning all day and night (avoid the 4th floor).  Definitely a great family hotel with lots of restaurant choices.  Good restaurants just a walk across the street.  Clearwater beach is about a 15 minute drive.

title: Fell in love with Florida
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. I apologize that the room view did not meet your expectations. There are certain times of the year when we are fully booked and must honor the room type that was reserved. A new pool is truly on our wish list, maybe before your next visit. Perfect family vacations are days cherished and we are happy you choose the Sheraton Sand Key for your time away. We hope you will be planning a return visit.

title: Enjoyable stay nevertheless
review: Right on the beach, great room with a gulf view for $200 per night on the 6th floor with breakfast, can't complain at all.  The pool is a little small but we had a great time with my daughter, walking on the beach, sunset pictures and only a short drive into Clearwater at night.

title: Over priced
review: Nice resort, but lots of additional charges.  Do not stay in a coastal view room.  The rooms are over the garbage area/delivery area/employee entrance and over the roof of part of the resort.  The A/C units on the roof make it impossible to hear the ocean and the garbage area was constantly busy with trash and recycling pick ups and smelled horrible.  Employees coming and going all day.  Not a balcony worth sitting on.

title: Just Average
review: Thank you, it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. We greatly appreciate your patronage as a guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and want to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area.  Most of the other resorts in the area charge a nightly resort fee. We have opt not to charge a resort fee and only charge for amenities used. I apologize that the harbor view room did not enhance your stay. There are certain times of the year when we are fully booked, we do our best to upgrade to the best possible room. Our rates vary throughout the year as they are based on the season and on occupancy. That amount differs in the off season. You can watch for specials on our web site.

title: nice hotel, but....
review: Very small parking lot.  Rooms were just okay.  Our view was lousy, as we were on the side of the building & could barely see the beach.  The restaurant downstairs was excellent, though.  I'd highly recommend that place for brunch or dinner!

title: July 4th long weekend getaway
review: I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer. Unfortunately, there are certain times of the year when we are fully booked and must honor the room type that was reserved, I apologize for your view. Yes we could use a bigger parking lot; the  issue is in expanding to where … We are on an Island that is not very wide, to build a parking garage would limited the room views even more. I am pleased you enjoyed Rusty’s Bistro they do have a very talented and creative culinary staff.

title: Nice Resort and Family Vacation
review: This was a nice, clean hotel with a friendly staff that was right on the beach (which was great for watching sunsets), but the poolside cafe closed in the early afternoon and the bar closed at sunset even though the pool and beach was still crowded. It would have been fun and lively to keep services in the pool area till later. Maybe even some music or entertainment would have been nice. (They shut off the music at sunset and really closed up.) The other thing that would have been nice is they could have provided a continental breakfast. Oh, and the kicker was that we had to pay for wifi.

title: Family Reunion
review: We stayed at this hotel cause was  set for our 20th family reunion.It was a great stay.Free parking,complimentary wi-fi,clean and confortable room with a Starbucks coffee machine and ocean view.The  staff were very attentive and friendly.It is a nice place to stay!

title: Very  clean and quiet
review: Thank you for your comments. We are pleased you recognized our associates as they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests, their friendliness is genuine. We greatly appreciate your business and hope you will return. We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the amenities and the comfort of the resort. Family reunions, whether held once a year or less often, are important for many reasons in particular. They bring family members together, they offer opportunities for family members to reconnect with one another, share old memories and make new memories that will last a lifetime. We hope many memories were made during your stay.

title: Lovely hotel, but not totally smoke free
review: We booked this hotel on a whim not knowing really what to expect. I was a little bit nervous knowing that the hotel is 40 years old, but I must say it is maintained superbly. You would not know it was an older hotel. The location is great just a 2  from pier 60 in Clearwater but across the inlet so it's so much more peaceful and a much quieter beach. Our package included breakfast which was a decent buffet but nothing spectacular. The pool is a little small but adequate with a baby pool and hot tub but my favorite was the pool bar.  Every staff member that I encountered were extra nice and went above and beyond the call of duty from check in, the bell hops and housekeeping. I was really impressed with the beach, warm water white sands and crystal clear water with an abundance of…

title: Good location but very noisy room.
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy.  You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, dolphin sightings, shell collecting. It is our associate’s goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. They are genuinely warm and caring and sincerely enjoy interacting with the guests. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our tranquil Island and the activity of Clearwater Beach. We hope you will return in the near future to once again enjoy our beautiful beaches.

title: Great Stay
review: My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay here; however as a Starwood member, I am finding that hotels vary in their definition of "smoke-free property".  This hotel does permit smoking on the property.  I believe there are three designated smoking areas.  I seek out properties that are totally smoke-free, so I may not be staying here in the future.  It is a lovely hotel and the beach is wonderful. As a preferred member, I was hoping for free Wifi, but it was not offered to me.  The room was very clean and comfortable.  The room view was not great-- view of bay, but also the air-conditioning units on the roof below!

title: A week of fun
review: This place was great!! My grandmother arrived a day later then us. We were pool side and I normally grab her bags and park her car. The front helped her with everything. They were nice on recommendations of restaurants and directions. The staff was always polite and one ever took a moment to "walk" (pageant) with my daughter. They both laughed. Great place to unwind

title: June 2015
review: Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise. Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. They are very knowledgeable on where to dine and what is happening in the area. Our goal is to provide our guests with a memorable and enjoyable experience from start to finish. It sounds as if your family’s stay will be a fun memory for many years to come. This is a great place to come for relaxation therapy.

title: A Great Resort
review: Stayed here for 3 days at the end of our holiday - very relaxing . The private beach is immaculate with comfortable beds &  bar service. The staff were very attentive & friendly.   I am a regular guest from Scotland & look forward to my next visit.

title: Not as expected
review: What a great way to end a busy holiday … It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. We love being here on tranquil Sand Key, we are way from hustle and bustle of Clearwater Beach but close enough if you enjoy the activity. Our beach does promote relaxation; for some Paradise can be sunshine, the sound of the surf, a comfortable lounge chair and a tropical drink in hand. I hope you enjoyed a beautiful sunset before you sank into the comfort of our “Sweet Sleeper’ Bed. We will look forward to your return.

title: great vacation
review: The family and I spent two nights at this resort. We had a deluxe room with a view of the gulf and pool. This hotel is directly on the beach. I was on the SPG preferred guest floor. It was breathtaking. The room was nice, clean and had two large queen size beds. The staff was friendly and cheerful. The pool area was really nice. There was staff available if you wanted to do any beach activity. The bar staff was very friendly. We had lunch at the restaurant at the pool. The food was good, reasonably priced, and again, the staff was really nice. In all, we had a great time. I would go back.

title: Time to relax
review: Great beach.  Nice pool area.  Ocean was great.  Watching dolphins was fun.  If you can't walk and expect uncle Sam to carry you to the beach try another spot.  It is a 5 min walk from hotel to beach.  It was great to walk out there.  You are really away from traffic and noise.  Great sunsets.  I only ate there once.  Not real impressed with food but the drinks were great.  Made you forget what you doing.   Room was nice.  We upgraded to ocean side.  The scenery was great except the wife busted me watching the "wild" life.  I would go back for sure.

title: Best Experience
review: We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time relaxing and that you enjoyed your stay. It is here that you can tune out the world, your worries and your obligations and just reflect. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience. Arrangements can be made if someone needs assistance to and from the water’s edge just dial “0” or stop at the Front Desk. Florida remains a supremely wild place. The beach is one of the best places to spot the state’s awesome wildlife bounty, Dolphins, birds, turtles and so much more. We greatly appreciate your patronage as a loyal guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and want to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area

title: A bit dated
review: This has by far been the best experience, of warmth, hospitality, superior customer services, from all departments, from bellman to front desk, to housekeeping, to Restaurants staff, to Clubroom, fitness room, to bar and pool staff, beautiful sea views......Room 110 stay, definitely will return :-)

title: Amazing getaway
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. So pleased when we are able to share. I am thrilled to hear your experience was all you anticipated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; I am pleased you were treated with the warm, caring and efficient attitude our associates are known to give. You enjoying your stay is their priority. We look forward to your next visit.

title: Too noisy.  Kids running up and down the halls, pounding on walls, family feud unil 2 am.
review: We had stayed at the Sheraton Sand Keys a few years ago and decided we would spend three nights of our holiday there again this time. The hotel is in a beautiful location right on the beach at Sand Key. We were checked in efficiently. The room was a decent size with two double beds but what annoyed me right away was that one of the duvet covers was a mess of creases. It just looked like it hadn't been ironed. The bathroom is really tiny with just the bath and toilet and the sink and vanity is outside in the bedroom. The bath looked like it could do to be replaced as there was a lot of stains on it. The pool area is very nice with a small pool bar which did excellent cocktails. I didn't think the service was very great in the bar from one of the waitresses. She seemed like she…

title: The plan was to have no plans
review: We were very much looking forward to our week’s stay in FL. We were also impressed upon arriving to the hotel, although they were VERY busy, we were greeted and helped promptly. Check in was at 3:30; we arrived about 5-5:30 and our room was not ready yet. We left our luggage with concierge and went outside to the outdoor bar for a drink. With-in 30 minutes our room was ready; compared to the lobby, on-site amenities and prompt bar service, the room was lack luster. I didn’t feel it was in-line with the overall feel of the hotel and for the price per night, I did expect a little more. One plus to the room was an in shower clothes line that swim wear could hang dry on. The water pressure was very weak and often fluctuated temperature, VERY little counter space is available. Better…

title: Beach Getaway
review: Thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key for your "no plan stay". Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; I am pleased you were treated with the warm, caring and efficient attitude our associates are known to give. I apologize for your delay in arrival to your room. It does seem as if you took advantage all your time here. I am terribly sorry that your impression of the room was not as you had expected. SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. The fluctuating water pressure and temperature have been addressed. It is not hard to enjoy time on this beach; lots of sun, shade when needed, the sounds of the waves, liberal amounts of suntan lotion and maybe a good book. Sunsets are an event in itself and there are many places to enjoy that event “The Barrier Islands” is one long island, but is home to the following beach towns: Sand Key, Belleair Beach, Belleair Shore, Indian Rocks Beach, Indian Shores, Redington Shores, North Redington Beach, Redington Beach and Madeira Beach. Each beach offers a diverse array of people. You will find many places to explore and sites to see. We hope you will make a future visit.

title: GREAT STAY
review: Spent a few days getting away from it all on the beach. The room was phenomenal! We had a great time with all the things to do and went constantly from the beach to the hot tub and back for a nap in the most comfortable beds ever! And then did it all again! Very close to shopping, grocery and great food choices but far enough away that the crowds of the main beaches don't bother with you.

title: Sisters wedding
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy life’s we lead daily. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key. You can always find a spot on our 10 acers of beach just for you. The Sheraton “Sweet Sleeper” Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. All were chosen with your comfort in mind, I am pleased we succeeded. Yes! I must agree there are many great restaurants in the Clearwater area. Our signature restaurant Rusty’s Bistro has an award winning culinary staff. We look forward to seeing you when you next need to Getaway.

title: Always a nice stay
review: Wonderful service! Great location, close but far enough from the Clearwater beach. Nice and clean! Wonderful wheelchair accessible place !   We will definitely go back! There is just one pool and its on a small size. Plenty of parking. Beautiful very private beach :)

title: Great Chill Hotel
review: We all descended ( 10 in total) on this hotel after a hectic!!!! week in the Disney Parks. The age of our party went from 60 through to 18 months and everybody totally enjoyed themselves. Yes the pool isn't huge , however over the course of our stay we taught our five year old to swim both above and under the water, so big enough. Rustys Bistro is an excellent choice for the evening meal and given that we had an 18 month in our party , were excellent with us all. All very attentive and knowledgeable. Suggest you check out all you eat buffet...Sand Key is a lovely alternative to Clearwater Beach so suggest you give it a try, we did and really enjoyed. As for the staff excellent..

title: Beach Vacation
review: I am sure after the fun of Disney a relaxing stay on the tranquil beaches of Sand key was more than needed. Building sand castles, catching the waves, time in the pool and spotting the Dolphins at play was a perfect time for the children. Then for the older ones volley ball, beach tennis, corn toss and looking at the sites was enjoyable. Walking the beach, shelling, and reflecting on the enjoyment of it all was perfect for the rest. I am sure we will be part of your five year olds memories for a long time to come. We are pleased to have an award winning and talented culinary staff in Rusty’s Bistro and pleased you enjoyed their creations. The staff serving you are knowledgeable and sincerely enjoy the interaction with our guests. Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize all of our outstanding associates. They truly enjoy going above and beyond to make your stay special. We are thrilled your vacation was one to remember and hope to see you again soon!

title: Nice hotel lacking pool facilities
review: I was debating between 3 or 4 stars.  While the hotel is very clean and well maintained, the pool is very small and there isn't much to do in the hotel.  The beach is nice and private, and the walk did bother me at all.  I just wish there was a little more nightlife or things to do at the hotel.

title: Nice beach hotel
review: Our associate take much pride in ensuring that the grounds and hotel are well maintained, we thank you for recognizing the work that they do. The beach is 10 acres so there is plenty of room to find your own private space. Although there is not much night life in the hotel … just 2.0 miles across the bridge is Clearwater Beach and it offers a variety of live bands and entertainment. We have many options for inexpensive public transpiration if you do not care to walk or drive. This gives you the best of both world’s relaxation on Sand Key or the activity of Clearwater Beach.

title: GREAT WEEKEND
review: We had a king room and found it roomy, clean and comfortable.  Bathroom small but okay for two.  AC great cold as u want. We usually go to sand destin or marco island but only had a few days and wanted to try somewhere new.  Very easy access from Tampa airport maybe 45 minutes. We are custom to resort pool areas and this place does not have one.  Small pool and crowded.  Food choices at pool side very poor. Beach was nice however a pretty good walk.  Most comfortable beach chairs ever. All personnel was very friendly and even remember from one day to the next your name and what u ordered.  Would go back someday but a new pool would really help

title: Below average for a 4star hotel
review: At last a hotel I did not love which will show my reviews are true! At reception were told we were upgraded to a sea and pool view- no we had a view of a palm tree and the back of the pool snack bar which left it's rubbish in a bin bag underneath our patio and stank of old food(fish) on all 3nights of our stay- was removed by time we came back late evening so did not use balcony! Air conditioning unit faulty so first night was like sleeping with a plane taking off every time it came on- complained and fixed to one that made a whining noise ! So not much sleep ! Then the paper coffee cup which leaked all over me! Side seam not sealed! Restuarants not great - advised to book Rusty's when we were one of four tables occupied- not much atmosphere that night! Next night went to other…

title: Above Average, but a few cautions
review: I sincerely apologize as it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Not meeting our goals and your expectations is very concerning. We have noted your comments and they will be shared.

title: Magnificent sunset viewing
review: We were attending a small conference at the Sheraton Sand Key.  Generally the meeting facilities were excellent.  We were there during the Stanley Cup Playoffs, so we were concerned about noise.  We needn't be.  Our room was quiet with a nice view.   It was well furnished but needed some new equipment to support computers, cell phones, and tablets.   At additional cost, the restaurant has a breakfast buffet.   I would not recommend it.   It was only slightly better than other buffets that are free in many hotels.   The beach is very nice and relatively empty.  However, it is a walk from the hotel.

title: Outstanding place for a family vacation!
review: We try to ensure that your meetings are impeccably planned and followed up by our experienced Sales Department and that it is done in a warm and comfortable environment. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. II am pleased we succeed in meeting your expiations. Ah! The Stanley Cup there was so much going on in Tampa that is where everyone went to watch the game. I am pleased you enjoyed quietness. I shared your comment with the head of our Systems department and they are working on upgrading that equipment. Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their long, wide Island beaches and our beach is private so there is not many people on it, you can always find your own space. Yes it is a bit of a walk … I also shared you comment on the breakfast buffet with our Executive Chef. I do hope you will return for another visit in the near future.

title: What a beach!
review: Our room overlooked the pool and beach, and from our balcony, we were able to enjoy absolutely beautiful sunsets. Went for a late night swim when we first arrived, and found the water temperature to be perfect. The beach was not crowded at all. For $25/day, you can rent an umbrella and cushioned  lounge chairs, but you  do have to bring towels from the pool. The room was comfortable, but the bathroom was tiny and awkward. There was way too little counter space on the one sink. The shower/toilet was so small that it was uncomfortable.  We stayed on one of the club floors, so had access to the lounge which had a lovely daily breakfast and hors d'oeuvres every evening. The staff in the lounge was friendly and kept it well stocked. We were not able to get a late checkout but wanted…

title: Best Sunset in Florida!
review: Stayed for first week in June as part of a 2 week Florida vacation - second week in Orlando; yes, i agree, it should nave been the other way round in order to recover from the hectic 'park' life but our personal situation prevented this - one of my sons was unable to join our party until towards the end of the first week! A beautiful hotel ( a tad expensive and possibly in need of a 'face-lift' or freshening up - but NOT a criticism) set on a magnificent beach, away from the hustle of the town, ideal for a quiet and relaxing holiday. Both of our rooms were spacious, very clean and very well maintained, and the beds very comfortable - ideal following a long and tiring journey. The cleaning staff were excellent, bottled water and coffee topped up daily - only forgot to top up the…

title: View,service and location !
review: It does sound as if your time spent here with your family was filled with many memorable moments for all. We are pleased to have been able to contribute to those memories. We are always pleased when our guest are out and about exploring all this area has to offer, Restaurants theme parks, snorkeling and Jet Skiing … My you were busy. What a great way to end your day it is breathtaking to see our sunsets they are some of Mother Nature’s most beautiful work and the Dolphins love to entertain. We appreciate the kind remarks regarding the rooms and the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds! I have shared your comment on the associates with housekeeping. Thank you for visiting “Our Island” return soon.

title: Great visit
review: An awesome hotel for sun and sand and convenience ! The strip of beach is very private albeit a bit of a walk from the hotel . The breakfast is sumptuous . The rooms very clean and well kept. Slightly expensive if you are booking closer to your visit.  The pool is very good but very crowded all the time ! All in all an excellent stay !!

title: great time
review: It is very satisfying to hear that your expatiations were fulfilled during your stay. If you love the sun and sand you have chosen the right place to be. You don’t need much to enjoy a day at the beach. Clear skies, warm weather, not too many people and liberal amounts of sunscreen. Of course a comfortable, clean room, surrounded by warm, caring and efficient associates all makes it a perfect beach getaway. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge, it gives you the true Island experience. It’s here that you can tune out the world, your worries and your obligations and just relax and reflect. We would love for you to return … Please note that hotel room rates fluctuate depending on the level of business, seasonality and events in the area. Usually, during periods of low activities the rates may drop significantly, you can check our web site for special prices. We will look forward to your return.

title: Awesome!!
review: Right on the beach. Lots of sand. Nice rooms, Quiet and relaxing. Great front desk service. Only problem was I was at a conference there and didn't get to spend enough time enjoying the amenities. Would be a nice place for a family. Had a great view from the window. Everything was kept up.

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Just got back from a 6 night stay!  We enjoyed every minute of it! We were on the club level, room 642 (last room at the end of the hall) with a great view of the ocean and the pool. Our room was clean, updated and the beds were super comfy. We decided to go for the breakfast and happy hour for $40 a day and were not disappointed.  The women that worked in the club level area were wonderful.  My 8 yr daughter really enjoyed talking with Mia and each night she made sure to gave her a small bowl of chips which was awesome to an 8 year old.  We ate at Rusty's one night for all you could eat crab legs and prime rib.  My husband said it was delicious.  We also ate at Mainstay Tavern a few times and the café at the pool. Both were enjoyable.  I highly recommend staying here instead of…

title: Outdated rooms, small pool, far from the beach
review: Your time spent here with your daughter must have been filled with many memorable moments for all of you. We are pleased to have been able to contribute to those memories and that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key, Mia is quickly becoming a star and I will share this comment with her and her appropriate manager. It is nice when upgrades are available for Sheraton Club it is a nice way to relax after a day at the beach. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy Clearwater beach area and that you had a relaxing and enjoyable experience. The Sheraton “Sweet Sleeper “beds were chosen for your comfort and it pleases to know they succeeded in being so. We do have a talented culinary staff… Thank you!! We look forward to a return visit.

title: Sorry excuse for a resort.
review: The beaches in the area are very nice, but a little pebbley. This particular area the beach is wide and they rent chairs and an umbrella for $25 a day. But be prepared to walk a good distance to get to the beach from the hotel. I was extremely disappointed with the room. It was outdated and could really use some sprucing up. The bathroom was extremely small...you have to squeeze in beside the toilet in order to close the bathroom door. It's terrible!  I had requested a room with water-view but again...the beach is so far away and all the other rooms that face the parking lot are looking at you. Really awkward. I was very disappointed with this resort..for the amount of money per night, they really need to remodel!

title: Perfect Getaway!
review: I apologize that the room view did not meet your expectations. Your comments are concerning, we are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas. This year new furniture drapes and carpets were put in all rooms. Two things determine the size of sand on beaches: the energy (height) of the waves, and the size of the material furnished to the beach. Other things being equal, the higher the average waves on a beach, the coarser the sand that day. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the water’s edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience. I agree that the design of the bathroom needs to be addressed. We are unable to change the size and lay out of the bathrooms due to losing space in the sleeping area. We are always looking into workable solutions. I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer.  I can assure you your comments will be shared so that improvements can be made.

title: Perfect location. Travel agent review
review: Looks more like a comfort inn than a resort, Very dissatisfied. There's only one pool, which people defecate in quiet frequently. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. There's a bar there which they let kids in?

title: Nice place to unwind
review: Stayed for 5 nights at the Sand Key Resort where we stayed in the beach view club room. Club lounge has good variety of food and drinks with the service delivered with a smile and helpful advice. All provided by the excellent lounge staff. Gym is excellent and well fitted out and maintained. Coin operated washing machine and dryer was a bonus and was found on the sixth floor which took 4 x 25c coins to run each machine.  We stayed in room 734 which was modern and well maintained. Bed was excellent. View of the pool and ocean was great.  Pool area was good with plenty of deck chairs. Deck chairs on the beach cost $27 per day for two chairs and an umbrella.  The only negative was the wrap purchased from the poolside cafe which was soggy. On the flip side the pre-made wraps in the…

title: Family vacation
review: We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time relaxing and enjoying our associates concern for your satisfaction during your time spent at the Sheraton Sand Key. Their attention to detail is obvious and they genuinely care. I am pleased you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy everyday life we all live… Looking out at the water brings a serine feel and the view is beautiful from the 7th floor. Hope you experienced several awesome sunsets? Our “Sweet Sleeper” beds were chosen for your comfort. The pictures on our website are true pictures; the beach to the shore is 1300 feet. Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that an Island experience. How disappointing I do hope you returned the wrap, the same culinary staff out of our main kitchen prepares the wraps and sandwiches throughout the hotel. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Hope to get back a
review: Stayed May 31st-June 4th. Had the best time at this resort, 10 min drive over the bridge to Clearwater. Couldn't have asked for a better family vacation to the beach! One reccomendation the shower head in 328 is rather low for taller people but other than that no complaints what so ever! Can't wait to plan our next trip! Thanks for having us! :-)

title: what a wonderful time
review: It was gratifying to hear that your stay was a success. A place to enjoy being with your family; casual and comfortable, a place to have fun. You can enjoy all the beach activities, go exploring or just relax in the sun. Stroll along the shore and just catching a sunset or go to Clearwater and enjoy the entertainment. I apologize for the shower head, we are constantly renovating at this time we are putting new tubs in some rooms. Hopefully we will get to the shower heads in the future. We look forward to your next stay! Thanks for choosing us

title: Huge beach, great pool and grounds, close but not too far from center of Clearwater Beach
review: Initially, I was a little worried about staying here.  I had needed to change my reservation and was told staff would call me.  After waiting a week, I still had not heard anything and complained via Twitter. SPG and management were quick to help after, and my problem was taken care of. The day of arrival was a nightmare. My daughter had fallen and broken her arm the night before resulting in a very late night ER trip followed by a very early flight. The pain and lack of sleep made travel miserable for her with constant air and car sickness (about 5 hours of travel total). When we finally arrived, I asked if there was anything staff might be able to do to make the day better for her. Kurt at the front desk kindly gave her a small stuffed dolphin (the first time I had seen her…

title: Great beach, outdated room, very small bath
review: The beaches in the area are beautiful, white and clean. This particular area the beach is wide and they rent chairs and an umbrella for $25 a day. Be there early otherwise you will be on the 3rd row. I was very disappointed with the room. It was outdated, the bathroom extremely small. The toilet run all night. I had requested a room with water-view but once there we were given a room facing the parking lot. It was either "that or a wall". We were given 'free wi-fi to make up for the room'

title: Relaxing Hotel, Beautiful beach
review: Welcome to “Our Island” it is the perfect place to catch up on some relaxation therapy. I'm glad that you enjoyed our proximity to the beach and also the surrounding area, I'm sorry that you were not happier with our hotel or the room location. We understand that you had requested a room with a water view and although we try our best to accommodate all our guests, the requests it is not guaranteed due to the nature of our occupancy, I apologize.  Some of our rooms are under renovation, we are always improving the hotel for our guests. I do hope you reported the toilet running, if so Maintence should have repaired it in a timely manner. We appreciate when our guests inform us of issues that have effected their experience so we can better focus on making improvements in that area..

title: Disappointing
review: My boyfriend and I spent a relaxing weekend at the Sheraton Sandview. The room was clean, spacious and modern and the staff was friendly and attentive.Beautiful, easily accessible beach. I'm looking forward to our next visit.  DO: Get a suite with club room access. The extra space and happy hour are worth it!        Check out the Community Sailing Center across the street for sailing, kayaking,         and paddle boarding lessons.         Avoid holidays. We deliberately booked after the holiday weekend to avoid the            crowds. We probably would not have had such an enjoyable time has the resort          been over run with kids or spring breakers.  DON'T: Rent a Car- The trolley and cabs provide affordable access to and around                 Clearwater Beach.

title: Beautiful, clean hotel with pool and beach access!  We are definitely going back!
review: What an excellent and informative review … That is what we specialize in, relaxation and fun memories. It is a great place to enjoy the water sports mentioned and more. We also have many outside activities such as Beach Tennis, Volley Ball, Tennis and Corn-hole. Couch Rhino is always available to give you tips and lessons to help you excel in these activities. Just a few minutes over the bridge we have Clearwater Beach which boasts many fun activities and entertainment, as you said you really do not need a car. Our area has many restaurant venues choices some in walking distance some just a trolley ride away. Our associates truly take pleasure in ensuring you enjoy your stay. I am delighted you enjoyed your suite and the Sheraton Club. It certainly sounds as if you stay was a success and we hope you will return.

title: needs an update
review: This is not a resort, don't let the name fool you. The hotel caters to conventions and weddings and is very busy. The pool is too small for the amount of people using it. The ocean was a long way to walk, maybe 900 yards. At the shoreline the chairs and umbrellas could be rented for $25 per day, but that adds up when you are staying for 15 days, and they were not interested in giving us a discount, so we bought our own at a department store. Lugging them all back and forth was no fun. WiFi in the room was an extra charge per day. But, all the staff were very friendly, the room was very nice, and the food was great. I would not stay there again, however, not for a holiday..

title: lots of nice beach
review: very nice hotel, with a welcoming friendly staff. Great location next to state park and walking distance into Clearwater town. Our only issue was with the walking distance to the waterfront on the beach. There is a major expanse of sand to traverse to get to the Gulf. But the beach is clean and beautiful, and private. The only other nit we had was the beverage cart lady drives up and down the beach in her cart and seemed to park right in front of folks, blocking the ocean view and creating a line of people looking for food and drink. If she would just drive in the lane right behind the umbrella all would be fine. But she seemed to like to park right in front of us! The umbrella and 2 chairs were $25 for the day.

title: Great Family Vacation
review: The Sheraton Sand Key resort is the perfect base for many attractions! The surrounding area offers plenty of options such as as Sand Key Park and much more to fill your vacation. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They remind you that you are truly on an Island beach. When the hotel was built in the 70’s the beach was much closer to the hotel. The Sand Key jetty was built in 1975. Since then sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused a wide beach. Arrangements can be made if someone needs assistance to the water’s edge and back. In reading through your specific comments I do respect your opinion on the beach cart and have shared it with our Food & Beverage Director. We always appreciate when our guest share their feedback, we can then focus on an issue that might otherwise be missed. I am sincerely pleased that you enjoyed your stay and our welcoming staff who are truly genuine. We hope for a return visit.

title: restful vacation
review: We had a wonderful time over Memorial Day weekend! The staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating to my husband myself and our two young children. Courtney checked us in and was so helpful in getting us a quiet room with a great view. The pool was great. The pool bar drinks were good and the food at the hotel was solid. The pool side cafe was convenient for lunch. The walk to the beach is long carrying a child and it would be great if they could put in a board walk or something but there is nothing to complain about when you get there because the water is warm, the beach is beautiful and clean. They had some sand toys left over from other kids so don't bring or buy any! A nice couple even gave us some sand chairs that they had bought when they left. Naturally we gave them…

title: Little Things Mean a Lot -- In a Negative Way
review: Perfect family vacations are days cherished; in some of our lives there are only a few moments when you can choose to pause and life long memories are made. It was gratifying to read your review and to read your experience was success. Thank you, it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. Our associates are genuinely caring as are many of our guests, “paying it forward” by sharing chairs what a nice concept. I have shared your comment with Courtney. We do have transportation to and from the beach for guests with children who need assistance just dial “O” they will help with arrangements. Yes we do have many restaurants in the area, the ones you mentioned are in walking distance. We greatly appreciate your repeat business! We are looking forward to another visit.

title: Two weeks holiday Very disappointed!
review: Decent reasonably priced  food.  Comfortable and well kept room. The pool was well maintained.  >Log walk from the hotel across the beach to the water.  Buffet breakfast was very good with plenty of choices.

title: Wonderful location for a conference or event
review: The staff are service-minded and welcoming, the facilities are well equipped and the hotel has restaurants and snackbars, a store, a business center, an outdoor pool and lovely surroundings for a pleasant and satisfying stay.  I warmly recommend the Sheraton Sand Key for any occasion.

title: Very Pleasant
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. It was pleasing to read that your experience was a success. It is a great place to come and enjoy a relaxing experience with beautiful surroundings and the amenities needed. Thank you for the recommendation it is the most valuable form of customer feedback. We will look forward to your next visit.

title: Heartwarming and friendly
review: We were there for our wedding on the beach. The hotel staff was very nice and the wait staff at the pool bar and the bar in the hotel were excellent.  The housekeeping service was vey slow...often taking till late in the afternoon to clean the room.  The beach was beautiful and the wedding on the beach was memorable! I would stay at this hotel again. Love the Clearwater Beach area!!

title: Nice Beach, Hotel Needs Updating
review: We are delighted to hear that all your dreaming and planning for that very special day became a reality here at the Sheraton Sand Key. Pleased that the experience was as anticipated and certainly what you deserve on your special day. Breathtaking views and awesome sunsets which help make for a beautiful and memorable wedding day. We have noted your comments regarding the room not being cleaned on time and we would like to apologize. Our Housekeeping team services the occupied rooms starting at 8am until 5pm. Our guests may request an earlier service or a precise time to attend to the room by dialing "0" and speaking with the operator or letting the Front Desk know at check-in. We hope you will return for a anniversary.

title: Nice hotel
review: My wife and I needed some long awaited time for ourselves after being apart for a long time due to my deployment abroad. The welcome we got at the Sheraton Sand key was just heartwarming. The staff is utterly proffesional, kind and helpful, and the resort has all you need to make your stay there memorable. Walk down to the beach and watch the sun set in the Mexican gulf - you can't beat it!  Stein

title: Welcoming!
review: My husband and I stayed here last month for the first few days of our honeymoon. Although some elements of the hotel are a little dated (bathroom) our room was comfortable and well appointed. The staff in the hotel were really friendly and helpful, with plenty of tips for things to do in the Clearwater and Tampa area. Facilities in the hotel are good such as the pool, gym and spa treatments (lovely massage) as well as a couple of restaurants/pubs for food and entertainment.  Would recommend if you are looking for a good base in this area.

title: Top Hotel
review: Congratulations!!! Perfect place for a honeymoon beautiful sunsets, lovely views, strolls on the beach and a semi -private beach where you can find your own space.  We want to ensure that we provide a warm and comfortable environment here inside the Sheraton Sand Key also. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We hope you will return.

title: Excellent experience
review: We spent two nights in this hotel and it was a really pleasant stay for us in this hotel! The staff was friendly all the time and every time helpful! As welcome gift we got a voucher for 2 Cocktails and a beach bag filled with cookies and water! Of course the Hotel is not a sheep one but the quality of service and cleanliness in the hole Hotel area  is excellent!so for my opinion the price okay!

title: Excellent service
review: I am always pleased when I read that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! They do truly care. Especially when you add to that your experience was successful. We have noted your comments regarding the pricing of our hotel and services; our rates are very competitive with the same category hotels of the area. Please note that hotel room rates fluctuate depending on the level of business, seasonality and events in the area. Usually, during periods of low activities the rates may drop significantly. Watch the Sheraton Sand web site, we post when special rates are available and come back soon.

title: housekeeping a disappointment, fair overall
review: The hotel was beautiful and the staff were great! We had an ocean view room and it was really nice. The beach house was really pretty, not over crowded, and they have a cart girl that brings you drinks and food! The pool was really nice and the drinks at the pool bar were awesome! Loved the mocha mudslides and bloody Mary. Only thing that could have been better was the food at the pool side cafe. It was okay but they don't offer any grill selections. Overall it was a great stay and we'll definitely go back again!

title: Great Trip!
review: Stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key from Dec. 19-24, 2014 and had a great time! Hotel is on the beautiful Sand Key Beach and just a stone's throw from Clearwater Beach. There are lots of great restaurant options in and nearby the hotel. We had originally book a parking lot view, but we were upgraded to a gulf view for free! Thank you Maurizio! Room 803 was evidently very recently renovated, and was very nice. Balcony in all rooms is a nice touch. Service was great from the valets to the front desk staff and housekeepers. All staff made you feel welcome and right at home. We enjoyed our stay so much we are making this trip a new yearly tradition for our family. Our room is already booked for December 18-24 this year and we are very excited. This hotel is highly recommended to all!

title: A great place to relax!
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience here with us was very positive. The view is beautiful, the Island tranquil especially in December. Hopefully you were able to see several of our breathtaking sunsets. Maurizio is defiantly an asset to the Sheraton Sand Key he genuinely wants to ensure our guests enjoy their stay. Welcome to our family and “Our Island” we will look forward to your annual visits.

title: Just Average
review: We stopped here for 3 nights on our honeymoon. The place looks a little tired but the room size was good with a balcony and good view of the Gulf of Mexico. The best thing about the hotel was the private beach, it is very well looked after and very quiet which is rare for Florida! It also had free parking  which is good considering most people rent a car in Florida. The only negative was if you wanted wifi, it was $10 for 24 hours which is steep.

title: Great hidden gem!
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. If you are looking for a breeze there is usually one to be found here as we are between the Gulf and Intercostal. SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. There is no charge to become a SPG members and it has many perks.

title: Great trip to Sheraton Sand Key
review: The hotel pulling up was absolutely stunning. The building is slightly smaller than the ones around it, but just as impressive.  Check in could have been smoother. My card had to be swiped two times, resulting in two $50 holds... Which meant $50 less to spend around town/at the hotel.  The hallways were dated, but the room was nice and refreshing. We ended up in a room that looked out towards a harbor, and there was a small balcony.. But the balcony lead out over to rooftop of the building and there were several loud machines, and a lot of hot air that blew up which meant that we couldn't really sit out on it. The beach was wonderful. It was a little crowded, but not any more than we expected. We did not eat at the hotel restaurants, but the atmosphere they gave the hotel was…

title: Very nice hotel on the beach
review: This was a very nice stay.  The biggest issue is getting here or anywhere for that matter on Clearwater Beach.  This hotel was off the beaten path and the perfect place to relax.  Nice beach access and a great sports style bar with nice food and salad offerings.  Local beers on tap the usual happy hour deals with all Starwood properties.  The bed was comfortable and the room very nice and clean.

title: sixty/forty
review: We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time relaxing and enjoying our beaches. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. All were chosen with your comfort in mind. We have two trolley systems, taxies and Free Rides available to take you places. We are 2 miles from Clearwater which makes it easy to get to all the activities. We do hope you will return.

title: Sheraton beachfront delivers
review: My husband and I stay at above average and higher end hotels whenever vacationing. This property exceeded all of our expectations except for the pool area - which should be a priority for a beach front property. For accompanying guests at a capacity of over 300 rooms (which could easily yield more than 1200 guests), this was a very small pool area and it was OVERTAKEN by children. They were very loud and this isn't a relaxing environment for us for the one or two weeks per year we escape work. I have no problem sharing my vacay with families and young children, however, when paying for the amenities I feel the adult guest's environment should be important. Perhaps an adult pool? After all, this property boasts '13 acres'.

title: It's the staff that makes this a place to come back to
review: Thank you for your complement, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. We do have many other months when it is a very relaxing, tranquil environment. I am pleased your experience was as anticipated other than the number of children. An adult pool is on our wish list also. We hope you will return at time better suited to your needs

title: wonderful time!
review: My wife and I stayed at this property April 25 for one night upon returning from a cruise out of Tampa. We paid $250 for the night.  Lot of hotels in this area were sold out for this week as it was spring break for a lot of northeast states.  The property is actually on Sand Key which is across an inlet from Clearwater Beach. It is about a 50min ride from the cruise terminal.  It was a 40 minute ride back to Tampa Bay airport.  We arrived at 10am and our room was ready within 40 minutes which was a nice surprise given the 3pm check in. While we were waiting we ate breakfast in Rusty's Bistro.  We had omelets which were tasty although a little pricey.  Lobby is nicely appointed.  There are 3 restaurants and a sundry shop which sells everything from sun tan lotion to…

title: Great Stay Just Outside the Clearwater Chaos
review: I was recommended to check out this property by a travel agent at AmEx.  My wife and I were looking for a few days on the beach in the middle of a Florida vacation we were planning.  As compared to the other comparably priced chain hotels in the Clearwater area, this one was definitely the nicest in terms of room and property design / amenities.  Our only initial reservation about booking was it's distance from downtown Clearwater.   However, soon after arriving, we were VERY glad to have made this decision.  If you want rest and relaxation, with all the benefits of being in this busy tourist destination, then this property is for you.  Located just a 5-minute drive (or trolley ride) from downtown, this secluded property features an isolated private beach on the Gulf and a great…

title: Just Okay
review: It is so satisfying to receive reviews such as the one you wrote. All your information was correct, thank you. We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds! We are an Oasis a place jut to relax and enjoy the beauty of nature. We were pleased to be able to share our Island with you. It seems as if you truly had a satisfying experience. It is also gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. We hope that you will return someday in the future..

title: Sheraton Sand Key - beach awsome - quiet area
review: This hotel is situated south of the main attractions.  The hotel beach is bad compared to the other side of Clearwater. The sand is not nearly as nice. The pool is just okay, can get crowded. The lobby area and bar not welcoming at all with the low ceilings. Also, no valet. Gym is not open 24/7. Make sure to say near the Pier.

title: Greedy
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home. As they say the best of both worlds; just minutes away from the activities of Clearwater Beach then come home to the tranquil Island of Sand Key to rest and relax. Of course where ever you stay we hope you will visit the area again.

title: excellent
review: Sheraton Sand Key is on the quiet area with only the Marriott (no beach front)  Adjacent to park preserve for walking, hiking - Beach awesome, a 3-4 min walk but sand somewhat compacted to make easier walking. Padded lounges with either an umbrella or cabana for $25.00 a day - just 2 lounges $17.00 -  Impressed on how they maintain them.  Was on 7th floor, end room -  refrigerator, room nice...small bathroom  -  huge TV.  Had a Kolbe hamburger at the Main stream Tavern - excellent -  Look into special buffets for dinner at Rustys.  Took breakfast promotion and was somewhat disappointed,  small area ...needed an omlet station. Pool not big or small - enjoyed hot tub.  Enjoyed drinks from Turtle Bar.  Strip mall close by, shopping and restaurants -  outside tables overlooking the…

title: Exceeded our expectations!
review: This resort is beautiful. We were first greeted by a nice young man named Brandon. Polite, courteous, and professional. The common area war clean and open. We tried all four restaurants, and had no complaints with the food. There are many good ones too, that we tried in the area. We had a terrific room overlooking the pool and beach.the bathroom was a bit small, but we are there to enjoy the beach and the pool. Beds very comfy. Every staff member very upbeat and polite. This area is very upscale compared to Clearwater Beach. This place is just what the doctor ordered after a cold, brutal winter in Maine. We also met so many nice guest from all over the country and Europe. Planning to return next April. By the way, this vacation was to celebrate our 42nd anniversary. Thank you…

title: Resort Hotels can be tough......!
review: It is perfect when your experience starts out positive from the minute you arrive. I have shared your comment with Brandon, who is truly a professional. I was pleased that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! They sincerely care … Our guests are from all over the world, we take pride in blending all of these cultures and creating a pleasant environment for everyone. It is fun and knowledgeable meeting people from different places. Hope it was a Happy Anniversary and we will look forward to your next visit.

title: great hotel
review: When a hotel is built on prime beach front property, they are used and abused!  They are very busy and from the 1st day open they will deteriorate, unless maintenance is a major priority.  Sheraton Sand Key Resort is a beautiful facility and the "common" areas are very nice, bright and maintained.  The rooms are the most difficult to keep up as every night there are paying customers demanding a room to stay in!  So, my room was very average.  Now, I'm actually okay with average because I only spent a few hours there every day.  To sleep and get ready to go outside!   I didn't go to Clearwater to sit in my room and analyze the floor boards.  (I never turned the TV on!) So, when your on prime beach front property you pay prime prices.  That is always my issue....paying a lot for…

title: Nice hotel but no wifi unless you pay for it.
review: Congratulations!!! May you enjoy many sunrises and sunsets together. It is very satisfying to hear that your expatiations were fulfilled during your stay. Our associates truly care and do their best to ensure that you enjoy your time with us, they are knowledgeable and informative. There is much to explore in the area. It offers sports, great entertainment, restaurants, beautiful beaches and much more. Maybe someday you will return to celebrate an anniversary.

title: Very relaxing, even during spring break
review: Hotel was great, very clean with great of food options. Staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was excellent. At dinner the staff did not tell us the tip had been added for out party so we did tip again.

title: Can't wait to go back!!
review: Hubby and I wanted a nice getaway from the winter and to celebrate our 26th year anniversary. Sheraton Sand Key was the perfect place!  Hotel staff is top notch. Our room wasn't ready for 3:00 p.m. check in (was ready 20 minutes later). Front desk gave us 2 free Bistro breakfast buffet coupons (that buffet is $15 a piece).  There was a complimentary bottle of champagne in our room to celebrate our Anniversary - very nice touch!  5th floor room w/pool/ocean view - beautiful. Balcony was nice for 2 people to sit and watch the sun set our have early morning coffee. Sun didn't hit this spot until 1:00 p.m. Pool - ugh only disappointment - two many kids!!!  Make an adult only pool and hot tub. People let their kids and I mean kids - 4-6 year olds run wild down here. Screaming…

title: 4.5, almost a 5
review: We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time relaxing and enjoying our associates concern for your satisfaction during your time spent at the Sheraton Sand Key. Their attention to detail is obvious and they genuinely care. We were pleased that you chose us to celebrate your 26th wedding anniversary here on “Our Island”. Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise. A nice dinner in Rusty’s Bistro and there is nothing like a walk on the beach to sooth the soul and to find some treasures. What a great setting to make new, fun and romantic memories. Another pool is on the top of our wish list also. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy Clearwater beach area and that you had a relaxing and enjoyable experience for the most part. Of course there are some tranquil months when the kids are in school and the area is at a slower pace. SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. There is no cost to become a SPG member and many perks. You should look into it before your next visit, which we look forward to.

title: Fantastic 5 day stay
review: I was here during a quieter week - not too busy, kids not on school vacation, and college spring breaks over or not started yet. I really enjoyed my stay here! I absolutely love the beach - quiet and beautiful - and I absolutely would not want to stay on Clearwater Beach. It does take a few minutes to walk to the ocean but that didn't phase me at all. The beach is a great walking beach and the ocean was so warm and wonderful! The hotel room was clean and the beds were comfortable. It was pretty quiet in the room too except for people opening and closing their porch sliding glass doors (redesigning these doors so they are quiet would be a big plus). The small store had everything I needed and is open 24/7! You can get a nice lunch there to take to the pool or beach. I was tempted…

title: A real find for the family
review: So pleased that your stay was successful. You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings, shell collecting. Truly showcase Florida’s natural beauty! Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. I do apologize that you did not find our culinary options to your liking. There are many venues for dining in the area and it gives you a chance to explore. We have noted your comments or suggestion on an adult pool, it is on our wish list also. We will look forward to your next visit.

title: Amazing place, so happy our friends recommended this place to us!
review: Well if you are looking for a lovely location out of the main drag of clearwater beach but easily accessable then this is the hotel for you. Lovely atmosphere and fantastic staff who are very courteous and cannot do enough. The rooms are well kept and cleaned to a high standard daily. Nothing is too  much for these guys and I would highly recommend.

title: All about the beach and the pool
review: The hotel is celebrating its 40 year anniversary this year and there is no way you can get around the fact that the hotel is indeed that old. Lobby and common areas are claustrophobic (low ceilings, dark) and the rooms were a bit on the small size - particularly for a family-oriented hotel. That being said, the hotel was updated, clean and comfortable. Hotel is a 3, grounds and beach a 5.  The main reason for our stay was access to the beach and a pool for the kids. The hotel succeeds on both accounts. Pool area was great and you can walk to the water in less than five minutes. Both kids and parents loved it. While Sand Key is great because it is away from the mayhem of Clearwater Beach, it is also difficult to get into Clearwater once you are there - good luck getting into town…

title: Relaxed Hotel
review: You don’t need much to enjoy a day at the beach. Clear skies, warm weather, not too many people and liberal amounts of sunscreen – that’s about it. It’s here that you can tune out the world, your worries and your obligations and just reflect. There is much construction going on at this time in Clearwater so I am sure you encountered much traffic. We are an oasis from the activities.  South of the hotel there are many beaches, restaurants and places tourists love to see. I am sure many family memories were made. We are constantly renovating and as you said we have been here for 40 years. I apologize you were unimpressed with the ambiance. We are a causal beach hotel, a place with a homey feel

title: Disappointed
review: This hotel offers a nice beach, pool among other standard amenities at a good price. The hotel also houses a high class restaurant, and a good, low-key location right across the bridge from Clearwater Beach. This is definitely a quieter alternative to the hotels in Clearwater or St. Pete's.

title: Relaxing
review: This is the place to come to relax. I am pleased that your stay was successful. You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings, shell collecting. Truly showcase Florida’s natural beauty! Nesting turtles, eagles in flight, and more than 50 native birds can be found by just taking a few minute walk to Sand Key Park, which also provides perfect running and nature trails. The Trolley’s let you get around stress free. We want to ensure that we provide a warm and comfortable environment here inside the Sheraton Sand Key also. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper bed provides a comfortable night’s sleep. Our award winning culinary staff truly enjoys wowing our guests with the taste and creative presentation. Many of our guests are enjoying Beach Tennis and Volley ball as this weather is perfect. Sheraton Fitness provides not only top of the line equipment, it also provides a panoramic view of the Gulf of Mexico to look at while working out.

title: Beautiful location
review: I am wondering if the other reviewers who loved the Sheraton Sand Key and I stayed at the same place.   We just returned from a 7-night stay and will never go back.   We have always been loyal to the Sheraton brand, it was the worst of any Sheraton we ever stayed in.  We are Starwood gold members, but because the hotel was so crowded and oversold, we were unable to stay on club level so our experience was different from the other Sheratons.  Before I discuss the bad, there were a few good things I feel I should mention.  The parking was easy, plentiful and free.  Big plus.  The hotel staff were all very nice and friendly.  I do not envy them working there because my overall impression is that the hotel has issues and is not well run.   The staff was pleasant.    Also, Rusty's…

title: paradise by the ocean
review: We decided to book a couple of nights by the Gulf of Mexico to break up our villa holiday in Haines City Orlando. We were travelling with two children aged 15 and 11. Booked well in advance on the Sheraton website and got confirmation immediately. We knew check in wasn't until three but arrived just after 12 , we were greeted with a warm smile by the lady on reception, who apologised that our room wasn't ready and suggested we try again at 2pm and she would do her best to make sure it was ready by then, she gave us a temporary pass and explained in detail about where all the facilities were and how to use them. We then went for something  to eat in the Grille restaurant and once again were treated like long lost friends by a lovely waitress who gave us loads of helpful advice…

title: Spring Break with Family
review: As a top year-round destination, Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. We are pleased you enjoyed our location. It seems you were treated with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! Debbie (Beach Buggy) does enjoy the interaction with our guests and ensures you do not have to leave your spot to have some food or refreshment. This is a place to relax and just enjoy your family. We do have a very talented culinary and server staff in Rusty’s I am pleased you enjoyed your dining experience. We look forward to another visit from you and your family.

title: Nice Stay with a few drawbacks
review: Highlights of the Sand Key resort include 3 onsite restaurant options that are all good.  Beautiful pool area with bar and cafe and direct ocean access.  Rooms are clean and comfortable but adding a fridge/micro would dramatically improve them for families.  We paid $10 per day for a tiny cube fridge.  WiFi NOT included - these petty things are irritating and make me give Sand Key 4, rather than 5, stars.  Also Beach access is FAR from the hotel - over a football field in length to walk from the pool to the ocean.  Sand Key is over the causeway bridge from the actual Clearwater Beach- less crowded and a short drive, or moderate walk, to activities there.

title: Great Family Resort
review: I am delighted you found our resort to be a relaxing oasis from the busy Clearwater beach. I have noted your comments. I am not sure why you would have been charged for a refrigerator. SPG members now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. There is no charge for becoming a SPG member. Our wide beach is due to the Jetty on the waterway to the north of Sand Key Park. Arrangements can be made if someone needs assistance to the water’s edge. We will look for you on a future week-end get away.

title: We loved it
review: My husband and I stayed the week after Easter.  I knew it would be really busy based on other reviews, but our dates weren't flexible.  We stayed with SPG points and had a room on the 2nd floor (seems to be the trend with people who book with SPG points). Our view was HORRIBLE!  We are talking a view of the roof and a/c units- no view of the beach, pool, parking lot, trees or anything else mildly pleasant.  It was definitely disappointing because this trip was our babymoon, and to celebrate my husband's birthday.  I honestly think anyone stuck with this "view" should be compensated by another perk...free breakfast or something.  We would have loved to sit outside on the porch in the evening but who would want to with our view? Besides the view, our room was very comfortable and…

title: better than expected
