review: We stayed here for a week during spring break with our 2 children.  We had the studio suite on the 8th floor.  The rooms was spacious with a nice balcony.  The bathroom was quite dated but still spacious.  I read the many reviews and did not have much expectation of the hotel. We were all pleasantly surprised at how much fun we had.  The sand key beach was nice with white sand and a short walk from the hotel.  Renting the umbrella/chairs was easy and the price was reasonable.  The Clearwater beach has much softer white sand.  It was worth the drive to go to Clearwater.  It was extremely crowded at Clearwater beach since it is spring break but it was still easy to rent a cabana/umbrella.  The hotel is full of families with kids (mostly young kids).  This is not the hotel if you…

title: Great potential but fell a little short...
review: As a top year-round destination, Clearwater offers a seemingly endless supply of entertainment, natural beauty, and outdoor activities both on land and at sea. I am pleased that your expatiations were beyond what you anticipated. After Easter our environment changes and we are much more tranquil. Beach volley Ball and Beach Tennis have become very popular here. Fun in the Sand! Our associates truly care they want to be part of your experience. We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas. I do hope you will return when planning your next beach get-away.

title: Great Beach Front Hotel
review: As a loyal Starwood member, I was excited to see that they had a property in Clearwater Beach.  The location is perfect if you want somewhere quieter than the main strip of Clearwater Beach. However, if you stay here, I would recommend that you plan to eat at the hotel.  Most of the restaurants are in the main strip but the traffic to/from was worse than city traffic and once you were there, there was nowhere to park.    However, the resort itself was nice and what you would expect from Sheraton (but not a Westin).  The only negative about the rooms were that the bathrooms were incredibly tiny and the rooms were loud at night. You could hear everyone (and their families) walking and talking outside your room at night.  But I feel like that is the case at most hotels.  The…

title: Nice hotel, great location, lots of activities for active families
review: Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; I sincerely apologize that you were not treated with the warm and caring attitude our associates are known to give. I also apologize for the noise. This is a small Island community with only one lane in each direction. That does make traffic almost impossible. Of course that is only during March and April and summer holidays. The rest of the time it is tranquil especially if you go south from the hotel. There are many wonderful restaurants and tourist things to do and see. The Suncoast trolley system is honestly the way to travel $4.00 pass for the whole day enjoy the ride with stops every ninth tenths of a mile and you can check on your cell phone for exact time of arrival … best part no parking. The smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm here on the beaches of Sand Key, which make it a perfect place to relax.

title: Moldy smelling, older room with a horrible view
review: We stayed two days over the last weekend in March.  We really enjoyed staying here. We ate at their restaurant twice as it was delicious food. Our server was amazing.  She was so accommodating and super friendly.   Hotel does need some updating but it's very clean and all the staff were very friendly and helpful.  The beach was gorgeous.  Nice playground on site the kids enjoyed.  Would definitely recommend this hotel, and we would stay here again.

title: Great, family-friendly resort!
review: Loved this hotel.  Great, friendly service, great food, beautiful room, and reasonably priced.  The whole place had such a positive vibe.  You get the feeling that the staff really like working there because they seem genuinely happy in their jobs.  There are five people in our family and we stayed in a huge one-room suite very comfortably.  It was like a million dollar NYC studio apartment.  We loved it.  The pool was a little small for how busy it was (the week leading up to Easter), but it didn't keep the children from having fun.  Beach was beautiful.  The beach is about a 3-minute walk through the sand to get to, but they take you out on jeeps if walking is a problem. Wifi is free only in the lobby, but when we checked in, we were given complimentary room wifi.

title: Great hotel and great location!
review: So pleased that time spent here with your family must have been filled with many memorable moments for all. We are pleased to have been able to contribute to those memories. It is gratifying to all of us when our guest enjoy their experience. The suites are very nice, perfect for families. Our associates do truly enjoy being here; they love the interaction with our guests and enjoy giving you information so you may enjoy the area, they are genuinely friendly. They realize being efficient creates a positive environment for our guests. I thank you for recognizing them. We will look forward to a return visit

title: Good for kids
review: We spent a few days with our kids ages 8 and 10 here during spring break to unwind before hitting the craziness of amusement park mania in Orlando. We flew into Tampa and rented a car and drove about 45 minutes to this hotel in Clearwater Beach. Although the hotel was at 100% occupancy, it didn't feel crowded at all. We always got a table when we wanted to eat and benches at the pool. The Sheraton has basically it's own private beach with easy to rent cabanas right on the water. They were just $25 for a cabana and 2 lounge chairs and we went at 8am and reserved one til 6pm right next to the water where our kids were playing and making sand castles! The beach has nice white sand with small shells and the ocean water is warm. The hotel's pool water was around 82 which was perfect…

title: Perfect place for the family!
review: Family vacations are days cherished; in some of our lives there are only a few moments when you can choose to pause and life long memories are made. It was gratifying to read your review and to read your experience here was success. Thank you for sharing your experience. Maybe the next time you could visit us after the parks. You will probably need to relax more after time at Orlando.

title: good for business travelers not for romance
review: My wife and I came here for four days on our one year anniversary and it was just not what we were looking for. It started off poorly as we arrived early around noon understanding that we would likely not be able to check in until closer to 3pm. They were not able to check us in until around 4pm- even though they guarantee check-in by 3pm. We were not offered any points, free breakfast, anything for the inconvenience. Then we get to our room on the 2nd floor and it was overlooking the valet and parking lot- not the most romantic. My guess is that's where they stick the SPG members who pay with points. They were not willing to upgrade us but did wish us a happy anniversary.   About the room: it was clean and mostly updated. The king size bed was comfortable but the pillows had no…

title: Beautiful Sand Key
review: A wonderful start to our family vacation thanks to Andre at check in.  He was attentive, kind and cheerful while he welcomed us to this beautiful Sheraton property.  He went above and beyond make sure our stay would be special.   Our stay was perfect with a gorgeous view, clean room and very comfortable bedding.  The hotel is a few minutes down from busy tourist area.   Volleyball and other games set up on beach. Quick service for beach chair/umbrella set up on beach. Towels available.   A very pleasant hotel that I would happily return too.

title: Nice place, still needs some renovation
review: It was gratifying to read that you enjoyed the location and many of our associates … they are committed to making your stay a success. I have shared your comment with Andre and he thanks you. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. We greatly appreciate your patronage as a guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and want to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area.  There is nothing better than sitting on the beach relaxing with your only thoughts being the awes of Mother Nature. We will be happy to see you return.

title: Great value. Great service
review: This property is nice and looks to be good for families.  I stayed here for a business meeting and was pleased although not overwhelmingly so.  The meeting rooms are great for small groups of 10, but the heating and air was a problem.  First the room was really cold and after 4 calls to the front desk they finally started heating it up, until it got unbearably hot.  Food service in the meeting rooms is acceptable, but not upscale at all.  Sleeping rooms are good although the showers need work and they need to reduce the softness of the water.

title: Flawless!!
review: The meeting space at Sheraton Sand Key was designed with you and your attendees in mind. We do have banquet rooms that can accommodate up to 350 for meetings. I sincerely apologize for the problem with the temperature. Each of the four calls were responded to and unfortunately we could not get it to where everyone was comfortable. I have noted the other issues which will be looked into. I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer as often times it may pinpoint an area of needed focus and attention. I hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future. I do hope you found time to relax and enjoy a bit of Mother Nature after your meetings.

title: Splendid Spring Break
review: We had a very nice stay at the resort for 4 days over spring break. Resort is very nice and our family had a wonderful time. I was a little concerned with some of the negative reviews, but I have to say those were way overblown.   Rooms are nice, high quality, and up to date. Quality was what you'd expect from a Sheraton. Not luxurious necessarily, but very clean, functional, and nice features (like fridge, nice mattress).   I'd say a great value. And the people there are really friendly and helpful  One really nice thing for families was all the amenities at the beach for free - lots of towels, sand toys for kids, beach balls/games etc. that our family loved  Other pros: - nice pool, with great attentive towel service - lots of beach activities and amenities (beach volleyball…

title: Feels like a mini Hawaii
review: My daughter and I stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort every year. We try to book a suite overlooking the pool, with a view of the ocean. It reminds us of the same views we had in Hawaii! Although, it is more of a hotel than a resort!   There is nothing to not like about this property. The grill is affordable and fast. Then if you want something more upscale, visit their restaurant.   A short walk across the street and you have good restaurants for breakfast and lunch. An easy shuttle ride takes you to a hipper area with fun restaurants, bars and shopping.   I recommend this hotel for families, couples or businesses!

title: Beautiful hotel on a gorgeous beach
review: Mother and daughter times are moments when you can choose to pause and life long memories are made. These vacations together are days cherished.  It was delightful to read your review and we look forward to your next yearly visit.

title: WOW!!!
review: My daughter enjoyed two nights this week at the beautiful Sheraton Sand Key Resort. I recommend it highly.  The staff is incredibly helpful and courteous -- every detail is taken care of.  The rooms are clean and lovely, and the pool area is really nice -- well-staffed and busy but delightful.  The hotel is set on one of the most beautiful beaches.  After a very bad experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Largo, we were so happy to move to the Sheraton.  What a happy ending to what could have been a very bad trip. We have found our home away from home when we are in Florida.

title: Decent and private
review: Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay.  The beaches on Sand Key and Clearwater are known to be exceptional; here at Sand Key our beach is wonderful. Long stretches of white sand and shells, the smell of salt water, the gentle roar of the waves all combine to create a sense of peace and calm … a perfect place to relax. We will be looking forward to welcoming you home again on your next trip to Florida.

title: Great quiet beach location, away from the hectic part of Clearwater Beach
review: Any negative review of this hotel must come from the competition! Beautiful property, very clean, and service was great; view from ocean view rooms beyond description, what a way to start the day. A special thank you to Marilyn for service beyond the call of duty, she is what Sheraton should expect from all employees. Makes the cost of SPG ownership and unbelievable hassle of dealing with them (not individual hotels) worth it.

title: Wonderful resort
review: My stay here was wonderful. This is an older resort but very nicely maintained. And beautiful.very friendly and efficient staff.the only thing I did not care for was the distance to the water. It is a bit of a hike. But over all I would definitely stay here again.

title: 2nd Annual Spring Break Vacation
review: Thank you, it is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that being on an Island feel. When the hotel was built in the 70.s the beach was much closer to the hotel. The Sand Key jetty was built in 1975. Since then sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused a wide beach. Arrangements can be made if someone needs assistance to the water’s edge. We greatly appreciate your patronage as a guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and want to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area.

title: True Paradise
review: This March was our second annual spring break vacation for our family. Our expectations were met or exceeded for a domestic 4 star chain hotel with key bay/beach/pool location, great club room, valuable concierge and helpful staff top to bottom. We will return in 2016.

title: Best Beach experience in Florida so far!
review: Family vacations are days cherished!  Whether you're looking for a peaceful, relaxing vacation or a fun-filled family getaway, we provide the perfect setting to make new memories. We are so very pleased that your expectations were met and you are brining your family back.  We hope this is the beginning of many more visits.

title: Very nice
review: My daughter and I have just returned from 9 nights here , following a rendezvous in New York. We are from England .New York was amazing but hectic so we much needed this relaxing break. The beach is excellent and we enjoyed daily walks collecting shells. what stands this hotel apart is the total commitment from ALL  the staff.  The shop in the inside of the hotel is wonderful, Thanks mostly to Janelle and Esther. There is everything you could ever need. the concierge were amazing too, always helpful. delicious choices of food, the beach is NOT too far to walk and we had a lovely time collecting shells from the beautiful beach , every day. What makes this hotel exceptional is the staff. The only criticism is the selfishness of some other  guests who forget that some people do not…

title: Business and Pleasure
review: I highly reccomend the Sheraton Sand Key Resort.  The place is very clean. The staff is very pleasant and helpful.  We enjoyed the food at 2 of the restaurants, and the buffet breakfast that came with our course was great!  They have a lovely pool area and you can walk right out on the beach.  Having left snow on the ground "up north" it was wonderful to sit by the pool, have a beverage, and listen to steel drum music.  I would definitely stay here again.  A great place in every respect.

title: Nice hotel, away from the beach madness
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … when not busy with your conference. Ah! A lounge chair, a great view, and a cocktail in hand, tropical sounds, lots of sunshine … That is the experience we want to share. We look forward to your return.

title: Business conference
review: We recently stayed at this Sheraton location using points.  The hotel is located 1 or 2 miles from Clearwater's main strip of restaurants and beach, but we enjoyed the more laid back feel.  Though the hotel is on the beach, the walk to the ocean is a good quarter mile away from the property and the beach sand was a bit rough (vs. the main beach's white sands).  My wife and I didn't mind the walk but if you need to run back to the hotel often, it isn't ideal.  The pool area was great, there were 3 volleyball courts, 2 beach tennis courts and 2 corn-hole (beanbag toss) sets.  You should arrive to the pool area early for your choice of prime locations as the spots fill up fast.  The bar served up cold drinks and there was live band playing every day.  For those venturing off the…

title: Convention Center, No Ocean View
review: Welcome to Our Island!!! It is an oasis way from the action of Clearwater beach, still close enough. We are a place to relax and to enjoy the time away from the busy life’s we lead.  It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience here with us was very positive. The view is beautiful from the Sheraton Club and hopefully you were able to see one of our awesome sunrises and maybe later enjoy the pool, or just a stroll on the beach.  Our wide beach is due to the Jetty on the waterway to the north of Sand Key Park. Arrangements can be made if someone needs assistance to the water’s edge. There are many times the sand is fine. Two things determine the size of sand on beaches: the energy (height) of the waves, and the size of the material furnished to the beach. Other things being equal, the higher the average waves on a beach, the coarser the sand. A new perk has been added for our SPG members they can now receive complimentary internet access when they book a reservation on a Starwood branded website or mobile app. Thank you for mentioning those other perks. We look forward to a return visit.

title: Great location and views
review: Amazing as usual!  I love that the staff is consistent from one year to the next. They are all super friendly and very concerned about each guest. It's hard to stay focused when that great beach is just outside your door. I would recommend this to all types of guests.  Couples,  families, old, young, etc. Take advantage of the Jolly trolley that heads into town

title: Worst hotel in the last 50 weeks.
review: I stay at nearly 50 different hotels a year, and by far, this is the worst. I have a room which is about the size of a closet, which overlooks the roof (which is filled with litter and refuse) and a storage yard for trailers. I just looked out and there was abundant smoke pouring across my window coming from some kitchen exhaust.   All this for $250 a night plus tax. I asked to be moved at any cost and was told thee was no other room available by the manager on duty.   Now I know why I don't stay at Sheraton Hotels. Don't make tgd same mistake as I did.

title: Longer walk than it appears in photos!
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. For not meeting our goals and your expectations I apologize. Unfortunately, there are certain times of the year when we are fully booked and must honor the room type that was reserved.  The months of March and April are our busiest, and the rooms are booked well in advance.  It is these busy months that we are usually prohibited from being able to do upgrades or to reassign a room. Our rooms with views do sell out very fast. The Manger on Duty was correct, we had no empty rooms.

title: Underwhelmed
review: Stayed here for 2 nights in late February 2015 with 2 little ones (2 & 5 years old).  First, I thought the $9.99 charge for Wi-Fi is ridiculous!  Sheraton should reconsider this policy!  Second, noise levels were very loud.  We were near the elevator on the third floor, and it was crazy.  Needed white noise app on my phone to drown out the noise of people walking down the hall.  Also, be aware that the beach is a MUCH longer walk than it appears in the photos.  With little ones, it's about a 5 minute walk, over very sea-shelled sand (so hard on their little feet).  We ended up having to carry the little ones after 2 hours at the beach (and all the beach toys) and got back to the hotel feeling exhausted!  The bathrooms are also oddly small.  I read that in reviews and thought…

title: Good value, good location - large beach area
review: We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service. Please accept our apologies for the movie signal and the noise. I definitely can empathize with two small children and a rainy day during the time spent with us. This is certainly not the Sheraton Sand Key experience we want to provide our guests.  The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that being on an Island feel. When the hotel was built in the 70.s the beach was much closer to the hotel. The Sand Key jetty was built in 1975. Since then sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused a wide beach. Arrangements can be made if assistance is needed to the water’s edge. Please rest assured that we do take your feedback very serious and that we will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance.  Keep an eye out on our web site for specials.

title: A favorite place!!
review: The room was clean, the linen and bed were nice. The staff was helpful and courteous. However, the bathroom was TINY.  Seriously, you had to stand between the bathtub and the toilet to be able to close the bathroom door.  TINY!  Also for the amount of money I paid for this room I expected at least a decent view of a garden or possible the beach or ocean.  Instead I had a view of the tennis court and the back drive used for deliveries.  Very disappointing.

title: Perfect Family Beach Vacation!
review: We traveled as a family with our 2 daughters who are in their early 20s and enjoyed a 5 night stay at the Sheraton hotel resort.  This was a long awaited family vacation so we did a lot of research and read many reviews as we wanted everything to be perfect.  I can't tell you how much we all enjoyed this great vacation!  This was our first visit to the Clearwater Beach/Sand Key area and all we can think of is how much we want to go back there again!!  Our experience with the Sheraton Sand Key Resort was all top notch!  We arrived at the hotel at 12:30 p.m from our flight and we were greeted by a friendly staff and were told to go ahead and get changed into our swimsuits and enjoy and pool and beach and they would get our room finished up quickly for us.  She told us that our…

title: Great staff / restaurant
review: Perfect family vacations are days cherished. In some of our lives there are only a few moments when you can choose to pause and life long memories are made. It was gratifying to read your review and to know your experience was a success. I am sure your daughters enjoyed their time here.  The surrounding area offers plenty of activities to fill your vacation and there are many beach amenities such as volley ball, beach tennis or you just can relax in the sun. Check out area restaurants or just explore the area.  Our culinary staff enjoys being creative when preparing your meals and our servers are genuinely friendly. I was pleased that our associates treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! They sincerely care and we look forward to a future visit.

title: So close and yet so far!
review: We had a great time and very relaxing week-end. This hotel was perfect for a week-end gateway of relaxation and the staff were truly amazing. While checking in they asked us what brought us to the hotel and we explained that we had just gotten married and needed a bit of a break before returning home. All though not officially our honeymoon they still congratulated us and upgraded our room to an ocean view room which was quite nice. The room was as expected very clean and quite large. The view was also quite nice and had a small balcony which we enjoyed sitting and relaxing at.   After settling in we went for a walk around the hotel which had a decent pool. Not super large but big enough for the hotel’s size. The only downside of the pool is that there is high rise condo next…

title: Relaxing Stay
review: We are so pleased that your stay was relaxing and what you anticipated it to be. You certainly can experience the best of Mother Nature; the beautiful views of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings from your window, shell collecting along the shore. It truly does showcase Florida’s natural beauty! Nesting turtles, eagles in flight, and more than 50 native birds can be found by just taking a few minute walk to Sand Key Park, which also provides perfect running and nature trails. The Trolley’s let you get around stress free. We want to ensure that we provide a warm and comfortable environment here inside the Sheraton Sand Key also. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Our award winning culinary staff truly enjoys wowing our guests with tasty and creative presentations. Many of our guests enjoy Beach Tennis and Volleyball as this weather is usually perfect. The beach is a bit of a walk; Clearwater and Sand Key are known for their exceptional beaches. They give you that being on an Island feel. When the hotel was built in the 70’s the beach was much closer to the hotel. The Sand Key jetty was built in 1975. Since then sand has been washed in a southerly direction which has caused a wide beach. Arrangements can be made if someone needs assistance to the water’s edge. The pictures are done by a professional photographer; the illusion is a little different on the website due to the space available on the page. We will look forward to a return visit.

title: Great beach!
review: In the middle of our stay here, I have a few tips.  First, the Sand Key is across a bridge from the chaos that is Pier 60 and Clearwater.  This puts you close enough to walk, trolley, or drive over, but far enough that you're not stuck in bumper to bumper traffic with drunks roaming the street.  The beach is right outside your door, past the pleasant, slightly undersized pool (which has a great 6 inch deep baby pool, too)  you walk a bit through lots of sand to get to the water but it is beach right up to the hotel.  Hotel has tennis courts with free racquets, beach volleyball, and you can rent jet skis, etc. at the beach. If you have the ability to bring beach chairs with you, you up save some money from renting them. Staff very kind and attentive here, heated up my leftovers…

title: "Very nice resort, attentive staff"
review: I stayed here for the second time in two years each stay has been extremely pleasant.  The reception staff is genuinely friendly and attentive. The rooms are nicely appointed including mini fridge, coffee and complimentary water. I had a beach view room with a small balcony that is just perfect for decompressing at the end of a long day. The hotel is within walking distance to nice restaurants, a marina, and shopping. If you're not a walker the jolly trolley will gladly get you where you want to go. This is a good place for couples or families.

title: Perfect experience
review: Our guests’ satisfaction is our number one priority, and we are happy to hear your expectations were met once again. Yes! With two different public transit options you are able to explore the area and get around vey inexpensively. There are, as you said, several restaurants and shops  within walking distance. We will look for your 3rd visit …

title: Nice Resort
review: I loved everything in this hotel- location, staff, amenities. Great! They have a nice pool and a hot tub outside,. The hotel is on the beach line ( 2-3 mins walking). We very much enjoyed the  executive lounge upstairs with a great view to the ocean. Beds are super comfortable too. I would reccomend and definitely go back to stay there again!

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our outstanding associates. They truly enjoy going above and beyond to make your stay special. We are thrilled your vacation was one to remember and hope to see you again soon!

title: Heaven on earth
review: Stayed for a night while at a business event being held at the resort.  Nice facility, beautiful location on the beach and great staff.  Front desk was very accommodating.  Stayed in 5th floor overlooking the tennis courts and beach, which was a decent view.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Beautiful resort
review: Three of us girls went to this resort, as part of a package with Allegiant.  The room was beautiful, but wish there was a microwave.  We did have a mini frig.  The room had a flat screen TV, huge dresser, 2 queen beds, table and chairs, and bedside table.  There were also 2 chairs and a table on the balcony overlooking the tennis courts and beach.  The concierge were very helpful, and they even have umbrellas you can borrow for the day!  The lobby is nice, there are several restaurants, and even a tavern where you can use their computers.  We ate breakfast at Rusty's Bistro, twice and it was good.  I ordered off the menu both times, but one of the girls got the buffet, which she said was good and had plenty of selections, including fresh fruit.  We especially liked that the…

title: Enjoyed our quick weekend stay
review: The sand might brush off, the salt may wash clean, the tans may fade, but the memories will last forever. I was pleased to read that you and your friends enjoyed your stay and the amenities we offer. I also think that the bathroom design is great when traveling with another person or persons as you can get ready at the same time … no wasting good vacation time.  I concur that the internet is something most all guests require nowadays. It is one of our standards to have a fee in place, however, just recently we have modified this in a small way and all internet in the lobby or The Mainstay Tavern at The  Link @ Sheraton Experienced with Microsoft (the Link) is provided free of charge. This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms but for now it remains as a fee based service. We will look forward to your next visit and thank you for sharing us with your friends

title: Watch out! Everyone gets different service.
review: My girlfriend and I just stayed at the Sand Key Resort this past weekend (Feb 28-Mar1), had a great time. The resort is nothing out of the ordinary for the Clearwater Beach area or amazingly over the top, but it does the job for sure. Depending on what you're looking for, it's off the craziness of the main beach area, but still close enough. And it's right next to Sand Key Park which is nice. They have pretty good facilities with volleyball & tennis courts out back, along with many chairs by the pool & hot tub.  The rooms might be considered a tad dated, but not horrible by any means, and they were clean..so that's a plus in my book! :-)  And the staff was great all around! From check in, to bar & waiter service, to the towel guys out by the pool. They all were very helpful any…

title: A stay I would not like to repeat
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise: beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. Yes, this time of the year we are definitely the more tranquil hotel option, yet still not far from the action of Clearwater Beach. Beach Tennis Pro, Coach Rhino, our Beach Activities Director, is here to coordinate activities and provide resort guests with beach tennis lessons. Along with beach tennis, Coach Rhino will be providing an array of activities for guests of all ages. He will be coordinating programs such as beach tennis clinics, sand volleyball games, corn hole and other outside activities. Our associates love interacting with our guests I am glad you enjoyed chatting with them.

title: Great service and location
review: To start, I'm a SPG platinum member so I have seen a lot of Sheraton's, and at this one a few things happened that would make me so mad if I were the manager. I felt like most of the staff is there to collect a paycheck so they really are not friendly and don’t care. Not all were bad and I’m sorry they will get lumped into this review.  Check in I phoned the day before to see if it was possible to get my upgrade and I was told I would need to check when I arrive at the hotel. So we arrive in the early afternoon and we start the checkin. I ask about an upgrade and she looks at me then looks at the computer then tells me she needs to check in the back. Yeah guess what that means? Upgrades are available but they don't know if they want to give it to me. So she comes back out and…

title: Nice clean hotel
review: I was here with a group and found it to be very nice.   The room was nicely appointed and comfortable. Everything was clean and in good condition.   The bathroom is very small but it was clean and in good condition. To me it's just a bathroom and it had everything you need. Others might want something larger. Strangely the sink is outside the bathroom.  The restaurants are nothing special and the food is just average at best. The bar/restaurant is noisy and if you just want food you are lumped in with the loud drinking crowd. They also hide the business center in here which is strange.  The staff was really good. Helpful and happy to help. Thanks again to Ellen who went out of her way to help me check in a little early.

title: Cold Shower, No wake-up call.
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience with our associates was very positive. Their concern is for your satisfaction and their attention to detail is obvious and shows that they genuinely care. I will share your comment with Ellen. I also shared your comment on the food with our Executive Chef. Our hotel was built in the 70’s and that was the style of bathrooms at that time. We agree that the design of the bathroom needs to be addressed. We are unable to change the size and lay out of the bathrooms due to losing space in the sleeping area. We are always looking into workable solutions. The business center is designed as a social destination, the Link@Sheraton experienced with Microsoft invites guests to interact while checking email, researching local attractions, and keeping in touch with home and the office. It also gives you the opportunity to meet new people. Being in the Mainstay you can also grab a bite to eat. We look forward to a return visit

title: Fantastic
review: This Sheraton property needs an update! Built in the 70's, it still feels like it. The two poor experiences that stood out, were my morning shower going cold before I soaped & shampooed. (Not Good) A bad start to a convention day which in itself went well. The last day though, our AUTOMATED wake-up call did not work!! Darn near missed the plane! I definetly would not recomend this hotel to anyone, ever.

title: Samo samo
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  For not meeting our goals and your expectations I apologize. Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests and improve these services.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, it is truly appreciated and I will be sure to share.

title: Not as expected
review: I stayed here for my sister in laws wedding, and wow this is an amazing hotel and a fantastic location, especially to see to see the sunset everyday. I fully recommend this place. There is a great cafe down the road that serves great breakfast.

title: Winter weekend getaway for me and my daughter
review: Arrived on 14February, Valentines Day,   TPA - got our rental car - about 1 hour to get everything done.  It takes exactly 46 minutes from the airport to get to our hotel.  When we arrived around 1pm at the hotel,  checked in early but went out to get something to eat.  The reception area was ok,  as you enter there was an older lady who checked us in.. didn't get the warm and fuzzy feeling that you are being welcome in the hotel she was very cold to talk to handed us the card for the towels, took my phone number to contact us when the room is ready.   She didn't even ask if we came with luggage, where to change, where to lounge.  Pretty much telling me to find out for myself where I can go.   Prior to our arrival I spoke with Mauricio Rodriguez,  contacted him and told him that…

title: Very Nice Property
review: Thank you for taking the time to write and share feedback from your most recent stay. Our guest feedback is important to us as often times it may pinpoint an area of needed focus and attention. I apologize that we did not meet all your expectations and have taken particular note of your suggestion that the hotel needs refurbishment/redecoration. We are renovating daily, we are just finishing a major project with new carpeting, drapes, art work, and furniture which includes new “Sweet Sleeper” mattresses in every room. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities; I sincerely apologize that you were not treated with the warm and caring attitude our associates are known to give when checking in. We do ongoing training daily, we have reviewed the need to step up training with Guest Services. This is a great place to relax and recharge. We will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance.

title: Great Hotel!  Everything on site you could want.
review: I brought my kids down in February for a Fri-Tue stay.  It was our first time in Clearwater, really enjoyed it and likely will come back to this property.  Very family friendly hotel but could also see this being a nice getaway for couples.  Definitely not the "frat boy party" scene (which is good.  Here is my summary...  Location - Awesome!  Right on the ocean, exit the hotel and you are on the beach.  Because it wasn't too hot yet (temps ranged from mid 60s to low 70s), most people were just at the pool, which is heated.  It looked like you could take chairs off the pool area and down on the sand, but not sure if you could drag them to the water (which is another 75 yards or so).  There was a company setup renting chairs and umbrellas by the water for $25 for the day, so…

title: Not off to a good start
review: Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Your review is truly appreciated and I will be sure to share. We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time relaxing and enjoying your family. Our associates concern is for your satisfaction during your time spent at the Sheraton Sand Key. Their attention to detail is obvious and they genuinely care. We will look forward to a future return visit.

title: 1st Anniversary Stay
review: My family stayed here in January 2015 and had a fantastic time!  The weather made it a little chilly to hang out on the beach, but the heated pool and hot tub made it easy to enjoy time outside in the water.    The outdoor bar and the grill both were tasty and convenient.  During our stay we ate at the restaurant in the lobby for the prime rib and seafood buffet and all members of our party were pleased.    The staff anywhere you went was incredibly friendly and helpful.  When we did need to go offsite they were always able to help with directions and helpful tips.  Housekeeping especially went out of their way to make us feel at home.    Overall a great stay.  I can't wait to come back!

title: First & Last Stay
review: Last night of our stay completely changed the review of our stay. Party was being held on the beach which was right outside of our room. Called front desk around 9 pm with extremely loud drums playing. Had a 3 year old sleeping & couldn't even hear the TV in our room. Was informed that the party wasn't over until 10pm but would inform the manager. Nothing was ever done! Suffered the following day with an early morning conference and a long drive home!

title: Super Nice Hotel
review: I am sincerely sorry that your impression of our resort did not end as you had expected nor what we had intended due to the loud music. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. For not meeting our goals and your expectations I apologize. I understand this apology does not resolve the issues or the inconvenience you experienced. It was unfortunate that the event kept you and your toddler up. I know how important it is to be rested and ready to focus for your conference. We hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future

title: Anniversary for my parents!
review: We stayed for 3 nights and enjoyed every minute we were there.  The staff was incredibly helpful, the pool and beach were great, and our view was AMAZING!  We LOVED being away from the hustle and bustle of Clearwater (where we have stayed before) and are already looking forward to a return visit to Sand Key and the Sheraton.  We were celebrating our anniversary, and to our surprise, a bottle of champagne was waiting for us upon check-in, which was a very nice touch.  We thought everyone we came in contact with was super helpful.  Even the pool staff was helpful during a rain storm, giving us some ideas of things to do nearby.  This is our 4th trip to the Clearwater area, and 1st time staying at the Sheraton.  We will not look any farther, as this is the ONLY hotel we will stay…

title: Great stay...great staff!
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience here with us was very positive. The view is beautiful and hopefully you were able to see one of our breathtaking sunsets. The island of Sand Key is much more tranquil then Clearwater Beach still close enough to visit. We look forward to you spending more anniversaries with us in the future.

title: Nice Resort
review: I booked this trip for my parents anniversary as a gift and they were very unhappy. The hotel is very old and dated. Old pipes, very noisy in the room. They thought it was overpriced. It was supposed to be a spectacular view however they were placed in a side room so the view was not direct but to the side.

title: Very nice hotel but for the price they should have free wi-fi.
review: The beds were queen size and very comfy. The setting was nice but we wished we were closer to the action on Clearwater Beach. The sand was not soft on Sand Key like at Clearwater but had lots of shells. There is a trolley that takes you to Clearwater Beach where there are many more restaurants, activities, and shops.

title: Not Bad.
review: Our associates are sincere and want to ensure they are helping our guest enjoy their experience. We do have a tranquil environment on the Island of Sand Key. It truly is the place to come if you enjoy the beach and relaxing … we are a little way from the action. That does give you the best of both worlds too enjoy. We have noted your comments or suggestion to have complimentary internet access for our guests. We are pleased to inform you that such complimentary service does exist at our hotel provided @ the Link @ Sheraton experienced with Microsoft which is located in The Mainstay Tavern. We sincerely hope you will plan another stay.

title: Good Hotel - Stunning View
review: Little noisy for my taste. Front desk people gracious for the most part. Fellow who checked me in was a bit curt since I was only in a standard room,not one of the more expensive choices. Good bar with excellent food and service.

title: Great service and nice location
review: I sincerely apologize that the person at the front desk did not treat you with the warm and caring attitude our associates are known to give. Such behavior is obviously not our usual standard. I also apologize for the noise. Much of the noise issue depends on how considerate the guests that surround your room are. I am sure it was disappointing. It is gratifying to hear you enjoyed the experiences of our Food and Beverage outlets.

title: great hotel
review: Stayed here for a couple of nights while in Tampa for business, but I always try to stay a an extra day to enjoy the amazing beaches in Clearwater. The Sheraton is great if you want to be away from the hustle and bustle and not pay the premium of being right downtown Clearwater, it is just on the other side of the main strip so you will need to drive to get to restaurants and whatever else you might want to see. The hotel itself is great, it is on the beach but not right on the water like the other Hotels, it is like part of the beach was man-made in order for Hotel to be considered a Beach location so you get a good 400 feet of sand before you get to the water from the hotel. But its that amazing white soft sand so who cares. :)   Free parking and even with the hotel being busy…

title: Nice location, service was lacking
review: This is a beautiful property and the view of the water is amazing.  The sunset view is incredible.  What was lacking was the attention to detail and service.  We were here for a technology conference and the wifi didn't work for over 48 hours.  After complaining to management about this, they credited 1 nights stay off of a 5 night reservation.  Since I was there for a work conference and was supposed to work remotely in the evening this was not at all appropriate.  If you are hosting a tech conference, the technology should be working.  A minimum of 2 nights should have been credited.

title: Excellent staff
review: Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay. Sunsets here can be breathtaking and something about being around the water is so relaxing. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is very concerning when we are unable to meet our goals and your expectations due to issues out of our control. I understand your feeling on the internet. We apologize and emphasize; the internet was a Verizon issue and effected parts of the Tampa Bay area for 48 hours. It is a beautiful location; we hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you so you can experience our resort in a suitable manner.

title: Great Hotel With a Beautiful Beach
review: This was our fifth stay at the Sheraton Sand Key and we had a very pleasant stay.  When we arrived our assigned room was less than expected ( the view) .  When we asked at the front desk if there were any other options we were given a room with a great view.  Andre was the front desk person that did everything possible to maximize our stay. The entire property was well kept and all of the staff were friendly and helpful. We will return again.

title: Bugs in room, slow/rude wait staff
review: I would like to thank you for being a loyal guest to the Sheraton Sand Key. We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your repeat business! I apologize that the room view was not what you expected, and was pleased that you were moved. Our associates do truly care about extending excellent service. I have shared your comment with Andre and he thanks you. It is gratifying to hear that Andre helped to ensure your experience was what you anticipated.  We hope you will come see us again.

title: December warmth & beautiful expansive beach
review: We stayed here in July after spending a week at Disney and it was an awesome place to relax. The location is great being directly on the beach. We swam in the ocean for hours. The pool area is very nice too. We didn't find the walk to the ocean long at all and made the trip several times a day. We rented sea-doos on the beach and got up close with some dolphins. The restaurants in the hotel are excellent (my daughter loved the filet mignon on the kid's menu) and the restaurant that's across the street and a block south was excellent as well. We didn't find anything here to be inexpensive but we came with the expectation of paying to rent beach chairs etc.

title: Good location, nice staff
review: Stayed here for a conference and business event. The hotel is in a very good location. The Staff was very helpful, the food in the restaurant was above average and decently priced. They have different buffet options for dinner. The room was clean and good sized. The room did not have a desk to do work and it was a bit awkward to use the round table there. Internet was good although a bit slow. For a true vacation this is a good option. The hotel could use some updating as the lobby was ok but basic.

title: Beautiful week.
review: Our meeting rooms are designed for your comfort and to offer you and your colleagues an unparalleled meeting experience. I am pleased that we succeeded. The meeting space at Sheraton Sand Key was designed with you and your attendees in mind. Although our hotel has been on Sand Key for a while, we are constantly renovating, the lobby was updated in 2013. Many of the rooms do have desks, I apologize that your work space was awkward. We will look forward to you returning in the future for a true vacation.

title: Excellent Hotel & Beach Location
review: My husband and I spent a week here. We love the location and the service was outstanding. The room was clean but could have used a little updating and maintenance. Closet doors need lube and rack in shower room is bent to the point where it is unusable. The staff has been outstanding.

title: First Time to Clearwater beach area
review: Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback; it is truly appreciated and I will be sure to share. Our associates truly enjoy being part of your experience by being friendly, efficient and informative. We hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you again someday in the future.

title: Great Location and Amenities
review: We have been here several times in January for a business conference. The location, staff service as well as proximity to many area attractions is superb.  The food at the restaurants is quite good, and there are other options in Clearwater or within a few miles if you desire variety. There is shuttle service from TPA available, however we chose a car as there were many inexpensive options available for weekend rates.

title: Great Hotel, Great location!
review: My family and I went here for a long weekend getaway.  The hotel has a very friendly atmosphere and the staff is really great.   The restaurant was nice for a Continental Breakfast Buffet and the pool bar made fantastic drinks.  We had the pleasure of an egret join us at the pool one of the days we were there.   Overall, I think it is a great couple or family destination. Free internet is only in the lobby and bar area.

title: Best location of the south island
review: Our associates are friendly and it is genuine.  They truly enjoy the interaction with our guests. They want your experience to be exactly as you anticipated your week-end get away would be. Nature at its best awaits you with egrets, dolphins, and sea gulls all putting on a show for you. It is a great place to reconnect and relax with your family without many of the outside intrusions that go along with everyday life. I concur that the internet is something most all guests require nowadays.  It is one of our standards to have a fee in place, however, just recently we have modified this in a small way and all internet in the lobby or in The Mainstay Tavern at The  Link @ Sheraton Experienced with Microsoft (the Link) is provided free of charge.  This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms, but for now it remains as a fee based service. We will look forward to your next week-end get away.

title: Pleasant Getaway!
review: the sand key is south of Clearwater beach which makes it really nice. Less crowded beaches and unlike the marriott across the street which has an inland beach, sand key has a beautiful ocean white beach. The rooms are nice and clean, nice pool and hot tub. Only issue is there is no place that is adults only. Would be great to change the hot tub to adults only. While we were there, there was a baby Ruth "accident" from a kid which necessitated draining the hot tub, cleaning, refilling and adding lots of chemicals. The food there is average but the location makes it all worthwhile. Well managed and run, very friendly and nice staff. Would stay there again.

title: Would stay here again
review: The Island of Sand Key has many miles of great beaches to just relax or enjoy some beach activities. The intercostal is just across the street. In addition to just relaxing on the beach. There is much to do in the surrounding area; nice restaurants, a beautiful park right next to the hotel. Trolley’s you can ride for site seeing or to get to another beach destination such as John’s Pass or Clearwater Beach. I do apologize for the incident in the hot tub. I hope you will return again when planning your next casual beach vacation.

title: FABULOUS FAMILY HOTEL IN A GREAT LOCATION
review: I recently went away for a quiet solo trip to Clearwater.   My stay was pleasant and I enjoyed the resort.  The resort is on the ocean, a bit of a walk to the beach, but beautiful none the less.  I liked the location as it was close to the downtown area, but too far to walk at night.  The restaraunt on site was decent and the staff was friendly.  I wouldn't say that it was very kid oriented, but I knew that prior to booking.  I would absolutely visit again.

title: Wonderful hotel!
review: Just on my last day with the Sheraton Sand Key and will def come back! Hotel is beautiful, clean, friendly staff, huge beach, right on the gulf, lots of choices for dining, excellent views from our room, comfortable beds, tazo tea and starbucks coffee right in the room and great fitness facilities on the top floor. I recommend this hotel especially if you are Starwood members, worth joining as the wifi then was free! You might also want to upgrade for $40.00 a night for the club floor lounge, continental breakfast and evening reception with drinks and appitizers from 5-7.

title: Still here, and still enjoying!!
review: Our associates concern for your satisfaction along with their attention to detail start your experience. We are delighted to hear that you spent quality time; relaxing and enjoying our location, with beautiful views, the comfort of our Sweet Sleeper beds, a work out in Sheraton Fitness, cocktail hour at Sheraton Club you are ready … for the many choices of restaurants to enjoy and places to explore. Hurry back!

title: Great Hotel!  Great Service!
review: This is my third visit, (hubby's second), to Sheraton Sand Key Resort, and it just keeps getting better. The front lobby area has been remodeled, with a modern Florida feel to it. Jerry at the front desk was so helpful, and able to look after us. Thank you!!! Our room is lovely, and we are able to have our morning coffee watching the sun rise. All the restaurants have great staff to assist you in any way. Try the Bananas Foster at Rusty's. The pool, and area surrounding is a great way to melt the stress away, but....it's the beach that we keep coming back to. White sand, seashells, with a nice breeze, plus the waves of the Gulf, make for a perfect vacation. If you have a chance, step inside the gift shop, and pick up a souvenir,  so you can remember this wonderful hotel.

title: Love, love, love this place!
review: We greatly appreciate your patronage as a loyal guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and would like to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area. We will look forward to many return visits by both your husband and your self. We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas.  Thank you for noting the new look of the front lobby. It can be very inspiring watching the sunrise, drinking your coffee and making plans or no plans for the day. I am pleased that our associated treated you with warmth and the comfort of home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key! They really do care …

title: Awesome
review: We were at the Sheraton this past holiday season.  The service from the Concierge desk was excellent.  Anthony suggested great restaurants!  Darin and all were helpful calling for reservations and printing out maps etc.  We would definitely go back.  Their beach was vast.  They had many activities i.e. volleyball, beanbag toss right on the beach.  Our room was overlooking the pool and the beach.  It was large and very comfortable.  We lucked out on amazing weather, so the vacation was a home-run.  Speaking of home-runs, we were able to visit the bluejays field in Dunedin, the Phillies field and the Pirates field in Bradenton.  Will definitely go back for spring training!!!

title: Great Stay - Will Come Back!
review: We will be leaving the Sand Keys Sheraton on Tuesday & I will be sure to come back on our next trip to the Gulf Coast of Florida.   This is our second visit.   This time we paid a bit more for the Sheraton Club Access & I would highly recommend it.   We enjoyed breakfast & happy hour on the 9th floor overlooking the waterways.    The service is outstanding & the staff friendly.   From the towel boy, to the room service lady Marsha.    We mentioned in the elevator one morning to a employee, if there was a newspaper somewhere available to read & within minutes one was delivered to our door.    Every request was met & they truly worked to make our stay comfortable & pleasant. The room was always attended & cleaned well.    Location is good - right on the beach.   Nice pool area,…

title: Great Place to Stay
review: “Welcome to Our Island.” Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our outstanding associates. They truly enjoy going above and beyond to make your stay special. The Sheraton Club is a great place to meet new people or just relax and read the paper. We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your repeat business! We are thrilled your vacation was one to remember and are looking forward to see you again soon!

title: Nice Place to Stay - Excellent Location!
review: My husband and I had a very positive experience at Sheraton Sand Key during the Christmas holidays. The property is beautiful with a location right on the extensive beach. From the moment we checked in, we found all the staff was attentive, friendly and so very helpful. The room was comfortable,very clean and we had all the amenities we needed. Would definitely return if we return to the area.

title: Beautiful Place to stay!
review: It was delightful to read your review. We are pleased that you chose us for your holiday get-away. The weather was beautiful; it was great time to be at the beach. I hope you enjoyed our Christmas trees in the hotel and enjoyed a ride down Gulf Boulevard to catch some pretty awesome light displays. Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our outstanding associates. They truly had the holiday spirit and they always enjoy going above and beyond to make your stay special.

title: Beautiful place
review: First, I am a former flight attendant of 26 years, so my I have stayed in many, many hotels over the years. I can be somewhat picky when it comes to accommodations (especially when it comes to cleanliness) .  With that said, this is my review:    My husband, 8 year old daughter and I stayed here for two nights.  The location is wonderful!  After staying here and driving through the Clearwater Beach area, I know would not have been happy staying there. Sand Key is quieter, while Clearwater Beach is bustling, lots of people, lots of activity, with many typical beach shops lining the streets.  I chose the Sheraton because it is on the beach, though you have to walk a good 100 yards or so across the sand to get there. (It is flat and a straight shot to the beach).     The staff at…

title: Will be coming back
review: We will definitely be coming back. I just want to mention one person in particular.. Janet at the front desk was overall great to us. She gave us a great room with a great view and made us feel so welcomed!

title: Beautiful property and perfect beach location
review: Your kind comments are greatly appreciated. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise. I have brought your comments to the attention Janet and those concerned. Janet does help make our guests feel the warmth and the comfort of being home on the beautiful Island of Sand Key!

title: Truly a great experience!
review: Stayed here with a friend when he was visiting.  Property is large and well maintained.  The pool and outdoor area is big and beautiful.  They have a snack bar outside for food by the pool.  An outdoor bar as well.  Restaurants are average.  I wasn't very impressed with the selections and the food was mediocre at best.  But there are more than enough restaurants around the area to go to as an alternative to the hotel.   Rooms were clean but nothing more than a regular hotel room.  I'd stay again only because of the location and the outdoor area is really wonderful.

title: Great Beach!
review: Whether you're looking for a peaceful, relaxing vacation or a fun-filled getaway, we provide the perfect setting to make new memories. I do apologize, as it is unfortunate that you did not enjoy our culinary offerings. It is a great location, beautiful beaches and great views … Yes there are many restaurants in the area to choose from as an alternative to dining in the hotel. I am sure you enjoyed showing your friend some of your favorite spots.

title: Nice Beach
review: This was my first stay at Sand Key Sheraton and it will not be my last.  Not only is the location and beach amazing, the service was impeccable.  I like to mention Paul who helped with our luggage, hung up our coats, filled our ice bucket and made us feel welcome.  I also like to mention our server Roberta who made breakfast fun and pampered us like family.  Rooms are clean and room service fast and the wings delicious.  I will return and if you are looking for a great place on the beach it's most definitely one of the best!!

title: Best Sheraton so far, Amazing!
review: To many good qualities but I will start saying that From the check in process to the end of the stay I was overwhelm with such a great service and quality. Check in was perfect with Jane that from the distance she start with a big smile and a very warm welcome. Jane went through all the process with such an elegance and friendly way and also explained us all the details from the resort. Second, the room was perfect, cleaned, spacious, linen cleaned, bed are great, nice deco, balconies are big and clean, bathroom cleaned (are small but hey, are clean and works nicely). Room view was fantastic facing the pool and part of the Gulf. Housekeeping was amazing and I know about it because I come from there. The restaurant Rusty's Bistro was just perfect, food perfect, Friendly staff and…

title: wonderful experience
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience here with us was positive. The view is beautiful and hopefully you were able to see one of our breathtaking sunsets. The beach is relaxing, it is away from the noises of everyday and brings you back to the calmness of nature. Jane is one of our stars she is very efficient, is genuinely kind and she certainly has an elegant sprit. I have shared your comment with her. Thank you for your recommendation, they are honest and unscripted when coming from our guests and that is what people want to read... They’re also one of the most effective ways of generating business.

title: Nice Hotel but didn't quite meet expectations
review: Great location on Sand Key between the gulf and bay.  Service was outstanding and rooms were clean and comfortable with Sheraton Linens. Columbia Restaurant across the street and trolley service available.

title: Friendly staff, great location
review: It is a beautiful location; it is the perfect place to just relax, it is also a great base for many attractions! The surrounding area offers plenty of activities to fill your stay with us. Our associates truly enjoy being part of your experience by being friendly, efficient and informative. Yes! There are many great restaurants in the Clearwater area and The Colombia is very nice. The trolleys are so convenient and great for site seeing.  The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. They were chosen with your comfort in mind. We hope your wonderful experience will bring you back.

title: Ripped off at breakfast
review: We spent 3 nights here in the middle of our Florida holiday and maybe our expectations were too high but we anticipated this part of the holiday to be the most luxurious and although it was ok, it wasn't quite what we were expecting.  When we arrived it was the start of the Jazz festival. We weren't aware this was taking place, however I'm sure if we'd done a bit more research we could have found this out. Had we have known in advance, I don't think this would have put us off as it was very nice to have the music playing in the lobby area but unfortunately the restuarants were virtually out of use for almost the entire stay. We managed to squeeze in to a back corner of the Mainstay Tavern one night but only stayed for one drink as it was too cramped. I would strongly suggest…

title: room cleanliness sub par
review: We were just not impressed with the cleanliness of our room.  We requested a second room with not much improvement.  We discussed our concerns with management and a discount was applied to out room rate.  In addition, the rooms are in need of updating for the price we were paying.

title: Great Views! I would stay again
review: We have noted your comments regarding the cleanliness of the room. We truly apologize for not reaching your expectations. Please note that your remarks have been discussed with our Director of Housekeeping in order to counsel the associate who cleaned your room and provide additional training to ensure that this occurrence will not take place again. We continue to renovate on a daily bases and are in the process of replacing furniture, carpets, and drapes at this time. We hope you will return for another visit when everything is finished.

title: Excellent location
review: I stayed here 3 nights for a conference during October. The view was amazing and the beach right at the foot of the hotel. I would stay here again for leisure when visiting Clearwater. The room was clean. I had ants in the bathroom but it was still clean. The sink outside of the bath didn't bother me. I actually prefer it that way. Great views, Great beach (although I was attacked by a seagull and didn't stay long). Great service!

title: Worth the wait!
review: Our meeting rooms are designed for your comfort, I am pleased that we succeeded in doing so. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service. We want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer. We are pleased that you enjoyed the views and that the beach is just what you anticipated it to be. Although attacks are infrequent Seagulls don’t hesitate to swoop down to steal food from human hands, it isn’t helped by the fact that those same hands are often feeding them. Not meaning you personally fed the Seagulls. I sincerely apologize for the ants, they too are brought in by food. I hope you reported that issue so it could be taken care of. I do hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.

title: Great place
review: Great to be on Sand key instead of the tourist area on Clearwater.  The Hotel is clean and accommodating.  Pool is great and so is the pool bar.  It is a very long walk to the ocean across the sand...and a little painful.  They should use the large area for something recreational.  Drink cart is awesome too!

title: Pleasant hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights. As other reviews its odd having the sink outside the bathroom but we got used to it. The beds  and pillows where very comfortable. We had a gulf view which was over looking the pool. I think if we stayed again I would go for a bay view more going on that way. On the 3rd day of our stay the jazz festival started wow it was busy then. I think the hotel should have told us when booking that this was going to be on, we would not have stayed there we where there to have a quiet few days!!!Staff nice and friendly fabulous location we love walking on the beach looking at all the birds etc., dolphins in the bay brilliant.

title: Lovely, comfortable beach trip!
review: You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings, shell collecting. Truly showcase Florida’s natural beauty! Nesting turtles, eagles in flight, and more than 50 native birds can be found by just taking a few minute walk to Sand Key Park. We are busy when the Suncoast Jazz festival is on; the majority of the guest who attend that are 60 and older and come for their listing enjoyment. They truly are not an intrusive group. I apologize that you were not informed. I am sure that if you were looking for a tranquil environment, a different week would have been a better choice for you. Our beds are “Sweet Sleeper “beds and were choose for your comfort..

title: Friendly hotel in good location
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key the last week of October 2014, and had a wonderful experience! I work in hotels, and having many details in mind, found the hotel to be delightful over all! Our room was a nice size, with a balcony overlooking the pool and beach. It was clean everyday, with all the towels and bathroom amenities always refreshed - even complimentary water bottles. The only thing that could have been better about the room was the water pressure - it was too weak in our bathroom sink. The decor could have been more up-to-date/stylish, but we were comfortable and decor was not our concern. The pool and hottub were important to us, as was the beach - the pool and hottub were lovely! You could spend all day there, get lunch, drinks and relax; it was…

title: Comfortable and clean
review: Welcome to our tropical paradise, beautiful beaches and breath taking views make for ultimate relaxation therapy. Stingrays are normally gentle, except when attacked by would-be predators or stepped on by unwary humans, the animal lashes its tail. The spine and its barbs pierce the integumentary sheath as they lacerate the skin of the victim, allowing venom to enter the wound. I hope that your sting is healed, I know how painful that sting can be. I shared your thank you with Kevin, Jeremy and Rick. We are pleased that most your experience was what you anticipated. The renovations of this hotel are ongoing. It is our loyal customers that inform us of any issues that need to be addressed. I thank you for your support. We will address the water pressure issue.

title: Immaculate
review: When we first saw the Sand Key Resort hotel we were a bit disappointed. It looks a bit dated and the reception area is huge but very impersonal. It looks like a massive conference hotel, which it is. The reception and other staff were very welcoming and we noticed the hotel had a well stock shop which was very good. There is only one medium sized pool, but the hotel is situated right on the beach. This is enormous, so it is a long walk to the sea. The room was disappointing, to say the least. It was clean, with plenty of storage space, but it was pretty bare and bland. The balcony, on what we were told was an upgrade, did overlook the sea, but it was very small and could only just accommodate 2 small chairs. The bathroom was very strange, with a room for just a bath and toilet.…

title: Other than my view of the air conditioners...
review: this was an amazing hotel.   I'll admit I was a bit disappointed when I opened the curtains and saw the roof of the other building and air conditioners covered in cigarette butts.  That was a big let down....BUT  the time we spent outside the room was amazing!  Pool, beach volleyball, great bartenders and staff!  Just overall very happy.    Check-in/check-out was a breeze - super nice employees.  We got a bottle of champagne and strawberries delivered to our room by a tall, bearded gentlemen.  We were so surprised that we forgot to tip him so please give him kudos and a huge thank you from Val and Amy...  We had a wedding party and had a great time.  We broke out in a volleyball game one afternoon and the outside manager went and got medals for the winners.  That was hilarious…

title: Best hotel ever
review: You are welcome!!! It is very satisfying to hear that most of your expatiations were fulfilled during your stay, with a little help from your phone (great idea). Our associates truly care and do their best to ensure that you enjoy your time with us. They pride their self in making your stay memorable. I have shared your thank you message to Austin who delivered your amenities. I also shared your comment on the metals with Brett. It was appriciated by both. It truly sounds as if you enjoyed your time with us. If there was a room available and you asked the front desk they would have been pleased to reassign your room. Both trolley systems are great it makes going anywhere in the area more relaxing. We defiantly will look forward to a return visit.

title: Nice view
review: we are currently still here, spent 2 days as part of our Orlando holiday.  This hotel is gorgeous so clean and the staff are a credit to the management special mention to Ken the waiter in the bar restaurant who was so obliging.  For a 4 star hotel the prices for drinks and food are very reasonable and tasty. The people who are moaning about this hotel must have exceptionally picky standards as my husband and I had the best time here.  The beds and pillows are amazing big high bed with soft pillows.  All in all a great stay and would definitely return for another visit.  Just what you need for a relaxing few days away from the parks.

title: Nice but isolated
review: It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  It is gratifying to read that your experience here with us was very positive. The view is beautiful and hopefully you were able to see one of our breathtaking sunsets, stroll along the shore. There are times that you just need to relax and refresh your mind body and connect with Mother Nature. The Island of Sand Key is a great place to do that. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper  Bed is found in each of our guest rooms and is comprised of luxurious sheets, a deluxe duvet, a selection of feather down and hypoallergenic pillows, and a custom mattress. These beds were put in for your comfort so it is rewarding to know you enjoyed them. Ken is a star he truly enjoys ensuring your time here is memorable, our associates truly care. We are pleased that we will see you again.

title: Worst hotel & service
review: The hotel has a great view of the ocean...on one side. Unfortunately there is another side which has a  view of the air conditioners. This is easily overlooked by the niceties of the hotel and the friendly staff.  Honestly, the only negative I encountered was the closeness of, or should I say the lack of closeness to other places to see.

title: Good conference, bringing the spouse is also a bonus
review: I attended a two day conference here and had some trepidation due to a couple of less than glowing reviews. Not to worry, the resort has many great qualities which make the stay worthwhile. The conference facilities are great for groups up to a few hundred. The food was decent and they have a good selection of beers and wines. The room was comfortable and had a nice view of the bay. To get the best views, get a room on the fifth floor or above. The pool is great and they also have a large hot tub.  Overall, a good place to come when it's cold up north and you can bring your spouse with you on a business trip.

title: nice hotel for conferences, and on the beach, too!
review: The Sheraton Sand Key is uniquely qualified to welcome you and make you feel right at home - whether you're staying with us for business or leisure. We're always working on new ways to better care for you. Once you get on the Island of Sand Key you leave all that commercial stuff that clutters life behind and reminds us of the beauty of nature that surrounds us. The sounds are so peaceful and serene how can you do anything but relax … when not busy with your conference. Our beach is large and you can defiantly find your own space. We are constantly updating throughout the hotel and housekeeping is very efficient at keeping the hotel clean and comfortable, I thank you for recognizing that. We will look forward to your next stay and bring your spouse..

title: Wonderful stay despite the chilly weather
review: Although there was no refrigerator in my room as it had not gone through the remodel, I was offered a refrigerator.  Room service was nice, but the food could have been better.  Enjoyed the wonderful, cushy bed pillows! The beach is just a few steps away, so was able to enjoy a walk on my last day.

title: Lovely Beach Location
review: We appreciate the kind remarks on the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds!
