review: Just returned from a 4 night stay and have only good things to say about this hotel.  I requested a high floor room with a view and was given an excellent room with awesome view.  Jane at the front desk was so welcoming and very helpful.  The guys at the pool hut were upbeat and friendly and provided big smiles every morning.  The property was spotless and the beach is gorgeous.  The property is surrounded by a state park on one side and condos on the other making the beach wide open and never crowded.  Ate several meals at the Mainstay Tavern.  Nate the bartender gave great advice on menu items and was friendly and remembered what I drank.  I look forward to returning for another vacation!

title: Nice but disappointed in booking issues
review: We made reservations through Orbit for what was called a 'standard two double beds and sweet sleeper' room. We were given the impression that this room was a suite with 2 beds and a sleeper sofa. When we checked in, this was not the case and we had 5 people to accommodate. We had the nicest bellhop named Bob who brought our bags to our room and he offered to stay and wait while we figured out the room situation. We called the front desk and they were not willing to work with us on switching rooms. We dealt and enjoyed our stay anyway. The concierge were nice and helpful and we had a driver pretty much all weekend named Jim, who seems to always be out front waiting to drive Sheraton guests anywhere they want to go. All in all, good stay. Had dinner at the restaurant in the lobby…

title: Best staff, great location
review: I would like to apologize; the name of our beds are “Sweet Sleeper” beds, I think that is where the confusion came from. To comfortably fit five people in a room you could book a suite, which would have a sleeper sofa and is a much larger room with amenities other rooms do not have. Our suites can only be booked directly through the hotel, suites cannot be booked through online booking sites. You could also reserve a regular room with two Queen Beds and request a roll - away bed for a small fee. Availability was the reason they could not reassign you to a different room.  I do hope this information will help when next making a reservation for your next visit. Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize an outstanding associate. I have shared your comment with Bob. All our associates truly enjoy taking that extra step to make your stay special. Jim your driver is a very efficient and knowledgeable about the area. I am also pleased you enjoyed the culinary creativeness of our award winning culinary staff at Rusty’s Bistro

title: Beautiful beach location!
review: This hotel is locately directly on the Gulf of Mexico and across the street from the ICW. The staff were superb and made our stay so relaxing and enjoyable. The Clearwater Beach Jolley Trolley stop is directly outside the hotel so no car is even needed.

title: Great location, poor manager
review: Surrounded by water as you are here on the Island of Sand Key should make you feel more alert, relaxed and energized…it sounds as if we succeeded.   Our associates truly care and do their best to ensure that your time with us is the experience you anticipated.  They genuinely enjoy their interaction with our guests. Taking the trolley instead of driving in traffic when going to Clearwater Beach or places along the beach keeps it stress free.  We will be looking forward to assisting you with your next relaxed, stress free vacation.

title: Gorgeous location and Great Service
review: We stayed at the Sheraton for 5 nights while visiting family. The best thing about the hotel is the friendliness of the staff. Everyone, from the front desk to the maintenance workers, was helpful and pleasant. The beach is wide, white and beautiful.  Sand Key Park is next door and is nice to walk through.Pool is nice, but pool area could use some updating. Our room was traditional and the bathroom was quite small. The room did not have a refrigerator, but did have a coffee maker and other amenities. Our first room, 806, overlooked the inter coastal waterway, but also the roof of the convention area and the dumpsters and delivery area. It was also on the end near service elevator and was loud at night. We asked to be moved to a quieter room and were put in 444 which was somewhat…

title: Great Hotel
review: Spent two nights here in June 2013 and had a very nice time. The hotel is very well kept up with a friendly staff. The rooms are very nice and comfortable. The pool is great with a lot of chairs to sit or lay in. The pool snack bar is good with reasonable prices.  The hotel is next to a park which is an enjoyable walk. The beach is a little walk to get to but very nice. The hotel is also on the trolley stop which is the best way to get to downtown Clearwater Beach as the parking there can be an issue.  The only thing negative about this hotel is the gap under the room door is rather large, it lets in a lot of light at night and you have to pay for internet. Other than that, it is a great place to stay.

title: Great spot on the beach - hotel a little dated.
review: June is a great month to visit the beaches and the Sheraton Sand Key; perfect weather and still a tranquil environment. I was pleased to hear your experience was all you anticipated. The trolley is a fun way to get around without the stress of driving in traffic and trying to find a place to park. One of our standards is to have a fee in place for the internet however just recently we have modified this in a small way; all internet in the lobby or The Mainstay Tavern The  Link @ Sheraton experienced with Microsoft is provided free of charge.  This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms but for now it remains as a fee based service. We are constantly updating and renovating throughout the hotel, the doors are one of the issues we will be addressing. We hope that you will make a return visit to "Our Island".

title: Fantastic location
review: The location right on the beach is fantastic and the layout of the hotel is great for kids. The heated pool is also nice as it was not super warm. That said, the hotel is in need of some sprucing up. Furniture in rooms looked beaten up. Lobby was not modern looking, bathroom area was tiny. Everything was clean and my kids had fun. That was most important. Great wide beach with lots of activities including volleyball.

title: Perfect for our quick getaway needs!
review: I agree; if you're looking for a peaceful, relaxing vacation or a fun-filled family getaway we have a perfect setting to make new memories. We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas.  We are in the first phase of putting new furniture in the rooms at this time and will finish when occupancy allows. We do appreciate your feedback.  Rest assured we are doing our utmost to better meet your expectations. Next time, given a chance, I hope you will enjoy the changes.

title: Superb vacation
review: This hotel is not the fanciest, and the rooms are fairly old.  However, the location is just superb! This hotel has a relaxed family feel and has everything you need for the kids.  The staff are great and food is decent.  The beach is just great with miles of white sand.  This is a great place for a short relaxed family break.

title: Great location
review: Unfortunately it rained the couple of days I stayed at the Sheraton so I wasn't able to see much of the area.  I had a nice view and the room was very comfortable. I particularly liked the extra space for coffee setup which was separate from the sink area. Both were outside of the bathroom/shower area. If I have a complaint, it was the noise from the room next door, which was heard though the connecting door. The bed was Sheraton quality and quite comfortable! I arrived very late and the staff was very kind and helpful. I would certainly stay there again.

title: Would return
review: I was pleased that the associates who greeted you at the time of your arrival started your stay on a positive note. They enjoy the interaction with our guests and want to ensure your experience is all you anticipated. I am sorry about the rain.  You must return when the sun is shining as there is so much to explore. I am pleased you appreciated the room and the amenities that we offer. Our “Sweet Sleeper“ beds were installed in the rooms with our guests comfort in mind.  We have noted your comments regarding the level of disturbance coming from the other rooms and would like to apologize for these occurrences. We know how frustrating and disappointing it can be when you have time to relax and your expectations are not met.  We look forward to seeing you again.

title: Awesome family vacation in Clearwater Beach
review: I recently spent 4 nights at a confernece in the hotel.  Everyone, with the exception of who I assumed was the manager of the Island Grill, was very friendly and helpful.  The woman at the Grille became a little arrogant when I asked to order a lunch take-out at a certain time as this was going to be "the busy time" when the conference took a break. Hmm the sign on the outside of the restaurant said to call ahead to have your food ready.  Oh well one bad apple....did not spoil my time. The server that took my order then later handed over my food made up for Ms. Grouchy. The food in Rustys and the Island Grille was very good.  Wait staff very nice. The rooms were very comfortable.  Loved the beds.  Very clean. Small bathrooms.  My view was of the tennis courts, a stretch to see…

title: Sheraton Sand Key Resort
review: Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. I sincerely apologize that our commitment to do so was not followed through by all our associates.  We have noted your comments and they will be shared with the appropriate managers. We always appreciate when our guests take the time to share their concerns with us so we can continue to improve our service. I am pleased that you found some positive moments during your stay. I hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.

title: Beautiful grounds and beach
review: Just returned from 9 days at this hotel with my family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids aged 4-6). It was the best vacation ever! It was our 2nd time staying at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and it did not disappoint. The Staff are amazing (the pool staff gave my son a birthday cake!), the food is delicious, the rooms and grounds are spotless. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Great Conference Location
review: For the past two years the organization I belong to have held their annual conference at this hotel.  The staff is unfailingly helpful, friendly, and professional.  One of the porters went out of his way to help me figure out how to use a feature of my new ipad. The food here is some of the best I've had anywhere.  That includes all three restaurants, banquet, and meeting break refreshments.  Free and easy parking.  Nice pool.  Great beach.  And, right next door to the hotel is a beautiful nature park with a fresh water pond with lots of birds.  In between sessions it was great to walk over and do a little bird watching.  Herons, ducks, shrikes.  Bring your camera.   I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Great Employees
review: You certainly can experience Mother Nature at her best; sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, the beaches of Sand Key, dolphin sightings, shell collecting. Truly Florida’s natural beauty. Nesting turtles, eagles in flight, and more than 50 native birds can be found by just taking a few minute walk to Sand Key Park. We try to ensure that your meetings are impeccably planned and followed up by our experienced Sales Department and that it is done in a warm and comfortable environment. Our associates genuinely care about our guests and enjoy taking care of details that will impact your stay. Our award winning culinary staff truly enjoy wowing our guests with a creative presentation and the way they prepare their meals. We do hope you return at a time where you can totally relax and enjoy all we have to offer.

title: Attractive, Beach, Comfort
review: One of the most friendly staff at a hotel.  We were always greeted and asked if we needed any assistance.  Only drawback was we had asked for a wake up call and never received it!  Fortunately we had used our phone as a back up.  When I discussed this during check out I was told the system doesnt' always work if it's on speaker.  This needs to be addressed.  Otherwise I would say it's a great pool/beach area.

title: Beautiful!
review: I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer so improvements can be made. Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect. They truly enjoy the interaction with our guests, they are genuine and caring. I apologize for the issues with the wake-up call. I have shared your concerns with the Director of Guest Services, that issue will be addressed. We look forward to your return.

title: Beautiful Setting on Sand Key - Gulf Front
review: The ABC's of a great hotel.  Just returned from a stay at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort and I had the opportunity to experience the friendly, attentive and "what more can we do to make your stay the best" staff. The hotel is well located on the Gulf of Mexico on a large stretch of beach.  When I was there it was not crowed with sun bathers but beach walkers.  It felt healthy just walking on the beach and not being approached by beach vendors.  Sunsets were amazing.  Food was awesome.  You must try the calamari at Rusty's Bistro.  I am not a fan of the onion ring style of calamari but this was so different that I had to force myself to stop eating it because our main course was coming up.  The room was so comfortable that it was an effort to get out of bed.  The best pillows I…

title: I would go back in a HEART beat!
review: Beautiful rooms, friendly, friendly staff! Comfortable beds. Starbucks coffee in the rooms. Excellent dinner. I loved that your hotel recycles. Great location, beautiful large beach. The only down side to the resort - thin walls. I could hear the neighbor talk, and their alarm go off in the morning. It wasn't a deal breaker though and I definitely would love to return.

title: accomodating staff, clean rooms, quite, good breakfast but very small bathrooms, a few miles from restaurants & shops
review: Thank you for your comments; I am pleased you recognized our associates as they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests. We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the cuisine, we have a very talented culinary staff. Sand Key and the Clearwater area are known for their exceptional beaches, they are beautiful. We are exploring different options to make the soundproofing of the rooms better I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back yet again!

title: Nice Property
review: We booked this hotel for 3 days through Allegiantair.com.  Unfortunately our flight was cancelled & did not get to this hotel till the following day.  I had informed the hotel of our situation & when we arrived, the lady at the front desk was very nice & gave us a complimentary internet access code.  After all the delays and cancellation of our flight, all we wanted to do is put our bags down & relax. However our room key did not work. Had to go down the front desk to try to get it resolve. Finally they had to send a maintenance person to fix it.  The GM was very apologetic & gave us vouchers for breakfast (which was delicious-try the orange muffins!). Only caveat to this hotel is that there's no room service after 11PM and the small bathrooms! There is a convenience shop…

title: Thank you Sheraton  Sand Key!!!
review: We have noted your comments regarding the malfunctioning of the room keys and we apologize for the disappointing experience. I know that those had to be annoying steps to go back again to the front desk and I sincerely apologize. I am sure it was added stress to your unfortunate trip here. I am pleased that the front desk and our GM recognized that. I do hope that the next few days were better and you relaxed, maybe caught a beautiful sunset and a wonderful dinner. We have experimented with Room Service open later then 11:00pm and it was not a popular option with our guests. I do hope that we will have a chance to redeem ourselves at some stage, when next you decide to visit the area.

title: Sheraton club level a must!
review: We've stayed here numerous times for a conference, and as always its a great place to stay. Clearwater is just across the bridge, as well as numerous places to eat. The rooms are spacious and clean, the only downside being the bathroom and sink area which is a little awkward in the way it's designed with the sinks being outside of the shower area itself. Great staff, always willing to lend a hand is a bonus.

title: Really good service....
review: We stayed here with another couple and kids.  Got connected rooms and had a blast.  The hotel employees were very helpful.  Had a great time.  There is a pizza place across the street called pizza bizzar.  It's amazing.  The pool area is nice for little kids.  The only annoyance is the long walk across the sand to get to the beach.

title: Nothing to write home about, take money for extras!
review: It sounds like many fun memories were made for all. Yes…the beach is a distance especially with children in hand and the needs you must bring along to entertain them. It is an Island beach and it has that feel because you are not close to the outside world. It is just you, the surf and sand. On a return visit maybe you can make it an adventure to get to the shore. We do have a beach buggy when occupancy warrants it. The buggy will bring food and beverage options out to the beach.

title: Lovely, clean and great location
review: We stayed for 5 nights. We had a bedroom looking over the gulf which was beautiful. Thank you Jane at reception! However the bedroom itself is not very good: bathroom is ridiculously small! Bath and loo in such tiny room that you had to go out of bathroom to dry yourself (on the carpet). Washing basin is in main bedroom  just in front of coffee maker next to room entrance!  No fridge in bedroom, you have to pay 5$ a day for it, no free wifi, you have to pay about 10$ a day for that! Nothing complementary.... and the hotel is not cheap! Be aware, nothing is close.

title: Minor Issues
review: Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is truly appreciated and I will be sure to share your comments. I understand your feeling on the internet in our guest rooms and the refrigerators. At this time there is a charge for refrigerators, we are hoping to work on a project that would put the refrigerators in most of the rooms at no extra charge. The internet; just recently we have modified this in a small way and all internet in the lobby or The Mainstay Tavern’s Link @ Sheraton experienced with Microsoft (the Link) is provided free of charge. This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms but for now it remains as a fee based service. You will find at many resorts these charges are included in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to do that, and only charge for usage should the guest so choose. I will share your thank you with Jane, I am sure she will be pleased. Our associates do truly care about extending excellent service. We do enjoy being on this side of the bridge as it is very tranquil and just over the bridge are all the restaurants and activities of Clearwater Beach. It is just a few dollar taxi ride and we have two different Trolley systems to use. We do hope you will come see us again.

title: Hotel not up to typical Sheraton/Starwood Hotel
review: We happened here just on a chance. We have a room with a fabulous view of the pool and ocean. Sundown view from our room. All the employees we have run into have all been very friendly.  Our room is super clean and the linens are gorgeous white.  Yes I would absolutely stay here again and would recommend it to friends. The beach location is beautiful.

title: Really enjoyed our stay here
review: Every single staff member as FANTASTIC*.  I have never been to a hotel where 99.9% of everyone who worked there was so pleasant, helpful and welcoming.  From the front desk, to the concierge, to the gym, to the towel guys (especially awesome was a man with gray hair who was always so happy to see us, I wish I had his name!)  We had Roberta in the restaurant one morning and she was so awesome.  Our room was very comfortable, the beds were great.  Having a balcony with chairs was nice too.   My only complaint about the rooms is you can hear absolutely every sound made in the hall.  No problems from above, but everything in the hallway or in the room next door sounds like it is in your own room.  We brought a sound machine from home which helped a bit, but also had the AC on the…

title: Beautiful gulf views and great beach access
review: I am delighted that your interaction with our associates was a positive experience. We are very pleased with our associates as they genuinely care and do all they can to ensure our guests are treated with the respect they deserve. I will share your comments with Roberta and Tom; they are two of our brightest stars.  I am sure they will be pleased to hear your comments. I do apologize for the rude behavior of Jason and that comment has been passed on to the appropriate manager. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds are designed with your comfort in mind. We have just started a project that will cut the sound level down. It does sound as if you had an excellent beach vacation. We will look forward to your next beach escape.

title: Nice hotel on beautiful beach!
review: Beautiful gulf views await you at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort, especially from rooms on the southwest side on upper floors. The in-hotel reservation agent, Caresse, was extremely helpful at helping us choose a room that would have the view we wanted along with the correct bedding configuration for our stay. In addition to having a beautiful pool and hot tub area, the sand beach comes up to the edge of the hotel and extends to water's edge. The facilities for families are excellent with the pool, beach volleyball courts, tennis courts and of course the beach itself only steps away. In addition to a superb location the staff are very friendly and go a long way to make the stay a comfortable and happy one for the guests.

title: Beautiful beach & great location!
review: The views are breathtaking; beautiful sunsets, stretches of sandy beach, dolphins and birds playing in the water…it is paradise. Our associates are dedicated to ensuring that your needs are fulfilled right from the beginning. Carress really cares and strives to do all that she can to ensure you have a great stay. She realizes each guests’ needs are different so she takes the time to find out what will make your experience memorable. Thank you for recognizing our associates; they all genuinely care. It sounds as if you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer. We hope that you plan another visit sometime in the future

title: Very good resort hotel in Clearwater Beach
review: I've stayed at this hotel several times while visiting Tampa.  It's about a 30 minute drive, but the fantastic beach is well worth it.  The room is typical Sheraton - well equipped, clean, but a bit small (although one time I was upgraded to a suite as an SPG Platinum benefit and that extra room was great!).  The hotel feels more like a resort.  The restaurant serves good food (free breakfast for Platinum members) and very nice dinner, although it's not cheap.  There is also a bar, where both food and drinks are good and reasonably priced.  The beach is outstanding, although it is a hike from the hotel (although the hotel is right on the beach, the beach is wide, about 10 minutes to walk from hotel building to the edge of the water).  The Gulf water is beautiful.  It really…

title: Very Great Host
review: We stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key resort as part of the Susan G. Komen 3 day event in Tampa Bay.  This was our last event in Tampa for hopefully just a year.  They have been the host hotel for as long as I been participating and they went out as usual for our event. Cookies and lemonade in the lobby and even had coffee bagels and fruit at an real early hour for purcahse by all walkers, volunteers and crew member of the Susan G. Komen 3 day event.  The room nice and the beds were comfortable. We are sad that the event won't be back in Tampa in 2014 but do look forward to coming back for a lazy weekend anyway.  This hotel is a must stay!  Alot in the area to do also....come back enjoy.

title: Great staff, but hotel needs improvement
review: We will miss you warriors, we looked forward to October and your stay for the past seven years. We enjoyed all the energy, dedication and enthusiasm you all brought with you. The cookies and lemonade and the pink balloons were our way to show our support. We are pleased we could ensure a good night’s sleep on our “Sweet Sleeper” beds and the breakfast needed.  I am sure a relaxing week-end at some point will be just what you need, we look forward to your return,

title: Visiting family
review: We stayed here for a week over Christmas 2013 so had plenty of opportunity to sample their service.  First, the hotel is situated away from Clearwater's more busy beach strip and so offers a quieter experience.  The hotel was built in 1975 and it shows in a number of places.op  The lobby is large and comfortable and probably the most up-to-date part of the hotel.  Check-in was smooth, and with plenty of free parking we were in our room quite fast.  The single room we booked had no refrigerator or microwave.  The furnishings in the room (including the wallpaper) were quite dated (at least 10 years + old) - the only new item was the flat-screen TV.  The room had a balcony (very small and with furniture that also needs updating), and the park view turned out to be view of the…

title: Wish we could have stayed longer!
review: We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your business!  We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas.  In the beginning of 2013 our Lobby, Sheraton Club lounge, Mainstay Tavern and The Island Grille were completely renovated. I apologize for the lack of service at the Sheraton Club lounge. I have shared that information about the associate and the menu with the appropriate manager. Our associates are trained to be warm and efficient.  All of our associates genuinely care and do all they can to ensure you enjoy your experience. I am sure memories were made for your son … not everyone receives a free DVD and book - he must have made quite an impression! I hope he enjoyed his visit to see “Winter”. It is unfortunate that you did not get to enjoy the pool due to the weather. I do hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you in the future.

title: We were treated like royalty!
review: Beautiful resort right on the sand just south of Clearwater beach. Pool area is connected to the beach with no obstruction of view or access to the ocean. Would love to have stayed more then two nights.

title: Great Staff and Hospitality!
review: The staff at all levels are excellent from bellmen, front desk, bar/restaurant staff, housekeeping to management and clearly interested in making your stay great. Thank you for this hospitality, it really does make a difference. The pool and grounds are beautifully kept. They also have a private beach area, which leads out to the main beach front. This section of Clearwater/Sand Key is made up of hotels and condo's which gets you away from crowds of Clearwater beach. There are a few restaurants within walking distance and the Jolly Trolley (local transit) stops in front of the hotel ( which will take you into Clearwater or surrounding Indian Rocks and area). They are in the process of upgrading common areas and rooms. A few suggestions for next round of property renovations:…

title: Exceptional Guest Service
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our outstanding associates. They truly enjoy going above and beyond to make your stay special. I concur that the internet is something most all guests require nowadays.  It is one of our standards to have a fee in place however just recently we have modified this in a small way and all internet in the lobby or The Mainstay Tavern The  Link @ Sheraton experienced with Microsoft (the Link) is provided free of charge. This may be a step in the direction of providing it complimentary in all guestrooms but for now it remains as a fee based service.  We do enjoy being on the Island of Sand Key as it is so very tranquil here yet just minutes away from the action of Clearwater Beach. I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer.  I can assure you your comments will be shared so that improvements can be made.

title: Conference with many Benefits
review: We traveled for our bi-annual Christmas family trip and spent 4 days at Sand Key.  Every staff member we encountered was friendly and helpful and went out of their way to make our visit enjoyable.  Two staff members in particular, Ken in the bar and Roberta in Rusty's were EXCEPTIONAL.  They truly know the meaning of hospitality.  Ken brought a toy over for our 16 month old son and Roberta gave us great local recommendations.   The resort itself is in excellent condition.  We were very pleased with the accommodations in the three guest rooms that we had as well as the public facilities.  I would definitely recommend to others and look forward to returning in the future.  Thanks so much!

title: Reception lady with the Santa Hat could be more polite
review: I am so pleased that your trip was as anticipated. All our associates genuinely enjoy making your stay a memorable experience. I have shared your comments with the associates named, and their managers. Ken and Roberta truly enjoy the interaction with our guests. Thank you for letting us be part of your Holiday. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit.

title: Beautiful beach - full of shells for the kids to find.
review: I attended a conference here in October, although I stayed at a friends apartment. On lunch breaks I enjoyed the restaurants specials in a take out box and to go sodas so I could lay out at the pool. Pool and beach were gorgeous. Staff was nice. I would like to go back for vacation. The town was a lot of fun at night.

title: Honeymoon
review: You don't even have to leave the Resort. Our car was parked all week. We love this place. It has many restaurants and some shops. It has a beautiful pool that is You can stay by the pool or go to the beach. Absolutely Beautiful!

title: Fantastic location and service
review: Congratulations! May you share many sunrises and sunsets together. The beaches of Sand Key are very private; you can even find spots where you feel like you are on your own private Island. It is serene and the sunsets are beautiful a perfect setting for romantic memories to be made. We hope you will make a return visit in the future … Maybe an anniversary so you can add to those memories.

title: Excellent location on beach
review: My friend and I stayed for two nights at this resort. Her son in law works for Starwood so we stayed with his discount. Everyone was so helpful and friendly. We were upgraded to a room with a beautiful ocean view. The food was great and every one of the staff were very friendly and  extremely helpful. The beach was very quiet as all the neighboring buildings are condos. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Hotel surpasses expectations
review: I am delighted that you enjoyed your experience and your room assignment. Our associates do truly care, their main concern is ensuring that your stay is all that you anticipated. The beaches of Sand Key are tranquil and views are beautiful, a wonderful place to relax.

title: Average
review: Loved the hotel -----checking in was easy. The doorman helped with our luggage he brought it up on a cart for us and on the way to room showed us where everything was located.  Room was great had a view of  the water and a small balcony to sit out on. Bed was nice and comfortable. Had booked 1 night and after arriving changed to 2 nights. Restaurant on site with a small store across from it for necessities a bit pricey.  Didn't use the pool was chilly when we were there but looked nice and clean. Had a hot tub nice and warm. Beach is next to hotel but a bit of a walk to the water.  Very private area. We had a car so we drove to a restaurant to eat but there are no restaurants near the hotel. Nice buffet breakfast at the hotel for a fee. Had everything you could want for…

title: Excellent staff, great location
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key for a long weekend dec. 5-8th. The resort is approximately a 40 minute shuttle ride from Tampa International. I would recommend renting a car, as you are not within walking distance to many amenities. However, the Clearwater Beach trolley system does work well for getting you to attractions, restaurants etc.. The location of this resort is awesome. Beautiful stretch of broad sandy beach. The pool area is lovely, with a view of the beach. Where this resort is exceptional is the staff. We travel frequently, my husband often stays at Starwood properties on business. This resort has great staff. They treat guests as they would guests in their home. There is clearly a sense of ownership in the property that they work for. The ladies in…

title: Will come back
review: It is very satisfying to hear that your expatiations were fulfilled during your stay. Our associates genuinely care and do their best to ensure that you enjoy your time with us, they truly consider you their personal guest. Our associates are given the empowerment to make decisions concerning the guest’s needs, they take great satisfaction that it could be their decisions that can affect your stay in a positive way. I have shared your comments with the appropriate managers and the associates mentioned. We will look forward to a return visit.

title: Great Hotel
review: What a spectacular staff here. Everyone upbeat and friendly. Ester in the gift shop is wonderful. Beach spectacular, breakfast was great, waitstaff cannot do enough for you, Huge, sparkling lobby, Room is well equipped and laid. Only drawback right now is some German tourist acting like the just got out of prison and raising hell around the pool, But then again they may have arrived from Germany in December, Otherwise quiet rooms.

title: Decent
review: I was delighted to read your review and that you enjoyed our associates they truly are genuine in wanting to make your stay be all you anticipate and more. Ester enjoys interacting with our guests she truly cares.  I sincerely apologize for the distracting gentleman at the pool, I have shared that with the appropriate manager. We will look forward to a return visit.

title: The Sheraton Sand Key is a great place for business or vacation.
review: This is  a great hotel in a great beach. Nice view and wonderful service. The pool is located right at the edge of the beach. The restaurant is solid. Nice tennis courts near the pool and the beach. Free parking. Nothing to complain. I used Starwood reward points to pay for two interconnected rooms for two night. I highly recommend it.

title: Nice and accommodating staff, good value
review: The staff and facilities were very good.  Everyone from the front desk to the waiters in the restaurants and the pool staff were very pleasant and helpful.  The pool area is pleasant with a bar and snack shop located on site.  The white sand beach is behind the pool but is about a 1/4 mile walk to the gulf.  Rooms are nicely appointed with flat screen TV's and comfortable beds. Late check out is an added bonus, just ask!

title: Only because of a conference.......
review: We are pleased that you enjoyed your interaction with our associates; they truly enjoy ensuring that our guests experience is all that is anticipated. Sheratons “Sweet Sleeper” beds are custom designed mattresses which are made exclusively for the Sheraton. Your comfort is one of our main priorities.  We look forward to a return visit.

title: Great place to stay
review: We stayed for 2 nights for a conference.  The largest downside is that the beds were rock hard and very uncomfortable.  Our conference room was extremely chilly and so we checked out the sweatshirts in the gift shop....the lowest price was $48!  I would not stay here aside from a conference.  The highlight of the hotel is the restaurant, Rusty's.

title: great place to stay
review: Rusty’s Bistro does have an award wining culinary staff and the servers are professional, warm and friendly; we are pleased you enjoyed your experience there. Your comfort is a priority with us; I do apologize that you found the Sheraton “Sweet Sleeper’ bed too firm. We do try to control the temperature so that it is comfortable for everyone. We do understand this does not resolve the issues you experienced. We do hope you will reconsider and will allow us to better serve you in the future.

title: Never a more disappointing hotel stay
review: We were visiting family in Palm Harbor after 5 days at Disney and just wanted some beach time.  They let us check in early and our flight wasn't until 5:15 pm and they let us check out at 3 pm. The pool atmosphere was wonderful. The drinks were delicious. The staff is wonderful.  The beach was beautiful. The location is great just around the corner from Clearwater happenings and lots of stuff to see when you head south. Would suggest this to my family and friends!!

title: Three-star property, good location, so-so rooms
review: I stayed four nights for a conference. During my short stay, I observed that this hotel does a brisk conference and wedding business.   The good: very nice front desk staff, walking distance to a small shopping center with two restaurants I frequented: Columbia and Maggie Mae's, as well as several nice shops and a good nail salon, beachfront (though there is the strangest square sand area leading out to the beach - it takes five minutes to reach the beach proper from the time you step into the sand), comfortable beds, I was pleased with cleanliness.  The average: the pool is small for a hotel this size, the vanity is too small, the hotel is showing age in hallways/elevator bank areas in particular, but other areas as well.  Overall, I enjoyed my stay. I'd call this a solid 3…

title: Like the hotel!
review: I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer.  I can assure you your comments will be shared so that improvements can be made. Yes, we do have many conferences and special event groups; although much of our business is social. We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas. We are working on the elevator bank areas at this time, among other projects. We do hope you will return to see the changes we have made.

title: Another fantastic stay.....almost don't want to advertise it. If you are just looking to relax, this is the place.
review: We stayed here for 4 nights in October. Weekday is much less crowded than the weekend. Highly recommend the Rusty's Bistro restaurant.  We think the food tastes great! Enjoyed the pool and the nearby beach as well.

title: Great views and beach...
review: Rusty’s Bistro does have a very talented culinary staff and Executive Chef John Harris, who is responsible for creating an exciting and well-thought-out menu, has added many exciting delights for our guests. We enjoyed reading that you enjoyed our beautiful beaches. We do hope you will plan a return visit in the future.

title: Simply Awesome !
review: Not located on the main section of Clearwater Beach, but just on the other side of the bridge in Sand Key. The staff are by far the most friendly and accommodating at a beach resort we have found. We were there for my Dads 70th Birthday and they surprised him with a cake in the room at check in....Just one example of the go above and beyond service we experienced.  l would pay to get club level for continental breakfast and cocktails before dinner. It was well worth it. We really enjoyed the dining options too. This was our 2nd visit and we know we will be back for a 3rd.

title: Wonderful
review: We had a great time at this resort. Big clean rooms. The staff was so nice and helpful. Great location close to shopping. They have a small store if you need lotion or even band aids and a shop with clothes. Large pool and beach bar. If you love to walk this is a great place for that. The best part of this resort is the BIG white sand beach. LOVE IT!! We will go back to this Sheraton.

title: Overall really nice hotel
review: I appreciate your comments and am pleased that you enjoyed your time spent with us. I myself love walking the beach; here in the Clearwater area we are known for our exceptional beaches. Everyday you can find a different treasure along the shore line and the peace and quite can be very therapeutic.  Our associates are efficient and caring and genuinely enjoy being helpful. We would be delighted to have you back for another stay.

title: Island Grille small quaint and wonderful. Best place on Sand Key Beach
review: For starters, i do not expect 5 diamond hotels, but I absolutely do not tolerate unclean hotels. This hotel was extremely clean and very nice. While it does not have the luxury touched like marble floors etc, it is a very nice hotel overall and the staff was likely the nicest that I have encountered at a hotel. It is right on the beach and a couple hundred years from the water, but the beach is beautiful. I was there for a convention and the reception halls and ammenities fro the group were all very nice as well. They set up tents on the beach for our group and we did have a reception out there the one night that was fun. Who does not like a beach party. If you are looking for a very nice, clean hotel, right on a beautiful beach, this is a great place to stay. I strongly…

title: Stunning, but the staff is the real gem!
review: It was a pleasure to note how much you have enjoyed the events held with us. It is lovely having dinner on the beach accompanied by a beautiful sunset and an efficient staff to serve you. We are proud of our associates; it pleases them to assist you, our guest, in enjoying your stay. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you and would be pleased to have your continued support.

title: Other hotels could learn a lot!
review: I  can't say enough about the Island Grille at the Sheraton Sand Key. My family and I have been going to the Island Grille for the past 15 years.  The staff and hostess are excellent, friendly, helpful, and always ready to accomadate.. The food is fantastic, fresh, abundant, and  healthy. Best of all  the price is right.  The advertising for the Island Grille could be better, unless you know where it is you might miss out. It would be nice, if the hotel had signs out to let everyone know where it is.  The hours need to be extended, closing on the weekend at 5PM is a loss for everyone.  The Hotel Public Relations Director would be a hero  to advertise to the community and hotel guests about THE ISLAND GRILLE. They should offer a daily early bird dinner special. My family and I…

title: Wonderful Getaway for Two
review: The most outstanding part of this hotel are the people who provide the service to the visitors.  There was not one person who was not friendly or helpful from the front desk staff to the cleaning personnel.  We let the hotel know through our booking reservation that it was our anniversary and we were pleasantly surprised to find a bottle of cold wine with two chilled glasses in our room when we arrived.  The beach is beautiful and the fitness facilities are top notch.  The hotel was relatively quiet as well.  We would definitely stay here again!

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Our associates are the heart of the hotel. Customer care is amongst our highest priorities and it is always gratifying to receive such praise. I will share your comments with them. We are so pleased that your visit was a success. We willl look forward your return visit and hope that there will be many more to follow

title: Relaxing family holiday
review: My Wife and I passed 5 days in this Hotel in front of the beach, wich is one of the best beaches in the world , Clearwater beach. The service is execellent, all the staff is friendly, is clean. So I highly recommend this place to have fun.

title: Best Family Vacation
review: It is always pleasant to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay. We do have 10 beautiful acres of Island beach and you were here the perfect time of the year for enjoying being outside. Our associates are commitment to providing you with the service levels and recognition you deserve and expect.  There are lots of activities to keep you busy with Clearwater just being over the bridge. We thank you for any recommendations and will look forward to your return.

title: i know it looks "dated"...but looks are deceiving
review: We stayed here for 10 days after a week spent in Disney, 4 adults and 2 children and the hotel was lovely and quite peaceful.  The rooms were clean and comfortable with all mod cons and we had a laundry room on our floor a few doors down, which i though would be noisy but wasn't.  The pool area was nice and right on the beach.  We had breakfast here most mornings, nice good choice of food catering well for young children.  This hotel was slightly out of the main clearwater centre with a 25 minute walk needed, you cant just stroll outside to find a restaurant.  There also isn't a lot to do in Clearwater and if we didn't have relatives here to show us around we would have gone crazy with boredom.

title: Great Weekend
review: Opted to take a short weekend in Clearwater having had a week out in East Tampa, hotel was sold out but the check in was smooth and despite not having my preferred room choice the amenity more than made up for it. Club room was spacious and staff very friendly but there we're limited seating options , Rusty's was my highlight as the Nickel & Nickel Wine with out standing lamb chops for Friday and then balanced with New York Strip Saturday (just to finish the wine :)  Pool area was ok, lots of families, screaming and background music to make sure you felt part of the event  Dawn was spectacular

title: Nice
review: Ah! Great taste in wines and I am so pleased you enjoyed your culinary experience both nights. The associates in Rusty’s Bistro, as well as all our associates, genuinely want you to enjoy your experience when staying here. It does please us when you feel connected and part of the community; you are definitely part of the event when staying here. I do apologize for not having your preferred room and the limited seating in the Sheraton Club. I hope you will return at a more tranquil time when the above are available.

title: Great stay
review: Overall nice resort. Rooms are average; overall very clean property. Decent location with a great beach. Pool is a slightly smaller than you would expect but who needs the pool when the beach is 100 yards from your door.

title: Great Hotel
review: I want to thank you for sharing your comments with us as it is very important for us to hear the voice of our customer. I appreciate that you enjoyed the location. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and the grounds. I do hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you in the future

title: Views were great!
review: Pros: courteous staff, great room, wonderful location (5 minute walking distace to shoreline), tennis/voleyball courts, shuttle takes you to the hotel from the airport for only $25, conveniently set up conference rooms for business travelers.  Con: shower had 2 settings - cold and scalding.

title: Thank you for putting up with us!
review: We stayed at your hotel when we were in town for a wedding. After hours, we were definitely being too rowdy by the pool and instead of asking us to leave or turn in for the night, you helped us find a location to continue our celebrations. It was much appreciated and helped make the entire weekend very special!

title: Good last minute choice
review: We appreciate that you recognizing our associate’s willingness to ensure that you enjoy your stay. It is our goal to help make your stay memorable. We do hope you make the Sheraton Sand Key your hotel of choice when in the area.

title: Nice resort
review: Booked this room at the last minute. Might have been the last room in the house. Nice beach, nice staff and good breakfast. Second floor very loud from housekeeping and laundry. Might go back if I reserve earlier. Check out my room's view.

title: Misleading
review: Thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key for your stay. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service, our associates do truly care . We will look forward to a return visit

title: Nicely renovated - excellent customer service
review: We recently got back from our stay at this hotel for a week and it wasn't bad. There's no resort or parking fees, which was welcomed. The room was nice and housekeeping came every day. The bathroom was a bit small, but good enough for us. The pool is nice but it is on the small side, so it can become crowded. Also, this is supposed to be a beachfront property, but the walk from the resort to the beach is about 1/4 mile, so be prepared for that if you want to go to the beach here. We also had the breakfast buffet at the restaurant and it was decent, nothing special though. We also had dinner, again, nothing special. My only complaint is that the doors are thin because you can hear people who are near your door very clearly. But overall, it was an ok stay and we wouldn't mind…

title: Nice Conference Venue
review: My wife and I attended a small conference located in the Sheraton Sand Key.  The hotel is on a great area of the beach, with gorgeous white sands and warm water.  After the day at the conference, we checked in for the evening for a stay in a gulf view room.  We had a room on the 7th floor, overlooking the pool and gulf, and from the side of the balcony we could also see the intercoastal.  Dinner was part of the conference, down on the beach under the large event tents, and the sunset was spectacular.  Dinner, which was a buffet, was also very good.  The stay in the room was comfortable, although there was loud music coming from the pool area until just after 10pm (went to bed early after a long day of lectures and presentations).  Breakfast in bed was nice, and tasty.

title: Great place to stay
review: It is great when you can mix business with pleasure and it sounds as if that is was a successful mix for you both. I was pleased to hear you enjoyed the location of your room and that you found it comfortable. The sunsets are a beautiful backdrop to a dinner under the tent. Our guests are here for a variety of reasons; we try to respect the needs of all our guests. We have noted your comments regarding the level of load music coming from the other pool. I do apologize that the music disturbed your sleep. We do hope you might return sometime in the future.

title: Good location
review: We arrived early on our visit as we were going to a football game, although our room wasn't ready they couldn't of been more helpful, they looked after our luggage got us a cab & set everything up so we could get in our room as soon as we got back. It was lovely & clean, staff were very helpful & professional.  They have a little bus service that you can pick you up in the grounds & take you into town which is a great little service.  We had the executive suite which was really nice in the morning & evening for a drink & a chat.

title: Nice resort with a huge expansive beach
review: Our associates do take pleasure in ensuring you enjoy your experience at the Sheraton Sand Key. They pride themselves in being detail oriented, friendly and caring. Thank you for recognizing them for those extra touches. We actually have two public forms of transportation. We have a Jolly Trolley which is an area Trolley and then we have The Suncoast Beach TrolleySM transports visitors every 20-30 minutes from 5:05am to 10:10pm during the week on Monday through Thursday and Sunday. Friday and Saturday have extended service until midnight. You will see the trolley stop bus signs located along the route. We do have a Trolley stop right in front of the hotel. Hope your team won!!!

title: Platinum resort, everything including the staff and food was awesome!
review: Hotel has been renovated since my previous visit. Comfortable rooms / nice pool area and direct access to the beach (good walk to the beach).  Friendly staff and very helpfull. Club lounge need some upgrade and is rather small in comparison with other Sheraton club lounges. However the club lounge staff was very friendly and cooperative . Free parking and offering fast reliable internet connection.

title: Weekend getaway
review: We stayed at the end of September with our 10 year old son.  It was kind of our end of the summer treat.  We stayed in one of the suites with a king bed and a sofa sleeper.  It was very large and comfortable.  We visited the Club lounge several times and the staff was very nice. Love the breakfast in the morning and the Happy hour in the afternoon.  Overall, I recommend the Hotel and I will go back for a quick weekend getaway far enough from our home in Orlando.

title: A WONDERFUL STAY.
review: Week-ends at the beach with your family are so special. The beach is full of adventures for a 10 year old. Pirate boats and dolphins playing in the Gulf … Our beach and Sand Key Park are made for exploring. Then there are swims in the pool and meeting new friends. I am sure memories were made that he will never forget. We will look forward to your next visit.

title: Sheraton Sand Key
review: If you are looking for a totally chilled out holiday , this is the place. We stayed for a week during august 2013, after spending two weeks in orlando theme parks . From the moment we checked in the level of service was first class. Our room was of a large size, spotlessly clean and comfy. We ate in both restaurants were the food was lovely. The pool area has plenty of loungers and shaded areas, the frozen strawberry daquiari,s are to die for from the pool bar, our children also enjoyed the non alcoholic cocktails available. The beach is wonderful,pure white sand, sea shells of all shapes and colours , swimming in the sea was like taking a bath as the water was so warm. If you feel like eating out of the hotel please try the coloumbian restaurant just  a short walk , across the…

title: staff
review: “Chilled” is the word you will need to remember when things get too stressful. Relaxing, walking on the beach, shelling, lounging around the pool with a frozen strawberry daiquiri and then ending the evening with a great meal before heading to your comfortable room. Our associates really enjoy being a part of your great stay. Thank you, we would love to have you return.

title: From arrival to departure outstanding service!
review: I was in clearwater for a business conference for several days staying at theSheraton Sand Key Resort.  I just loved staying at this resort!  Outstanding service - the restaurants had good food and great waiter/waitresses......the room was very nice - very very clean - only thing i didn't care for was the set up of the bathroom - quite small - sink area also very small but the pool area beach area was wonderful!!!

title: Staff rude in club room
review: Lady in club room was very stern. The evening snack was an old sandwich with raw bacon. Don't pay the extra. Mold in shower. I expected this hotel to be much better. Went to dinner in the bar but food there wasn't much better and service wasn't good there either .

title: A great property, with great service & staff!
review: I apologize for the rudeness of the associate in The Club Lounge, I understand this does not resolve the issues you experienced. I hope you accept it as a demonstration of our commitment to providing you with the service levels you expect and deserve… There are no excuses for not meeting let alone not exceeding your expectations with the service in the Mainstay Tavern. I will also share your comments on the food with our Executive Chef. We assure you we will be taking steps to insure such occurrences are not repeated.

title: Nice Weekend Escape
review: This property really is great. Its in a beautiful quiet area of clearwater, with a private beach. My husband and I have been coming here for 2 years now, and absolutely love it. It is BEYOND worth it to pay for a gulf view room. I have noticed all the people on here saying that they had a terrible view because they did not get the room they "requested". As frequent travelers we understand this but clearly some people don't. If your going to pay the cheapest rate for a hotel you can find, and request the best view, HELLO your not going to get the best when you paid for the worst! Of course upgrades are great but you cant rely on them! Personally we find it MUCH better to pay the extra fee for a great view, and be guaranteed that great view, so upon check-in there are no surprises…

title: front desk personal
review: Thank you, your comments are so true. It is beautiful here. The waters edge is a five minute walk. We are on an Island and our beach does have that Island feeling as you are away from the busy part of the world, just sea, sky and sand. I am so pleased that you enjoyed our associates; I know I have said this many times but they do truly care and they will do all they can to ensure you enjoy your stay. When booking a room, we do honor requests but it depends on what the person reserved not what they request. We would love to upgrade our guests when possible; it just is not always possible.  We will welcome your return Kathy and Paul and are pleased that you are now part of our Sheraton Sand Key family.

title: Perfect in every way !
review: Stayed here on a weekend staycation with the family.  Great location just across the channel from Clearwater Beach...so if you want the activity and amenities of Clearwater they are a stones throw away, but if you want a more relaxed setting then you're in the spot to be.  Rooms are a little small but we made it work. The pool is a little small and can be crowded but it's nice and it's well maintained and when it gets crowded you've got a fantastic beach in front of you so no worries. Nice cafe and bar poolside. They have a restaurant, lounge and store for sundries as well.  we had the breakfast buffet and it was pretty decent and was priced a little lower than what were used to at similar hotels. The staff was great and everyone seemed in a good mood which was a pleasant change…

title: Losing it's appeal
review: We've been here every Sept. for 12 years now for a yearly conference.   Parking always a problem. This year, I have to say they did update the lobby and it had a nice fresh look about it but the rooms leave a lot to be desired. Had problems at check-in, room we requested not available so a very kind reception clerk put our name on a list for the following day and she called to let us know we were to be moved and for that I would like to acknowledge her professionalism and that she followed through with us!  Our initial room was looking at the back of the pool snack bar.  Rust stains in the tub, and makeup on a towel....ugh!  Second room had a very nice view of the gulf so that was better but just lots of little things off. Drawers did not close, an odd smell to the room, sliding…

title: Delightfully restful hotel with beautiful vistas
review: I apologize that we did not meet your expectations and have taken particular note of your suggestion that the hotel needs refurbishment/redecoration in the rooms. I have directed your comments to the appropriate managers so the issues you encountered can be rectified. Please rest assured that we do take your feedback very serious and that we will do our utmost to better meet your expectations next time given a chance.

title: Great place
review: We were greeted by a staff member who was able to meet our room requests with a beautiful pool and gulf view...great western sunsets.  We were there for 5 nights and only Saturday got busy, the remaining nights were very low-key with a variety of older and much younger guests.  It was especially fun when the pool person provided extra 'noodles' for us to float on in the pool.  The pool bar gals were so helpful and made every drink from scratch with generous pours.  We also enjoyed the pool restaurant nachos (plenty for 2!) and the Mainstay Tavern meals.  Best of all, we enjoyed the short (1/4 mile) walk to the beach with the beautiful sand dunes and collected many beautiful shells.  We'll be back in late October...can't wait!

title: Great 3-night stay
review: Our associates truly enjoy when they can help in making your stay memorable.  From meeting your room request and doing little things such as smiling and being friendly, supplying you with pool noodles or just making a great drink. Of course the beaches, sunsets and views are nature’s gifts and we love sharing them. We will look forward to your stay in October… it truly is one of the best months to be here.

title: Loosen the purse strings
review: Loved it, such great service, great views,  will come back! !!! What a relaxing time we had and the staff went out of their way to make our 25th anniversary a time to remember and cherish. Pool, beach and hot tubs great, very clean, met all of our expectations.

title: Many years ago
review: Stayed at this hotel many many years ago. Beautiful location but from all outside views i don't see it being worth that price but if some one wants to pay it good for the hotel. I am rating on what was there years ago. I think you would have to put millions in the inside to warrant that price. I Put YEARS AGO Being forced to state a date and my date was many years before 2012.

title: I can't wait to go back
review: Thank you for sharing your comments. We are pleased you enjoyed the location and a memory was made.

title: Wonderful holiday
review: This resort was so clean and the staff is so courteous and obliging to your every need!  Room service was impeccable!!! The sunsets are mind blowing  We found so many sand dollars in the ocean and saw lots of dolphins and stingrays You feel like someone has whisked you away to paradise  :)

title: Four Star Hotel is really a Three Star or even 2-1/2.
review: Thank you, we are pleased that you enjoyed our associates they truly do care … “Paradise” it is; the beaches, strolls along the waters edge, shelling, spotting dolphins and the sunsets. Enjoying a wonderful dinners and maybe a tropical libation, hurry back your room awaits you.

title: Heaven on Earth
review: I have just returned from sand key resort. It was wonderful. We had spent 5 days in NYC and flew to Tampa for a peaceful break, it exceeded all our expectations. The room was not overly big but more than adequate for are needs.  However I was disappointed with the small balcony. There was three of us in the room but we couldn't pass each other on the balcony. Everyone was so friendly from the obey porter to the shop assistant, the cleaners and the pool attendants no one could be more helpful. I must comment on the restaurants. Simply excellent! Rustys is the main restaurant and the food is beautiful and very reasonable. The breakfast Buffett should not be missed.  One complaint is why can we not eat outside? Other business groups where catered for at the pool side but we as…

title: Truly incredible!
review: We spent four. Nights at the Sheraton Sand Key and were spoiled from the moment we arrived.  The people were so nice...especially Peggy and Nickie in the club lounge. First, get a gulf view...worth every penny.  Also, I strongly suggest that you upgrade to the club lounge...includes continental breakfast, water and soda throughout the day, and drinks/snacks from 5:00-7:00. Well worth the cost.  They also have one of the few private beaches, and it's a really nice one too.  You will hard pressed to find a resort with everything that the Sheraton Sand Key has to offer!

title: Enjoyable!
review: Words such as “truly incredible” are what we strive to hear. The Gulf view rooms are perfect for a beach lover. Our associates enjoy spoiling our guests; two of those associates are Peggy and Nickie. I will share your comments with them and their department manager. They sincerely enjoy our guests in the Club Lounge. I am so pleased you came at a perfect time; great weather and a relaxing atmosphere. We will look forward to another visit.

title: Excellent service at the Sandkey Sheraton!
review: This was our first time staying at this resort. My husband and I had a wonderful time. The only things that were negatives was that the beach was a long walk and the pool area was not big enough. The rooms were nice and comfortable. I also appreciated the "old school" thermostat. I love for my room to be cold when I am sleeping and this hotel was able to provide that. And even though the beach was a long walk, it was worth it. There was plenty of room for everyone to spread out so you did not feel crowded. The staff also gave us some very good suggestions for dinner. If we go back to Clearwater, would definetly stay here again.

title: Wonderful!
review: I was delighted that you enjoyed your stay. I hope some memories were made. There are many wonderful restaurants in the area, our associate take pride in researching knowing the area.  I was delighted that you enjoyed your room and slept comfortably in your cool room on our “Sweet Sleeper” beds. Being on the Island of Sand Key our beach is large and a walk to the waters edge. It is away from the Hotel and the outside world and definitely gives you an Island experience.  We are pleased that you will return when in the Clearwater area and will look forward to that visit.

title: Quite nice hotel on the beach, with benifits.
review: My husband and I visited the Sand Key Sheraton last month for a much needed vacation.  The property is smaller than other properties from its nearby competitors but it surely delivers great service. The staff is super friendly and welcoming, especially Jerry at reception and David out by the pool who had friendly smiles and helpful tips. The pool area and beach are well kept and we had no complaints. The bar served awesome drinks and pool cafe had great snacks. The beach was not a far off walk as other commments/reviews suggest and its not as crowded as Clearwater beach. Great place to just relax.  Rusty's bistro which is also located at the Sheraton has  friendly and attentive staff, especially Ryan our waiter. The food was incredible too. I totally recommend this resort. We…

title: great hotel
review: The hotel and staff were great and tried to provide for your every need.  Dining was supper as well  The location was easy to find and extras around the area were well advertised.  There is a meeting area to hold conventions at this location which makes this a great location to have a meeting then time to play.  A must stay if you are in the area.

title: First Rate Value
review: Thank you for your comments and for recognizing our associates.  They sincerely enjoy assisting our guests. I appreciate the kind remarks regarding the cuisine.  We are very proud of our Executive Chef John Harris and his talented culinary staff. We also have a great Sales Department that when booking meetings will help you book fun, creative events to go along with your meetings. We will look forward to seeing you in the future.

title: Much Better Than Expected
review: Sheraton Sand Key is my favorite place to stay in Clearwater. By arriving from the south causeway, you can avoid the traffic that seems omnipresent in Clearwater beach. However if your destination is Clearwater Beach, you can easily cross the north causeway to be there in 5 minutes. The location is really nice, it is right next to a lovely nature park great for short hikes and runs and 5 minute walk from the Columbia restaurant which has great spanish & cuban food and awesome ambiance. The price is right here and I recommend paying a little extra for use of the top floor lounge, it offers drinks and appetizers in the afternoon and a great view of the bay. This little resort is a great value.

title: Just what it needed to be
review: We are truly pleased that we are your favorite place to stay. I appreciate your review and accurate descriptions. We will look forward to your next visit.

title: Just ok
review: We booked this hotel on short notice and settled for it becuase our first choice was already full. We were very pleasntly surprised when we arrived. The hotel appears to be newly renovated and the rooms and all of the the facilities were excellent. The breakfast buffet was high quality and the same room was the evening restaraunt which had fantastic food. The head chef has been at the hotel for more than 20 years and the pride in his work really showed. The private beach was really nice as well with chairs and umbrellas available for rent with no over-crowding like the public beach down the road.   The hotel was close enough to things that you could get there easily but far enough away that you had some privacy. Some of the higher priced hotels required you to use the public…

title: Very very good hotel
review: What an excellent hotel. Extremely good service and the pool staff & restraunt staff. The rooms very large and the beds were the sheraton comfort beds which made for a great night sleep. There was not one fault that could be found. The pool was excellent especially considering that this was a beech holiday it could not have been better. Thank you sheraton another great stay!!!!

title: Athlete friendly and nice ocean view rooms
review: Our associates do truly care about extending excellent service to ensure you enjoy your stay. Thank you for your comments on our staff. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds are designed with comfort in mind I am pleased that was the case.  We greatly appreciate your patronage as a loyal guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and would like to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when planning your next beach holiday.

title: Great week...
review: We stayed there for a triathlon/vacation weekend. The hotel is right next to the Sand Key Park so we rode our bikes directly to the triathlon- VERY convenient!  The hotel has been redone and the rooms were nice and clean. We got a ocean view that ended up overlooking the pool, but the ocean was still in view. You just had to walk out on the balcony to see it. Other rooms to our left had a straight-on view. The hotel is a T shape, so I guess it depends on the room, but it was still really nice.  The hotel is very athlete friendly, we were allowed to keep our tri-bikes in the rooms with us. (Some places don't let you.)  The gym on the top floor was recently redone and was great. It had panoramic views of the bay and ocean. The equipment was all new and in great condition.  The…

title: I thought this was fabulous.
review: Your review was very much appreciated. We do have many events in the area for athletes; it is one of our goals to ensure that you are can focus your energy on your events by providing excellent customer service. We are pleased you received your pillow. We will be looking forward to your visit for the next area triathlon/vacation weekend.

title: A dump, literally
review: We always return to the hotel and this is why,. Great location, fantastic beach and the food is great. You people really know how to take care of you customers. The attention given to my wife and two daughters by Ken at the Mainstay was great. The girls keep asking when are we going back to see Ken...He really knows how to treat his customers well. We ended up having all our meals at the hotel. Why bother going elsewhere when the food and service is excellent. All in all as usual we had a great time. Yes, the pool does get busy at times but that is to be expected during the summer months. This is a great family place to go to.

title: End of summer vacation
review: My 13 year son and I stayed at the Sand Key Resort for a week before he had to go back to school.  For the most part we had an amazing time.  The ocean was a short walk across the white sandy beach and we had perfect weather the entire week.  The only downside was on our last day before checkout (August 17th) the hotel hosted a sand volleyball tournament on the beach immediately adjacent to their pool area.  Over 50 pool crashers from the volleyball event basically took over the pool area for the entire Saturday.  The hotel staff did very little to try to stop this from happening.  They were coming up from the beach all covered in sand and jumping in the pool to clean up and cool down.  By the end of the day the volleyball players had their spouses and children join them…

title: GREAT HOTEL FOR FAMILIES !
review: I was very glad to read that you enjoyed most of your stay with us, and would like to apologize for the unpleasant experience on the last day of your stay.  The event on the beach was a fundraising volleyball tournament hosted by the fire department.  We have had this event in the past, and it was never as challenging as it was this past year.  Our management staff did their best to limit the inconvenience to our registered guests (and the firefighters had many rooms registered as well) however, the event was much more taxing than originally anticipated. It is always our goal to balance the business we have in the resort at any given time.  In this instance, we did not do a good job in scheduling this event on this particular weekend. I am terribly sorry you were inconvenienced on your last day and feel terribly that this one day marred your entire experience with us.  I hope that you will consider returning to give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.

title: Good Hotel for a short visit
review: Great hotel nice staff fantastic beach small pool but we go to Clearwater Beach for the beach not the pool it was not that bad of a walk to the beach but i'm from NYC  so walking is just fine with me will definitely stay again p.s view from room 426 was awesome pool plus beach

title: Great service at a delightful beach location
review: It is always so satisfying to read comments such as yours. The biggest compliment a guest can give us is to tell us you will return! It is a great feeling to know that your stay was everything you anticipated it would be.   We look forward to welcoming you back.

title: Fantastic Stay! Great exercise facilities. Endless Beach.
review: Stayed end of July for 2 nights. Great customer service, all request were met with a smile. Fresh water and requested a refrigerator which was delivered immediately, although they do charge $5.00 per day. Pool is very small and lots of children. We chose the beach, long walk especially when the weather gets ugly. Had lots of wind and high surf, which with an over crowded pool but a damper on the stay. It would be great if they would build a larger pool area. Overall lots to see nearby and friendly, clean hotel. Next time I believe I would look for a resort with additional pool areas, and closer beach.

title: Nice Resort, but overpriced IMO
review: I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort this past weekend. My first impression when I got there was "Wow, those internet photos must have been photo-shopped".  Now, don't get me wrong, its a pretty hotel and beautiful location, but did not live up to the photos in my opinion.  I would gladly have paid the price for what I saw on the internet.  As many have said on these reviews, the pool was VERY crowded pretty much at all times. Its not as big as it appears on the hotel website.  The walk to the gulf is pretty long, much more than what I expected. So if you bring your own chairs or whatever, be prepared for a decent walk with them. I understand there's been erosion there, which obviously can't be helped.  However, I think the length of walk contributes to the amount of people…

title: Nice Resort... Service is Hit or Miss, Small Pool
review: We strive to provide our guests with a superior experience through our product and services. Insight such as yours will only aid us in attaining our goals and for this I thank you.  Our associates do truly care about extending excellent service; I do apologize that you were not provided with that information during your stay and that you had to leave our property to find Spa services. I have addressed your concerns and feel confident you would not experience these situations in a future stay at the Sheraton Sand key Resort.

title: Good.....Has room for improvement
review: I stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort as part of a dance convention. The resort is in a beautiful location on Clearwater Beach. The room was very clean and the queen beds comfortable. The balcony view from the room faced the sunrise over the water which I really liked, but I had to overlook the resort's convention area's rooftop A/C units that were  also part of the view. The pool is nice but very small and crowded and not much for rentals on the beach. The food in the restaurant was good and there were also many restaurants just a short drive away for those who are more adventurous and don't mind leaving the resort.   The service was hit or miss. Check-in went smoothly with very friendly front desk staff and bell service. The two small front desks give the resort a smaller…

title: Nice hotel with room for improvement
review: Please accept our apologies for having missed the opportunity to impress you. We do hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back in the not too distant future. It concerned me to hear that our staff did not follow through on the requests you made; this will be addressed. Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  It is truly appreciated and I will be sure to share.

title: Not what we were expecting!!!!
review: To begin the location of the hotel is superb as it is located on Sand Key which is about a three minute drive from the commotion and riff-raff of Clearwater Beach.  It is around a 45 minute drive from the Airport in Tampa, Tropicana Field, and Busch Gardens.  Unlike the Marriott across the street, the Sheraton is also located on the beach (I will discuss later).
