The service was great a majority of the time besides for the concierge who knew little about the surrounding area which was quite disturbing.  On the other hand the waitress at the Mainstay Tavern (one of the hotel's restaurants) was great and even provided us information about a town that we were looking to visit.  Our room was located on the sixth floor and had an intercoastal view although it overlooked a large part…

title: Looks much nicer on the Internet
review: We stayed here for a 3 day get away with our two kids.  I researched this hotel and read a lot of good reviews. The pool is just way to small for this hotel.  With all the property they have they really need to be able to accommodate all their guests.  Also the beach was so far and when you got there the sand was so corse my kids could not walk comfortably on it.  So our only choice was to go back to the overcrowded pool filled with tons of people, floats and toys.  Not relaxing!   Also bathroom is the size of my kitchen pantry.

title: Fun Place to bring the family
review: I am so sorry that we did not manage to meet all your expectations, for which I apologize.  We are constantly renovating on a regular basis and another pool is a topic for discussion. Sand Key and the Clearwater area are known for their exceptional beaches; over the years our beach has become much larger which is due to the Jetty on the waterway to the north of Sand Key Park. The profile of the shoreline constantly fluctuates because of the regular action of waves and tides; this is true with all of our area beaches. For that reason our beach can be fine soft sand or coarse at different times.

title: Pool needs rules!!
review: We recently stayed here and while the public areas were in pristine shape, the rooms (at least our room) did have some minor defects. Nothing too bad just seemed the room wasn't well maintained. We did have a great view of Sand Key Park and the Gulf. The pool area was clean (crowded) and the staff was friendly and professional. There were lots of places to go around the area to eat or drink. We will come back again.

title: Sheraton Sand Key is Great!
review: I was delighted to hear you and your family had a fun vacation. We are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep the hotel updated and will continue to do so to fix those worn out areas. I am pleased you enjoyed our associates and the area amenities. We will look forward to your return visit.

title: There are better hotels on the beach
review: Very small pool for a resort like this.  I understand the costs of expanding, but with simple rules could be tolerable.  Adults floating on full size loungers in the pool and kids with noodles, inner tubes, etc which make for a less than relaxing time!  My children, who know how to swim, were almost bulldozed over multiple times.  I did not feel comfortable letting them in the water without being within 2 feet of them to protect them.  With simple rules -no floating devices unless life jackets or attached arm floaties, this could be solved......especially since the beach has stingrays and I was nervous letting them swim there.....

title: Great location.  Helpful and friendly employees.
review: We have stayed here 4 times in the past 5 years.  Since my last stay, they did a nice renovation.  The lobby is bright, pretty and spacious. Front desk employees were very friendly and helpful.   It is always nice to feel welcome when checking into a hotel. CLUB LEVEL: We booked the club level and enjoyed having a place to have a light breakfast and nighttime snacks.  The breakfast is very basic (bagels, fruit, cereal and muffins along with coffee and juice) but all you really need before a day at the beach.   There is a light snack from 5-7 of fruit, cheese and a hot appetizer.  Great to stop by before going out to dinner. They also have water bottles and soda available whenever you want it.  I wouldn't pay too much for the extra benefit of club level but if you can get it for…

title: Great way to celebrate 10 years!
review: We greatly appreciate your patronage as a loyal guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and want to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area. Thank you for such an accurate review of the hotel and area amenities. I am pleased you enjoyed our renovations… they are light and bright

title: Great beach
review: My husband and I recently spent 4 days and nights at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort in June of this year.  We LOVED it.  We are parents of 3 young children and needed a vacation where we could be away from them and feel like adults again.  This place was perfect!  The hotel was super clean and everyone was friendly.  The pool and turtle bar were top notch and the beach was beautiful.  One of the best parts of our trip was collecting shells each night and watching for dolphins at sunset just a short walk from the resort.  We were celebrating our 10-year anniversary and were excited at check-in to hear they had upgraded our room from a "standard" to a Gulf view!  We were on the 8th floor facing the Gulf and it made the whole stay that much more perfect.  The staff even sent up a…

title: Great property, great location!
review: Ten years … Congratulations! I could not be more pleased that we succeeded in providing the perfect setting for you both; to relax away from the children, enjoy each others company and make new memories. This is the perfect place for that with strolls on the beach, shelling, beautiful sunsets, and of course Dolphin shows. Thank you for the wonderful comments and we will look forward to your return

title: Luxury Hotel in lovely location
review: This was our second time staying at this hotel and both experiences were equally excellent. The staff is very friendly and helpful and the location is perfect, a short walk to the other side of the bridge but away from the crowds of Clearwater beach. The rooms are spacious and clean and the beds very comfortable. As mentioned in previous comments the hotel although located on the beach is a bit of a hike to the water but the sand is well packed so it is not a difficult walk. We never had an issue with noise from other rooms however it does seem as if the doors are thin as we heard every little noise from the hallway. All in all this is a wonderful hotel and we will be going back for another visit.

title: We love this place
review: We love this hotel.  This was our third stay and I am never disappointed!  The rooms are spacious and clean.  Even the parking lot view rooms overlook lush gardens and palm trees. We could also see the marina-side waterway. The beach-view rooms are even better! The pool is beautiful.  The beach is also beautiful, too, though it was a little bit of a walk to get there.  Still, it is worth the effort.

title: Ok hotel with a beautiful beach.
review: It was gratifying to hear that we never disappoint you. The views are lovely and it is a very relaxing place to be. We greatly appreciate your patronage as a loyal guest of the Sheraton Sand Key and would like to make sure we remain your hotel of choice when visiting our area.

title: We had a room looking towards the parking lot
review: The easiest way to explain my review is by listing pros and cons. PROS 1. Was warmly and quickly greeted by Monique at the front desk.  Who helped us get checked in to a room facing the ocean. 2. A very friendly Danny helped us with our bags and gave us a nice overview of the property. 3. Our room had a beautiful view of the beach and a comfortable bed. 4. The beach is gorgeous white sand and calm blue water.  Perfect!! 5. The housekeeping staff on the 5th floor was efficient and friendly. CONS 1. The crazy noisy hallway!!!!  There is a huge gap under the doors(at least on the 5th floor) where you can hear every door slam, kid scream, loud talking people and a couple of drunks. Did not for restful evenings...which is what we came for.  My advice fix the gaps and soundproof the…

title: Clearwater offers reasonable cost vacation - Sheraton Sand Key Resort, Clearwater Florida
review: It was gratifying to hear that you enjoyed a positive interaction with our associates. Our guests’ satisfaction is our number one priority, and we are happy to hear your expectations were met. We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the room view, and the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds! We are exploring different options to make the soundproofing of the rooms better. The pool is on our priority list. Insight such as yours will only aid us in attaining our goals and for this I thank you.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back yet again!

title: A Good Hotel
review: We stayed here on a recent trip to Florida. We got a room that faced the parking lot and that was fine because the beach was quite a ways away. You need to get a parking permit to park in the parking lot. The pool was very nice but the beach was better! We found a lot of sea shells in the warm Gulf water. We drove to Pier 60 and where we also to get a bite to eat.

title: Great last minute
review: Booked the hotel last minute, around 4pm for that Friday night stay. I was trying to decide where to stay, and by the time I made up my mind, I did not have too many options. However, I am glad I made the decision to stay here, especially because I had a toddler with me. Clean, family friendly, the guys at the pool were awesome. Free, plenty of parking. Service was pretty good. I had one of the older rooms, but I did have an ocean view, so it was worth it. Compared with other options in the area it was a really good deal for the money. The next day, I tried to extend my stay, and unfortunately it was sold out!! I should have booked two days from the start.. bad planning on my part. I wish it was closer to the beach.. Overall a great experience, will stay there again if I had the…

title: Very nice hotel! But I'd prefer a better location.
review: We are pleased you made the decision to stay here. It is rewarding to know that we effectively met your expectations. Our beach has grown over the years as the sand that erodes from points south collect here due to the Jetty at Sand Key Park.  It is beautiful, but does mean a longer walk to the water’s edge. We have had a very busy summer; I apologize for not having a room available so you could stay an extra day. We will look forward to your visit for a beach get away.

title: Great value and location!
review: This hotel was beautiful and very nicely kept and clean.  However, the beach location was ok.  I live on the Atlantic coast of FL and wasn't impressed when I walked out to the beach.  But then explored the coast some more and would have preferred to stay a bit more north where all of the restaurants and shops are, over by the pier!  The beaches there were actually a bit more enticing then they were behind the Sheraton.  There are more places to walk if you find a hotel near the pier.  My kids would've enjoyed it more too if things were a bit closer within walking distance of the Sheraton.  Otherwise, it is nicely kept and the staff was friendly.  No problems.

title: overpriced
review: This area is a perfect place to visit because it does offer something for everyone. The tranquil beaches of Sand Key, the action of Clearwater Beach, museums of St Petersburg and the list continues. Thank you for the nice comments on your hotel stay. Come back to the area and explore …

title: Great family resort
review: We stayed here for one night as our last stop on our family vacation.  It was a nice relaxing day after hitting the theme parks for 4 days.  It is not a new hotel, but it was clean and well kept up.  The staff was very friendly.  I thought that the beds were very comfortable and the rooms were plenty big for 2 adults and 2 kids.  We did not have any trouble with our shower and it had good water pressure.  We did not pay for an ocean view and I'm glad that we didn't because the ocean was a good walk away and you could not sit out on your balcony and really hear the ocean.  We had a bay view and it was very nice.    The beach is a good walk away.  The day we went it was very windy so there was no one serving food or drinks; it was so windy you would not have wanted to try to eat…

title: Outstanding!
review: Everything at SSK exceeded our expectations. I am giving it a 5 out of 5 as it exactly met our expectations for an upper-end resort hotel. Expansive parking, warm and welcoming attitudes,  very nicely appointed, clean and fresh rooms and great dining experiences at Rusty's (have the eggs benedict for breakfast - you won't be disappointed - and the dinner menu is great).   For a lazy afternoon, drinks at the Poolside and Mainstay Bar, as well as access to the the pristine private beach, were just what the doctor ordered. The sand isn't quite the fine grained stuff some people might like, it is a little coarser, but who cares, the water is warm and crystal clear and we were fortunate enough to have dolphins in-shore, supported by diving pelicans. Quite a show!!  The resort is…

title: Good view with a pure, white beach
review: Stayed here for one night in July for a Conference. Overall probably a 6 1/2 or 7 out of 10. It is not a new property but kept up well. Upon arrival there is plentiful, free parking. The hotel is a located in quiet area. Oddly, the beach itself is down a fairly far expanse of beach. This is not necessarily a negative as it's a relaxing walk down the beach from the hotel.   Kate at the Front Desk was quite helpful in assiting me to obtain a room on a high floor, a quiet room and an excellent view. I was told I would have to wait for 2-3 hours for such a room but I acquiesced as I was in a Conference lasting through the afternoon anyway. The room I obtained on the 8th floor was what I requested. Oddly, there were connecting inner rooms on both sides but I experienced no noise from…

title: Perfect trip, nice beach and great customer service!
review: Katie is an example that our associates truly care and do their best to ensure that you enjoy your time with us. I was delighted to hear you enjoyed the beaches and the views. Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, it is truly appreciated and I will be sure to share. Watch the Sheraton Sand Key Facebook, we post when special rates are available.

title: We had a great time here!
review: My wife and I recently stayed at the Sheraton Sand Key Resort for a long weekend.  The amenities and customer service are the best I’ve seen in years throughout my travels in Florida.   The beach was incredible with lounge chairs and umbrellas for rent ($25).  An employee of the Sheraton named “Debby” provided drinks and snacks via golf cart right to your chair.  She’s was incredibly friendly and provided information on local hot spots.   There’s a nice lounge/bar downstairs with entertainment each night and two or three places to stop for munchies during the late night.  We’ve stayed at other hotel properties in Clearwater and the Sheraton Sand Key has them beat!    If you want a nice beach, nice pool, multiple restaurants on property (all you can eat snow crab) and good…

title: Not worth the money
review: Thank you for such a great review on the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We are aware of how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your repeat business! We appreciate the kind remarks regarding Debby, she is a star!  Was pleased you enjoyed the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds! We look forward to welcoming you back yet again!

title: Excellent Value Great Location
review: This is a nicely maintained hotel located on a beautiful wide beach.  It is far enough away from the central Clearwater Beach area (as you take a bridge from Clearwater Beach to Sand Key) to be somewhat private. It is located next to a state park.  The rooms are clean and the amenities are nice enough.  Its a four star hotel at a three star price. Parking is free and the staff is friendly.  I would stay here again.

title: Location is good...
review: Thank you for the great review. It makes us very happy to hear that we fulfilled your expectations and our goals. We hope you will plan another beach getaway at The Sheraton Sand Key in the near future.

title: Not what it used to be
review: Well, my family and I stayed at the SSK for two nights. Right when we got there we were told that our room was not ready and that we would have to wait. We waited for two hours. We got to our room, and noticed that the bathroom was TINY. The rooms were what you would expect. We went to the ocean located right behind the hotel, and had a wonderful time. The next day we had plans to go to the ocean, eat a nice dinner, then swim again. So we made reservations at Rusty's, the restaurant within the hotel. They were for nine o'clock. We went to the ocean, and at about 7 pm, we were told that we needed to leave because the beach was closing for an event that was supposed to happen there. Funny how we were never notified about this beforehand. So, we decided that we would go to the pool…

title: Nice family resort
review: I have forwarded your concerns on to the appropriate department so that improvements can be made. I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you. I truly understand the frustration with the beach closing. We had no notification either as it was done by the city - they were setting up fireworks and the area had to be cleared of pedestrians for safety reasons.The pool was definitely being treated; it was a matter of bad timing.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location and sincerely wish you will plan a return visit with us.

title: Amazing family trip
review: We had a week booked in this hotel and it was our fourth stay here. On arrival the person who checked us in asked if we had stayed before, and I said we had. We were then shown to our room by the bellhop. The room left a lot to be desired. It overlooked a roof and the car park. We had requested a high floor overlooking the beach and this was on the opposite side of the building. The floor was sloping and the carpet was dirty. The bellhop dumped our bags and was off, didn't offer to get us ice as previous ones had on other stays. For the price we paid we did not find the room acceptable, especially as we had experience of far better rooms. We went up reception and asked to be moved. We were told that the hotel was full that night, but we could be moved the following day to a room…

title: Awesome
review: Trip was great, hotel was super clean, and staff was very friendly. Debbie on the beach, delivering drinks, was awesome! I thought that the drinks were a little pricey, but that was to be expected considering the area. We ended up going into Clearwater and purchasing rum and cokes from the liquor store and brought them to the beach to avoid the $9 a drink price the next day. Make sure your containers are all plastic or aluminum though, as the fine for glass bottles is $100 a bottle. The food was fantastic on the resort, but I would also recommend a restaurant in Clearwater called “Frenchy’s;” specifically the one located on the ocean. For Shopping, I would recommend going on down to John’s Pass / Madeira beach area, as the shopping in Clearwater leaves much to be desired in the…

title: We always stay here.
review: Your comments started my week out with a smile. I was sincerely pleased that you enjoyed your interaction with our associates…they truly care. Yes! Debbie is a star. It sounds as if you enjoyed the beach also, and found some nice things off property to enjoy. We will look forward to your family visit and I am sure you might enjoy it even more because it is best when shared and we are watching our children having a great time.

title: Beautiful
review: My husband and I stayed at the SSK from July 8th - July 15th for our honeymoon.  When we arrived the front desk checked us in pretty quick.  Most hotels at check in time can get pretty crazy but there was no wait at all here.  We were in room #633 which has a pool/gulf view room which was beautiful.  The AC was on in the room which was very appreciated since it was scorching hot and humid outside.  As we do every time we stay here we threw our bags in our room and headed down to put our toes in the Gulf.  We enjoy the little walk from the hotel down to the water.  After a quick dip we headed up to the Turtle Bar for some Hurricanes.  They make sure of the best frozen and tropical drinks.  I cannot say enough about the bar tenders that they have one staff.  Our favorite was Kyle.…

title: GREAT BEACH!!!
review: Congratulations! May you enjoy many more sunrises and sunsets throughout your life together. Hopefully some will be with us at the Sheraton Sand Key. I am very disappointed that it being your honeymoon was overlooked. Of course you should have been sent something special. Our associates do truly care about extending excellent service and yes! Kyle is a star. I am pleased you enjoyed your room and the view. It sounds like memories were made. Please let us know the next time you will be visiting us.

title: Awesome location. dont look further
review: We stay at the Sheraton for the first time and it was beautiful . The staff is wonderful. Allen the bellman was very friendly and helpful. In fact the whole staff goes out of their way to be friendly and helpful. The beach is gorgeous and the pool is beautiful . The food is very good. There's a walking path close by. Also you can walk across a bridge that has a gorgeous view of the Gulf of Mexico . We will be playing a return trip next year

title: Good but has the potential to be great!
review: We booked this hotel because of its location to the beach and it was awesome to be able to walk out each day onto the beach and enjoy the ocean. You can rent  two beach chairs and an umbrella for 25.00 for the day and we highly recommend it! We stayed for six nights at this hotel and used a suite night award for our stay, a upgrade award program given by Starwood for being double Platinum. Our room was a large room with two queen beds and a pullout sofa, which worked well for our family. Our view was called a city bay view and we were on the far end which also overlooked the parking lot. We did enjoy sitting out on the patio but were hoping for a ocean view. The negative of this room is being on the eight floor directly above us was the fitness centre and every morning we were…

title: Nice room, gym, & great staff
review: I was delighted that you enjoyed the beach.  There is nothing more relaxing then a walk on the beach or spending the day on a comfortable, shaded beach chair with your thoughts or a good book.  Spending time with your family and making memories is certainly a highlight, I am sure. We were pleased that you enjoyed our associates; they genuinely care. It is unfortunate that you were not pleased with some of the amenities we offer, I apologize. Through each comment we receive, both positive and negative, we are able to seek knowledge and growth to better serve our guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback; it is truly appreciated.  I will be sure to share with the appropriate management.

title: Great hotel, nice beach
review: We just stayed here - July 8th thru the 11th. The hotel was very clean & nice rooms. Gift shop / convenience store was great for morning breakfast & quick items we needed to buy. They had very reasonable prices. Gym on the 9th floor was great. Awesome view & equipped with just about everything you'd need for a good workout. The pool however was small for the amount of people that were present.  One pool staff was a bit rude by pressure washing everyone's towels making them soaked. We know he was just trying to keep the place clean but that was a bit overboard. At one point (3 hrs after the pool opened) the lawn mower, weed eater, pressure washer, & water pumper (out by the beach) were all going causing it to be noisy and hard to relax. Other than those concerns it was a fun and…

title: Excellent hotel
review: We stayed for just one night in June but it was delightful. Easy, quick check-in, great beach. You have to walk to get to ocean but its not that bad. We ordered food from restaurant and brought it back to room which was great. Clean and spacious two queen room with balcony that faced beach. Was nice to have private beach.

title: No free Internet, but located away from the crowds
review: I was thrilled with your comments and genuinely pleased that you enjoyed your stay. It is nice when everything starts out well with an efficient check-in. The beach is lovely and it is nice to have your own private space. I hope you will consider staying with us on your next beach escape.

title: Outstanding hotel, facilities, beach... you will enjoy it!
review: From the moment we arrived to the moment we left customer service was fantastic from front desk to poolside to everyone in the restaurants.  Rooms were clean, beds were comfortable.   Pool, jacuzzi, and beach great.  We even got free all you can eat buffet breakfast every morning of our stay in Rusty's, one of their lovely restaurants!  When we called for extra towels, they were delivered within minutes of our call.   Hotel is located in a quieter section on the beach, but still close drive to many nice restaurants.  My son's also loved the fitness center and (free) tennis courts.

title: Nice Hotel, but not top end
review: Thank you; I truly enjoyed your review. Our associates truly care and do their best to ensure that you enjoy your time with us. We appreciate that you recognized them. The fitness Center has quite the view! I am pleased that your son’s enjoyed their time here also.

title: Lots of Kids at the Pool but a Great Place
review: The rooms are very nice, and also the internal areas, but this hotel is slightly let down by its pool area. When the hotel is very busy its is very very cramped (especially of its not a great day and people arnt venturing down to the sea, as happened during our stay).  The bar also lacks a bit of atmosphere and is quite sterile (although all the people who work in there are very freindly and service is good.  And I know its already been said but every hotel these days really should have free WiFi..  Other than that a great hotel / location to spend a few sunny days..

title: What a view!
review: I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and our associates. Our tavern was just renovated earlier this year and it was meant to have sleek clean lines. We are constantly updating and I am sure a larger pool is on the list. You are correct… sunny days are the key when you are staying here to enjoy the beach. We will look forward to your return.

title: Fourth of July Getaway
review: We made a last minute reservation for the 4th of July weekend.  We checked in on the 3rd of July and received an amazing room #806 - top floor, harbor view -- which was VERY important for the Clearwater fireworks that took place over the harbor on the 4th.  We also had a partial view of the gulf from the balcony AND we overlooked Sand Key Park.  As long as you didn't look straight down, to see the roof of the rest of the hotel and the garbage bins, it was a fantastic view.  Really, it was!  Also, the room was clean and the beds were very comfortable.    You could talking, the tv and other noises through the adjoining door from the next room.  Which wasn't a problem most of the time.  However, on our last night, unfortunately there was a baby crying half the night and we heard…

title: Great Resort Hotel
review: Stayed here for one night.  Hotel right on beautiful beach.  Pool is quite small for huge hotel.  Lots of restaurants to eat in the hotel and walking distance.  Used suite award to get suite room.  Older hotel - nice spacious suite room with bar fridge.  Free parking and no resort fees.  Got government rate of $93.00.  Great price for hotel.

title: Nice location and service but....
review: It is very satisfying to hear that your expectations were fulfilled during your stay. I was pleased that you enjoyed the location. The beaches are beautiful; I do hope you got a chance to see a great sunset. Please come back when you can stay longer…there really is a lot to explore.

title: No frills, older hotel
review: No free wi-fi?!  Wow.   Bathrooms ridiculously tiny, shower heads mount for really really short people.  Food mediocre.  Pool small.  Pool bar opens late and closes way too early so there's no fun here after 7.  The service is great, though.  I know the redesign would be challenging but this hotel would gain in attractiveness if it offered free wi-fi and nice poolside coctail service after dinner.

title: Clearwater Beach June 2013
review: Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay. We feel as though we have the best of both worlds.  We have a very tranquil environment here on Sand Key, however, just over the bridge is Clearwater Beach.  Clearwater Beach does have much to do and was recently voted Florida’s # one beach town for 2013. I understand your feeling on the Wi Fi. You will find at many resorts these charges are included in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to do that, and only charge for usage should the guest so choose. Our associates are all about extending excellent service. We hope you will come see us again.

title: Beautiful location
review: Two stars for a friendly staff (guard, bellman, and one of the ladies at the front desk) and clean hotel, but that's about it.   The rooms are tiny, the walls are paper thin, and the beach is a pretty long walk away if you are carrying more than a towel.   The money they spent on marketing was a good investment because the pictures are gorgeous, but the reality is that it is an older hotel with a small, crowded pool that desperately needs a refresh.    We requested a mini-fridge (medical purposes) for our room when we made our reservation, but one was not available at check in, so they said they would provide a cooler and ice until a fridge was available.  Then, they said they did not have any coolers and we would be put on a waiting list.    We checked out after about two hours…

title: Enjoyed our Stay.
review: We stayed June 22 - 29, 2013.  We had a view overlooking the tennis courts with the gulf in the far background.  Our room was nice and clean and was well maintained.  There was no microwave and the refrigerator was $5 dollar a day charge, plus tax.  The bedding and pillows were nice.  Bathroom and area was small but adequate and clean.  The pool was also small and although there were allot of people at the hotel, the pool never seemed crowded.  Also, pool chairs were always available. The walk to the beach was kind of a long one but it was ok with us, we like exercise :).  Also, the pool staff had buckets and toys to borrow for the beach.  We also enjoyed the beverage and snack cart at the beach.  Umbrellas and loungers are also available at the beach for $25 a day.  We rented…

title: Lovely, but you paid for it --
review: I stayed for a conference at this seaside hotel. My room was tired and could have used an upgrade. The walls are paper thin. I had no view, as I am sure my room was in the cheap seats...but the beach is lovely, the restaurants were good and the locale is just perfect. Not a bad conference, either.

title: Four stars is about right
review: I apologize that the room view did not meet your expectations. Unfortunately we do have times where we are unable to upgrade from the room type that was booked. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your conference. Please return to our beautiful beaches for a vacation stay in the future.

title: Beautiful Getaway!
review: Recently stayed here for a conference and overall it was pretty good. Rooms were large and very comfortable as is usual in the states. Nice big bed, ok bathroom, wifi and coffee in room, bonus was a small balcony which was nice to sit in while working.  The decor was getting a bit tired but I did see them refurbishing some rooms so presumably they are fixing this. Rustys restaurant was excellent but there was also several good restaurants over the road.  The beach was nice and sunsets spectacular but unfortunately didn't have the time or the weather to fully appreciate this.

title: Hotel was excellent!
review: I appreciate that you took time to write this review. It sounds as if we met most of your expectations. I do hope you will return when you have the time to relax and enjoy those amenities such as the view, beach, and sunsets. Hopefully the weather will cooperate as it does most of the time. There is much more to explore.

title: NOISY!!!!!
review: When we arrived, luckily parking was no problem. Entryway up to the sixth floor (Starwood guests) was pretty clean. Clean white sheets and bathroom towels were very nice. When it came time for afternoon snack, It was ok. Just some thawed out finger food. Breakfast was not impressive either. Typical bagels, cereal and fruit.  When it was time to sleep, all the floor seem to have come alive til the late morning! There is absolutely NO sound proofing what so ever!! All night it was door slams, screaming kids, loud conversations from housekeeping !!! Did I mention screaming kids?! My head was pounding when I left two days later. I will not be staying here again.

title: Excellent Family Holiday
review: We have stayed at this hotel on two occasions now, we had our six month old grandson with us. Very friendly staff, free WiFi in downstairs computer room area. We had two rooms between the family, beds are very comfortable, good choice of pillows on these excellent bed too.

title: Nice and Relaxing
review: Thank you for your positive comments. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the comfort of our Sweet Sleeper beds. I am sure you enjoyed your time with your family and of course all of us grandparents have a special place in our hearts for the memories made with our grandchildren. We hope you will return again to make more memories.

title: Nice Clean Hotel on Sand Key, Clearwater
review: My wife and I visited this location for an adult get-away in June and we enjoyed the location. If you are looking for a place in the heart of the hustle and bustle, this is not your place. However, this is your place if you want a beach that is not crowded and it is quit. The hotel is older, but the interior and grounds are updated and VERY clean. The walls in the rooms are somewhat thin and the doors do not come all the way to the ground. We heard a lot from other rooms and we were woken up by hall noise frequently. It appears that most of the rooms have balconies and coffee machines. That is it, no refrigerator unless you pay ($5) for one (small dorm refrigerator). I also wanted to note, in case you are pillow type specific, that the pillows are very soft, but you get two. The…

title: Right on the beach
review: Thank you for your review on the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We do try to keep costs of amenities at an affordable level through out the hotel.  You will find at many resorts these charges are included in a nightly resort fee. We have opted not to do that, and only charge for usage should the guest so choose. Being away from all the activity of Clearwater Beach area provides us with a tranquil atmosphere which does make it a perfect place to relax. We are aware how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your business and look forward to your return visit.

title: Small Crowded Pool
review: We are currently at the  Sheraton Sand Key and quite disappointed.  Though the  building is lovely, the rooms are small, wifi isn't complimentary and the pool  is really small compared to the number of rooms.  I did research the hotel beforehand, and I gotta say, the pictures are very misleading.  Though June is not high season, the pool is packed with people.  I know Tripadvisor reviews have mentioned the pool size, but looking at the hotels photos I figured it would be adequate.  Now I wish I'd taken those reviews at their word.  The beach is wide and not so crowded, and that is a plus, but if you're after a pool/ beach combo, this isn't your place.  I approached the manager asking to cancel the reservation- we are here three days and hoped to change to another hotel for at…

title: Amazing getaway only few hours away from NY
review: Gorgeous views, delicious food and very relaxing atmosphere!!!!  The staff is very welcoming and always there to help!!!!  Will definitely come back again!!!!  Must check out Rumba Bar & Grill http://www.rumbaislandgrill.com/.  The food is beyond delicious and the margaritas are to die for!

title: Great private beach and pool area.
review: A little pricy but the hotel staff, quality of rooms, quality of the pool etc are tops. Amazing white sand beach. Everything is perfect at this hotel an it is priced that way. Although there are some hotels that are more expensive in the area too. We liked the place so much we added a day to the stay and when shopping prices on online discount sites I went to the front desk and they were able to give me a better rate than I could find online.

title: A Little Disappointing but nice staff
review: Thank you for your comments; it is very nice that you appreciate the value of our staff and the location. It truly pleases us that you enjoyed the whole experience and that we had availability for you to stay and enjoy that extra day. We hope you will consider the Sheraton Sand Key on your next stay in the Clearwater area.

title: Another wonderful stay
review: A nice welcome from Bob the porter and desk lady on arrival.  First impressions of the property was that it is not overly luxurious for the  room rate.   Half bath in small bathroom. Otherwise room is quite nice.   Pool area very busy.  Pool itself too small/busy to enjoy and water overly heated to be refreshing. Friendly tiki bar staff, Kyle and Bobby.  Gents restroom at pool appalling from a hygiene standpoint. Very strong urine odor. Paper strewn on wet floors. Faucet encrusted with months of debris/verdigris.   The Mainstay  tavern is reminiscent of a school canteen. Plain and without any real atmosphere. Nelson behind bar quick, friendly and attentive.   Arranged a cab to eat out at Island way grille through concierge desk. After 45 min wait had to cancel as taxi never…

title: Nice resort with tennis courts
review: My wife and I and two adult sons stayed here over the Memorial Day weekend after a graduation/reunion in Sarasota. We had a complicated, split reservation, which Brandon, the desk clerk, sorted out quickly. He was also helpful on some other requests. We had rooms on the sixth floor. My wife and I overlooked the pool and the gulf and my sons the inland waterway. The pool side was very noisy and I would select the inland waterway side if I stayed again.  The hotel has three decent tennis courts which are not heavily used. We got a lot of playing time. The beach is about a 200 yard walk over sand and was not that crowded. The pool, on the other hand, was a zoo and we never tried it.  The casual tavern is easy to eat in and had a pool table.  I would recommend this hotel if you like…

title: Mixed quality for a business convention
review: Thank you for your comments and for recognizing our associates; they sincerely enjoy assisting our guests.  I was pleased to hear Brandon was helpful and efficient.  I will pass your comment on to him.  It sounds as if you enjoyed the location also. If ever in the area again I hope you will consider coming back to the Sheraton Sand Key.

title: 180 Degrees of Difference compared to the rest of the area
review: This is my 10th stay at this hotel for an annual convention. The overall experience was good but mixed.  Rooms- This is the first year I was on the first floor and what a mistake. Very noisy with the crowd from the lobby and elevators. The only good thing about the location was not having to wait an eternity for the elevators. Quality of the room is slightly above average. Noise from adjacent rooms was very bad.  Pool and beach- Plenty of room at the pool and we see the same pool attendants year after year. Beach is a long walk from the hotel. This beach is great for shell hunters- not so much for barefoot walkers but typical of the area. Hotel does have rental umbrellas and chairs and they do provide a cart that has refreshments for sale that comes down to the beach.…

title: Awesome experience
review: Your pervious conventions must have been a success for you to return that many times. We hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future. Yes, we do have many associates with longevity.  All of our associates really enjoy working with people and it shows. We appreciate your candid feedback and have shared your comments with the appropriate departments.

title: Still in love with the hotel
review: We recently returned to Sheraton on Sand Key after many years and were reminded of just how unique this property is.  In an area that is otherwise bustling and a little intense, the Sheraton Sand Key has plenty of beach, a lot of rooms actually seeing the beach, a nice pool and is just plain low key and pleasant. Sunset is wonderful, drinks were good, Not sure what else to add,   We'll go back again soon.

title: Good Experience
review: Just spent a week at this hotel.  We used the "club room" and were pleasantly surprised at the value/great service/good food this provided.  The employees of the club room were very friendly and helpful with questions about what to see, where to eat/shop.  The employees at the towel/pool area were very friendly, as well.  I felt good that we had chosen this hotel based on safety, cleanliness and just friendly/helpful employees.  Someone is doing a good job at training the staff to ensure customers are satisfied!

title: Perfect .. Just Perfect!
review: I am so pleased that you enjoyed your experience here at the Sheraton Sand Key. Our associates are trained. It is just not the training; they truly care and it comes from the heart.  We hope you will return for another visit in the future.

title: 70s hotel in dire need of an update
review: Just got back after a weeks stay here. From the moment we drove into the car park until the moment we drove away, our stay here was wonderful!  It was my wifes birthday and they left chocolate coated strawberrys and sparkling wine in our room which was a pleasent suprise on arrival. We had a massive and very comfortable king size bed with a Gulf view (which we paid $40 per night upgrade) the room was clean and modern and has lovely HD flat screen TV. The bathroom was small, but was not a problem, most importantly it was very clean and maids came everyday to change bedding & towels. We also was given complimentry wi-fi during our stay  Just like most reviews on here the staff are just so friendly and helpful and I must make a special mention to David who was one of the deck/pool…

title: Missing final touches
review: I am so very pleased that your gift to your wife was all that you both anticipated. Thank you for recognizing the staff - as I say often, they truly care. I will pass on your comments to David. We appreciate your review and will look forward to a return visit.

title: Very nice, friendly staff, very clean
review: For over $300 per night, this is NOT what we expected!  I don't know were to start... Its a 70s hotel that was renovated maybe 20 years ago. The room was tiny, the sink is not even in the bathroom, the bathroom itself is even smaller. The AC is a wall unit that can barely keep up. Showerhead was broken, wallpaper and grout in bathroom moldy, balcony dirty upon arrival with old food from previous occupants. The furniture needs to be replaced, some drawers stuck and the furniture was scratched. The water in the shower oscillates between hot and cold.  I understand this place get a lot of good reviews here, but those guests must have either been in a different room class or must have stayed at a different Sheraton Sand Key Resort.....

title: Supurb as usual
review: We've been coming to the SSK for over 30 years and brought our daughter here when she was a toddler, this year we brought her back along with her boyfriend who is the father of her 2 children, our Grandkids, and the boyfriend parents.  We were always impressed and really the hotel hasn't changed. Alright the Pool Bar has been re built and the place has been decorated many times over. The rooms are the same, well appointed with good firm beds. New flat screen TV's have replaced the old Box on the sideboard.  We were given a free upgrade to a Gulf view on the 6th floor (of 9) and had 3 rooms ajoining so communication between us was easy.   They also gave us a free internet pass to use in the room Value $9.99 per night.  The hotel caters for a lot of conferences, this time it was a…

title: Great Stay
review: I am sure many memories have been made over the last 30 years here at the Sheraton Sand Key. You are part of the family and I am sure many of the associates you know by name and have watched your daughter grow. I can just imagine how much fun it was to share your paradise with your grand children and extended family. We will look forward to your visit and yes! Stay healthy.

title: Great location
review: Great location, very long walk to the beech.  Very clean room and friendly attendants.  Professional staff and friendly bellman.  We stayed on the 7th floor and had access to the Club Room on the 9th floor for breakfast and hors d’oeuvres, drinks served from 5-7 pm.  Beautiful view of the pool and gulf from our room especially the beautiful sun set.

title: Wonderful time!
review: Thank you for such a nice review on the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We are aware of how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your business!

title: Nice Family Weekend
review: This hotel has a great location right on the beach off the pool area. Check in was easy the staff was very friendly. The hotel was very clean and the view from the room balcony was great overlooking the pool and out onto the beach. We enjoyed time at the pool as their were many seats both in the sun and some shade as needed. The staff at the pool were very helpful. The beach is beautiful covered in shells and has some beautiful sunsets and sunrises. The one disappointment we did have was with the restaurants at the hotel. We tried all but one and were not impressed with any of them. We ended up going to a restaurant at another hotel for one of the nights. Overall I would stay here again.

title: Destination Wedding a SUCCESS!!
review: We recently were married on the beach at The Sand Key Resort and I can honestly say it was AMAZING!  We had about 50 adults and 10 children who attended.  This hotel was perfect for our crowd and there was something for every age group to enjoy!  The pool was nice, restaurants on site, beach, games.....outside bar!  All around the staff was amazing, knew us by name, professional.......we were a crazy group and they still get an "A+".  When I started planning my wedding, I really didn't know too much about the area.  Amanda, their wedding coordinator and catering manager, really knew what she was doing and made me feel at ease.  I was very pleased with the planning process, recommended vendors, and the day of the wedding she didn't miss a beat!  If you are looking for a beautiful…

title: Nice hotel on a quiet beach.
review: We are delighted to hear that all your dreaming and planning for that very special day became a reality here at the Sheraton Sand Key with Amanda’s help. She is very efficient and really loves doing what she does. Our standard is to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  I am so pleased you and your guests had such a wonderful time. It is a great area with much to do…  We will look forward to your return, perhaps on your first anniversary!  Congratulations!

title: Nice Amenities
review: This hotel was extremely well kept with updated rooms, outstanding service, and great location to both the beach and downtown.  The hotel looks older from the outside and I was worried about the rooms showing age, but the room we stayed in was completely updated with nice touches of granite in the bathrooms.  The beds were like the Westin Heavenly beds we enjoy when we stay there.  The beach was not right out the door, but only a few hundred yards from the hotel to be in the water.  The views were outstanding.

title: Excellent property in a great location
review: I appreciate that you enjoyed the location. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep it updated. The views are breathtaking; Sand Key and the Clearwater area are known for their exceptional beaches. We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding our associates, and the comfort level of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back yet again!

title: Awesome location-great hotel-even better stsff!
review: I recently stayed at this hotel on a business trip as I was attending an event there one night.  It was overall very nice with an incredibly friendly staff.  The location is great if you are planning to spend a lot of time on the beach or in downtown Clearwater.  However, just be prepared to do some driving if you're going over to downtown Tampa or St. Petersburg.  My room was clean and nicely appointed.  Pluses: nice gym, good breakfast at Rusty's, great pool area with direct beach access and a good place for late night drinks in the Mainstay Tavern.  Minuses: Hard water that left my skin feeling filmly and no free wi-fi.  Bring your smartphone/tablet or you'll have to pay $10/day.

title: great family place
review: Lots of kids and family...makes eating at the "club concierge" level more of a Holiday Inn express fruit n donut bar feeling than a real club dine n wine experience....Not exactly a Ritz Carlton resort ....more like a family outing hotel, pool n beach club for those pit stopping in route to Bush Gardens. The nice beach front, location, clean updated rooms, and friendly staff rescued this hotel from being a 2 star. We paid extra $75 a nite for bay view room and "all day" free club dining with drinks, evening wines, delights and breakfast and when we entered club level...the clampetts n company were feeding about 13 bagels n donuts to their kindred . If you stay  here..don't do club level, get cheapest room, and definitely do Rustys...Rustys wasn't cheap but nicely done !  This…

title: Beautiful Sunsets
review: Hopefully you will return at a much quieter time as we actually have a very relaxing environment. I was sincerely pleased that you enjoyed your interaction with our associates…they truly care. We have an award winning culinary staff and they do prepare many creative dishes. We hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.

title: Excellent Service!
review: My family needed to get out of the house this summer, so my husband got in the car, and took us all to the Sheraton Sand Key resort. I had my doubts, but this hotel is wonderful! As soon as we stepped into the lobby, we were amazed of how fresh, and clean it was. We got checked into our room in less than 10 minutes. Our room was very clean, and nicely decorated, but a tad small for us. We didn't mind though, being that we weren't in the room for most of our time. The variety of restraunts was tempting, but we decided to eat elsewhere during our stay. The pool was a bit small for the amount of people in it, but it was heated well, and very nice. We enjoyed the murals on the wall informing you about different kinds of shells and animals as we were waiting for the elevator. The…

title: Surprisingly Excellent
review: I hope memories were made during your recent stay. The sunsets are amazing and the beach is lovely; a perfect place for relaxing, shelling, quiet talks and watching dolphins play. Our beach awaits your next visit.

title: Pretty nice stay
review: Your associate named Brandon who works at the Starwood Preferred Guests reception desk at this property did an outstanding job for my wife and I during this anniversary trip visit to the Sheraton!  Brandon greeted us warmly when we arrived, he offered to upgrade our room to an available room that had a much better view for no additional fee, he assisted us by updating our contact information in our new Starwood Preferred Guests membership account, he arranged for a welcome gift to be sent directly to our room since it was not available during check-in, and also we received an anniversary gift consisting of complimentary drinks, which I suspect Brandon may have arranged.  Brandon also was friendly later during out stay when I saw him in the lobby, as he greeted me again. The…

title: What a great end to our Disney Vacation!
review: Sheraton Sand Key Resort exceeded my expectation.  Brandon at front deskt was so nice and upgraded us to a pool view from our parking lot view previously booked.  We asked for a fridge which came within 10 minutes.  The room was so clean and the beds are comfortable, although the rooms are a little on the small side. But we were never in our room so that was not a big issue for us.  Weather was so beautiful during our entire stay, no rain.  We ate at the Main Tavern a couple of times during our stay.  Prices were affordable for a hotel restaurant which surprised us.  Food was excellent and so was the service.  We walked over to a plaza across the street which has an amazing Columbian Restaurant.  The Seafood Paella was amazing!!    The beach was a little far to walk with our 4…

title: Pretty good
review: What a delight to read your review on the Sheraton Sand Key Resort. We are aware of how many options there are in the area for lodging so we greatly appreciate your repeat business! We also appreciate the kind remarks regarding the our associates and the cuisine. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back yet again!

title: Nice beachfront Hotel
review: So while I was here on business, I also went with my girlfriend this time.  Had to go to a meeting in the beach room but that eventually ended and we could enjoy the rest of the trip.  The beach there was nice, and the rooms are ok but not as big or good as you'd expect from walking through the lobby which is amazing.  But anyway it was still pretty nice but overpriced for what you get.  We enjoyed being at the hotel even though it's showing its age somewhat as other people have said.  It could've been constructed better at the time.  Still it was good, although I think probably not up to the usual Sheraton standards (haven't tried other Sheratons but I think others are probably better).

title: Very basic and simple beach hotel
review: I appreciate that you enjoyed the location. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep it updated.  Thank you for that wonderful comment on our newly renovated lobby. We hope you plan a return visit.

title: Great Stay
review: I've stayed at the Sand Key twice now, both times on business. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The pool area is really nice (though the high rise condos next door block the sun mighty early), and the staff have always been really accommodating and friendly. The in-house food is mediocre. There are a couple of great places to eat just down the street on the other side of the road. I would definitely recommend the Sand Key resort if you are going to be in Clearwater Beach.

title: Perfect Beach Stay
review: My husband and I spent 4 nights at this lovely beach hotel. The location, a gorgeous and pristine waterfront spot, cannot be beaten.   The rooms were lovely and very clean. The common areas are elegant and upscale. The restaurant was delicious - we loved the Dinner Buffets (great prime rib!)   The pool area was very welcoming and yet not too flashy looking - we loved cocktails by the pool and wished we had our kids with us just to make it even funner.   This is a great place to wake up - sound weird? It's true! Our room was near the tennis courts, and it was lovely to watch the early morning players. From the beach side you can see them out raking the sand. The beach is HUGE. Lots of sandy area before you get right down to the water.   The concierge was above-average helpful and…

title: Nice location, but glad I paid conference rate
review: Your positive comments were a nice way to start the week. I am so pleased you enjoyed yourself. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We hope when planning your next beach escape your memories will bring you back to the Sheraton Sand Key.

title: The Cleanest Hotel
review: Positives: Magnificent location on an enormous beach, very helpful and friendly front desk staff, room clean and comfortable, good choice of restaurants in hotel plus a shop inside the hotel selling a variety of foods, near to good town restaurants. Nice gym with great views from top floor windows. Negative: Bathroom small, had problem with low water pressure (but was quickly fixed by hotel - new shower head), hair dryer blew a fuse (again quickly fixed by hotel).  Charge for wi-fi in the room. Overall a slightly dated feel to the hotel.  Business center comprises an annex to a bar/restaurant with a few computers. Small-ish swimming pool. Parking lot always seemed very full, so we had to hunt for a space.

title: An Efficient Hotel Right on the Beach
review: We are pleased that you enjoyed a positive interaction with our front desk associates and the location of the Sheraton Sand Key. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep it updated. We also have just added several new wireless access points throughout all lobbies and in the club lounge.

title: Great hotel
review: This hotel is the cleanest hotel I have every visited. It is spotless. It's also right on the beach,and the rooms are very comfortable. Hotel staff is very warm and gracious. Just an excellent place to stay in the Clearwater area. And at this price point, it's an incredible value. The only negative is the pool is on the smaller side but the wide and expansive beach with the shells more than makes up for it.

title: Decent Stay, Great Service
review: The hotel has been nicely updated, although the first room they put us in had a connecting door to another room, and we literally could hear every word they said, and they spent hours in their room. We finally asked for another room, realizing we weren't going to get any sleep. They moved us and we had amazingly quiet room (even though the hotel was full that weekend). Food was OK, beach and pool areas were great!

title: Very Friendly Hotel
review: I appreciate that you enjoyed the location. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep it updated. Thank you for noticing. I am so pleased that they were able to find you that amazingly quiet room. We hope there will be another visit planned in the future.

title: weekend vacation in april with kids
review: We just went with our daughter, son-in-law and 5 year old grandson for overnight.  We had a wonderful time because of the friendly staff, fabulous beach, great pool area, clean rooms, and the quickest room service I've ever had.  I was so pleased to take my kids to such a nice place.  We will certainly go again!

title: anniversary trip
review: It was a pleasure to read your comments. We are very proud of our associates.They are sincere in helping you to enjoy every moment of your stay. I am certain your 5 year old grandson will remember his over night stay at the beach with his grandparents forever. We are pleased you enjoyed the beach and some of our other amenities. I hope you will be able to come back with your family in the future.

title: Friendly Staff and great views
review: excellent hotel,   love the location,  onsite restaurants were good,  only thing I wasn't crazy about was the bathroom was pretty small ,   location I liked the best just over the bridge from the busy Clearwater beach area,  parking was nice (self parking)  24hr store is convenient,  and the pool stays open till 11pm

title: A fabulous hotel with a grade 1 restaurant
review: This hotel has a really good feel to it. Great grounds, pool and direct onto the beach. The food in the restaurant is first class. My 10 year old son particularly appreciated the rib of beef....and again...and again!!! All staff are friendly and are very helpful. The rooms are clean, well furnished and good, clean bed linnen, with comfortable beds and pillows. This is now our favourite hotel in Clearwater!

title: honeymoon revisited pt 3
review: I was sincerely pleased that you enjoyed your interaction with our associates…they truly care. We have an award winning culinary staff and they do prepare many creative dishes. The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper beds are designed with comfort in mind and we are glad you enjoyed them. Thank you for choosing the Sheraton Sand Key and we will look forward to your next visit.

title: Nice overnight stay
review: Just spent our 24th wedding anniversary at this hotel ,our third visit . All the staff were friendly and polite and when needed did the utmost to help.we locked ourselves out of the room and were let in by security but not before some basic questions which only we would know the answers to which was reassuring,minor faults as mentioned,no free wifi, small pool area and patio area could get crowded  (although huge beach on doorstep but sunbeds $25 even for guests). Food was of good quality and the breakfast buffet well worth the money.

title: Our fave place to stay in Clearwater!
review: Thank you for being a loyal Sheraton Sand Key guest. I am pleased that you enjoyed positive interaction with all of our associates and enjoyed our dining options. We hope you will put the Sheraton Sand Key on your destinations to return to list.

title: It's a long way to the Gulf
review: Stayed at this hotel for one night on a short beach trip.  Liked the fact that there is no 'resort' fee for parking, but no wifi included.  Really when Target, coffee shops and even grocery stores are offering free wifi it should now be a standard offering in hotels.  Room was clean and did not feel cramped (we had a King Size bed).  Very nice pool area with plenty of sun beds but there is a significant walk down to the shoreline.  Staff were extremely courteous.  Would stay again.

title: Great pool service
review: The Sheraton Sand Key has a beautiful beach and maintained grounds. The staff is friendly and very helpful. The restaurant is ok, better to have a cocktail and go to one of the great nearby restaurants. Get a room on the concierge level Oceanside. They serve breakfast, snacks during the day and a fun cocktail hour that could be a nosh or a meal. We were delivered beautiful plates of chocolate covered strawberries and other delicacies each day to our room. The pool service is perfect, very clean and constant attention. Which is why you want to be in Florida.

title: Beautiful Location and Professional, Friendly Staff
review: Sunshine, beautiful beaches, sunsets, walks on the beach and dips in the pool … that is what we are all about. The associates love making our guests’ happy and ensuring that they have the correct information to help you enjoy yourself with out any stress involved. We hope you will join us again on your next trip to Florida.

title: Pretty good stay
review: The Sheraton Sand Key Resort sits upon a beautiful beach.  The grounds are well-maintained, and the staff is very friendly and professional.  The building itself does show its age; it was built in the 1970s, and it shows. The rooms themselves are fine, but nothing special. The bathroom is comically tiny.  But honestly...if you are here, you are here for the beach, and that, coupled with the lovely pool and deck area, it's a wonderful place to spend a vacation. I definitely plan on coming back.

title: Gorgeous hotel!
review: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. It is a wonderful place for a “Beach Escape” as our beach is so private and relaxing. The associates are here to assist you and enjoy doing so. We will look forward to your next visit.

title: Worst view ever
review: A friend and I decided to take a long weekend to a kind of laid back more low-key warm place :) Clearwater was perfect. Pros for me were the very comfortable beds, delicious breakfest buffet, and. Some cons were the room views, not being on Clearwater beach, and the early time of the gym closing. My view was of the dirty rooftop :\ There wasn't anything to do on the private beach, so we liked to go Clearwater beach for the activities. The walk to the main beach is very nice (maybe 30 minutes or more), especially crossing the bridge (nice photo ops!) I wish there was a refrigerator in the room because we did have a rental car and ate out a lot, most times having leftovers. Our safe messed up several times so we had to call down too have them unlock it, which didn't make me feel…

title: A few gems in a disappointing "resort"
review: The gems first: The gentleman who cares for the pool area is a real professional!  He is constantly picking up, organizing, and cleaning the pool area.  He seems to take real pride in his work.  Within only  a few minutes after a storm he had the pool are ship shape with the chairs in perfect line!  The bartender, John I think?, was very helpful, polite and made a perfect Bloody Mary:-)   The disappointing areas: The employees at the check in desk are a nightmare!  They tried to give me a room that literally faced a wall!  A balcony like all the other rooms yet it faced a roof top about 6 feet across with air conditioner handlers and a wall at the 6 foot mark. A nightmare!  It took a manager, who complete with rolling eyes,  to give me the "last room" in the hotel, at 1200 noon,…

title: Too expensive for low level of service
review: I am pleased that you did see an efficient, caring side of our associates. You should have been treated that way with every associate you came in contact with.  Your issues with the front desk will be addressed. It is our goal to effectively meet the expectations of our guests and provide excellent customer service.  For not meeting our goals and your expectations I apologize.

title: Great Vacation
review: The property itself is in a pretty location and is located on the beach with a nice pool area. There are also several dining options. The front desk staff however- make for an unpleasant experience. We found many of them to be impolite and unhelpful. The rooms are small and not worthy of the price. I've found Sheraton's value to be slipping recently and this hotel is no exception. The wifi is not free, they even charge for the fridge. Really? The other staff, in the lounge, in the restaurant and cleaning staff were all pleasant including the concierge who helped us to find food after hours. We wouldn't return to this location, would probably try the Marriott across the street.

title: Family reunion
review: It was unfortunate that you did not enjoy a positive interaction with all of our associates. Your issues with the Front Desk will be addressed.  That is definitely not our usual standard as shown by example with other associates. Our guests’ satisfaction is our number one priority. We do not charge a resort fee as most hotels do. We only charge for amenities used such as the internet and a refrigerator. We do have free internet at the Link Experienced with Microsoft which is located in The Mainstay Tavern. We hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.

title: Great family / business combo!
review: Just finished a great week at the Sheraton Sand Key! Great service, friendly staff, from the doormen to the great hostess on the club floor, Nicki. Nicki not only served the great food and drinks, she also had a wealth of local information about sights,  attractions and restaurants. The beach was wonderful too.Thanks Sheraton Sand Key!

title: If you're into shells...
review: When I go to Florida, even on business, I spend a lot of time walking along the beach looking for shells.  And there are good shell beaches, and bad shell beaches.  This is a great shell beach.  The hotel itself is lovely and the staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful.  Get a room with a balcony and enjoy the view and leave the door open at night.  There is a strip of shops in short walking distance with a well-known restaurant and a great sandwich/breakfast place. The descriptions of the walk to the beach by some confused me before I went.  Here's the deal.  The hotel is beachfront but the beach is fairly wide at this point.  When you step out of the hotel, you step on to sand and have to walk a short distance past the dunes.  If you have small children who need to be…

title: Got Kids, Stay Here
review: Shells! If you love shells you are correct. Our beach is filled with treasures, and you never know what treasures you will find day by day. Our associates love to ensure our guest are enjoying every moment of their stay. When our hotel was built it was not far from the water. Then a Jetty was built on the North side of the outlet and the sand started building up.  The jetty has created our large beach, plus that is also why there are so many shells. Looking forward to your return… hopefully on that visit you will find your most treasured shell.

title: Undervalued
review: Large, clean rooms, great pool, plenty of parking, lots of families.  If you are a family, this is a good place to stay.  If you are a couple or single, you may want to go somewhere else.  Kids everywhere;  sitting at the bar at the tiki bar, sitting at the bar in the bar restaurant, running up and down the hallways and the elevators.  Apparently the parents subscribe to the "it takes a village" theory and you are expected to be part of that village taking care of their children. Hot tub is open until 11pm and there are children in it , even in their diapers, right up until closing. There is no adult only bar where you can escape.  Even for families, there is quite a distance of land from the hotel out to the beach.

title: Lovely Beachfront Hotel
review: Hopefully you will return at a much quieter time as we actually have a very relaxing environment. The beach is a lovely place to escape to when you want to relax, reflect and recharge.

title: Won't be back
review: At check in I asked if there were any available rooms with a view, as I am a SPG member and was told there was not. I was also told that I would have to wait for my room as I arrived early. I understood this and was fine with waiting until 3. I checked later in the day and my room was ready. When I went to my room it was clean and fine for my stay. My room was right by the elevator (room 316) and as my family and I were trying to go to sleep around 8 the noise from the elevator area was overwhelming. It was fine during the day because I didn't focus on needing quiet, but at night it was bad. I went to speak with a CS representative and they offered a different room with a view, which was fine but it would have been nice if that was offered in the first place at check in. I was…

title: Awesome stay!!  will be back!
review: Wow what a very pleasent surprise.   Booked stay through Airline as a flight & hotel combo.  Could not have been better.  We stayed 3/27-4/3 yes busy easter week but beautiful and wonderful staff...However a few REALLY STOOD OUT!!  Many thanks to  JoAnn @Rusty's Clayton, Hugo and Jeremy also there.....And the Pool many thanks to Grant, Mario and Dave....YOu all did a wonderful job.  We came to take my grandmothers ashes to final resting place and stay a few days on the Beach, It was WONDERFUL...everyone make it a MUST STAY!

title: Great place to visit
review: What a nice way to start a day with comments such as yours. Our Associates do make us proud…they truly care. I will ensure that the ones named will know that they were mentioned and let them know they do make a difference. Please come back again.

title: Loved this hotel
review: This resort is a great place to visit.  The best thing about this is location, staff and club room.  I would have to say this must be a great place to work because everyone here is very happy.  Our check in was easy and jerry made sure we were happy upgrading us to an ocean view room.  We needed to wait two days for the room to be available but he set it up and the move went smooth.  Steve and Dennis  helped us with our luggage (two different times) and were a wealth of information about where to go and eat and just have fun. They also remembered our name when they saw us in the hall and said hi and chatted.  They made you feel like you were with family!  The pool is much smaller than it looks in the picture another pool would be a great asset, ESP an adult pool.  I would rather…

title: Slice of heaven
review: We sincerely enjoyed your wonderful comments. I am genuinely pleased that Jerry had the opportunity to upgrade you and that you really enjoyed the Club Lounge. Our associates take pride in remembering details to ensure our guests have everything they need. It is our goal to make you feel at home and part of our Sheraton Sand Key family. It is a great place to work and much has to do with being appreciated by guests such as you. We will look forward to seeing you at a more tranquil time.

title: Something in the water
review: Having read some of the negative reviews of this hotel we were a little wary but we needn't have been, it was great. Very friendly staff everywhere, beautiful rooms and great facilities. Kids absolutely loved the pool area and Esther in the gift shop(!).

title: Beautiful resort for couples and families
review: Visited the resort in late March, early April for a getaway using starpoints.  We hired a car through the concierge at the resort before leaving home. A very pleasant and efficient experience. The cost was $65. It was actually cheaper to hire the car both ways to the airport and rent the car across the street at the Marriott than it was to rent it at the airport for the week. The resort is beautiful. We were greeted by a very friendly staff at the door and the desk. The food at Rusty's (in the resort) was terrific for dinner. An awesome prime rib buffet.  Resort food is usually mediocre in my experience so this was a pleasant surprise. The resort has many amenities, pool, gym (one that actually has more than a couple of dumbells), beautiful beach, bars, restaurants, etc. The…

title: Great for Conferences
review: Thank you for the very informative review - it is appreciated. We do have an award winning culinary staff and they will be pleased that their creative efforts were recognized. It certainly sounds as if you enjoyed the time spent at the Sheraton Sand Key and our area. I apologize for the associate at the pool, I am sure they were just looking out for everyone’s safety.  It will be mentioned to the appropriate person. Please return soon - there are many more places in the area to explore.

title: Not the best hotel by any means but some wonderful staff
review: Hotel staff is extremely accommodating.  I was there for a conference and they made copies of presentations for when when presenters ran out.  There was some sort of flying bug in my room late one night and they were up immediately and took care of business.  Always friendly and enthusiastic. Hotel common areas are in good shape.  However, rooms are a little dated but comfortable. Pool is nice but gets crowded, so be sure to get down there early. Gym is just okay (be sure to bring your own water). Bar and restaurant areas serve good beverage and drink.  Especially good to know when weather prevents you from going outside.

title: Great beachfront stay
review: Our associates enjoy ensuring your experience here is a success by helping with the details and providing the amenities needed. They genuinely care. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and are constantly renovating.

title: AWESOME!
review: I stayed at the hotel in March this year for a 5 day seminar. I found the decor ugly and with no charm. Scratched hangers made the wardrobe cheap. Cheap office furniture. The walls were ridiculously thin and you could hear wake up alarms going off and also people speaking. The ensuite was one of the smallest I have ever seen. There was NO fridge which I find apalling in a hotel of this type.   The bed was very comfy however. And the linen was clean and the tv worked, that I don't really watch.   It was HECTIC during Spring Break. Avoid this time. Kids and adults screaming up and down the corridor at 2am.   Some of the staff were lovely, especially Jerry and Andre on the front desk. The breakfast buffet was incredible! Kudos for that. It's also very close to some fab local…

title: Meeting at Sheraton Sand Key
review: OK hotel but during spring break season, it may not be worth the price (we were there during week starting 24 Mar 2013).  Our group was there a month later last year for a SIGNIFICANTLY lower price so if we go back, it'll be when it's more reasonable.  Weather this year was COLD but not the fault of the hotel.  Otherwise the hotel/resort can be a nice place to spend some time,  Restaurant opens at 07:00, I prefer to start earlier, say 06:30.  Hotel is a bit dated though.

title: Super Sheraton Sand Key Resort
review: I appreciate that you enjoyed the location. We are committed to the quality of our hotel and are constantly renovating on a regular basis to keep it updated. Hopefully you will return at a much quieter time as we actually have a very relaxing environment.  In Room Dining does start at 6:00am if that is more convenient, We do hope you will consider planning your next meeting with us.

title: Not Perfect, But Good Enough
review: Overall the Sheraton Sand Key Resort was fantastic.  The pluses :  Private beach, pool, hot tub, above average fitness center,  friendly staff, close drive to busy clearwater area. Very kid friendly. Pool area can be a little bit on the noisy side til about 9:30 PM, but it didn't bother us.  Great view of the ocean from balcony if you can get one ( we lucked out & got one ).  A few tips ....  1 ) Suggest heading to Indian Rocks for dinner on Friday or Saturday when its busy.  Traffic is a lot lighter.  2 ) Hit the fitness center before 8:30, otherwise its busy.  3 ) Wifi is free in lobby area.   Can get by with that.

title: We LOVE this hotel.
review: We appreciate that you enjoyed your stay.  It certainly seems as if this is not your first visit. Your tips will be so helpful. Sorry about any inconvenience the noise by the pool caused we thank you for being so understanding. We will look forward to your next stay

title: Resort? Nope, just your average hotel
review: We've never been to this area, so we studied the TA reviews of the various hotels carefully. The reviews of the Sheraton are all pretty accurate. There are some really nice features, and some where the hotel falls short.  We had reserved a Harbor King room, which means a room with a king bed and a harbor view. We were assigned a king room on the 4th floor with a view of the tennis courts. We reserved the harbor king because we wanted a view of the water, so we went back down to the front desk and asked to be moved.
